Detailed Review: I checked in with wife and 2 kids  on 17th August, for nearbye mumbai experience .. the staff upgraded my room to a suite, looking at my larger family at no additional costs. the cook in breakfast did something extra looking I had young kids with me ... overall a wow place for the money we spent .. lots of freebie‚Äôs in the hotel and the heritage look once you get in - makes it an experience of kind ... special thanks to the Manager Sir - for checking in couple of times for our comfort.. Stay blessed elphinstone team and a heartfelt Thankyou

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LATIFA
Detailed Review: Dear Respected Sir,  We were glad to stay with Elphinstone hotel. it's best with an attractive location. But, being your loving guest we will appreciate if you could provide privilege point card to attract more visitors to deal with hotel and should have benefits for both side, and about the room as superior should have the 1-bed selection for who comes and stay alone. there is no space to walk in these rooms.  meanwhile about being clean yes its nite and clean but should also have a lift because the main entries of the hotel have importance to get more visitors.  I would like also to special thank Mr. Hemond - Manager for being so helpful and being friendly to all visitors. wish you all the best  Thanks & King regards from the KINGDOM OF BAHRAIN LATIFA

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: deeksha karkada
Review: Choose this place for outstanding hotel stay experience
Detailed Review: This is the loveliest place of stay I've found! It is located at the heart of the city, close by to the markets, railway station. Perfect place to choose if shopping and sightseeing are one's goals for travel. The rooms are compact, the dining area is lovely. The breakfast they provide is tasty and healthy, tea/coffee is equally prepared well for tea time. The place is not attached to a restaurant but it will not be a worry with zomato/swiggy and other food deliveries that happen really quick to the location. Last but not the least all the staffs are super-friendly, always ready to help, managers are amazing, especially Mr. Hermond who guided us through everything.  To sum up, a very pleasant stay at this place, would always want to get back to this location in case of any work‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Erelbz
Detailed Review: Staying in this Hotel, is a different experience than taking regular hotel in Colaba. This hotel located 10 minutes walk from  the main market of Mumbai and if you are looking for very good  original food, fruits and spices, this is the right place for you. The hotel itself is very nice, clean and comfort. The team is great. don't afraid from the official manners, it's for the customers benefit. Highly recommend for othentic Indian stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venkateshwaran R
Detailed Review: As someone in reviews already mentioned, budget is an understatement for this hotel. Super good service, nice morning breakfast and to top up, good location. The staffs were super friendly. Total value for your money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sumit Saha
Review: Short official stay, but best stay.
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel during my official trip to Mumbai. It is a very good hotel, all types of food available, good, big and clean room. Staffs are very courteous and helpful. This is a big hotel and one can enjoy its luxury.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Giorgia O
Detailed Review: Perfect location. rooms are big and clean (for indian standards). All the staff is very nice and available at any time. They always smile and ready to help you for everything. They organise trip to Dharavi or city tour.  Concierge Rajesh is so COOL and NICE!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Blair moro
Detailed Review: I visited cafe lounge , and service was done by Mr Venus Miranda , the service done by him was quite amazing loved it..! fabulous awesome mr Venus was very kind to me while servicing,he didn't gave me any chance of complaining amazing ..!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MANFRED
Review: POLITE STAFF+ BEAR URBAN MALE MASSAGE MIND BLOWING + GOOD SPOT
Detailed Review: First thing I notice is staff is extremely polite and well mannered , they are pretty friendly , happy and always to guide n help you , hotel is small n budget friendly with free tea n coffee situated in prime locality , As a Gay solo traveller wanted a massages and booked BEAR URBAN MALE MASSAGES and I mus truely say it‚Äôs more than WORTH and MIND BLOWING , it‚Äôs important to choose a good masseur n genuine , hotel Is in busy area and taxi and food restaurants are available  Over all great hotel , great staff , super massage from bear ur an Male to Male and great memories

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tamira
Detailed Review: We really enjoyed our stay in Residency Fort. They were very friendly and helpful, especially Mr. Peter, Mr Kesar and Mr. Gopal. The rooms were good as well as the breakfast. We greatly recommend this hotel!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vive
Detailed Review: Had an on and off muscle pain due to stress and workout. Bumped into Gym instructor Sharukh at Novotel Juhu who instantly sensed my agony. His stretching techniques have given me instant releif. God bless him! He really knows his job. Not going to miss this gym in my next stay at Novotel. Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: willylim
Detailed Review: The hotel is right in the heart of financial district of Mumbai, with walking distance to excellent restaurants like ÿßŸÉŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿπÿ±ÿ®Ÿäÿ© Savoury (middle eastern food just next door) and award winning Pratap Lunch Home (Mangalorean seafood 10 mins walk away).  But what makes this hotel special is Concierge Rajesh, who will take care of your every needs like a personal concierge.  Whether is it cold beers delivered right to your room, or booking of day tours, or even walking you as a bodyguard to the nearest ATM to withdraw cash, Concierge Rajesh treats you like his best friend and family member and make you feel right at home.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Casey O
Detailed Review: This is a great hotel and I can't recommend it highly enough! The staff are amazing and make you feel very comfortable. It's in one of the best and safest locations in Mumbai with most of the tourist attractions within walking distance. And it's very clean and beautifully decorated. It also has an excellent breakfast buffet. I will absolutely stay here next time I come to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ann P
Detailed Review: My partner and I have stayed at the Residency hotel before and enjoyed the great service from all the staff,which has been consistently superior from the person who cleans the room to the wait staff,the concierge and reception staff all offer a pleasant and professional service at any time of the day or night. We hope to return to this hotel again  and would recommend it to anyone who is interested in a great service and a very cocomfortable clean and well appointed room. Well done Residency!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Abhishek Kanojiya
Detailed Review: i have visited here with my dad for a rest room. They have good bugets rooms and also they provide wifi, breakfast and many things. Service is good. Their staff is very polite and helpful. Must visit here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alessio R
Detailed Review: If you want to be in a hotel with 5 stars treatment but where you can feel at home like in a really Indian family place comes here. Everything is perfect from the A/C till the breakfast. Raji is a guy who started to work here more than 20 years ago, if you need anything just asking him and all your problem will be solved, I m not joking. Hope the best for this hotel and all the staff. From Italy with love Alessio, Federico, Fabio and Nicolas

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anton
Review: Wonderful hotel to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: The great hotel and friendly stuff service for the all duration of staying, and even beyond. Free of charge room for changing, still water, wi-fi, device charging, shopping guide, smiles from stuff - all that after check out! Especially thanks to concierge Rajesh!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anause
Detailed Review: Perfect. Clean,  hot water,  really good people,  beautiful,  awesome breakfast,  free te or caffe when ever you want, big confortable room...  They gave us a room when we arrived pretty earlier than the check in.  TOTALLY RECOMMENDED!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bjerkseth
Detailed Review: We have stayed almost a week. The taxi driver did not immediately find the hotel, due to a number of closed roads around the hotel (due to construction of new subway). As we get used to the place, it proved easy to find, and it‚Äôs very centrally located. Rooms are a bit small, and after one night in a quite small place, they willingly moved us to a slightly larger room, which was also not very close to the construction. Very well appointed, and the bathrooms are nice. Small restaurants, best for breakfast, which is satisfactory. During the day, they serve fresh lemon water, coffee, tea and biscuits for free, nice touch.  The strength of the hotel is their staff, whom all are super friendly, helpful, willing to support, and smiling. Really very nice people. Right beside the hotel‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kkgupta
Detailed Review: A place of elegance must say beautifully architecture complements the hotel it must see the hotel warm of the staff is awesome Greated by NAMASKAR to make sure all is taken care of us seamlessly done by the staff specially like to highlight SAKSHI and MANISHA in the lobby From guest relations very friendly and cooperative And Dhaneshree from the concierge.love the food  and will love to come back again

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: dEEpakK72
Detailed Review: We took one of the newly furbished rooms on the 3rd Floor. For the location, amenities, service, upkeep, comfort, the somewhat stiff tariff is full paisa vasool. In room dining options are plenty and the kitchen dishes up the fare to your taste, which again was very welcome. All staff were courteous, especially Ameya and Ajay at the Front Desk. Keep it Up!!üëç

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JEEVANANTHAM
Detailed Review: Hi i am jeevantham  from chennai .The hotel was too good, it was a homely atmosphere as well as luxurious. The rooms were neat and clean and also peaceful.The sweet memory of the hotel will remain in our heart forever. I would like to suggest everyone to stay in this hotel

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kersley
Detailed Review: Great people with great hospitality!  Friendly and caring staffs...nothing is too much trouble whether to book for a taxi, order food or any other requests. As per previous reviews you might be disappointed once you arrived at the property,  but once you're upstairs things are completely different and the holidays begin. Special mention to Hemonji, Mohunsinghji and Kaushalsinghji and all those that we can't remember their names. Highly recommended and we shall be back. Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: K.r.r
Detailed Review: All the employees of the hotel were very helpful,polite,friendly & never refuse to help .  They always keep a smile on their face & give you a warm welcome .  The room was well-equipped & was really comfortable.  Breakfast also was hygienic.  Excellent location for shopping .  Had a great time there ! Though it looks scary from outside but inside it is not less than a " 5* hotel " .  Will definitely go there again .

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Food Aficionado
Review: Nice hotel in a slightly scary surrounding
Detailed Review: The room was clean and had all the required amenities. The staff was great, very helpful and polite.  Limited options for breakfast but hygienic and fresh. 10min walk to Mohammed Ali road that has lots of yummy restaurants and Crawford clothing market.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Seema
Detailed Review: I had booked Hotel Elephinstone annexe twice now for my Mom to stay at while visiting Mumbai and can definitely say that she cannot stop saying just what good service she recieved from the staff of the Hotel especially Mr Hemond the manager who was always polite and helpful at all times. The Hotel is situated to all reach all tourist and main attractions and provides an exceptionally neat and tidy room and bathroom with a shower which is awesome. We can truly recommend Hotel Elephinstone when deciding on a hotel in Mumbai which has good value and location, excellent service and superb rooms !!! Will definitely book to stay there again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Roshni Jadon
Detailed Review: The staff at the hotel is very warm, from the reception to the room service. They were very polite and considerate of my needs. The rooms were comfortable and cleanliness was maintained. You will be attended with quick service , that‚Äôs for sure. As a solo traveler and a young girl, I felt very safe at the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venugopal
Detailed Review: stayed here several times,  a very nice experience. Every step is made homely and simple.  The reception ideas are just great from a welcome snack kit, Complementary beverages from morning tea, midday fresh Limbu pani to evening tea are some exceptional ideas. A relaxing open massage facility is simply different. Staff warmth and honest approach gives a homely family atmosphere. Overall it makes a stay complete at the price offered.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alice L
Detailed Review: Part of g-adventures tour.  All I have to say is I literally couldn‚Äôt stay in this place and had to get a different hotel for the night in Mumbai....... Other members of the tour mentioned: tiny bathroom where you have to take the toilet roll out before you shower otherwise everything would get wet, dampness was unreal apparently. Someone had ridiculously damp pillows......  hence why I had to go somewhere different.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alice L
Detailed Review: Part of g-adventures tour.  All I have to say is I literally couldn‚Äôt stay in this place and had to get a different hotel for the night in Mumbai....... Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alice L
Detailed Review: Part of g-adventures tour.  All I have to say is I literally couldn‚Äôt stay in this place and had to get a different hotel for the night in Mumbai....... Other members of the tour mentioned: tiny bathroom where you have to take the toilet roll out before you shower otherwise everything would get wet, dampness was unreal apparently. Someone had ridiculously damp pillows......  hence why I had to go somewhere different.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chris@ke11
Detailed Review: I spent only one day with my wife in this hotel in the end our trip to India. The hotel, restaurants and rooms are nice. It is expensive and the service is poor. The toilet was blocked and we spent two hours waiting for someone to fix the issue (actually we checked out without solution for the problem). The breakfast was also an issue if you don't like to have indian food: all pastries looked like have been made a week ago. The bread was dry and hard. We got very disappointed since the restaurant looks pretty good (LOOKs only).  Which I like the most - Quality of the food at breakfast was brilliant. Even though the breakfast spread was not huge the quality of what was presented and prepared was incredible.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shubham S
Detailed Review: I stayed for 4 nights in july .. Rooms are of medium size bur very neat n clean. Only beds are not very comfortable . The best part is that staffs are very polite and humble. Specially Rajesh was very helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankitverma09
Review: Convenient luxury hotel for business personal and professional
Detailed Review: Very convenient luxury hotel Stay gave me a great experience.. staff from reception to restaurant including housekeeping are friendly and professional and helpful Would like to mention some names Ramcy the Front office manager was very helpful Sandhya Afeefa Diksha mayuri from front desk Bushra and aparna from restaurant Foods was very good Ambiance very good Recommend for all professional and business people to stay there visiting for work or for leisure

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Haamim Ahmed
Detailed Review: I stayed with my family in this hotel for 5 days. We were lodged in the adjacent wing from the main hotel . Room was ok. But the hospitality of the staff is worth mentioning. Keshar,the waiter is a charmer.So are the front office staff. The location is in Fort. And away from hustle bustle of usual Mumbai crowd. Seemed that we stayed in a known neighbourhood. We enjoyed the stay to the fullest . You lived up to our expectations, Hotel Residency, Fort!!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: uri20123
Detailed Review: This was my 3 time in hottel. First of all the staff of the hottel is so nice and kind and i love every one of them. The room  is fantastic. Clean, great air condition, great bed and everithing you need. Location is excelent, in fort area. And breakfast is rich and tasty. This is great place to stay, a gives you peace and quiet in mumbai, dont miss it! Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jayson Chin
Detailed Review: The service is great first of all. Many thanks to Rajesh and Gopal for attending to my every need. Second, location, location, location. Close to the bay (Colaba), bars and restaurants, main sights, Churgate station etc. Overall good experience and good value.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: CarolineHerasse
Review: Such a great place to discover Mumbai
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 2 days with a friend of mine and it was perfect : the room (in the new wing of the building), the equipment, the cleanliness, the services, the breakfast. Special thanks to the staff, so kind and so helpful. They make you feel very welcome. I warmly recommend it!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Roc√≠o
Review: Great experience in the heart of Mumbai
Detailed Review: We stayed for 3 days in this hotel and we were very glad of our choice. The staff was very kind and helpful and they gave us great advice on what to visit around. It's walking distance to the Gate of India, Victoria Terminus and the main museums.  The room was comfortable and very clean and they gave us free bottled water every day. The breakfast was delicious and we also tried the dinner menu one night and we loved it. Even if you're late for breakfast, they will always have food and drinks to offer.   They're building a new metro line in this area of Mumbai so you should pack earplugs if you want to sleep well at night (we visited during monsoon when it's too warm for working during the day so they worked during the evening).  We were also very happy with their airport‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: UKBackpacker6
Review: Made Our stay in Monsoon much more comfortable
Detailed Review: All staff around hotel were very helpful and made us feel welcome at every opportunity. Breakfast had a wide range of options for free. Wifi was very reliable and tv with some English channels. Enjoyed free tea and coffee in the evenings with a free foot massager machine. The only real down side was very very noisy construction outside the hotel all through the night which often kept us awake, but this is probably out of their control. The hotel felt like a safe heaven when Mumbai got a bit much. Overall a very good experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LewisRuff
Review: Great Value & Location. Friendly Staff, Metro Renovations a Temporary Distraction
Detailed Review: The Club Room next door I stayed in June was larger than my first stay about 12 days earlier. But it wasn‚Äôt as clean as the smaller room. Dirty carpet, more worn than the main hotel. Air conditioners were great. Good shower pressure. and enclosure for a big guy like me. Excellent location not far from train station, Marina Drive, other sites. Very hospitable staff both day and night. Genuinely friendly and respectful. They still call you ‚Äúsir.‚Äù Good breakfast and breakfast area with fresh fruit, juices, fresh made omelet and waffles. Fresh cold lime juice during the day really hit the spot. I came very late like 2am and 5am from the airport but they accommodated me immediately with no delay including a cold drink. I used Uber everywhere for cheap. I would stay there again. They‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: WDLIV
Detailed Review: The hotel was very accommodating of my asks and the complimentary breakfast had everything needed to fuel a day of exploring the locality. Docked a star for one of the complimentary waters being unsealed.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Indra Saenen
Detailed Review: We had a very good time, the staff was very helpfull with the booking of our train tickets and upgraded our room for free (because the elevator in the New building was under construction and we had No problem walking stairs), break fast was also good.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: .Lorettah
Review: It's a good place with good services and the rooms are clean
Detailed Review: I stayed in Bawa for one month and chose to stay there because of the cleanness, good hygiene and fast wiFi. The manager plus his staff they are very welcoming and caring people they make you feel at home, they make sure you get whatever you ask . Keep it up

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RAVI
Detailed Review: Good service Staff r very friendly Hotel is very clean  24 hour service üëçüëç A perfect hotel for business. It's just 10 min walk to Mohammed Ali Road. Great airport pickup service Great place got worried when I saw the building exterior but the hotel world apart..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shubham
Review: Okayish if you don't want to spend much for a clean hotel room.
Detailed Review: I had visited last month with my family. I stayed there 3 days and here are the pros and cons, I want to break about this hotel :   Pros :  1. Clean hotel rooms with clean bathrooms.  2. 90% of the staffs are helpful and have a great attitude.  3. Beds are comfortable and there is a tea maker and a mini fridge for each room (atleast the one we stayed in)  4. WiFi is okay, reception is just a bit slow sometimes in the rooms.  5. Breakfast is wholesome, hopefully it would satisfy your appetite.  6. Lobby is good with two massaging chairs.  Cons :  1. Rooms are small. Though we stayed in a deluxe suite, the room was not as big as many hotels offer. The superior suites are too small, so avoid booking a superior suite if you have problem with tight and small places.  2. There is no‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Prabha
Detailed Review: Stayed at the Elphinstone hotel for around 10days in Mumbai.. I would definitely recommend this hotel as it's very clean, neat and great staff.. I enjoyed the coziness this hotel had to offer and I will surely visit them again. A special mention to Hemond, kushal Singh, Salman, the kitchen chef and all the staffs (I forgot their names‚òπÔ∏è). Thank you and see you soon..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pablo T
Detailed Review: I was 5 night at the hotel very cozy, clean well located with  professional management . Pretty French style second floor building with excellent rooms and good breakfast. I felt at home, there are a good  Indian restaurant downstairs . Very good value for the money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Fatiul Biraj
Review: Cosy little place with a set of wonderful people
Detailed Review: On my recent visit to Mumbai, chose to stay in Hotel Elphinstone Annex given my nature who likes to stay in the thick of things and as the hotel is ideally located near the bustling Crawford Market and in close proximity to the major landmarks of South Mumbai. Right from the time, I started to enquire about availability on my given dates till check out, I got wonderful and timely response from the reception. Even though I would have preferred the bigger suite rooms, but had to adjust with smaller Superior rooms as my preferred choice was unavailable on chosen dates. The place is well suited to families, couples and even the solo traveller. The amenities provided were adequate for this budget and some freebies such as complementary massage chairs, complementary evening tea and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raymond W
Detailed Review: The Hotel Elphinstone Annex is located near CSMT, near the Fort neighbour, and it is a very nice property.  We arrived very early on the train and were dreading having to walk around town until check in time, so we were delighted to be allowed to check in at 7.00am without even asking.  As many mention, the standard rooms are small, but you're in Mumbai. The New York of India, so this is to be expected. The same goes for the price. Mumbai is expensive, and just as prices in Ohio aren't the same as NY, prices in Mumbai are more expensive than rural India.  All rates at the hotel include a simple breakfast with a choice of either eggs or Indian dishes. It's a great way to start the day.  Finally, the hotel staff are friendly and helpful. Stay here. You'll be glad you did.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vaibhav S
Detailed Review: What I like most about this hotel is that staff is very friendly, breakfast was on time and variety of options available, Will recommend it to any person visiting Mumbai for business purposes. Dinner was also perfect.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Samthomas71
Detailed Review: Very good clean and affordable hotel. the staffs are very cordial .the place is very easy.All the stay arrangements are very good and comfortable . the food is very good and timely provided. The staffs are very helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rahman A
Review: 3 Star Hotel with a 5 Star Hospitality (except location) !
Detailed Review: It was a great pleasure to stay at this Hotel; The room might be little squeeze but clean enough; Bathroom toiletries was ok; The welcome snacks & drinks was a great please as we were tired having back2back flights from DAC-CCU-BOM!  The breakfast area was little bit cozy & basic; The transparent windows may give to ‚Äòclose to the nature‚Äô feel! but the WiFi speed needs improvement.   but the hospitality was unforgettable; everyone was extreme helpful; We received help on almost everything (UBer, Washing, food, gifts, many more);  The location was a bit awkward; it‚Äôs a totally commercial area; shops around the hotel is related to office stationary only! try to avoid the laundry attached to the Hotel; try restaurant savory; Lastly, there was a metro rail construction adjacent the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dhabya
Detailed Review: This was my second time to stay at residency  Always felt happy and comfortable  The staff are friendly and helpful  The rooms clean and breakfast buffet was delicious  Will definitely stay here again when in Mumbai  Thanks for all from the reception concierge bell boys and staff at buffet

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Madelaine W
Detailed Review: Stayed at the hotel for a month and it was absolutely fantastic. Wish I could stay longer. Everything about this hotel is top notch. As a solo female traveler I felt safe at all times and the staff went out of their way to make my stay a very pleasant one. Staff are helpful and friendly and go the extra mile from assisting to find an apartment to finding a Nail salon üòÇ. Service is excellent and all staff at all times are ready to assist. The rooms are spacious for this price range and neighborhood and well maintained and very clean. Water, kettle and amenities are provided with clean fresh linen and towels. The location is perfect if you work in Fort but also convenient for visiting Colaba and sight seeing spots such as Gate of India. There are a few restaurants in the area‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pesha63
Detailed Review: Hotel has good location, wonderfull stuff and food. It is clean. I adore this place. Stuff is polite and always ready to help you. Room was clen. I expect even better when construction works on metro and elevator will finish.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KaurK
Detailed Review: My cousin and I booked this hotel at the very last minute on our arrival in Mumbai. I cannot recommend this hotel enough for anyone planning to visit Mumbai. We were lucky enough to be upgraded to the newer rooms - clean, comfortable bed, lovely big shower.   Rajesh was very hospitable and always at hand to offer advice and the best tour and food recommendations - thanks to him we had a great stay :) he went above and beyond to make sure my cousin and I were happy :) the rest of the staff were just as helpful and always greeted us with a friendly smile :) I have nothing bad to say about this place. The Masala Dosa's at breakfast were delicious!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pandres87
Detailed Review: So sorry, but We had a terrible experience at the hotel. When we arrived the guy at the lobby offered us a ‚Äúbetter room‚Äù for the same price. It was not in the same building. It was raining, we were all wet. The room was ok. The 4 nights there were people doing some construction during the night and at 9 am every day start hammers and noises until 2 or 3 am. They told us they were not from The hotel but we saw how they tried to hide the guys from us. It was a really bad experience. Then, the might before the check out I Payed for everything, and the morining after, when we were in the uber about to leave, someoane said that I had to pay 800 rupies more. That‚Äôs delayed me like 10/15 minutes and I almost miss my flight. I will never come back to this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Traveler
Review: Not as advertised or as the photos show or even the room you will get started off bad got better üôèüèª
Detailed Review: Now   Whoever wrote the reviews other than the negative ones must have been smoking something or drunk   The hotel is nothing like the photos  Simply look at the photos to see my first room  There seems to be 3 buildings   (1) reception and breakfast  (2) renovated building  (3) building out of the movie slumdog millionaire   My first room was 405 building number 3 which I would not recommend at all, you will struggle to sleep, noise, smell, size, bed is small and certainly not worth the night rate, after talking to the hotel manager he moved me to another room   Room 706, good size, much better than the first one but with no window and a massive stench it was hard to sleep, in the morning when I woke up I explained to the duty manager I would contact Agoda and seek a refund for‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mandy K
Detailed Review: We chose this hotel at the last minute, going by the previous reviews, and what a great choice!  As soon as we arrived Rajesh met us with a smile and snacks.  Our entire hotel experience continued int his vein.  We were upgraded to the new building without extra charge which was a lovely bonus.  The room was lovely,in fact the whole building is beautifully designed and you really leave the hustle and bustle of Mumbai  behind.  Everyone working in the hotel was amazingly helpful and kind. I sadly did not get the name of the employee in our building but he did a fantastic job of cleaning our rooms.  On a particular note Rajesh made our experience extra special, no request was too much and he went above and beyond to make our time special.  No request was too small or silly!  He is‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anoopxtreem
Detailed Review: The hotel itself is clean and neat. Service is good and staff are polite. What‚Äôs wrong are the misleading pictures posted by the hotel. This is located in a dingy alleyway and the reception area is nothing like the pictures. The rooms are terribly small and not worth the 5k per night they charge.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Christine T
Detailed Review: Was recommended this place by friends.   Loved it! Feels like, home. Rajesh - was amazing, nothing was ever too much, staff super friendly and very accomodating. Really enjoyed our stay here x   Thank you for your hospitality x

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: djdan17
Detailed Review: We were upgraded to a Suite Room, which was amazing and very spacious. The staff there are very helpful and accomodating, especially Peter and Rajesh who we dealt with on most occasions. Overall a nice cosy hotel, and the staff make you feel so welcome.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: willistay
Detailed Review: Staff always extremely happy and helpful.  We were given an upgrade to their hotel next door which was a brucey bonus as the room was fantastic; a wanted relief from the humidity and intensity of the Indian summer!  Breakfast was good however it‚Äôs unfortunate that the room is so small and if busy (more than circa 15 people are already eating) you will have to wait until some leave. This however didn‚Äôt interfere with the quality of our stay so would highly recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Flyer40115253234
Detailed Review: We are here for business and surprisingly were cordially invited by Monideepa and Delzine to join the Wednesday cockatiel hosted by the GM of the hotel. We are very pleased with the whole arrangements. Also the stay is very comfortable and foods are delicious. Will surely come back to the hotel in future without fail.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anima
Detailed Review: It‚Äôs a great budgeted hotel to stay. Heritage places are at a reachable distance. Very helpful assistance from the staff. It hasclean and hygiene rooms.  Various taxi services are available. A good hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Goda B
Detailed Review: Very clean inside despite the exterior! We were a little bit alarmed when the taxi droped us, but as we entered inside everything was ok. Good breakfast, very friendly and helpful staff. I can recommend that hotel, if you need a place to stay in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pernille H
Detailed Review: Great little hotel in downtown located near the Central Station. It does not look of much from the outside but inside it is nice. Rooms were nice and clean and with a modern decor. Staff was exceptionally nice and would go out of their way to help. Wifi was great also. Breakfast was toast and eggs and nothing to brag about. Good value for money - and again: great staff!!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anurag Kumar
Detailed Review: The stay was perfect. Staff was very kind and sweet. Cleanliness was also good. The only thing that i was quite disappointed with was the food.The food was good but my expectations were quite high after seeing all other services But all in all it was a great hotel.A great experience in this hotel. Is  you are finding a hotel at this place the please stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suzanne L
Detailed Review: We arrived late at night, after a long day of flight travel. Quick as you please helpers were there to help with our (over) abundance of suitcases, greeting us by name, and a tray of refreshments at the ready. They were aware of my request for a room to accommodate the three of us. All our questions were answered with expertise and calm reassurance. ( I wish I‚Äôd taken note of the night shift man‚Äôs name, because his hospitality was superb.) Our room suited us perfectly. The porter even ran out to find us some cold beers in spite of the late hour (and generally non drinking area.)We had a great quiet and comfortable night‚Äôs sleep.  In the morning, Peter was there to make us feel welcome and guide us through a delicious array of breakfast choices, from fresh eggs to dosas and more.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vickialvarez2003
Detailed Review: My daughter (age 20) and I spent two nights at this hotel and had a great experience. The breakfast, rooms, and staff were excellent. We loved the location with short walking distance to the Gateway to India. The staff were very helpful and courteous.  Would definitely recommend this place for stays in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mia B
Detailed Review: The hotel was very central to everything, the room was comfortable and clean and the staff were absolutely amazing. The breakfast was excellent and the free lime drink in the lobby helped with the heat.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sudarshan H
Review: Nice small hotel but with problems
Detailed Review: The hotel is in an excellent location close to all major landmarks in fort area. We picked this as we had work at the Mumbai university, which is at a walking distance.  It had two issues - First is that it is right next to the metro construction and was noisy all night. This wasn‚Äôt a big problem for us.  Next, the breakfast was sub-par. Both the chutneys were spoilt by 10AM. Idlis were hard and rubbery. Both of us ended up with a stomach upset by afternoon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kashif B
Detailed Review: I was impressed by the hospitality of the staff. Location of the hotel is good as it's near to Marine drive. Rooms are well maintained and cosy. Breakfast was nice; they have lot of options to choose from.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sacha P
Detailed Review: I spent a short but very pleasant time in this hotel. The room is comfortable, and clean. The staff is welcoming, and friendly, always ready to help. The breakfast is ok. the location is very well located near the restaurants of the station to take the tram.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ruth S
Detailed Review: Although there‚Äôs work going on near to the hotel to form an underground, the hotel is in a lively location. Close enough to museum and oval maidan to walk. Good breakfast and other complementary offers including a foot massage machine. Staff very helpful and gave good advice about the local area, especially Gopal who was very helpful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Adityamerchant
Detailed Review: We stayed on may 14th was a transit stay as we had flight in the evening food served in buffet was excellent service was excellent Rehman ,pillai and Oscar took good care free wifi was provided close to airport and free transfer to airport was provided overall excellent stay and service

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pramila D
Detailed Review: We attended a family party on 5th May at the banquet hall at Le Grand - Gusto. The service was excellent, and the food was delicious.  Mr. More, Mr. Oscar & Gusto staff,  thank you !! The party was a huge success !!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jeetendra
Detailed Review: Whilst in Mumbai, I only prefer staying at Bawa Regency as it is near to Dadar station and you get connectivity to any place from there. You can also get long route busses which is merely 100 meters from the hotel.  Talking about the rooms - they are clean, well maintained and hygienic. WiFi signal is also good.  Staff - they are very professional and are very friendly in nature and always greet you with a smile. I feel like home.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Khurshid Jahan Pia
Detailed Review: I stayed 3 months in Bawa during my project work and chose to stay here the whole duration because of their wonderful behaviour, cleanliness, food and care. Fast Internet, availability of hot water 24/7hrs,room service and great food amazed me always. From entrance gate to my room i got always nice smiles. Any kind of issue got immediately resolved. I would like to come back again to Bawa.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mso Mso
Detailed Review: Staff speak good English, I really needed that. They were helpful in every way concerning our stay there, beyond hotel issues. Breakfast is a-la-carte and is good, and the rooms are spacious. Fast speed internet available too. Enjoyed our stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: melandged
Review: DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL - it is AWFUL
Detailed Review: The hotel is on a really really busy road and its hard to get in an out of the front doors. There is no security and you need to climb a big flight of stairs plus, it smells terrible. The rooms are tiny and ours had no window with no option to upgrade. They had music going until 1am and when I complained they finally turned it off. The rooms are super small and the bathroom is terrible.  There are no nice restaurants or cafes close by and the staff speak very little English. There are no maps available and the breakfast is slow and tasteless.  The service was the worst service I had ever seen or experienced. They throw any left over food out the window and the entire place is dirty.  DO NOT STAY HERE. Its just terrible. We checked out early because of poor service and because it‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sri
Detailed Review: perfect stay in south mumbai.very near to victoria terminus and crawford market.Dont get misguided by the outer building.The breakfast is adequate not  much options.Stayed there for two days.One day in Victoria suite and another day in deluxe room.Both was equally goog.Loved Elphinstone

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Katie C
Detailed Review: I chose this hotel for its location and it did not disappoint.  At first, walking up the stairs I was thinking ‚Äúoh no. This is going to be awful...‚Äù dark, dusty and dirty, wires hanging out all over the place. It looked like something out of a horror film.  As soon as I rounded the last flight of steps though, I could smell roses and feel the cooling blast of air conditioning. Friendly receptionist greeted me and I was shown to my immaculately clean and smart room.  Breakfast = perfect. Banana, toast, eggs, tea/coffee.  Afternoon tea and biscuits every day at 5pm was a bonus!   WiFi was fast in the lobby and hit & miss in the room.  No window but I didn‚Äôt mind - it was just a place to rest my head after a day of sight seeing.  PACK EAR PLUGS!!!  Somebody nearby plays noisy music‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kathrin Opielma
Review: Very great hotel with friendly staff
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful stay and experienced exceptional service by the hotel staff. Everyone was very friendly, we got picked up from the airport and were even assisted in booking further travel arrangements. Communication in advance was great and we really enjoyed our stay. Would definitely recommend, location was extremely good too!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Evievv
Review: Could suck it up for one day.
Detailed Review: another gadventures traveller here  Hot. Smelly. Damp. Bad wifi.  That's all I've put in my notes. I think considering we spent less than a day here, it's one that can be sucked up. We just did not enjoy it at all.   The one positive is the lovely security guard at the door.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Evievv
Review: Could suck it up for one day.
Detailed Review: another gadventures traveller here  Hot. Smelly. Damp. Bad wifi.  That's all I've put in my notes. I think considering we spent less than a day here, it's one that can be sucked up. We just did not enjoy it at all.   The one positive is the lovely security guard at the door.

Name: Evievv
Review: Could suck it up for one day.
Detailed Review: another gadventures traveller here  Hot. Smelly. Damp. Bad wifi.  That's all I've put in my notes. I think considering we spent less than a day here, it's one that can be sucked up. We just did not enjoy it at all.   The one positive is the lovely security guard at the door.

Review: Could suck it up for one day.
Detailed Review: another gadventures traveller here  Hot. Smelly. Damp. Bad wifi.  That's all I've put in my notes. I think considering we spent less than a day here, it's one that can be sucked up. We just did not enjoy it at all.   The one positive is the lovely security guard at the door.

Name: Evievv
Review: Could suck it up for one day.
Detailed Review: another gadventures traveller here  Hot. Smelly. Damp. Bad wifi.  That's all I've put in my notes. I think considering we spent less than a day here, it's one that can be sucked up. We just did not enjoy it at all.   The one positive is the lovely security guard at the door.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: preet
Detailed Review: i visited here many times and stayed here one of the most beautiful hotel in mumbai with all the facility awesome place and i will give more than 5 star.affordable rate with high class facility and u will get delicious food here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: James b
Detailed Review: GREAT PLACE EXCELLENT SERVICE  Great staff  Very modern rooms , great showers , plenty of hot water fridge in room The staff are great and help you with everything. They will get you beer and put it in your fridge. they will walk you to a great restaurant. book this place your search is over. Break fast is included

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mrscakey
Detailed Review: I love this hotel. Every single member of staff goes out of their way to be helpful. Lovely breakfast and great rooms too  Faultless !  Also, they have a fab foot massager for when you‚Äôve done too much exploring üëçüèª

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Brownie the Dog
Detailed Review: Overall my stay in this hotel was very pleasant. The cheapest category room deluxe had a reminiscent of a Japanese shoe box hotel room but the club room where I stayed for the last two nights were much better with bigger space and better decor. Cleanliness is guaranteed in both room types. The staff were available round the clock. The receptionist greeteed me at most professionalism at four AM upon my arrival. The staff named Gopel was very efficient and helpful each time I had to travel to the other side of the island. I thank all of them who made my stay exceptional.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: GAZEFC1
Detailed Review: I can say from a service point of view this has to be the best hotel I have ever stayed in. Every member I encountered was brilliant.  From the moment my wife and I arrived we knew we had made the best choice.  The room was in the annex and a lift was available. It was clean spacious with ac.  Breakfast was taken in the main building with a great choice on offer.  There are metro works going on outside on the main road which affect traffic and other businesses , but it will come to an end.  We had no issues walking locally and got to Churchgate station on foot.  Plenty of places to explore close to the hotel !  Would not hesitate in coming back !

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: maupiesreviews
Review: Great hotel with even better staff
Detailed Review: Nice clean hotel in Fort. Great location where a lot of things are at walking distance. The rooms are modern and clean. The breakfast is perfect. And the staff (thanks Gopal and Kesar and all the others) does everything to make you feel welcome. Great stay and would certainly recommend it for anyone who will be visiting Mumbai!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: My stay was comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful. I got best deals for my booking. The location of the property is very convenient from metro station and Mumbai airport. There are so many nearby places to visit. Recommended to solo travellers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: saraogi
Detailed Review: TATA had an event in ITC , met these two girls from guest relation who escorted me and showed me the entire hotel , they talked about the paintings and the history about it  the food was good.  glad to meet pooja and hira , thank you for your time . well be back soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: tnbms162016
Review: Reception staff good, otherwise very poor
Detailed Review: This hotel was much more downmarket than I'd expected. The room was cramped and not at all attractive. There was a problem with the electrics at night - the room lights kept coming on every ten minutes from 3 a.m. until 8 a.m. because of some fault in another room. The only way to stop this was to take the key out of the slot by the door, disabling all the electrics in the room. This meant no air-con, and it was hot and stuffy. The staff tried to fix it but failed. Also, there are construction works nearby (metro line extension), with noisy pile-driving, including at night.  The front desk staff were fine - polite and helpful. Other staff less so. The breakfast was pathetic.(But maybe not so bad if you like Indian food at breakfast.). All in all, a very poor stay. Not‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: katietimms
Review: Very friendly staff, great food, handy location
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 3 nights and it was great. The staff are so helpful, even getting us beers and leaving them in our fridge as the hotel can't serve alcohol. The room was a good basic with en suite. Noise didn't bother us but our room was away from the metro works. The food was brilliant. We had dinner here on the first night and it was very tasty and affordable. Breakfast was good too, with some good Indian options to try. Would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HOPPO43
Detailed Review: My wife and I spent 2 nights here. Good rooms. Really comfy bed. Brilliant helpful friendly staff. Had some good chats with the 3 waiters in the restaurant. Only 10 min walk from CST railway station. Only drawback was construction of new metro station right outside our room. They work all night. Very noisy but nothing the hotel can do about it.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 6254arun
Review: Enjoyed our stay at le grande Hotel
Detailed Review: My stay in  Hotel Le Grand along with about 60 guests from 16th April 2019 until check out on 19th April was a pleasant experience for all of us.I had booked 22 rooms in all for about 60 guests who had come to attend my daughters wedding in a nearby 5 star venue.  Right after the rooms were booked in January 2019, Manager Oscar Pareira and  F&B Manager Ramchandra More would sit with us patiently on multiple occasions answering our queries regarding our stay as well as planning the menu for the banquets for the noon and night of 17th April for more than 80-85 guests.  Guests were overall quite happy with the rooms and service, and also the food served at breakfast and dinners and especially the spread of dishes served at the banquets 17th April. Every one appreciated the quality‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SeanNile
Detailed Review: The hotel looks very small from outside but has spacious rooms.  Clean and neat. Well maintained property.  Very close to airport.  Value for money. Newspapers are provided everyday.   Food is tasty.  Buffet Breakfast has a good spread.   Parking is very limited and vehicles are parked haphazardly.  Not much help from the people at the parking area.   Room Service and reception folks need a bit of customer handling skills.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: We went to the Bombay in month of March to roam over with my husband. Visit at a hotel and it was aahhhh superb. Everything was neat and clean services provided to us was excellent. Food quality and service was good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: We went to the Bombay in month of March to roam over with my husband. Visit at a hotel and it was aahhhh superb. Everything was neat and clean services provided to us was excellent. Food quality and service was good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: We went to the Bombay in month of March to roam over with my husband. Visit at a hotel and it was aahhhh superb. Everything was neat and clean services provided to us was excellent. Food quality and service was good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: We went to the Bombay in month of March to roam over with my husband. Visit at a hotel and it was aahhhh superb. Everything was neat and clean services provided to us was excellent. Food quality and service was good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: We went to the Bombay in month of March to roam over with my husband. Visit at a hotel and it was aahhhh superb. Everything was neat and clean services provided to us was excellent. Food quality and service was good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Peter P
Detailed Review: we stayed at this hotel in one of the small rooms. It had everything we needed. Great bed. The all male staff could not do enough for us. They made us feel like we had known them and them us for years.  We spent many fun times discussing cricket (Australia India one dayers were on) (and we won) Nothing was too much trouble and it will be our hotel of choice when we return to Mumbai. It was a great place to finish out month long visit to India. Close to the main terminal and lots of parks and places to visit nearby. Peter and Sue

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Paul H
Detailed Review: Do not hesitate to stay here, the rooms, especially Club rooms in the Annexe are of an exceedingly high standard. The staff are wonderful, in particular, Rajesh, Roshan, Lawrence (the Manager), Kumar, in fact, all the staff cannot do enough for you.  You will not be disappointed staying here, it's also in the area that's handy to all the best sights to be seen, a short walk or cheap taxi ride away.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TensionTamers
Detailed Review: In the buzz of Mumbai daily living lies this hotel with good and comfortable beds in fairly small rooms but you don't need that much more. Good and attentive staff trying to make your stay as smooth and inspiring as possible with the concierges Rajesh and his colleague who's name I forgot doing their utmost best to bring book a tour, find a restaurant or even bring you there on the hotel motorbike! Great value for money!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sdasroy
Detailed Review: Excellent Stay and highly recommend delighted with service in all means , location , cleanliness, food and amazing courteous staff , supportive and friendly helped in finding location out of way ,breakfast is also great

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Maya Papaya
Detailed Review: I was shocked by the level of service at this hotel. We booked it for location (incredible) and the price (super affordable) but the staff the worked here continuously provided 5 star service. When we asked for a good place to grab a beer, the offered a recommendation and walked us there. They called restaurants in advance to make sure the busy spots would have a table waiting for us. The breakfasts were included with our stay and didn‚Äôt just have cereal: I‚Äôm talking freshly made dosa, cereals, an omelette bar, a barista with fresh lattes, chai, fruit, and lovely kind staff.   Gopal and Rajish took extra care to make sure our stay was great. Our room exceeded expectations and was much quieter than I expected.   This is a lovely hotel in a great area that felt safe and friendly.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Joke G
Review: I hope to come back soon!
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel, with many of Mumbai's highlights in the neighbourhood. Rooms are small but comfortable, modern and clean. Breakfast was excellent. But most of all, the staff was very friendly and helpful at the reception, the concierge, in the restaurant,...

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ttconner
Detailed Review: Easy location for traveling the Fort area by foot (everything is within a 15-25 minute walk) or accessing the train (15 min walk to church gate station and the western line fast train.)  Clean, nice, cool, quiet and comfy rooms well stocked with soaps, towels and toiletries with wonderful showers. Great place to come back to after a sweaty busy day! Great bed, variety of pillows thicknesses and super great comfy bed covers.   Excellent breakfast buffet with fresh chai or fresh espresso, cappuccino, etc. made to order and egg grill for eggs any way you like including omelets, and all continental items, Indian items, including deliciously prepared potatoes, and delicious always freshly cut and tree ripened fruits! yogurt, lassi, cereals, etc. but lite on meats.   Same day laundry‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Megan Butler
Detailed Review: Great position to walk everywhere like markets, train station, museum and various restaurants etc.  Uber and Taxis are there too which staff can assist with.  Staff speak English well and are full of smiles. They do not push any tours or favour any particular tour companies but have brochures and maps that are handy and will help assist with organising same if needed.  There are different sections to this hotel. We stayed in the new middle section. Although stairs and no lift the staff were there to help carry luggage.  When we first entered the room we got a shock as we were expecting the room to be bigger. But we had a bar fridge, a kettle, coffee, sugar and crema (powdered milk). These were restocked every day when the room was beautifully cleaned. The room needed to be no‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LucyanneLondon
Detailed Review: Stayed at this hotel for a week in March 2019, lovely hotel with great staff that gave us loads of tips during our stay and let us have breakfast really early on last day so that we could eat before our morning flight.  Thank you for a lovely stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Latonia G
Detailed Review: I recently stayed at Hotel Residency Fort and I cannot say enough nice things about the hotel or the staff.  The rooms were immaculate and the staff was superb!  I enjoyed having masala chai in the hotel lounge with the other guests where we could interact with the staff and get to learn more about them, their families and the sights of Mumbai.  The hotel is centrally located and within easy walking distance of Churchgate rail station and Victoria Terminus.  The staff was extremely attentive and stood ready to assist in any way they could.  Concierge Rajesh went above and beyond to make sure my experience in Mumbai was amazing.  Thank you, Rajesh!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lynne P
Review: Well situated and really helpful staff!
Detailed Review: We found this hotel to be clean and friendly, with comfortable rooms and a bright breakfast room serving a good range of breakfast options.  There was some noise from the street because of the construction work on the new metro system but it didn't spoil our stay.  In reality we only had 1.5 days in Mumbai and the hotel was extremely well placed for us to see a number of key sites of interest - and we were ale to walk easily to what was formerly the Prince of Wales Museum, the art galleries, the train station (from where we caught a local train to go on a trip to Dharavi Slum (highly recommended!) and the Gateway to India....In particular we appreciated the help given to us by Gopal, one of the reception staff in the hotel

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kerstin Lovoll
Review: Very good hotel with very helpful staff!
Detailed Review: We spent 4 nights there, and - exept from the first night - in a very quiet and lovely room. The noise outside is due to the building of a new metro station, and that will be very good later on. The staff were very helpful and nice. We had a friend who were ill, and ended up in hospital, and they helped a lot! We will definately stay there again!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vaibhav Mavani
Detailed Review: Awesome room service n cleaning. Quick and smooth service providing when ever we call instantly present at our room for fulfill ours demand... Really, I personally give 10 out of 10 but here rating is 5 so I'll give full star to this service...

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ash P
Review: A beautiful hotel with great staff
Detailed Review: We stayed at the residency Fort Hotel in March and we loved every minute. The staff could not do enough for you from the reception to the bellboy to the cleaners and the waiters. Great customer service from all. We had complementary about breakfast at the hotel and this was excellent with many varieties for your pallet. The hotel is in a central place and you can reach the gateway of India the Taj hotel within 10 minutes of walking. To go to chapati beach or to juhu beach you would be looking at approximately 20 to 25 minutes by car. Mumbai itself is very clean and getting cleaner by the day there is a metro being built right near the hotel and that may cause some noise if you've got the rooms at the front of the hotel. When we got to the hotel we were supplied with the deluxe‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rednipnoj
Detailed Review: We arrived very late at night/early morning but nevertheless the welcome was incredible! This set the tone for our short stay, friendly and helpful staff with a real personal touch that you don't get in larger hotels. Nothing was too much trouble. We stayed in a new annex room, which was modern and clean - and even a balcony to view the bustling street below. This was a great base for sightseeing around the Fort district, so we walked everywhere even at night, and it felt very safe. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hawaii-Ina
Detailed Review: We requested a room with a window...which we had! Great room, great Staff...Peter was very helpful as our luggage went missing for 36 plus hours...he helped in the recovery. The breakfast is always delicious and the same staff so very pleasant! The only glitch....there is construction that blocks the road....so more congested and difficult to get a taxi. But all in a good place which is budget easy.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Globbie
Review: Seriously, I don‚Äôt understand the glowing reviews...
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel because of its location and overwhelmingly positive reviews, but after staying four nights there, I am really disappointed.  The biggest issue for me is the cleanliness of my room and bathroom. Upon arrival, I noticed that the floor was not cleaned properly, and the bed linens were stained as well. The stained towels looked like they have been used for decades and were mostly frayed.   My room was small but the bathroom was tiny! The door almost touched the toilet seat when I opened it, and it was impossible to keep the door opened.  The best thing about this hotel is the location, followed by the friendly service. Breakfasts offer a variety of choices including Western and Indian, which was good.  Another issue for me was the metro construction works right‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kristian
Detailed Review: This hotel wekcomes you with open arms and the staff are very friendly and want to make your stay as good as possible.   We got extra good support from Gopal which made sure we had everything we needed and wanted, also provided us with good tips for the City of Mumbai.   Good value for money a d the location is good.  Thanks   Best regards  Kristian & Thais

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vijaymanoo
Detailed Review: My day in Lalit is going very comfortable I checked in today morning in room no #116. The food was very tasty with special mention of Khmer. The hotel staff is very helpful,with special mention of MrMangesh of laundry section and Miss Manish from guest relation.   Regards Capt.Vijay RAJ Manohar

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Runwildjohn
Detailed Review: This hotel very clean and the staff are friendly and helpful. The buffet breakfast was good and there was complimentary lime juice and tea available all day. Our room was small but well equipped. The access road is currently blocked by Metro excavations so the road outside the front of the hotel is very quiet.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Heena Shaikh
Detailed Review: Good ambience, great staff , yummy food, located close to mumbai international airport and near to j b nagar metro stn, extremely clean and comfortable. A place to visit again n again Keep it up Hotel Le Grande

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Harshit
Detailed Review: Nice hotel with nice rooms and good service of food and friendly staff. Located near airport with taxi services available for pickup and dropping. Location near to chakala metro station approximately 1 km.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sangeeta Tubki
Detailed Review: Always happy to stay in this hotel. Best place to stay near Airport. Staff are very helpful and cooperative. Rooms are Clean and specious. Restaraunt staff is good and food is also too delicious. .  I recommend this hotel to all specially Goans because one of d Director Mr. Rodrigues of this hotel is also from Goa itself  & he treat Gains in such a way that we feel like this is a home away from home.  Thank you everybody to make our stay above  the expectations. We will definitely come back.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kalyan Waghmare
Detailed Review: We had booked this hotel through TBI for overnight stay of our return journey from Bangkok. Attendant at airport was very prompt and helpful and check in was smooth front desk staff was very helpful Rooms and washrooms were neat and clean.  Limited but delicious breakfast and food at Restaurant was awasum , transfer to Airport was ptoMpt. Enjoyed our stay at Le Grande.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lily_indy
Detailed Review: Staff are extremely friendly and pleasant Complementary breakfast was good...Indian OR eggs available. Great choice. Fruit, cookies, chocolates in room. Room was large and comfortable.  Bathroom is standard for an Indian hotel. Instant hit water..rare for miist Indian hotels Bottle water in room with kettle. In the West this is only available in 5* hotels  Central to train station.  Staff will organise taxi on request Overall...nothing is to much for the staff! Onsite bakery can be a bit noisy..suggest you don't st e.g. on 1st floor

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hik0
Detailed Review: Very good location, just short distance to Victoria train station and walking distance to many highlights. City bus stop is also nearby. Superior room is small but perfectly maintained and extremely clean, There is no window in the room but they have very pleasant common area with big windows. Hot shower is great and WiFi connection is excellent. The tasty breakfast is not too big but really enough. The accommodation is very safety so I can recommend it to single women. And the hospitality is incredible! Great value for money!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LizJamesJosie
Review: perfect place to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: We had to spend a night and a day in Mumbai before a flight to Bengaluru and were rather dreading this, but our stay at this hotel was just fabulous. It looked pretty depressing from the street, but It made a fantastic base for exploring the places nearby. The building has a huge colonaded balcony  on the first floor at the top of the stairs with offices and workrooms off it. We could see a bunch of women depitting piles of dates in one of the rooms, all sitting on the floor. We could easily walk to Crawford Market and through lovely streets which are mostly easy to cross southwards to the Gateway of India and the Oval. We left our bags near reception for most of the day. The hotel itself was a few minutes taxi drive from the main station and much more peaceful than we thought‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Arvind Sharma
Review: If in Mumbai the Home is Elphinstone Annex
Detailed Review: I rate this hotel as superlative. Have stayed here many times, deceptive from outside, but once you step into the hotel it is bliss. Best Personnel, Best in cleanliness, swiftly attended to. Best luck.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: STEWY88
Detailed Review: When your taxi drops you off here you will think he‚Äôs made a mistake or he‚Äôs having a laugh- crowds of men hanging round on a broken litter strewn pavement and a sign with a pointy arrow flagging up the scruffiest entrance to a hotel I‚Äôve ever seen . You‚Äôll hesitate - then shrug your shoulders and start to climb the delapidated stairs - then at the top of the second flight you will push through a glass door and then it will hit you !!!‚Äî- this is really special - elegant and comfortable and the reception staff will make a fuss of you‚Äîthey will do anything to help ‚Äî We LOVED IT ‚Äî even when they directed us back through the door and along a dirty corridor to what looked like a huge cupboard door ( there was a man asleep on the floor  just a few yards away ) ‚Äî and then you open the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bdassani
Review: Best experience of any hotel, I keep coming back
Detailed Review: This is the third time I‚Äôve stayed at this hotel. Every time the experience has been wonderful. The outside of the building is not too impressive but upon entering, one is charmed by the elegance of the interior. The front desk staff is warm and welcoming. All the staff at the hotel are pleasant and ready to help with a smile. The rooms are clean with comfortable beds and attached bathrooms. Breakfast is free and in the evening, hot chai is served in the lobby, which is an added bonus. The location is great for seeing the sights, shopping, eating at various restaurants and cafes. If you can climb the flight of stairs to the first floor, this is the best value you can find in Mumbai

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: muneer19870
Detailed Review: It was my 2time in Mumbai to meet friends and we have book this hotel from net and until we reach there we were not shore how it works there  but when we reach there it was nice place and clean and quit place to stay and the people are working there are really nice person and well speaking English and helpful to know u all places u want go .so we are really looking forward to see them again in our next trip .and i want say thank to them .from Peter kapac and sajad ahmad

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Meenashay
Detailed Review: Was not sure about the hotel at first when I landed on the main road but once I entered their property it was an absolute treat the place is centrally located the ambiance is really good , the breakfast also is real good   All in all a good place

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shanil S
Review: One of a kind - Simply Perfect Hotel
Detailed Review: 1. Very well priced for Mumbai.  2. Excellent and friendly service from the staff. Felt right at home.  3. Cheap taxis wait directly outside the hotel.  4. Free back, neck and feet massage machines provided for use at guests leisure. 5. The hotel offers bottled water for sale at a very very cheap price. Very convenient since guests don‚Äôt have to go looking for safe drinking water. 6. Breakfast was good.  7. Cannot fault this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: NA- Australia
Detailed Review: The reception staff were lovely and reception area charming. The rest of the staff here were amenable, helpful within the bounds of the environment, and very pleasant.   This is where the charm ceases!  Physically the hotel is years past a major overhaul.   Many things not on the brochure  * They don‚Äôt have standard rooms.  Advertising is deceptive. So if you are booking a superior room.  It is base room. Apparently the deluxe and suites might have windows  * The skid row looking entrance- filthy and poorly lit, climbing over idlers and motorcycles to get to the stairs.  * The thumping music from the bar downstairs to one am.  * The rooms were not sound proof * The rooms having the ambience of prison cells( ... I do know! Doors opening into corridor, no windows,prisoners are‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kanikaneg
Detailed Review: It is one of the oldest hotel. My dad has also visited here during his young age. We stayed here for 2 days. Service is great. The location is perfect. One can visit marine drive Colaba Worli all famous places nearby.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Col W
Review: Value for money with good staff
Detailed Review: I was in older part of hotel and found it to be clean with most things a guest would need. The only difficulty I had was that india seems to suffer from the english idea of small showers. I couldn't bend over to wash properly. Take your own body wash cloth as there is non offered. The staff are great and I have a special thanks to Rajesh who was very helpful. I convalesced here for 5 days after major surgery and will return. The Train subway construction work outside in the street was a little noisy but was beyond the control of the hotel and wont be there forever.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MawiH2014
Detailed Review: We were travalling with 2 small children (5 months and 5 years) and all staff was so extremely friendly and helpful in any respect. They put us in a new tract next door in a spacious, qiet and very comfortable room. It's luxury quality! The staff at the reception is full of good advice and the guys in the breakfast area are just amazingly friendly. I can't think of a better hotel in Mumbai. We would definetely come back here. Our 5 yr old son still says this was the best place on our whole trip to India.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Steve
Detailed Review: Don't be overwhelmed by hotel choices in Mumbai. If you're looking for something local, mid-priced, comfortable, convenient to sites and activities, this is the place. Perfectly comfortable room and bathroom (unless you're looking for vastly spacious). Super, super, super attentive staff. Rajesh will take exceptional care of you: upon arrival; when recommending how to spend your day; when arranging for a cab for you. Breakfast is delicious (and it's so convenient to start your day by not having to look for or spend on a restaurant). I couldn't have had a more comfortable introduction to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Leytonstonecrop
Review: Good hotel, but be aware of road works
Detailed Review: Clean, comfortable. Attentive service, good breakfast. Well located from the point of view of seeing the colonial-era sights, and in walking distance of two good restaurants. But at the moment there are works at the end of the street, very close to the hotel, digging for the Mumbai Metro and the drilling continues day and night. I slept OK but some people might be affected, and taxi drivers have difficulty reaching the hotel because the obvious access route is blocked.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: adamgeo
Detailed Review: Comfort.... from our 2 nights in the lovely club rooms to 4 more nights in a regular, but most comfortable room..our stay was special... the smiling faces of the staff...Gopal at the door ready for any help he can give, to Peter either at the front desk or being the dining room host... with his tip of the day for us... where to go... see, , enjoy a wine, or dinner also  maybe that little store front shop down the road... he was ever helpful, and smiling.  The boutique hotel just down from the UNESCO main train station, close to the pier, as many or as little walking streets through Mumbai.. The great varied breakfast, to the cappuccinos, wonderful dining room staff... always a song and a smile.. sitting area very comfortable... We loved it all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kernewek
Detailed Review: After a long flight from London we were looking forward to having a comfortable place to have a shower and to relax. The drive from the airport was typically frenetic but the hotel itself was a haven of calm. With the works for the Mumbai Metro going on outside we cannot say that our stay was quiet but that is not within the hotels power. Our first two nights were in a room in the hotel Annex next door to the main building. We had a room on the ground floor which was noisy with the people coming and going during the night. Our final night was in the main building and that was much better. The hotel is spotlessly clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is excellent with a wide variety of things to choose from and the free afternoon coffee/tea was very‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mario D
Review: A perfect stay at this excellent boutique hotel
Detailed Review: You don't have to look further if you're looking to stay close to Colaba and all the major attractions of Mumbai. Hotel Residency Fort Mumbai is the place to stay and I will definitely go back there on my next trip to Mumbai.  As I just said, the hotel is perfectly located for visiting Mumbai. Right now, there is construction right next to the hotel as they are building the new subway line but this shouldn't deter you from booking there.  For that reason, I had chosen to book a Club room as the Club rooms are located in another building just 100 feet away from the main building (and away from the construction). The Club rooms building interior is very nice, stylish, modern and quiet. My room was just perfect with all the amenities and comfort one would expect from a boutique‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gerrit
Detailed Review: We used this hotel twice as a transfer place and the staff made us realy feel home. From all the hotels we visited, this staff was exceptionally genuine friendly. I would definately go theri again. Price was very ok also and some of the rooms are a bit small, but for the rest the rooms were clean and pleasant to stay in.
