The extende lobby was also very nice to sip some coffee or chai with cookies.  There was some work on the new metro going on outside, but this noice stopped at night. It is also a nice area to make a stroll, even at night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 1plato23
Review: Has to be 5* because of price and service
Detailed Review: We were really impressed with the staff. They were all so helpful and friendly. We had a club room in the new part of the hotel. Small with no view but very quiet. Bathroom was very nice. Some of drawers a bit broken and a few small ants but do not let this put you off. Cold drinks on arrival. Free coffee/tea/biscuits in lounge. Breakfast was ok. Location is excellent- walking distance to Gate of India and Marine Drive.  Would definitely go back. Amazing value for money.  No dinner restaurant but they will organise carry out. They walked us to restaurant nearby.  Nothing is too much trouble. Thank you.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: cdmm58
Detailed Review: We stayed 5 nights. We originally booked the Heritage Room, but due to construction noise we were offered a room in their adjoining building. This room was superb, it was luxurious in every way. The location of the hotel is great, walking distance to sites and beautiful buildings. The staff are all courteous, friendly and helpful. The included breakfast is plentiful and caters for all tastes. This hotel is professionally run and centers around giving their clients a positive experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mahan P
Review: Good for discovering Fort area but no reason for me to go back!
Detailed Review: Location is very good for discovering south Mumbai.  Breakfast was really limited and not so much appetizing. We stayed in the club rooms not in the main building which was fine considering the metro work around the main building but it felt more of an appartement building rather than a hotel. There was strong smell of some aromatic substance that gave me bad headaches.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mlsev
Detailed Review: My friend and I really enjoyed our multi-night stay last week. The hotel staff was wonderful from the moment we arrived ‚Äî they accommodated our very late check-in. Everyone we interacted with was gracious and charming ‚Äî and the concierges were very solicitous (thanks, Rajesh!). We liked the hotel location ‚Äî many of the places we wanted to visit are within walking distance. We also enjoyed just wandering around the area. We‚Äôve already recommended the hotel to friends who are in Mumbai now!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gabrielle H
Detailed Review: This hotel is clean and value for money. The service is impeccable - better than some 5 star hotels visited in India. Gopal was especially helpful in assisting us with check out and locating our Uber driver who was lost due to the construction surrounding the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Boo2Utoo
Detailed Review: Friendly and helpful staff with a great breakfast to start the day. My Room was small but nice, clean and quiet and given I spent most of my time exploring the city the size didn't matter. Short walk to Starbucks for that coffee fix!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kerry553
Detailed Review: This hotel is in a handy spot to everything.   Rooms are on the small side but clean and modern.  Very quiet.  Breakfast good ..but not many tables..so if you are on a time limited you would be best to go early.  They have a nice spot to sit and have tea near the foyer.  Highly recommended

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Joanne C
Detailed Review: It is fair to say that at first we had doubts about our choice. We arrived at 9pm after a long commute from the airport. As others have said they are building a new metro in Mumbai which is causing disruption across the city and one section is almost at the door of the hotel. And yes it is noisy most of the time. There was a problem with both our rooms: Wi Fi not working, not very clean and a door fell off in the bellboy's hand when he showed me the room. After much confusion we were given new rooms. There were Wi Fi problems for my friends most of the time. I had a room in the building next door to the hotel and found that the noise didn't worry me there so consider if booking. After a rocky start we enjoyed the hotel - it is central in the Fort area and the staff are helpful‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: apsara49
Detailed Review: There is a new extension, very luxurious. The staff is very helpful and kind as usual. It is my third visit here and one of the best accommodation in India. The location is perfect. The metro is under construction.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Helena13T
Review: Small friendly hotel in the heart of Mumbai
Detailed Review: Staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms compact but clean and well equipped. Complimentary tea and coffee. Good range of food at breakfast. 10 mins walk to CSMT station, 15 minutes to the Gate, excellent central location.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ann P
Detailed Review: We spent  2 nights here and had a lovely clean modern room with big bathroom.  All staff were very polite  and helpful especially  our concierge Rajesh and nothing was  too much trouble.  Even the wait staff can attend to every need and make delicious  cappuccinos We would  love to  stay  again  if we come  to  Mumbai  again

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: STEWY88
Detailed Review: We were waiting to register in reception when a couple were leaving with cases and before they got in the taxi a staff member ran out with the mans wallet ‚Äî he‚Äôd dropped it in the corridor on his way out !! That simple decent honest act just about sums this place up !! It would have been nice if he‚Äôd dipped into his cash and given a generous tip but it‚Äôs not a perfect world ‚Äî well not quite . This hotel has everything you are looking for - modern spotlessly clean comfortable rooms with some extra touches like the easy to use safe in the wardrobe - the soap and shampoo dispensers - tea and coffee makers - bottles of water replenished daily - an empty fridge for your convenience ( not full of beer and KitKats to be added to your bill) - a concierge who will see to all your needs (‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ÁÇéÊ±ü Ëªä
Detailed Review: thanks for concierge rajesh and manager‚Äôs hospitality. room service is good as well. tried laundry service, neatly done. soft bed and clean sheets. many thanks for having  a great memory staying in mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: martin76
Review: Perfect Place to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: Hotel Residency Fort is in the perfect location for those planning a trip to Mumbai and it is within walking distance of most of the attractions in this gigantic, crazy city. The hotel is spotless, the rooms  attractively decorated and furnished with 24 hour hot water. The breakfasts are freshly prepared with Indian or Western options and will set you up for the day. However, it is the wonderful staff who really set this hotel apart. Nothing is to much trouble and their friendly, helpful attitude are a constant source of reassurance. When I lost a bag in Mumbai airport they went to great lengths to help me retrieve it and their local restaurant recommendations were excellent. This hotel was our oasis in Mumbai....you simply cannot go wrong here. We cannot recommend it  highly‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Issy koh
Detailed Review: Loved staying at this place! Great hospitality from al of the staff including Gopal. The food was really good too and they recommended good restaurants around the area. Rooms were always kept clean and we even got a free upgrade!! Thanks guys

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: philandcathy
Review: Great hotel in a terrific location
Detailed Review: No hotel in Mumbai is set in palatial surroundings so don‚Äôt get too upset where any hotel is located. This is an excellent hotel in a great location. It‚Äôs surrounded by local businesses and lovely restaurants catering for western tummies. You can walk to just about everything and at times I felt walking was faster than the traffic jams. The neighbourhood is safe and the locals delightful. The room was modern and most importantly the aircon was cold. Breakfast was great and lastly the staff are just sensational.  Very highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SharonBlackburn
Detailed Review: Staff are wonderful and helpful.  Rooms spotless with comfy beds and a great shower.  Big selection for breakfast.  It is a little noisy due to the heavy construction in the vicinity but this shouldn‚Äôt put you off, I slept through.  I will recommend this hote to others.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: guycallednik
Review: Excellent Hotel, Comfortable Rooms, Wonderful Staff
Detailed Review: Surely the best-value hotel in the Fort area. The staff is outstanding and lovable, even by Indian standards. The rooms are comfortable and the breakfast is one of the best we had on several trips to India. Absolutely recommended.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lucile  D
Review: Stone age mentality, don't go there !!
Detailed Review: After calling the hotel, they confirmed to have free rooms, they accepted early check-in and sent us a car for pickup at the airport. As we came in at the reception with my boyfriend from India, they suddenly decided to accept only married couples !!! They refused to give us a room, they refused to give us WiFi to book another hotel. We had a sleepless night and a flight behind us and this hotel refused us for very discriminating obscure reasons !! They were disrespectful and judging. Never go there if you want to enjoy India and Mumbai! This stone age behavior doesn't even deserve '1 point' !!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manish S
Detailed Review: This hotel staff picked us up at the airport. After arriving at the hotel the reception was so rude and had no courtesy and manners at all. They refused us that couples are not allowed to stay. ( In their defence they said only 5 star hotels accept couples as their guest) It‚Äôs so shameful and disgusting excuse. I felt like suddenly I am not in Mumbai but in Afghanistan or Saudi Arabia. We requested them for wifi so we could book any other hotel but they simply refused even to give us wifi password. My girl friend and I were so tired and sleepy but they didn‚Äôt bother to offer any courtesy. I am an Indian and my girlfriend is from Europe. This experience really ruined her impression about India and Mumbai as being progressive city. I been travelling for 15 years but never in my‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Paul Harland
Review: PLEASE PLEASE read this before booking !!!!!
Detailed Review: I booked and paid for this hotel. Free airport transfers were included. I rang the hotel the day before arriving to confirm my flight details. The manager assured me that there would be someone waiting for us. On arrival we were told that there had been a mistake and the hotel was full. I insisted that I spoke to the hotel manager,he explained that there was a medical emergency and my room had been let go. I demanded to be taken to the hotel. On arrival we were told that a wedding was going on and the people in my room wanted to stay on so I did not have a room. The manager said that he would find me an alternate hotel. After a heated argument he came with me to this other hotel. I insisted to be shown the room which was a disgrace. I told him that I was not staying,he then took‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 523katarinav
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff that are at your disposal 24/7. Rooms and bathroom were clean. There was some things I didn‚Äôt like, but in general good value for money, and would definitely stay here again if I come back to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ashok D
Detailed Review: Despite initial reservation hiccup, we were given a room to stay.The managements initiative to give us a very early ( 3 AM) breakfast was the best ever service received. Post run complimentary break fast was highly appreciated.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sbh192013
Detailed Review: I needed a secure clean and medium comfortable stay near dadar east station  so after search my son booked bawa regency  dadar    paying 6000/-    we reached around at midnight from airport travelling whole day    checkin done  lift smelled typical bombay cockroachy smell you know   room was small leaking bathroom  made to wade in dirty water  horrible it was I dont mind if I am at a lower budget hotel I can adjust to anything even the cockroaches if staff is well behaved and security is provided  so I stayed there for that night  while check out I asked them whether all rooms are this small and dingy   they say they have deluxe rooms for rs 5000/-.   I did not say anything as I am not going there again  as I have better options at 5000 to 6000/- people should not expose their‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: senorak
Review: staying in nice place and clean
Detailed Review: everything was very good very kind and professional . I told my friends about this hotel and we will also come next timethe room was clean the service was good. very sweet workers and helpful..only the lift was little dangerous.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Runa F
Detailed Review: I stayed there for 4 nights. The location is perfect for sightseeing! The staffs are super friendly! They often talked to us in easy Hindi since we know a bit of Hindi! Also, they asked us whether we want our room to get clean. The room has no window but our room was just outside and easy to ventilate. (Of course everything was clean!) The bath room was very clean as well. Hot water is available but after some time it was a wee bit lukewarm, which was not a big deal for me. The breakfast was also nice. Two pieces of toast and some kinds of eggs (sunny-side-up, scrumble, boiled, poached, omlett etc..) with tea or coffee are served, and that was very tasty! I wish I could stay longer! If you visit Mumbai, you should go for this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aashini Malhotra Rambosson
Detailed Review: Best Hotel to stay in Mumbai... very nice service. All the staff members are very kind and helpful. Rooms are great and clean. I would never stay at another hotel in Mumbai.... Will suggest it surely to others..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Liam1914
Detailed Review: Close to everything we found this a great place to relax and escape the buisiness all around. Markets and sights and good restaurants close by. And a peaceful clean atmosphere to come back  to. Dont be put off by the exterior

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Geert-Jan V
Detailed Review: Don't worry about the outside of the building and the entrance ; Once you enter the hotelfloor it's all nice clean and modern. Great staff, friendly, helpfull and courteous. We booked the superior room but upon arrival decided to upgrade to the new suite. Spacious, great bed, great bathroom with ample hot water, fridge, desk and sofa. Not because the superior room wasn't Ok but simply because we wanted the extra space and amenities. GREAT WIFI btw.. :-) Will definitely stay here again !

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TurnpikePete
Review: An excellent hotel with great staff
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant 6-day stay here with my wife. The staff were excellent, very helpful and a pleasure to be around. A great place to escape the heat and chaos of the city diring the day.  We had a few things in the city to sort out and the staff provided us with lots of help on where to go and how to do it. I would definitly return here.  The resturants downstairs are great too.  Very short walk away form the north entrace of the central train station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lewis-Nikki
Detailed Review: Had a good stay at Hotel Elphinstone. All the staff were brilliant and friendly, some great recommendations for local cheap restaurants and take outs. Free breakfast in the morning was nice and chai in the afternoon great after a long day sight seeing. Overall great value for money

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: marja vissers
Detailed Review: Mumbai is a wonderful city but very hectic. Hotel Elphinstone provides a safe haven.  Our room, our bathroom, the breakfast: everything was good. They also serve tea in the afternoon (5 till 7 pm?). And they have a massage chair.  There seem to be no restaurants near the hotel. We took a taxi as soon as we left the hotel. Taxis are cheap and plenty. Next time I come to Mumbai I will stay here again!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: OxfordAunt
Detailed Review: ... in the heart of the business district, lots of sights are walkable from here. Small bedrooms but perfectly adequate. And bathroom larger than expected. Breakfast was good, with European and Indian choices. Staff at all levels couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful, nothing was too much trouble. Making this a very enjoyable stay in the heart of a busy city. If we ever found ourselves in Mumbai again we would definitely go back

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mwspear
Review: Be sure to ask for the annexe rooms next door
Detailed Review: A great place to chill after a busy day exploring Mumbai. The annexe rooms next door to the main hotel are modern, clean and bost lots of piping hot water.   Breakfasts taken in the main hotel are just what you need to start your day.  Friendly helpful staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sandra L
Review: A Metro from the airport will soon take you right there.
Detailed Review: Another great hotel, first you meet the helpful, friendly staff with welcome water (much needed as we had been travelling all day) and bag of chips.  Next we are shown to our room.  Very clean and modern.  The bed was very comfortable with lots of pillows.  A wonderful buffet breakfast serving plenty of Western and Indian choices.  It was probably the best we had in all of India.  We really liked the area of town we were in.  Right in the center of the things we wanted to see.  We didn‚Äôt have to travel too far to the Gate of India, or the beautiful UNESCO train station.  Everything was exactly like shown in the pictures.  They are putting in a metro so it was quite noisy at night but I understand once that is in (and they build things very quickly) you will be able to go‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Howard London
Detailed Review: This is an excellent place to stay in Mumbai. The hotel is clean and comfortable with very helpful staff. Its location is ideal for sightseeing and there is a good choice of restaurants within walking distance

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Carol K
Detailed Review: Stayed her on 6th and 7th January 2019 and again on 30th Jan 2019. Rooms are clean, beds are very comfortable. Staff are very helpful, patient and courteous. The breakfast is exceptional. Great variety and omelettes are very good.  Location is ideal, close to local street vendors Many restaurants close by. Bombay Store just up the road has a huge array of Indian Souvenirs, for last minute shopping.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Haitham khudeish
Review: perfect place to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: Thanks for concierge Gopal, Rajeesh and manager's hospitality. Room service is very good as well.Hotel location perfect to go by walk anywhere. The breakfast is freshly prepared with Indian and Continental breakfast cover your hunger for the day. I would like to say thank you very much for the amazing staff were providing first class customer service I have never seen before, Especially Akmol, Cesar and Gopal they are very helpful staff and honest.  Haitham Khudeish

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Xamen-Ha
Detailed Review: I was in a Club Room in the new building the Hotel had recently purchase and decorated.  I was expecting to have a Club Room in the main hotel where the rest of my family were staying.  However this proved to be a minor inconvenience, mitigated by the wonderful staff in the hotel. The Club Room was very comfortable and attractive, with wardrobe, flat screen TV, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities.  It would have been enhanced by one or two drawers for storage. The bathroom, though a little on the small side, did have lots of hot water with good water pressure in the shower.  Hand soap, shower gel and shampoo were provided. The sole window in the room, once the blinds were raised, gave a view of the next building which was in very close proximity but that is to be expected in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dean
Review: Great hotel - Concierge Rajesh was very helpful
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Residency Hotel Fort for 4 days in Mid January 2019. At this time construction of the metro was underway near by which was noisy at times - but work stoped at night and the hotel staff did what they could to put us in a room away from the noise. We slept fine. The rooms are small but well appointed and very clean. Breakfast is a buffet with lots of options. Location of this hotel is great - walking distance to the two key railway stations - Churchgate and CST. Concierge Rajesh was very helpful and all staff were very frendly. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mac8156
Detailed Review: lovely hotel and great position in mumbai, yes there is work going on with the new metro but we were in the new wing and the room was superb and very comfortable also lots of good eating places close to hotel, we had breakfast in the hotel and it was very good, the staff were all wonderful and so helpful. would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting mumbai

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mr and Mrs Shah
Detailed Review: Thanks for looking after my wife and I in our recent stay in your hotel, we felt as if it was our second home.  We did not miss our family because of the kindness of Roshan, Abhijeet, Laurance, Rajesh and Gopal.  Also catering staff Kaiser, Akmal.  Also the cleaning staff of the hotel who kept our rooms so clean.  We recommend your hotel to all travellers to Mumbai.  Thank you very much Mr and Mrs Shah, UK

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jave50
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 7 nights on our first trip to India & it couldn't have been better for finding our orientation before our onwards tour of India. Great location for exploring the local area on foot & access to the tourist sights. Staff were all fantastic & made us feel very welcome in Mumbai & couldn't do enough to help us - including change currency, find things we needed for our trip, point us in the direction of places to eat & get beer! Highly recommended, although as others say until the metro works outside are completed it can be a little noisy, but not prohibitive.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Petra M
Review: Good location for sightseeing on foot
Detailed Review: I stayed for two nights in Jan 2019. The airport pickup was very convenient and the driver friendly - stopped for a view of a laundry on the way! Great location for walking around and seeing the sights of the Fort and Colaba area of Mumbai. Small room but clean. Unfortunately, the subway construction very close by is noisy though I was luckily there when it stopped over the Republic Day holiday. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is good with Indian and Western options. I think pretty good value overall.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John H
Detailed Review: Excellent location,fabulous hotel and outstanding service ,nothing too much trouble would definitely recommend if looking for a bargain compared to some other mumbai hotels of similar standard and cleanliness

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: WILKINSON1955
Detailed Review: Spent 3 nights in the Hotel while sightseeing the good,the bad,and the ugly Mumbai has to offer. Comfortable accommodation,an abundance of tentative polite staff (with a smile). Good breakfast. Great location for sightseeing,but would recommend a private City tour which the hotel can arrange with Hakim tours.  Not a lot of "welcoming" restaurants in the area. The negative side of our stay at the hotel was the road works for the new underground,which is to the side of the hotel and 24/7 ! Apart from that I would recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lengelcj
Detailed Review: This was my second stay at the Hotel Residency, which tells you something about how much I liked it the first time. My husband and I visited both at the beginning and the end of our trip to India, for 6 nights and 4 nights, respectively, and I have only good things to report about the uniformly excellent staff. Check-in was smooth, the rooms are spotless, the bathrooms are clean and have great showers, and the breakfasts are the BEST. Eggs, dosas, and uttapam are made to order; a buffet offers delicious regional food (more poha, please!!), and there's even a cappuccino machine.   Our thanks to the restaurant staff, including Peter, Ballu, Keshar, Akmal, Girish, and Naveen, and to the staff at the front desk and in the lobby, whose names I am sorry I didn't get (everyone is‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Danielle M
Detailed Review: We stayed in the Residency for 4 nights at the start of a month in India. We couldn't have wished for a better start to our trip. Our room was spacious, pristine and supremely comfortable. The location was excellent, the perfect place from which to explore Mumbai. To too it off the staff were excellent. They were all so warm and couldn't do enough to help, from Peter and the team who served us delicious breakfasts every morning, to the excellent staff at front desk and the staff who looked after our rooms. Couldn't recommend Hotel Residency highly enough.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jeff C
Detailed Review: My wife and I spent three very happy nights at the Residency Fort in early January 2019.   The hotel is not a resort, so if you are looking for huge rooms and a pool, this isn't for you. But as a  spotlessly clean, very comfortable, compact place to stay with superb service at reasonable prices and in a great location, I don' see how one can do much better.   The rooms are small but perfectly appointed with a very comfortable bed, a neat en suite bathroom with a good shower and in-room coffee- and tea-making facilities. The dining area, where we enjoyed three excellent breakfasts, is intimate and attractive and there is also a tiny lounge (accommodating about 8 people) where, of an evening, you will be served complimentary tea/coffee and cookies. In short, the facilities are‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shaikh Abdul Rehaan
Detailed Review: Best place to visit enjoyed your time and your family and friends with you guys Go to the beach and you will be a great addition to your family and friends with your parents who have been in love with you and

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suvarghya
Review: Good hotel, excellent service from staff
Detailed Review: Stayed for 3 nights during Jan 12-15, 2019.   Location : Overall very good location, near CST and near all the important locations in that locality and also Marine Drive is nearby. Due to Metro construction, direct entrance road is blocked so you have to take a detour - which is not a big problem though.   Check-in: very smooth, did not take much time. We were greeted with refreshments and soft drinks. Our 3 year old son was also later gifted with a goodie bag.   Rooms: Had booked Deluxe rooms. During check in, we were given options of rooms to see and choose the suitable one. That was really good. However the Deluxe rooms in the main building are really small, though not lacking in any facilities.   Food and room service : Food is not prepared in the hotel, is sourced from an‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MichalGo
Detailed Review: We‚Äôve stayed here and everything was just great. The staff are incredibly nice, they upgraded us due to metro construction to a better quieter room for free, given the costs the stay was just perfect.   This is central downtown like Mumbai so getting a sleep in a quiet room is above all sort of luxury!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bene W
Detailed Review: 10 out of 10 without any remarks. (Rated by Germans)  We were staying here for 1 night at the end of our India trip. Both the hotel & the service staff were out of the charts! This was the best hotel we had in India - equal or probably above European standard! It started with a warm welcome when we arrived (welcome drinks, easy & fast checkin, fast info on the city & tours, ...).   The rooms & bathrooms were completely clean, well equipped & calm.  The service staff was proactive, helpful & friendly at any time.  We also booked a great slum & city tour via the hotel. Therein and for actually everything we wanted our go-to-guy (Gopal) provided exceptional support. Also the breakfast was amazing: both the Indian & Continental breakfast (incl. eggs to order, waffles, fresh fruit,‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lars A
Review: Nice stay, very helpful staff, but rat-infested surroundings
Detailed Review: Residency is i bit hard to reach just now, since a Metro station is being built right next door, cutting off the entrance from the big DN Road. The hotel entrance is grand, in sharp contrast to the run-down state of the street outside.  We got a room in an annex just 20 meters down the street, which was ok, with some minor ?-marks. The annex was guarded at night by a poor fellow who had too sleep on the marble floor on just a thin blanket. Terrible. The staff here is extremely helpful, and will arrange everything You asked them for. They even managed to get us into a fully booked restaurant! The hotel itself does not have a restaurant, unfortunately, nor a bar. They just have a breakfast room, serving a very nice breakfast. We just stayed here for two nights, and had some‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kathryn H
Detailed Review: The treatment we got from this hotel was appalling, as a regular visitor to India & Mumbai I have never been treated like this before. If you book & pay for a room it should be ready for you when you arrive not given to somebody else!! After over two hours driving around Mumbai & being taken to horrendous hotels we had no choice but settle on the last one as it was 11pm at night. This hotel wasn‚Äôt any better but my husband was feeling unwell( he is a diabetic) We hadn‚Äôt even been offered a drink of water all they were interested in was getting rid of us. There is a letter going to the Indian tourist board as we don‚Äôt want any other tourist being treated the way we were. Our love for India as now been stolen & feel that we don‚Äôt want to return.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vikram bhardwaj
Detailed Review: It's been a wonderful place to stay, approachable, good neat and clean rooms fully equipped with all Amenities. Some rooms provide very good view of Sahar intl. Airport. Staff is amicable. Special thanks to Mr. Pillai for being a good support and host. Buffet quality is good.  Pick and drop facility I'd good, have very professional and polite drivers on board. LED's in rooms need to be upgraded and (Smart LED's) should be installed.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Harsh206
Detailed Review: We had great 50th Anniversary of my parents celebrated,  as good as First Wedding, relatives n friends were happy,  ambience food and Hospitality was wonderful, specially to Ramchandra More n Team. Kelaskar n family.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JosephSkaria
Detailed Review: Been to hotel to attend IITT 2019, this is my 5th visit to this hotel,  fortunately got the Airport view room.  The entire team is very supportive,  Thanks to Mr.  Pillai, Sales Manager. The location is also good,  the near by park is very helpful for jogging. Good food. All the best wishes to Le Grand Team

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pradeep
Detailed Review: Nice hotel near by airport Have airport pick up and drop'driver was help with the market near bylt was, hotel having free WiFi service, nice place to stay,staff was help at reception and restaurants & housekeeping Thank you everyone,

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: PIYush
Detailed Review: Very good services and good higyne maintain and good food facility and good staff is also available.we are very happy to visit a hotel le grand and feeling good in this hotel. Have a nice time and good luck.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: yashka78
Review: Great, clean hotel minutes from the aiport
Detailed Review: We missed the connecting flight and needed a place to stay at 3AM. The hotel managers were very polite, showed us the room (which was clean and spacious), basically made the check-in in the middle of the night smooth and painless. The breakfast next morning was great and they provided a free taxi to the airport. Great place.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amrita
Detailed Review: The hotel staff were very nice and sincere.The arrangement was very good.Ramchandra More helped us with menu selection and everyone attending the party appreciated the taste and quality. The Banquet is also well maintained.The decorator who did all the decoration was exactly like as per plan.Even the DJ was very good and accommodating. A big thank you to all of you. And for the readers of the review please go and visit and trust that it will surely meet your expectations...

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Voyager10915212411
Detailed Review: good staff and services, reachable location, walking from local trains and easy to reach by other conveniences, if must visit again if i am in Mumbai, food was also good, specially non veg items was yummy and fresh...

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Journey49961033176
Detailed Review: In website I was impressed but when I entered the room, it was not up to the mark if I believe the three star *** meaning. As a man, I will not blame but the room should be updated with toilet good facilities.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Xavier Rodick
Detailed Review: We had stayed for 3night, once we entered the  room which we booked it was much more then what we excepted, availability of 24 hours hot water which was a good thing, staff was very friendly and welcoming (5 star), and greatful specially to Manager HEMOND for his helpful nature, from the time of booking till we check out, he is a real asset to the hotel. Will definitely visit again......

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Durgaprasad
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel and service is very good mainly interior and room is nice best to stay thanks for all the service will try to visit again breakfast lobby receptionist all are good will suggest to stat with out any fear

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: BIJIT DATTA
Detailed Review: On 17th Dec-18 I have booked this hotel for 1 night stay along with my family. I was having a very good experience about the hotel . Rooms are very clean & all staff behaviour was excellent. & when I was entered the hotel reception I  met hotel Manager Mr. Hemond, he was very helpful person.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Md Nur Un N
Detailed Review: Me & my wife stayed at Elphinstone for 3 days in This month. The room was clean, as was tne rest of the hotel. The breakfast was outstanding, by its quality but the quantity is very few. The people were very friendly & mostly the font desk people were too helpful. The room charge was very reasonable and the location was great. InshaAllah, will visit again to this hotel in February 2019 again. Good luck Elphinstone ü§òüèª

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AshaKN
Detailed Review: The rooms are comfortable,  though there are no windows. The main advantage is the location. It's near metro cinema and close to marine drive. Close to CST station and VT. The staff,  from the manager to the waiters at the restaurant to the housekeeping staff are very warm and always ready to help you. I would recommend it if you are looking for an affordable place to stay.   I hope the rooms were more ventilated,  there was slight damp smell in the rooms. Hope they will take care of it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amy G
Detailed Review: I came to this hotel on a GAdvenures tour where the accommodation was supposed to be ‚Äòbasic‚Äô so was just after somewhere clean and safe to stay as a solo female traveler. The room was tiny and it is cramped, but I was only there for 1 night so it didn‚Äôt really matter. The room was clean and comfortable with a perfectly adequate shower. I was lucky enough to have wifi in my room which was a bonus. I understand accommodation is expensive in Mumbai so would recommend here for somewhere well priced, safe and clean in a good location!

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Adnan Wangnoo
Review: The Best Hospitality What We Got From Mumbai!
Detailed Review: I stayed at Residency hotel Fort for 3 nights during my time in Mumbai and the stay was delightful!   The staff is very polite and helpful, the hotel is clean , The rooms are very comfortable and well equipped.  Specaily the  breakfast area is lovely and the food was so awesome with a lot of choice for both Indians and foreigners..    Me and My Wife We travelled all over India but we got here such a wonderful atmosphere .. The price is worth for what we got  and it made us feel like a home away from home.    I booked deluxe room vai Agoda.com for 03 nights and next day  ,they  upgraded to a Suite room for us . Thanks to the hotel management.. This is place is very good, considering the fact that it is located right in the heart of Mumbai .. I would surely love to stay here again‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: VeganTraveler
Review: Great Hospitality, Comfortable Stay, Perfect Breakfast
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful 5-night stay here in December 2018. The hotel staff was friendly  and helpful. The breakfast was excellent. I got a lot of tasty vegan options in the menu. The hotel and room were very clean.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: trevor giles
Detailed Review: I spent 17 days at the Residency Hotel whilst I was having serious dental work carried out at Dentzz  Dental Clinic in Mumbai. The attention I received from all members of staff from morning to night was superb and they made my stay in the hotel a very pleasant one. Everything I asked from them was carried out straight away and in the most efficient manner. I cannot speak highly enough about the whole staffs attitude to the way they looked after me.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Marjorie18
Review: at least spend some money on the bath towels
Detailed Review: Fort Residency hotel.  We arrived in the middle of the night on Dec 2 to a very disappointing room.   The room was TINY with hardly enough room for our luggage.  There was an old mattress on the bed. The only chair in the room was a plastic beat up outdoor lawn furniture. Desk and wall paneling looked like 40 years old and in disrepair. Bathroom was very under equipped!  The tiniest roll of cheap toilet paper, minimal soap and shampoo. Even the small ( not bath size)  thin only 2 towels were stained! Minimal hot water. Nighttime desk help, not very helpful. Daytime desk crew tried to be as helpful as possible but they were limited in what they could do. Breakfast however is adequate, and the dining room is pleasant enough. Dining room staff was accommodating. Had one dinner in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SMR
Review: Great location & lovely Staff that go the extra mile
Detailed Review: We called ahead to let them know we will have a late check in, front desk was helpful. When we got there late we were so pleasantly surprised to be given a room upgrade. This was lovely as it was in the newer part of the building- the room was great with all the mod-cons. Check-in was super quick! Breakfast was great- very good choice for all palates.  Location is fantastic if you want to see the usual sites in Mumbai. Star of the show has to be Rajesh in concierge- he was a real gem and helped us out whatever our question. I bought a birthday card for my dad who was currently still in India - I didn't get chance to buy a stamp or post the card in advance before we left and he did this for us- so thankful as my dad was made up he received a birthday card on the 1st Jan which is‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gavin O‚ÄôConnor
Detailed Review: The staff and breakfast were perfect at this hotel. You will be greeted by Rajesh and Gopi in the foyer and they will be the smiling helpful faces you see each day and they go above and beyond to help you with anything you require - a great asset to this hotel. Breakfast is ridiculously good with everything you can imagine including fresh waffles - allow lots of time each morning!! The location of this hotel is great for most of the tourist attractions.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amarjit D
Review: Good location with friendly, helpful service
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Residency Fort in December for 3 nights. I booked an airport transfer with the hotel and this was perfect. Right from the moment we walked through the front door we were welcomed and looked after by all the staff. When we couldn't find a restaurant a staff member took the time to walk us there and introduced us to the manager. The breakfast buffet was busy and we usually had a short wait for a table in a pleasant lounge area. The breakfasts themselves were brilliant with a good range of both Indian & western cuisine. Masala chai was made regularly and some of the best we tasted on our trip. Thanks to Peter for looking after us at breakfast times. The hotel is located in a busy & bustling area but there are a good range of amenities nearby such as restaurants,‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: piab123456
Detailed Review: The hotel is a tranquil haven in bustling Mumbai.   It is very good located for sightseeing. It was very clean. And we enjoyed a great breakfast every morning. What else do you want?  I give away five stars for the staff! They are kind, attentive and they always try to help - Thank you very much!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Urmila
Detailed Review: Excellent location,close to airport.8 rooms were booked for our group if 22 by Ranjani of Bharani Tours and Travels.We all were pleased with the clean and spacious rooms on 6th floor with nice views.Staff were very friendly and helpful.Special thanks to Parmesh Pillay-Marketing Manager for his help and tour tips for our short stay.Rakesh Thakur (staff) was very helpful too.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chalara Saratchandran
Detailed Review: Excellent ambience, excellent food and service with reasonable rates.Family members came from different parts had expressed full enjoyment and satisfaction. Strongly recommends this place for any functions.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankit
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 03 nights. My experience was wonderful, the rooms are clean and well maintained as well as in terms of foods its up-to the par. Staff was cooperative. Near by airport.   Looking forward to stay again!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pea_Bags 1613
Detailed Review: Just never check in to this seedy dysfunctional joint ever. Rude staff , uncouth people, unhygienic food, no water supply and crawlers on your bed and to top it all mosquitoes keeping u awake all thru, check in at your risk!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Santu H
Detailed Review: I have been here several times but it never feels any different the guest relation will always welcome with the same smile.  Always welcoming,My special thank You to Mr.Maninder.  I can't thank ameya Danish Srinath ajay and jyoti enough for there kind and generous nature.  Kudos to you team

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Go68201491075
Detailed Review: The room charges are 3500+ and they dont have a restaurent , rooms are oldage. Window AC that makes lot of noise, In bathroom locks are damage, no shower head. It should be priced less than 1500 or should be an oyo or treebo . Not worth to stay and pay 3500.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rksuman
Detailed Review: Hotel is great.... Value for money... Location is also near CSTM... Which is added advantage. Support stuff very cordial... Breakfast can be improved, what i felt... For lunch and dinner, options suggested by hotel staff was great üëç Overall we had a nice stay...

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jill
Detailed Review: The rooms are really small and have no windows, however they are clean and have comfortable beds. Fast wifi and hot showers. It's stuffy due to no windows and kind of feels like sleeping in a shoebox but it's good for those with a budget wanting something basic and clean.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Georgene R
Review: A great home away from home while traveling in India
Detailed Review: I spent about a week at the Fortune Select Exotica Hotel in Navi Mumbai in November of 2018.  The hotel was beautifully appointed, centrally located, and staffed by an impressive group of dedicated professionals.  The dining (breakfast and dinner) was excellent with a buffet that offered the best of Indian cuisine.  Most impressive, though, was the staff.  Friendly, personable and conscientious.  They made my brief stay memorable.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Katie
Detailed Review: The rooms in the hotel were a little small but modern and clean.  The location was good and the service was very friendly.  The staff always had a smile on their face.  Breakfast was basic, but did the job.  All very good value for money.  The only concern I had was that the bathroom sink moved and there was a leak of water on the floor.  We raised it with the hotel and someone looked at it, but it wasn't really fixed.  It wasn't a massive leak, but as the bathroom was compact, it was hard to avoid the water.  I also worried about germs in the water.  Perhaps I was being paranoid with it being my first time in India.  After all I got home and no harm done by it!  All in all, I would happily stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rebecca W
Detailed Review: The room was compact but clean and the hotel is well located for Churchgate station and many of the sights in Mumbai. We arrived early in the morning and the staff were great at getting a room ready and letting us check in early (which after a sleepless night flight from London, was really appreciated!). We were also offered complementary refreshments on arrival. Efficiently run hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dave L
Detailed Review: Fort is a nice part of Mumbai, we walked to India's Gate and it was a short taxi to many south Mumbai attractions. The front desk was very nice and spoke English. They set us up with a car and guide for the next day, which we enjoyed. The breakfast was excellent. The room we reserved was two beds and the only thing they had with two beds when we arrived was a "suite" on the top floor. It was not like most suites in the USA, but It was very nice room, especially for $64/night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raj
Detailed Review: Liked it.. Visiting that place must visit this hotel Preferred to all individuals especially for solo trips Staff and services are up to the mark and impressive designs of the hotels beatifies your journey and your stay to the bext level

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HariJayanthi
Review: My stay here 30th november 2018 to 1st december 2018
Detailed Review: Nice clean hotel with quite spacious rooms. Buffet breakfast good spread. Bed is good due to which sleep quality is good. Very close to international terminal at Mumbai. Quality of food was really good for dinner. Very helpful staff. This hotel is next to some Cambridge school. Fire alarm was not yet functional when I stayed in November 2018. Maybe it is functional now.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ANAND BHONG
Detailed Review: Food was good specially a quality of Breakfast was excellent,rooms was clean & specious.Special mention to front office staff airport pick up service provided fabulous experience.  Great friendly place to stay with the family. All I can say is "Beyond and above my expectation"

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vijay hms
Detailed Review: Dear guys, Poor choice ...argumentative,unhelpful staff. Plus a co owner was at reception not pacifying an irate customer while trying to smooth things over by telling his staff not to argue with customer...all over a small thing as a Visa in the passport. The restaurant is poor...slow in service from ordering to taste. Only thing going for it is its proximity to the airport. Such review not bcos I was irritated but genuine. I would not recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TerryD
Detailed Review: Stayed at hotel for 3 nights with family , nothin to complain , all went well throughout stay right from airport pick , hotel room , breakfast and airport drop.    Credit goes to hotel staff who were always ready to help , special thanks to front office team Oscar , Ramu , ab, Clive , Samuel and Ajay , also thanking Abdul who was helpful throughout booking .     Definitely will stay again in future .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alok C
Detailed Review: - Internet didn‚Äôt work. Despite complaining twice, issue remained as is + staff wasn‚Äôt cooperative. Check attached screenshot  - they charge 6k/ night and give local brand mineral water. Can‚Äôt even offer ‚Çπ20 bisleri bottle  - in room service wasn‚Äôt that great either. Served badly cooked food.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Curiosity67504209666
Detailed Review: Except for non availability of orthopedic mattress, everything was fine. Telephone sets need replacement. tooth paste wasn't kept in the room. suggested that sandals for using withing the rooms also be provided

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: classic n
Detailed Review: Hi,I m a travel agent from,bhairawaha, (Nepal),very often I visit  Mumbai for trips (group) So, I need  a Good Hotel with better hospitality,So,I choose" HOTEL BAWA REGENCY" as they (BAWA)have Other properties also around Mumbai,  but I choose"Bawa Regency" fits my budget,worth every Penny. They are outstanding in every department ,say FRONT OFFICE,ROOM SERVICE,HOUSE KEEPING etc etc.Hats off to u Guys' keep up the good work.See u soon"

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nkhurana7
Detailed Review: Overall experience was good. Facilities which was available was all ok. Responses on compliance was on time. Only thing is visitor was not allowed. I went there for Mumbai darshan. Sometime it happened that on way going to another destination, i came across the hotel. I came to hotel to freshen up but the person who is accompanying me was not allowed to visit my room, to freshen up, to rest etc. There was no other or common washroom in the hotel premises.  The strictness of not allowing visitors even for some minutes, this i felt the hotel to do something about this awkward rule.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Odyssey139412
Detailed Review: As a Managing Director of several companies I travel quite frequently to asian countries. THe staff of this hotel is the key to their success. All are friendly and very helpful. I would recommend this hotel to any person on a business trip that needs to stay in this area of Mumbai

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Saikat M
Detailed Review: The location of the hotel is very near to CST railway station.The outer side of the hotel looks like a old heritage construction but the inside hotel, the decoration is like what you like most of the time at time of traveling.The rooms are very cosy and all amenities like frize, microwave,water heater are available. The bathroom is also fabulously decorative. However it is true for double bed delux room;for only double bed room the room size is very short.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RMS88LFC
Detailed Review: My stay at HEA was superb. On the outside this place does not look like much but inside this is an immaculate hotel with a great lounge area. The room was great and the air-conditioning was excellent. Water dispenser in the lounge is always a massive bonus. When I arrived the guy on reception was really keen to advise me on the surrounding areas and give me advice and what I wanted to see in Mumbai. Whilst I was a little disappointed that I did not get a double bed instead of two singles I was aware that there was no guarantee of my request being granted and this did nothing to take away from what my stay and I would not hesitate to recommend this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Connector56762720898
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel. Cleanliness, service, food, everything was too good. Loved the hospitality of the staff. Would surely recommend this hotel to all our family n friends.Thanks to Mr. Aijaz and all the staff for the warmth and hospitality.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: aliw1992
Detailed Review: Not an authentic place, but exactly what we wanted and expected! Mumbai can be quite expensive and this was really well valued. The rooms were spotlessly clean and well equipped. The shower was good. The best bit about it was the staff - they were so helpful and kind. We had a couple of mishaps (outside of the hotel!) and the manager was very understanding and hekpful. Would really recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Danja
Review: Great place to stay if your visiting Mumbai
Detailed Review: We visited Mumbai for only 2 days. This Hotel is a great place to stay. Short to gateway of India, trainstation and chowpatty.  We booked a deluxe room, better than superior. This one has a window, little bit noisy but not too bad. Room was clean, good hot water and perfect wifi.  Breakfast is ok, bread with jam and butter, eggs. Really nice staff! Would recommend this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: szeva007
Detailed Review: There are 3 kind of rooms we tried all the three. The smallest is specially perfect for traveller alone. All the three categories are well equiped. Even the small room has a very nice and clean bathroom. I liked that all the room had a wall clock. This is very useful. The staff is extremly kind and helpful. We felt that the guests are the most important. The atmosphere is quite familiar.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tauseef Narangi
Detailed Review: Indeed a very delightful experience...the rooms were neat and clean. Initially when we arrived they gave us a room which was far away from the counter but upon request the Manager Mr.Hemond graciously shifted us to other room which was closer to the reception. The staff was very helpful and they made sure that we enjoyed our stay....

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Linda W
Detailed Review: The staff at Elphinstone Hotel are the best ever. All of them. They are so helpful, kind and caring, and happy as well. They quickly felt like family. Clean room, and the location is near Crawford Markets, which is a fantastic experience.  Thank you!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Denise Z
Detailed Review: Very small rooms and bathrooms.  Walls need cleaned and painted.  Bathroom floor stays wet all night after showers.  No squeegy.  Would be helpful to label switches in rooms.  Remote for AC only works for power.  Dining service and food is ok. Good location.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kaushik
Review: Dream is like interpreting infront of eyes
Detailed Review: It was a great pleasure to vusit the place and it was my luck to stay there and enjoyed every moment of my seconds ....overall it was a great vist i like the hospitality and the service of the people.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ibrahim Ali
Detailed Review: This is a good hotel. Expect your average hotel and nothing superb, however, you will not be disappointed if you're more interested in local sightseeing than the hotel itself. A few things can surely annoy certain people such as the quality of the WiFi, but other than that, I think it's a fair hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aditya Moitra
Detailed Review: I am writing this review after few years i had visited this hotel. The hotel wears a new look after renovation and looks definitely better than what i saw  coupe of years back.  Spread out at Buffet Lunch and Dinner is limited.  There are hardly any toiletries. Management must consider of improving in this area. Taste of food too, can be better.  Rest everything I found to be satisfactory

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aditya M
Detailed Review: I had stayed in this hotel earlier and after two years stayed  for 4-5 days. The hotel after renovation looks better. Everything is perfect  except the spread out  in buffet breakfast & buffet dinner. Varieties of items are very very limited. Food is good but can be better. Staffs are very decent and polite.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajesh A
Review: An ideal Hotel for families wishing to stay in the environs of a famous Residential Township of Mumbai called Dadar.
Detailed Review: The hotel is located in Dadar Residential Area with 5 minutes walk to the Dadar Stations - For Local Train as well as for inter city Trains.  This hotel offers a most comfortable stay for the patients visiting Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) in Parel for treatments that last for 4-6 weeks or even more.  The hotel has its own 24x7 kitchen and caters to all requests from the guests and patients be it snacks or a complete meal.  Sumptuous Fixed Menu Breakfast comes as a compliment with the room tariff!  The hotel staff is extremely courteous and always willing to help and offer guidance to those who are visiting Mumbai for the first time.  For those pilgrims who are transiting Mumbai for their onward journey to Shirdi to seek blessings of Baba, the hotel offers a comfortable transit‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: erdenkind
Review: From decent to terrible - it all depends on what room you get
Detailed Review: The hotel is in a quiet corner of the otherwise lively neighborhood of Dadar East. Hotel staff is excellent. I felt very safe. The bedding is OK, the rooms are large enough and fairly clean. The problem is the bath room. I stayed on two different occasions in two different rooms. Both bathrooms suffered from the same design flaw: There is a shower in one corner, then the sink opposite to the bathroom door, then the toilet and finally in the other corner the bathroom drain. Therefore having a shower sets the entire bathroom under water. Please note: I have seen many bathrooms in Asia where shower and toilet where not separated, but nothing quite as dysfunctional as this one. The difference between my two stays was that in one instance everything in the bathroom was clean and in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manuessechuma
Detailed Review: The staying in this hotel was outstanding expection and hopefully I will come back asap And it's a place where can give reference to the friends and families to spend their holidays Kind people. Friendly and high service rooms. Place kindly and clean people. Fast to responde to the request of guests. We only regret that we are expact and always the difference are present but did it did not affect the goodness of people working to this hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Cruiser815370
Detailed Review: This is the only place which u prefer to live wenever i visit mumbai, they have got an excellent staff who treat the customers with care and respond with a smile on face all the time. Apt place for the words ‚Äúcustomer is the main priority‚Äù.   Excellent maintenance of the rooms in different types such as deluxe and executive, peaceful ambience, well maintained Air conditioning and wifi round the clock. I suggest this place as the best one to live for every individual.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Climber814157
Detailed Review: We stayed for 10 days in Bawa regency.The front desk staff were always smiling and pleasant.The food was good.The room service guys were very helping.The hotel is neat and clean.I would recommend this hotel as it is very safe  and comfortable to stay for families and ladies.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Camper597726
Detailed Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful. I loved their thoughtfulness and approach. The room was nice. The toilets are old and were a put off. Maybe the higher end rooms have better ones. Food was quite good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ankit4691
Detailed Review: The stay at elphinstone was amazing. Although the building looks very old from outside but the interiors are really good. I had booked a deluxe room which was sufficiently spacious. The room service was outstanding, they provided continental breakfast daily which had either an egg option or a veg option. Given the price, I would really recommend this to anyone who wishes to stay in South Mumbai

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Avishkar
Detailed Review: The stay at the hotel was superb. The staff gives you a warm welcome at the reception with snacks, water and wet wipes and would make you feel like home. Breakfast spread is limited to bread toast and eggs but the serving was fresh.  The location was in walking distance to CST and all the shopping places, gateway of india and marine drive are in 3km range. The entrance is a bit old with lobby and stairs but you would be delighted after reaching to the hotel's gallery. The hotel loaction ia well connected with freeway (elevated road) for faster commute.  The manager also gave us a free upgrade to their newly made suite.  A big thumps up for the hospitality, would like to visit again..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Brenda C
Detailed Review: Loved this place! Great stay for first time in India. Place is clean and comfortable. We checked in past midnight and the staff was super friendly. The breakfast was good and perfect to hold us up until our next Indian meal - various egg options with toast and coffee/chai. We got the smallest room, which is perfect if you just need a place to sleep but they have bigger rooms if you want to spend more time in your room or need more space to move around. They do have some chairs in the lobby area and even some massage devices for your back and feet! Would come back again and recommend it to friends and family.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Asmita M
Detailed Review: Stayed in the hotel for a night on September 18th 2018.It was more like going back to my home. The Manager recognised me and came forward to take my bag.When the whole of Mumbai is busy worshipping Shri Ganeshji with great fervour, this place still maintains its peaceful nature.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: narenjoshi
Detailed Review: If you going to mumbai for a bussiness trip or for vacation hotel elphistone is perfect place for everyone.clean and comfortable room with 5 star service. I really appreciate Mr. Hemond manager who takes care special care of guests.he is always there you to help you or guide you. I must say it's a great hotel with great team members. All the best. Narendra joshi

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Brijmohan C
Detailed Review: I always stay in Hotel Elphinstone in Mumbai.The attitude, ambience,near to CST are the drivers for me to stay at hotel.But among all above main is the attitude of staff, recognition of customer,understanding of customer er n providing support.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jenifer
Review: Don't worry about the service it is always 5class
Detailed Review: Good hotel good staff good ambiance good decor. Like mention about my stay in this hotel it's was a pure experience of good hospitality staff have good communication with in them self. Like to high light that my room was very clean and neat my room attendant was very professional and well trained ever day my room was well clean and all the things was properly set thank to house keeping staff for making my stay comfortable and also the food was goid. Like to  tell to GM please send my appreciation to the hk team. Like vist again  Highly recommended Thanks...!!!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: CabMag2015
Detailed Review: My inlaws have been staying in the Le Grande whenever they are in Mumbai for 4 years now. The staff are friendly and service is par excellence.The food at the restaurant is great. Looking at all this we celebrated my inlaws 50th Wedding Anniversary on 8th Sep 18,  at the Le Grande which turned out to be  the best venue after going thru 100's of venues around Andheri. Mr Sabas , a gem of a person was very accommodating to our needs. Mr More, the F&B manager was more than happy to assist to our needs and made sure everything was set to perfection. Hats off to the fanastic staff that made sure our guests were attended. I would HIGHLY recommend Hotel Le Grande for its Venue for every occasion. Its food at the restaurant and rooms for a good stay. Thank you Mr Sabas, Mr More and the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Heather P
Detailed Review: I only spent one night at Hotel Le Grande. The room was spacious and clean and so was the bathroom. The hotel is situated next to a school. So you hear happy noises. I found to staff to be disengaged. The hotel has a shuttle and I hit a bit of a panic when I couldn't find the driver when I arrived at the airport. Other than that the hotel is conveniently situated and served its purpose for the one night.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sherpa817038
Detailed Review: I am very happy with the services that I got. Had plan an event for my company here with a 90 pax with breakfast. It was a great as I got appreciation for planning the entire event from my Bosses. Food is tasty, infrastructure is very good, staff is quick and active, things asked get done immediately. Looking forward for a long term relation with some competitive rates. Thank you .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mady
Detailed Review: After two days travelling from shirdi sai mandir we stayed at le grande hotel to rest and next day we had flight to delhi.we booked 4 rooms and 2 rooms out of 4 hotel provided us were used rooms later on request they changed and on same floor cunstraction work was in process...and other 2 rooms bathroom were so small and in hotel images bathrooms size big and clean...totally bad experince.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kanhu M
Detailed Review: This place is awesome to stay with family it's near to international airport .restaurant   staff are friendly.reception staff helped me in booking car .free WiFi is provided.breakfast spread is good housekeeping staff are also helpful

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: samuel.v.pachuau
Detailed Review: I stayed for 3 nights in this hotel. The property is easily accessible from the airport. There is a shuttle service avaialble which you can request from hotel itself (they charge me Rs 250 for the same). My room was on the third floor. As I had not specifically requested a non smoking room, I was given a smoking room. When I entered the room, it was smelling excessively of cigarette smoke. Since there was no other room available, they came to spray the room with lemon grass. The room was small and the toilet was smaller. Very basic facilities. There was a lot of noise coming either from the lounge downstairs or from outside in the evening till midnight which was disturbing. If you're visiting for a night or so and want to be close to airport, it is okay otherwise it is better to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: narkarnarkar52
Detailed Review: Stayed on 4th of aug18 with my family it was a very beautiful stay.everything was excellent hoping to visit the hotel again.amey at reception was helpful.breakfast v ordered in the room was amazing.thank u

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manish K
Detailed Review: The rooms are clean and cosy, staff is very helpful and friendly, it also has nice location, it's near CSTM, fashion street, Crawford market etc; everything's great except for one :breakfast, it can be improved.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Zeeshan K
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel !!  rooms are small but comfortable. Great breakfast and very good service. Staff is polite and welcoming. Best option if you are looking For a hygenic place to stay near mohammad ali road and especially near hajj house.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bowi72
Detailed Review: There are various categories of rooms, we had a simple one at first, close to the reception area. The room wasn't as quite as we hoped for, though after changing we had a quite one, away from the street, and slept like babies. Rooms don't have windows, they are rather new and are absolutely clean. Breakfast is simple but OK (french brkfst). The USPs are:  1) the good location between old city center and airport. The place is perfect if you have an early flight (ca. 45 min. to the airport, calculate 600 Rps.). Plan 10 car minutes to the gate of India from with you can cover most attractions (Victoria Terminal can even be walked).  2) the second USP is probably the more important one: The staff. People are very friendly, helpful and well trained. They come up with loads of tips‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shaggy921
Detailed Review: Stayed there for 4 days.Main USP of this hotel is the location. Marine drive,wankhedee stadium is in walking distance. I was upgraded from deluxe room to superior room. Superior room is spacious and regular housekeeping was done but still a damp smell was always there. Breakfast was complementary in my package.Food was okay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 245DaveB
Review: Friendly hotel with great customer service
Detailed Review: A group of 11 people stayed 6 nights from 24 August in 6 rooms, we found all the rooms to be clean and tidy; the hotel accommodated us at very short notice due to cancellation of our prearranged accommodation at another place. Le Gande were able to put us all in rooms that were on the same floor. We enjoyed breakfast and evening buffet each day; the food was lovely and the chefs prepared something different each day.The complimentary WiFi and airport transfers were greatly appreciated. Reception staff were very helpful. Thank you to everyone for a lovely stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jest1988
Detailed Review: I stayed there with my family between 27-29 August. I booked the room through the hotel‚Äôs website and it was showing free breakfast. However I was charged in real. The curtain of the room fell down during our stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rittwik mondal
Detailed Review: The level of service in this hotel is exceptional there has been no request that was not met with a pleasant attitude the rooom is good and clean the food spread at breakfast is good all the staffs at reception and breakfast staff were polite abd helpful.also free wifi and airport drop was provided overall enjoyed my stay

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TeamBrizzy
Detailed Review: Good hotel, nice clean rooms, good food and splendid hospitality. Room service is always on time. Clean bathrooms and clean towels provided. Awesome view of the International Airport terminal. Air conditioned rooms and safes for valuable personal belongings.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ramu T
Detailed Review: We had a stay at Hotel le grande and conference room as well. Breakfast spread was excellent. the set up for conference room was good. Free WiFi was provided all the staff are friendly and polite   and also free airport transfers are provided overall excellent stay kudos to the team specially breakfast staff

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nicholas Mariarputham
Detailed Review: Close to Chatrapathi Shivaji Airport. Compact and clean. Friendly service. Airport pickup and drop. Room to improve service by providing better quality toiletries. Elevator space and corridors are very compact. Strictly for work or business visit only not for family and leisure.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: signsun1202
Detailed Review: Yet another transit hotel with average service. Looking high prices of airport nearby hotels, I no start assume you can get something similar to this. Either pay high cost or compromise for one night stay. Approach road to this hotel is full of mess and for moment you may start thinking about your bad decision. Food was bad to average (was served cold)

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rohitsanjeevani
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful stay at the hotel le grande stay was superb right from the airport pickup .all the staff are friendly from reception to service staff .breakfast spread is good hotel also provides free wifi.rooms are clean reception staff also arranged for a city tour I would recommend this hotel to my friends

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jaideep N
Detailed Review: Excellent conference held at Le Grande with special mention of food.  Staff was very accommodative. Good setup for conference. Narayan as main coordinator was very helpful. Good reviews by all participants.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anjali d
Detailed Review: We had a cooperative function of 2 days , really a very good experience ,great staff , delicious food . The staff were really very cooperative and helpful ,especially (Narayan and Oscar ) . The management needs a appreciation and had a wonderful experience . Will have more events in future !

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SK A
Detailed Review: Hotel Legrand is an excellent hotel with well behaved staffs. They are highly caring....Overall it is an excellent place to stay. I would like share my experience...they had breakfast complementary and my wife was on fasting and asked for something without onoun and garlic. The kitchen staff immediately prepared special Curry for her without any extra charges and served....truely it was heart winning for me.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Samirah G
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel good location friendly staff always at your disposal when needed help. Hotel can be ranked 4*. And thank a lot for helping me. Breakfast was yummy..hotel has a restaurant it served delicious food buffet..

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kipkirui Y
Detailed Review: Le Grande hotel, what I liked about it... It's near the Mumbai Airport so I could not worry about missing my flight, it has amazing rooms with fan and AC, very clean, very cozy beds, they offer breakfast in the morning, some really tasty Indian food there. I would like to come back to hotel le Grande whenever I visit Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sapan2901
Detailed Review: It was a pleasant stay. The staff were very friendly, great value of money. Rooms are very clean !!  Food was mind blowing!! Loved it !! Would love to visit again !! Good location for airport passenger and for USA visa applicant. Free shuttles to airport by hotel was a good one !!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vaibhav B
Detailed Review: Nice ambiance , good hospitality and best location. The front desk staff was very courteous with smiling face. The room size and cleanliness is good. I have not availed the restaurant service but the cake shop at reception was nice.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ericengineer81
Detailed Review: Hi, I will like to thank Bawa group of hotels and specially staff of Bawa Regency Hotel in Dadar for the best service they are providing to customers. Entire team from Security Guard, Reception and House keeping are very helpful to customers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Musharraf H
Detailed Review: Good hotel , beautifully maintained. Humble and friendly attitude of manager eases your stay.  Very near to all famous tourist points of Mumbai and many markets. Walking distance from Crawford market.  Go for it

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ria702
Review: VALUE FOR MONEY & VERY GOOD LOCATION
Detailed Review: From the reception , restaurant and the housekeeping the staff is very helpful and polite.Rooms are small..........Go for dlx and sup rooms.Rooms are nice and clean.The location is very convenient to all the sight seeing area and shopping places.We will surely visit again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amsetus
Review: Very convenient hotel with excellent service
Detailed Review: What a pleasant welcome, being received with drinks and chips at the front desk! The room we had was on the top level, very comfortable with a big bathroom. The location was ideal in the heart of the Victorian architecture, there was some work going on with the building of the metro system but we did not experience any noise, labor may be finished by now. Breakfast was an enjoyment, even the baristas Rasher, Ballu and Alumal were very gratious. Secret: Next to the lobby there is a massage chair (free) so you can relax after a full day of touring this beautiful city.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anil T
Detailed Review: The hotel is located at a very good place and the rooms are very clean and hygienic. The room service is very good and responsive. Overall infrastructure is very good and good quality food is provided. The Staff is pleasant and courteous. Its been a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sajju b
Detailed Review: Best stay. Good clean and spacious rooms. Helpfully staff. Always with to help. And also free and speedy Wi-Fi. Hassle free check in. Good and quality breakfast. 24 hours room service. Best economical stay. A good stay over all. Recommend to all.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bawkher y
Detailed Review: Pleasant stay at the hotel. From pick up to drop back at the airport it was a wonderful experience. the staff are polite and courteous. the food is excellent. we would like to certainly stay at the above hotel again.
