Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shsoni74
Detailed Review: Very Good Accommodation, Hotel staff very mannered, I suggest for every person for this hotel, Rooms and services are speechless,It was such as my memorable  stay, Thank you le grande team  Regards, Harsh Soni

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vmahajan65
Review: cosy and comfortable stay offered in Bawa regency
Detailed Review: The hotel is located in bustling Dadar area, howewver when you turn into the lane where the hotel is located,   the hustle bustle is replaced by a sense of quaintness and  its entrance  and  reception takes you into the old world hospitality with its  charm and warmth.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rishi708
Detailed Review: Great Service. Well Mannered and well trained staff. I keep traveling to various cities and have several  hotels. But service here can not match any in this category.  Guys please keep it up. Ill visit again soon

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bk m
Detailed Review: service is good and reception is excellent....Mr Ajay the front office has been excellent in his approach & attitude. thanx  I think for this facility the tariff is way high...for customers like us who wish to stay on a regular basis the management ought to provide special discounts...

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanskriti T
Review: The hotel meets the expectations and the service is swift and the staff is humble
Detailed Review: Have stayed here for 15 days together, over multiple trips. The staff was extremely friendly. The restaurant with their 24*7 kitchen was very flexible and the food delicious. The room was also comfortable and the hotel took care of the needs.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Louise
Detailed Review: Staff are extremely helpful. We got an upgrade to the deluxe room which was very comfortable, clean and had everything we could possibly need. Perfect location - out of the touristy area and very central in Mumbai - convenient to get to Colaba, Fort, Chowpatty beach...etc. Highly recommended especially for a less touristy experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venkat_09
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at this Hotel. It is a small oasis. From outside you doubt if you are entering the right property but once inside its all together different. We have booked a deluxe room and it is spacious by Mumbai standards with proper ventilation. The bathroom is clean. I recommend Delux rooms due to its size and ventilation. Room service is good. Location is OK and near to Crawford market. CST is nearby but may need taxi. If you prefer to take local train, I believe Masjid station is much nearer.  Breakfast is basic but good. There is excellent small restaurant just beside called Balgi which serves delicious Indian food. Overall hotel offered best value for money.  The best thing I liked about is the service. My son had a minor accident and the staff went out of their‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anand A
Detailed Review: Very small room.  The room shown in on internet is of big room (Suites) and is shown for booking even deluxe room. The same is used for selling small, i.e., deluxe room. suc a small room that you even can't accomodate a chair.  EVEN STAFF ARE NOT CO _ OPERATIVE.  ENTIRE PROPERTY IS HAVING BAD SMELL.  NO RESTAURANT.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bibek Sen
Detailed Review: Hotel Elphinstone annex is more than a hotel. It's like a friend's house. The cleanliness, the service boys, the positional advantages of being close to Chhatrapati Shivaji terminus, Crawford market, gateway of India,  cheap but clean restaurants just below the hotel, smoking area, laundry service,  availability of cabs at any hour of the day made it my first choice, I visited Mumbai four times, everytime except once I checked in at Elphinstone. Unlike many other hotels across India, I'm a frequent visitor of major cities, the deluxe suites are spacious, have TV and fridge,rooms and bathrooms are spotlessly clean, towels and sheets are clean and new. It has some defects, which hotel hasn't? The locality is a bazar due to the presence of dock workers, they have some kind of‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Merry B
Detailed Review: Dont let the entrance colour your opinion. Its clean, well appointed rooms, friendly and helpful staff, and central location is perfect for a short business trip. The breakfast is the bummer. But other than that, great place at a very modest price.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tarun Chugh
Detailed Review: It is a 3-4 STAR hotel for working professionals walking distance to abdul rehman and musafirkhana, 5-10 mins uber distance to colaba n gateway of India everything nearby rooms are a bit small but very well maintained

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: gaurav b
Review: excellent property & wonderful service with newly renovated ROOMS
Detailed Review: Stay at elphinstone hotel is always about comfort & relaxing but this time it was with a BONUS as they have got newly renovated room & i had chance to stay in it, although all rooms are very cozy clean but this room is with all new interior & a huge bathroom, as usual all staff members right from hotel managers to room boy all are extremely courteous & helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tauseef Narangi
Detailed Review: Best budget hotel in Mumbai...very close to cst station.Rooms were neat and clean. The manager Mr Hemond was kind enough to give us a spare room before check-in.Complementary breakfast was good but the menu was very limited they can improve on that..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: saad05
Detailed Review: Very well maintained clean rooms. Centrally located. Crawford Market 5 mins walk, Marine Drive 10 mins drive. The manager Mr. Hemond will do everything possible to make sure the guest have a pleasant experience. A great stay and value for money all in all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chris v
Detailed Review: The hotel is a space of calm and comfort in the chaos that is the city of Mumbai. The staff provide excellent service on arrival and throughout your stay to ensure all your needs are met.   The rooms are well air conditioned with plenty of space for those sharing a room. Everything was in suitable working condition including the wifi.   The breakfast is simple and does the job for those who are keen to explore Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dev B
Review: Amazing location but staff could be more courteous
Detailed Review: I put up there for 3 days. First day i was in superior room. They were below average as they offer very less space. Like 8*5 room. Its more or less like a bathroom space of a normal hotel. After that, for next 2 days i changed my room to deluxe room then they offer us suite. That was amazing. Ample space in rooms. Neat and clean rooms with clean bathroom. They dnt have much in breakfast. First day the waiter refused for the breakfast as they dnt have enough idli's for us. When i contacted the front desk they help us with the alternate food available with them Service staff is rude and should be polite. Where as front office staff was helpful and polite. The main turn on of the hotel is the relaxing point i.e. foot massager and back massager which help u to get rid off ur‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anjan2mon
Detailed Review: It was a nice stay at Hotel Fortune, Room and bathroom were clean, but bathroom was small. The bed-sheets and towels were also clean. There is a restaurant too, foods were tasty. The staff was good too.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rabia K
Review: Should not be given even 1 star!
Detailed Review: we had the worst experience in this hotel. the first room we were offered, had a mold smell and the AC was not working. After complaining, they moved us to another room - this was "Suppose" to be a non smoking room but it REAKED of smoke and was disgusting. After further complaint, we were moved to a decent room for an extra charge. Everything was fine the first night and the second night the AC stopped working, it was 40 degrees in Mumbai and our AC stopped working - we called the lobby to fix the issue but we got no response and in the morning they definitely didn't make any accommodation to rectify this issue. BEWARE!! it looks nothing like the pictures posted!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DvsH008
Detailed Review: This hotel is a great place to stay. The staff are friendly and helpful. Service was good. We appreciated Kishan helping us with our travel arrangements. We enjoyed our meals here and found the menu had lot's of choice.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: maxdinatale06
Detailed Review: Very good service,everybody is doing his job whith smile and kindness.general manager,cleaners,desk service,waiters.these peoples represent india the best way. Try to find the same quality in west is quite impossible. Tourism here is just pleasure and i will keep coming.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: pdaniel2018
Detailed Review: Clean and Comfortable rooms to stay. Friendly and helpful staff.Special thanks to Mr.Hemond who recommended good restaurants to try in Mumbai and suggested best shopping places. Takes special care to keep guests happy.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: wanderlustdance
Detailed Review: The outside doesn't look like much and the stairs definitely throw you off a little upon arrival. Fear not though, the hotel is quite nice when you arrive at the 2nd floor. The rooms with two single beds are pretty small. I don't recommend those unless you are travelling by yourself. The rooms with the double beds are perfectly sized, however, so definitely splurge there and you are good to go. I found the staff to be very helpful. They directed me to everything I needed. The breakfast was simple but very good. There is a restaurant just below the hotel that has good food, which was handy. There isn't an incredible amount to walk to nearby but we used this as a base to grab a taxi to tourist destinations and it worked out very well. I recommend it overall for the price range.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raju P
Detailed Review: This hotel is located close to south Mumbai. The rooms are clean and spacious. Bathrooms are modern. And the service is very good. The exact location of the hotel looks a little sketchy but it's very safe and good value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kadir M
Detailed Review: Without doubt one of the favorite hotels I stayed during my time in Mumbai! Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the staff and manager.  Note, this is not a 4/5-star hotel or so, but the atmosphere is so special that it really felt like home to me. All respect for the whole staff who does a great job here; a true sample of excellent hospitality!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Roshni S
Detailed Review: Stayed there for 8 nights in the deluxe room. New and clean room with hot water and AC. We couldnt have asked for more. Bed is very comfy. Staffs are very polite especially the housekeeping and kitchen staffs. Very respectful people. Its a small hotel,yet very lively.There's free massage chair for back and feet which was just amazing after a hard shopping day.   Negative Aspect-After every 3 days, i had to go to the reception to get another wifi password, which was quite disturbing, especially when its 11pm and you had to get out of your room to go to the reception. Also breakfast is too limited, like you have to choose between butter toast or eggs. MAybe they can include a fruit in the breakfast package, it will be more than enough. LAst thing is the stairs that leads to the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Makarand K
Detailed Review: We had a morning flight from Mumbai International airport. So we stayed here for a night. The hotel is decent, room was clean and spacious. The staff was very good. We had booked with a meal included. The buffet lunch was very good and so was the breakfast. There were ample options. Very satisfied with this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ashish K
Detailed Review: I have stayed at this hotel multiple times on my domestic-international overnight layover; since the location is quite near to both the dom/int airports and they provide airport transportation.The rooms are ok and I usually just sleep over for a few hours.   However, I really had a bad experience on my last visit. The hotel driver who dropped me at the airport as usual wanted money/tip. I usually tip handsomely, but unfortunately I ran out of cash this time around. The driver started blaberring as if I had commited a huge crime by not paying him. It was really embarassing.  Complained to the hotel management about the rude behaviour, but they did not even bother to acknowledge my complaint. Well they just lost a regular customer.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ShweNan
Review: Not at all a 3 star hotel
Detailed Review: Bad experience ofstaying at his hotel on a business trip, Airconditionng doesn't work well, lots of noise in neighbourhood. Buffer n breakfast is not up to mark, does not feel clean and appealing. The ew emotion goofed up on our airport pick up too. Lifts don't work correctly and water stopped in the middle of bath to return with blackish dirty water!  Won't recommend it for the price they are charging. Overall a poor experience.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: chrisaussie1
Detailed Review: Mumbai is an expensive place for accomadation. Bawa Regency represents good value for money for what it is. If you seek a higher standard prepare to pay 50% plus. I spent 11 nights at Bawa Regency. This is a realistic appraisal of my stay. Also remember all prices quoted are plus tax. Rooms, food, laundry etc They hav a sign in reception. Complains are our textbooks to learn from.  Good-  -Friendly and helpful staff like Allwyn, Ajay, the doorman and housekeepers etc -Proximity to Dadar railway station. -Smooth checkin and checkout at the hotel -Curved ceilings and walls in my room (pic) -Seperate enclave lounge and table in my room (pic) -75% of their extensive food menu available 24/7 -Simple breakfast served in room which i like personally. -Reception area clean and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ralph K
Detailed Review: room was decent for the price, good room service, clean room and bathroom. polite and helpful staff...  good location, center of the city in Dadar and lots of places to shop around and visit. near to the local train station.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ajinkyaukuk
Detailed Review: It was great experience over there. My wife was studying there.she could get pkeasapl,cool,calm climate for her study.room service was good.staff was supportive n helpful. Location too good. All rooms r too good

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tiger
Detailed Review: i had stayed at this hotel for some official work in April 2018 . I made following observation:   1) the rooms need to improve on their cleanliness  2) The person serving the complementary breakfast was RUDE  3) The manager was cordial and was a guy from Uttranchal  4) This hotel Does NOT have accessible good food hotels and you have to walk a lot to get to some decent eating zones.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Asmita M
Detailed Review: Stayed in Hotel Elphinstone Annexe Mumbai Maharashtra India for a night and it was a very comfortable stay. Reached in the afternoon of April 24th and checked out on the next day. The staff are very helpful and courteous. The hotel is grandiose because it's on the first floor of an old heritage building. There is a quiet calmness inside the hotel though it's situated in the busiest and in one of the oldest port areas of India. All sorts of conveyances are available to and from the hotel and the property is very close to the Mumbai Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus and one can reach the place pretty quickly from the airport also. The maximum city Mumbai looks green and beautiful from the front lobby of the hotel. Potted plants have added a cosy touch to the place. The‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HimasVR46
Detailed Review: Very good. Clean environment all around inside the building. Polite staff.Outside area around the entrance its a bit dodgy but can be ignored but other than that everything great. Great complimentary breakfast with different veg options

Source.Name: Hotel_Residency_Fort-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shanghai_Lil_49
Detailed Review: There was a bit of a wait when we arrived to accommodate a room for two beds but we were given snacks while we waited and after some time, we were in our room which although small, was very clean and of course great for the price.  The hotel is in a great area in Colaba- easy to walk around and get to so many places in Bombay that you want to see. The most incredible thing about the Residency Fort is the staff.  They are truly phenomenal. You will not want for anything. If you need a cab, a guide, a tailor, dry-cleaning, a Coca-Cola or if like me, you lose your passport in the cab they got you to go to the airport and you need to call that specific cab back, the staff at The Residency Fort have got you. Can‚Äôt say enough nice things about this place and looking forward to a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vivek Kaushik
Detailed Review: We had booked a package to a trip to mumbai & in that  Hotel le grande was our stay point situated near to airports ( both domestic & international) in andheri east & i must tell you it was a great stay , all the amenities were provided , the rooms were spacious bathroom was too good everything was proper . We also had a complimentary breakfast mostly food items ( boiled eggs, omlette , puri, aalu sabzi , idly ,saambhar , bread & butter or jam & coffee or juice ) i think i have mention most of it in detail . i will recommend this hotel to every one & at last i forgot to tell you people the staff were very helpful. thank you

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mohamedapa
Detailed Review: I come to India very frequently for my business.and in Mumbai I am very sure to stay in hotel le grande. The rooms are really very good, foods are awesome sum and they also have a round the clock room service. The location is pretty calm and you can enjoy a good sleep. For me it‚Äôs a very good place to stay in. And thanks to the management for a such good maintained property. The pick up and drop service to the airport is good and fast. And also must say the free WiFi is also good in speed. ŸÅŸÜÿØŸÇ ÿ¨ŸäÿØ ÿ¨ÿØÿß  ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™ÿ±ŸÜÿ™  ÿ≥ÿ±Ÿäÿπ ÿ¨ÿØÿß  ÿ≥Ÿäÿßÿ±Ÿá ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßÿ±. ŸàÿßŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßÿ± ŸÖÿ¨ÿßŸÜÿß  ÿÆÿØŸÖŸá. ŸÖŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≤ÿ© ÿå ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ¥ÿÆÿßÿµ ŸÅŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ±Ÿäÿ≥ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÜ   ŸÖŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≤ŸäŸÜ  ŸáÿØŸàÿ° ÿ™ÿßŸÖ ŸÅŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸÜÿØŸÇ  ŸÑŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖ  ÿßŸÑŸÅŸÜÿØŸÇ ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿ¨ÿØÿß  ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ±. ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ®. ŸÑŸÑÿÆÿØŸÖŸá

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sangeeta c
Detailed Review: We were pretty apprehensive of getting a hotel in a central location with reasonable price tags... this was our choice after lots of research on the internet!! The hotel is located in dadar near local railway station...with quite a few tourist attractions within 2km.. The rooms we booked were deluxe.We were pleasantly upgraded to super deluxe rooms...Rooms are a bit on the smaller side , otherwise wonderful!!They provide all amenities complete with minibar n snacks...The best thing is that it has a 24hour open kitchen!! Another thing worth mentioning is their hospitality... People are ever smiling and ready to help out.. Overall we had a wonderful stay..

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Coastal759412
Detailed Review: Love the Bawa Regency,  perfect location,  friendly staff always ready to assist.  Food is excellent, tasty and service is available 24/7. We always stay at the Bawa Regency,  the smiles are free. We love it there.  Thankyou Bawa for the comfort.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: planet-travels2000
Detailed Review: Stayed at the Elphinstone hotel for a few nights while travelling through Mumbai. The service was extremely good and friendly, and the room was clean and exactly what was needed.   Highly recommended in this price range/category.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TomS1990
Review: Very clean modern room and very attentive staff
Detailed Review: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Mumbai. On arrival we were presented with water, crisps and a wet wipe!! Very handy after navigating trains from the airport!   Our room had recently been refurbished and considering the price we paid and location of the hotel, was EXCELLENT value for money (we were told it‚Äôs the best room in the hotel). The room and bathroom were spotless, had an amazing four poster bed and also tea/coffee making facilities.  The staff were extremely accommodating and went out of their way to ensure we had a pleasant stay. We notified them that we had bad water pressure and couldn‚Äôt really use the shower - by the time we returned from a day of sight seeing this had been fixed!   The complimentary egg breakfast in the morning was also great!   As‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sheena S
Detailed Review: Returning to The Elphinstone after each day of exploring in Mumbai felt like coming home. The staff are all fantastic and very helpful. The property is kept spotless and we were very comfortable during our 2 week stay. The beds were comfortable, the air conditioning and fans worked well and the atmosphere of the hotel was very soothing and comfortable. The masala chai in the afternoons and the breakfasts each morning were delicious. Highly recommended!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: WahedaRamjanally
Detailed Review: My name is Mrs Waheda Ramjanally from Mauritius.  My husband and myself spent four memorable days at Elphinstone Hotel in March 2018.  The room was very nice.  Toilet and bathroom were very clean.  Special thanks to members of the staff starting from the desk to cleaning team.  We are very much grateful for their precious help and support during our stay at Elphinstone Hotel.  Thanks a lot!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 6kerry g
Review: Brilliant place but for the noise from downstairs
Detailed Review: We stayed one night as we needed somewhere close to the station for a really early train. Not easy to find. The service was exceptional from the front desk who happily ordered a fab veg takeaway for us and then provided plates and cutlery from the kitchen, to the kitchen staff who were up at 4am to provide some toast and tea. Cannot fault the service. Rooms are very small but perfectly fine and comfortable for an overnight. BUT the noise from the doof doof bar below is horrendous. Not even earplugs dulled the vibrations coming through the floor. Maybe rooms near the kitchen are quieter.....

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: siddharth061073
Detailed Review: room r very neat & clean, breakfast is tasty and fresh, tea is awesome, location walkable from CSTM railway station/ gateway of india/crowfort market/ and one of the safest hotel in mumbai. hotel staff are helpful and honest. i am staying since 2016. siddharth bansod

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sharbis
Detailed Review: I book this hotel and it i dont regret my stay The hotel is very clean Staff are very helpful as well those at the reception.The only thing that is a problem is the staircase.We have to carry our suitcase up and down. There is no parking available at hotel premises.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venu Nair
Detailed Review: Safe and secure place. Don‚Äôt predict by entrance to the hotel, inside the hotel is clean and tidy. Average room size but the best in the locality. Friendly and supportive staff. Complimentary breakfast needs improvement.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Businesstripinsider
Review: Good for Meeting, lacks Green Cover
Detailed Review: Yet another event at Fortune. Good Lunch, courtesy and events management. But the place lacks basic green cover, looking a concrete, hot terrain in summer. Roof top pool with no green roofing or even plants around

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kshitish-Jeurkar
Detailed Review: I stayed at Hotel Le Grande in March 2018 for couple of nights. I had booked considering it would be on main chakala road, near metro. But its bit inside. If someone has the vehicle it just doesnt matter and even if you dont, it hardly does. I checked in at night and after the check in was to go for dinner outside and was looking for Auto, it was bit dark. Owner, sorry forgot the name, dropped me to the location enroute, really nice gesture. Security guy helped me get auto whenever I needed. (I prefer Autos in Mumbai and Uber everywhere else :))  The lobby, restaurant which you see after entering is really nice. I was greeted well. Room was nice, AC was working well. Bed was bit smaller for my height. Bathroom was neat and clean. The location is convenient to Chakala as well as‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: tubki
Detailed Review: This place is awesome to stay with family. every time we went to Bombay we stayed only in this hotel.  Rooms are spacious with good amenitie & very clean. Good staff. excellent receptionist & Manager . they are helping a lot.  Actually we are from Goa & we met there Mr. Rodrigues who himself from Goa. He is also a very helpful & polite. ,Good food  in  the restaurant . Breakfast was also tasty with many choice. In all aspect this hotel is very perfect. I recommend this hotel to all my friends from Goa . Thank you everybody. We are waiting to stay in this hotel during our next visit to  Bombay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nupur A
Review: Good Budget hotel but can be better
Detailed Review: I stayed in the hotel for 2 nights one day and took one Complementary breakfast. The breakfast was not good(I tried Vegetarian only) , it was tasteless with no salt nothing. It is better to eat only bread and butter. The room was good, shower was having some problem but otherwise everything was good in the room. Also was had lunch in the hotel restaurant itself. Food is reasonable price and taste OK. Only thing I didn't liked was If you ask for regular water they will give you in used Bisleri bottles not a jug or something.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Riaz V
Detailed Review: Service good from mangers and supervisors, staff, food is good at the restaurant . had no problems. Request was available when I asked like car arrangements. The room was silent without disturbance.  Had No problems  had a good experience . thank you

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: myaandozzie
Detailed Review: just returned from my first trip to Turkey and I was pleasantly surprised, lovely hotel although the rooms are a bit dated and could do with a touch up. The food was very varied and was of very good quality. I would recommend to my daughter and she is a fussy eater. I will go back.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mahindraprakash G
Detailed Review: Truly a home away from kind of an establishment. Hygienic,Hospitable And more than value for money. The airport Pick up person was courteous and on time. And the hotel itself is an up end sort of a place, looked after by professionals team from hospitality background who would venture out of their way to make you stay comfortable and fruitful.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: StutiSharma
Review: Comfortable stay, nice location, helpful staff
Detailed Review: It's right in the middle of chaos, being on a busy locality near the Dadar station, but a cosy and quiet place. The newly furnished rooms on the third floor where I was upgraded to are fabulous. A boutique hotel that's comfortable and provides good food and all other facilities. Overall, thumbs up. Was travelling with an infant and got what I needed, whenever I needed. Very supportive desk staff and other employees. No unnecessary hassle. :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: tatsatpaper
Detailed Review: The service was very nice and cordial, friendly staff. Homely atmosphere. The stay and my experience is very delightful.  Must recommend if you r looking for a nice place in Mumbai to enjoy your vacation

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Witold S
Detailed Review: The hotel is placed in an interesting location to wall - marker, nice mosques and temples (not the ones listed for tourists which is even more fun).  Walking distance from Victoria Station and historical center. Bus ride from Marine drive. 50 rp by taxi to Gate to India and ferries to Elephant Island. Reasonable breakfast (good price/quality balance)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajkumar
Detailed Review: This property is located few kilometers away from Nariman Point in a very busy area of masjid bunder. Entrance may be difficult to locate. Old staircase is a dampener. But the scene changes when you climb to the 1st floor. Decent lobby. Front office staff was ok. It took nearly 10 minutes to check in though no other guest was there. Room was ok and clean. Bed needs a lot of improvement and bed sheets are not clean and pillow covers had some stains. Hot water was available. Breakfast was minimal but decent and not something to complain about. Staffs were good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ChrisDaberer
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel as part of a G Adventures tour and it was adequate for what I needed.   Here‚Äôs what I thought... Room. The room was small but clean and everything was in working order. The only minus was that there was no subdue and the bathroom was very tiny.  Location. The location was good but the closest attractions nearby (Taj Hotel & Gateway arch) are still too far to walk. Taxis should be readily available. I did not venture out of the hotel in the dark but several friends mentioned being no bothered by people hanging out in the area. There is also a metro station nearby.   Staff. I found the staff to be friendly and helpful. There is an aquarium built into the lobby floor and staff were happy to let guests help feed the fish. Room service was prompt and friendly‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: raviGuwahati
Detailed Review: It was a late night check in in the hotel. It was an average size room available in the hotel a very small room. Which I was not used too but still managed to stay there. It was under renovation. I don‚Äôt know much about the facilities available in the hotel as I left next day early morning to Indore for some business trip. Breakfast was complimentary but could not have it. Yes I tried veg biryani there it was good and liked it. Overall ok stay

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ningegowda
Detailed Review: I have stayed at this hotel for 5 times and spent more than 35 days, Nice Location, Very neat and clean rooms, Budget-friendly, Good Interior, Food is delicious, free airport picks and drops, Amazing Staff Very friendly nature, I will definitely recommend this hotel for Business, Family, and Friends. I would like to visit again....

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Spandan D
Review: Worth to stay there for a short period
Detailed Review: We stayed for one night. Staffs are cordial, polite and sensible. Food are tasty and good. Breakfast has maintained a balanced choice for indian regional food habits. We could stay 2 hrs more than the checkout time without any hassle. Open view from back side rooms.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Trancy C
Detailed Review: It has been for 2 years since my last review about this hotel.  During this two years, I have stayed with them for more than 10 times without comments. Also within this two years, they have made much improvements on hotel better.  1. The restaurant style improved. Before it was a small and gloomy one. Now it is a spacious and stylish one with visible kitchen. It feel more comfortable to have complementary breakfast in the morning or lunch and dinner there.   2. Reception desk and lobby improved. Before it made customers feeling hotel was  not good when you reached there. But now it made you feel good and can say it is obviously better than ever. This time all staffs are in new fashion suit. The whole team looks more professional and skilled.  3. Facility improved. Before the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mike5124
Review: Very  happy with our stay   at this hotel
Detailed Review: ..The. room was clean ...the bed was  super comfortable...linens changed daily..  seems cleaning was going on continously .the staff were out of this world amazing..bending over backwards serving us and  offering to help .Mr Sanmeerdeb. could not have been more helpful with making suggestions and recommendations  and seeing to our comfort,

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nibedita C
Detailed Review: It was only a single night halt at mumbai. And we searched a hotel near as we wanted to stay near Dadar station for catching our morning train.A small hotel near dadar market and station.  But overcom every thing with services matching to any 5 star hotel. We were upgraded to their executive room,which are new and with modern fitting. The person managing counter will be an asset to any hotel. At morning he ensured to call cab and specially sent complimentary hot tea and sandwiches at our room early morning at 4.30 a.m as he did not wanted us to leave without eating anything.  That's called hospitability! Dadar market us just 2 mnts walk. Highly recommended to stay for anyone looking to stay at Dadar   Their hospitability is awesome.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sairaj9999_sk
Detailed Review: it was good to stay because the rooms were so neat and clean which made us happier after coming and also the staff was so helpful to us when we had some queries regarding the hotel and the ambiance was attractive and fine enough......

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Saylesh
Detailed Review: Was a bit uncertain to book the hotel as it was our first time in India. However, the staff made us feel at home. They were very helpful, caring and always cooperate. We had a great moment at Bawa. Am sure we'll come back again and is definitely recommended.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kalpesh J
Detailed Review: The hotel was booked for 4 days stay on business tour. The biggest advantage as far as my need is concern was the location. The hotel is located very near to Ambedkar Road, Behind Chitra Cinema , Dadar-E. One can have nearby prominent places like shopping, eating and connectivity by Train & Taxis. Will recommend for commuters. Only shortfall is Breakfast is served in the room itself & hence have very limited choice. Room can be more spacious and airy, that I feld. Rest of Okkk.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: litza1987
Review: Top hotel, spotless clean and very friendly staff
Detailed Review: Thank you very much for our recent stay in this great and clean hotel in Mumbai. The Staff was just amazingly helpful and I can easily recommend to stay here. It also has a good location, close to the Main Train Station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ssmoerda
Detailed Review: I stayed in Hotel Elphinstone Annexe for 8 days. As my passport was stolen, I used more or less all of this time to get my papers in order again. The hotel is located in a not so very posh area of Mumbai. But once found your way up the shabby stairs, you see the door of the hotel, and and a new world appears: Nice, clean and modern. Mr Hemond, the manager, runs a very smooth enterprice here. He himself is utmost friendly and helpful, and the same goes for all of his co-workers in the receptiopn. During my 8 days stay, I also learned to know several of the excellent staff, but especially Mohan and Dilip. They were very nice and helpful, always ready to assist me with anything. Despite the circumstanses, I had a most wonderful stay in Mumbai, thanks to Hotel Elphinstone. Very‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Beattie‚Äôs
Detailed Review: We stayed for two nights while visiting Mumbai, staff very welcoming, couldn‚Äôt do enough for you, rooms very clean, we were in room 115 didn‚Äôt hear any noise at night, breakfast basic but good. Plenty of good eateries around. definitely recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bubanita
Detailed Review: Mr Hemond and all his exquisite staff made us felt welcomed from the very first moment. They offered us a welcome lime juice, made sure we had everything we needed, every our request was accepted with the utmost kindness and smile. They truly know what customer care is all about.  Hotel Elphinstone will be our homebase whenever we stop in Mumbai. Thank you Mr Hemond and staff for giving us the best welcome for our first Indian experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nailla D
Review: Superior twin room small but clean with great service
Detailed Review: Very central location, easy accessibility to all major attractions and city shopping, just down the road from Crawford Market. While rooms are smaller than most, I believe any hotel is only as good as the service it provides. The staff are courteous and helpful and make you feel at home. The manager, Mr. A. Hemond, is a consummate professional and very knowledgeable about the city, its transport and services. He assisted us with train bookings and even called to confirm our travel arrangements on his day off. He also assisted us in purchasing magazines we sought to buy in Mumbai. The hotel rating of 2.5 does not reflect the 5 star quality of its staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Fandl2011
Detailed Review: Stayed at the elphinstone hotel from 5th to 8th January. We had a difficult time getting to the hotel because of the general strike but once we were there we were able to fully relax and enjoy Mumbai life. The hotel is situated in a central area in Mumbai so is handy for sightseeing. The hotel is very clean and the rooms compact but well equipped with clean bathrooms, toiletries, tv, wifi and tea and coffee. The complimentary breakfast is freshly cooked and the bonus is it's served until 11am. However the best part for us was meeting Hamond, the general manager. He met our every request, thoroughly and professional. I wanted to arrange a surprise birthday cake for my travel companion and he sorted this. He booked us a car for a sightseeing tour and also arranged for us to have a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KathiVice
Detailed Review: The place is located directly on the main road down to Colaba and close to the Eastern Freeway (which connects South Mumbai and northern districts like Bandra West). Service staff is friendly and the place is clean, air conditioning is working well. Nothing spacey or luxurious - but for that price amazing for young travelers, who are outside all day anyways.  Directly in front of the hotel‚Äòs door are three cheap restaurants where you can see locals ordering traditional food; there is also a kiosk, where one can get bottled drinks, tea, cigarettes and snacks.  The ‚Äûfeel of the hotel‚Äú: Lovely place to not feel like the typical ‚Äûwhite tourist‚Äú.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Matthew B
Detailed Review: Good hotel in a good location. Close to main railway station and bazaar area. Clean and modern room although quite small. Tea making facilities in room along with fridfe and tv with cable channels. Helpful, friendly staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shyam P
Detailed Review: I visited this hotel in this month of jan. For my business trip. Really very good hotel this is.room is good clean and very hygenic.room service is very nice all staff are very polite. Breakfast is complimentary in morning was delicious. Specially thanks to room service staff shyam and manoj both are very good service person.reception staff are very polite. Thanks fortune.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AceNace
Review: Great Hotel, Great Staff and Great Location!
Detailed Review: This review comes a month late but we had a great time last month during our 4 day wedding stay @Le Grande with family, friends and relatives. Our functions were scattered in different hotels across Andheri-E and Le Grande's location worked out perfect. The hotel has been recently remodeled and the rooms are clean, well maintained and spacious. The staff is also courteous, helpful and responsive.   Mr. Sameer and Mr. More from the hotel did a brilliant job co-ordinating with all the bookings,reservations, room assignments, guests and all other facilities and arrangements. The super talented chef(Chef Vishal if I remember the name correctly) of the hotel deserves a special round of applause for all the delicacies he prepared for us during our entire stay and some family‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: beth1957
Review: Very close to the airport - don‚Äôt get ripped off by taxi company like we did.
Detailed Review: We stayed just one night prior to flying home the next day.  The room we had was good, clean, and quite large with 2 armchairs and coffee table and a large comfy bed. Plenty of sockets, but disappointingly no hairdryer. The shower room was adequate but the window did not shut properly which meant it was noisy in the room from construction work nearby. We had room service for food, which was tasty and delivered hot too. We got to the hotel by taxi from the airport taxi desk. Unfortunately despite the fact I showed then the hotel name and the address they didn‚Äôt seem sure where it was- we were charged 800 rs which we knew was much more than it should be, but didn‚Äôt argue, the driver then asked us to find the hotel on his phone and set up the navigation to it - when tapping in the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hemant B
Detailed Review: Stayed in this hotel 3families had a very good and pleasant start.The staff is very cooperative and always ready to assist.The breakfast is good.Can recommend this hotel to others as we had wonderful stay there.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Arifin A
Review: My first stay at a Mumbai hotel
Detailed Review: I had a pleasant stay at your hotel, the only problem was with the internet because I could not get connection in my room. Besides that all were good and compliments to your providing timely and useful information to guests when you had problem with the line connections between your reception and rooms also thanks for the chocolate candies, very thoughtful!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Siddharth V
Detailed Review: Have recently visited this hotel! Have visited this coz of my fist experience was amazing with this hotel! Where this hotel have a service called,"Day Use" which has a time where u check in at 12 pm and check at 6 pm. This service is majorly used by short transistor or couples to spend some quality time. I was the second option person!   Now this hotel have confirmed my bookings for this day use service 4 day in advance so that we do not face any last minute problem.   First of all they made me wait for almost 40 mins after my check in process.   And with the legit service time provided my check out should be 6 pm. But but but... The receptionist gave me a call at 5 pm and ask me to check out in 10 min.   Can u imagine a hotel receptionist asking u to check out in 10 mins.  They‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vishvesh_rege
Detailed Review: Our guests (Two families) stayed for three days and had an awesome stay experience. The rooms were really comfortable and service was up to the standards. A special thanks to Mr. Danish from reception who noted down our all the preferences very well and provided it accordingly though the hotel occupancy was high. We really appreciate it a lot. Once again thank you so much to the entire team for all your assistance and efforts. Keep it up. Cheers.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kumar S
Detailed Review: Very good hotel in mid town ; multiple public transport options available ; staff very helpful and look after guests very well. Danesh was particularly very helpful. Good breakfast options. Room tariff is also available with complimentary breakfast and internet options.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hans Beck Gregersen
Review: Nice, small rooms og good service
Detailed Review: Its a cheap hotel by Mumbai standards - we stayed a family of five in two rooms - the rooms are very clean and nice - both aircon and fans - and got a great welcome with a drink and chips :-) Good service and very helpfull staff However be prepared for at pretty rough neighbourhood - and the hotel looks like XXXX from the outside

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Clarky6605
Review: Don‚Äôt stay if you want a nights sleep
Detailed Review: We stayed here on our 3 day visit to Mumbai.  We had booked a room for 2 plus extra bed for our 16 year old on arrival they only had a room with 2 single beds, as we were going to be late for our first tour we just accepted the room and my daughter  said she would sleep on the floor.  The hotel is spotless clean and in a good location ( although none of the taxi drivers we used knew where it was).  The staff are extremely helpful and can‚Äôt do enough for you.  After having done the bazaar walk tour and then gone out for something to eat we returned to the room around about 10:30pm we were very tired and just wanted to get our heads down unfortunately music started and then continued until about 1:30am it was constant and very loud.  Due to my daughter sleeping on the floor she‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Josh W
Detailed Review: We very much enjoyed our stay at Hotel Elphinstone. It is well located and provides good respite from the busy streets of Mumbai! We like to walk and found it was very possible from the location, even to Chowpatty Beach and to Colaba if you are keen.   However, the best highlight was the quality of service. Nothing is too much trouble, the hotel feels very secure. On our last night we had a very late train departing at 11pm. The staff allowed us to leave our bags during the day, and were happy for us to sit in the lobby and use wifi while we waiting for the train in the evening.   I would wholeheartedly recommend this very accommodating hotel and would certainly stay again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manoj D
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel for my honeymoon tour. Frankly saying i spend a good time in Mumbai this hotel. Every thing was fine. Lunch dinner and break fast was really fantastic. Indian Chinese all tandoori all type of dishes are available here. Service is good. Strongly recommend to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Daniel P
Detailed Review: I have to be fair & state that this is probably one of the cheapest hotels in Mumbai, so to start out, for that price it will never be great.  The issues here are: There was no window in our room. The room had been cleaned, not well though. No hot water. Room smelt a bit like mold.  However, the guys working there helped where they could & as we spent our time seeing as much of Mumbai as we could, we really only slept there so it served it's purpose for us.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TerryFerns
Detailed Review: The room was excellent with good linens and accessories. The bed was also very soft and had a pleasant sleep. The entire arrangements from the airport to the Hotel was well arranged. The entire Staff from the reception to the room service and housekeeping were very helpful and excellent Hospitality. The best part was their excellent food. It was so tasty and  delicious that me and my family enjoyed so very much. Overall a good and peaceful hotel as this is away from the traffic with excellent food. Worth our family stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RITIKA T
Detailed Review: Affordability : 4/5 Stay : 4/5 Food : 3/5 decent not highfi funky food basic hygienic food Location : Good though a little inside initially could be difficult to search but google takes you to exact place  Just one thing they are strict about the couple that stays . You gotta be married if you are a couple

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DrShailajaShivsharan
Detailed Review: This hotel has become my most favourite hotel at MUMBAI,as this is the most clean, chic n beautiful hotel with a excellent hospitality.It provides complimentary breakfast and make more fascinating things which makes your stay more amazing and memorable one. I genuinely love my stay at this luxurious hotel with a reasonable prices.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: narayanprasad1
Detailed Review: Very good stay. Very organised and welcoming hotel. Has most things you need eg: restaurant, good rooms and very good staff. Had   free breakfast with a variety of food which you will enjoy. I recommend this hotel for families.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Opkar C
Detailed Review: I was  on  a business/family  trip   from the  us  after  10  yrs and  was  referred  to  this  hotel  by a friend .The  rooms  were  large ,clean  and  well maintained .the  staff  was exceptional  an  went  out of the  way  to  make my  stay unforgettable.  They   also  provide   travel  to and  fro  from the  airport  and  free  breakfast .Best  Buy  for  your  Buck if  you  want  to  stay  near the  airport .Stongly  recommend  this  site   its  a  bit off the  main road   however  with that it has  its  advantages  of  being  quiet.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jenloo
Detailed Review: I stayed at Le Grande for two nights while I was visiting Mumbai on work. At first the approach road to the hotel worried me, but as soon as I entered I was greeted warmly and the check-in process was smooth. The rooms are neat and clean and the staff does their best to assist you. I thoroughly enjoyed the food there (a la carte) and was very impressed by the Head Chef and the main Manager. I noticed the Manager spent hours google translating to mandarin to help some Chinese guests file an FIR for their stolen phone! He went above and beyond.  Overall, as a solo woman traveler I felt very comfortable and will surely stay here again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: G33ta
Detailed Review: Clean rooms! Excellent staff, friendly and very helpful! Perfect for the family! Great breakfast! Even at mid night service is great. Our first visit and good start. Western toilets, good shower system, hot water system.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SMattu
Detailed Review: Stayed here for one night on a business trip. Rooms are small but neat and tidy. The staff however needs to be trained better. First they gave me an already occupied room, then it took 10 minutes to find an empty room. During check in I provided GST details for billing. But on checkout they lost those details and I had to validate them again.   And for some reason they refused to give my bill before payment. On my insistance they gave a provisional bill. When I was checking out they were struggling with another check-in although there were 2 receptionists sipping tea right there. Hope they impart much needed training to their staff urgently.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: pareekshreya
Detailed Review: I stayed there for 2 nights. It's a Good option for budget stay. Very nice, polite and humble staff. Food was also decent. It doesn't have a restaurant but 24 hours room service is there. Location is also nice as a few eating joints are located nearby.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michael U
Detailed Review: This is the second time my wife and I have stayed at this hotel,and once again we were not disappointed. The  service here is excellent,due entirely to the helpful and attentive staff who work so hard in keeping the hotel spotlessly clean and ensuring you have a pleasant stay. Breakfast is quite basic with a choice of eggs, toast and an Indian dish. There is no restaurant on site but good places to eat all around the hotel. Located in the south of Mumbai and is very handy for Crawford Market and Gate-Way to India. Loads of shopping just a taxi ride away. The black and yellow taxis are so cheap to  use, you can travel across the city for around 200 rupee. Always ensure the taxi driver charges you on the meter! Do not be put off at the outside appearance of the hotel as it looks‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Christine C
Detailed Review: We arrived in Mumbai exhausted from the long hours of travel and waiting, past midnight. We were shocked when we discovered that we had to walk up 2 flights of stairs, with our luggage, to the Reception. But the moment we stepped into the hotel, our expectations were exceeded, every single time.   We were welcomed with a bottle of water, a snack and a single-use wet towel. The check-in was smooth and efficient. For a 2-star hotel, we were given complimentary breakfast everyday. Although the menu showed the standard types of eggs, the chef served us a local dish which was not on the menu - egg buji. It was awesome (a word of caution, it's not for those who can't eat spicy!)  Every evening, they serve a delightfully refreshing lime drink, a welcome respite from the tropical heat.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gautam Bagchi
Detailed Review: Nice hotel very close to the CST Railway station. The hotel is an old building but well renovated into a good hotel. We requested for an early check-in, it was approved,The staffs, reception personnel were very helpful in advise on what to do in the city. Only thing they can improve is the choice and quantity of the complimentary  breakfast.Overall a nice and enjoyable stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Olivia B
Detailed Review: This hotel is located next to slums on a dirty area, at the crossing of 2 big roads so it is very noisy and hard to cross the street. Our Uber driver didn't even find the place. The stairs to get up to the hotel (no elevator!) look very broken and dirty. The hotel itself was clean, the staff is nice and helpful. Our room had a good size, the beds were comfortable. However it was very noisy at night so I recommend to bring earplugs! The bathroom has an opened window (just a whole) so the heat was entering the bathroom and then the room. The A/C was only in the room, not bathroom. The breakfast was ok.  I would not recommend to go there because of the location, but the rest was OK.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ashu A
Review: Nice n budget hotel near marine drive
Detailed Review: Very nice and budget hotel near marine drive. Really we enjoyed our stay at fortune. Latest service and all amenities are here as you need. Led TV fridge ac and very neat and clean room. Service n staff is good.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 885shradha
Detailed Review: What you spend here is what you get. its a nice cozy hotel, tucked away in a quiet street, which is very hard to find in mumbai.The breakfast spread could have been better, otherwise it was a comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Snehal R
Review: Good Stay, small rooms and nice breakfast
Detailed Review: It was good night stay while our trip back from Bali. Hotel staff and service was good. We get Free breakfast. they are just renovated so Rooms now must be more better. Location is also good in calm area. One can get auto from 5 mins walk easily.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Naznine M
Detailed Review: We came to this hotel from Bangladesh with my family we found this hotel very  good.The room service staff was excellent.The entire staff was very friendly and helpful.The food us good but felt a bit expensive.Would reccomend this hotel for families.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manasvi R
Detailed Review: Amazing hotel with good interior . Food is delicious. Very neat and clean rooms. Budget friendly hotel. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Will definitely recommend this hotel and would like to visit again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rupinder G
Review: Last minute visit due to flight delay
Detailed Review: My family was in a situation where we had to find a hotel at the last minute because of a flight delay. The staff in this hotel were very helpful. Even dropped us back to the airport in the morning. Breakfast was nice, room was clean and comfortable,

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anthony D
Detailed Review: The rooms are very good and clean. The room service is also very good. The house keeping department is very efficient and ensures the room is cleaned every day.I was picked up and also dropped at the Mumbai airport.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jagan N
Detailed Review: The hotel was good stayed for 2 weeks in this hotel they had the best services.The front office staff was very cooperative.The housekeeping staff was helpful.My kid enjoyed the most than we did.The hotel was a bit interior but was peaceful. Would recommend this hotel to others.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ravdeep
Detailed Review: Hotel Bawa Regency located in Dadar area of Mumbai is best among others in the budget hotel category. The rooms are equipped with basic amenities and provide absolutely clean environment both in room as well as in Bathroom. Neat and clean linen is an important attraction. However, food is just too good. They take sometime to serve your order but taste and flavor makes you forget the waiting period. Front office and room service staff is extremely helpful.. :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John N
Detailed Review: Overall a good experience. The staff are nice and the hotel is very clean.   The only downers I have for the hotel are: 1). The breakfast is very small - we usually went out to eat more after... 2). The location is ok but you will probably have to get taxis everywhere you go. We used Uber extensively.  3). Room was extremely small for a twin room- could hardly fit both of our bags in there. But they were clean and the beds were comfortable.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Cillian R
Detailed Review: Stayed for 3 nights. Be aware that tax is not included on the price you see on Booking.com, we got a small surprise when the bill came to more than we were expecting.¬†  The room itself was very small (we had a superior room). We had two twin beds and could just about swing a cat in the place. The bathroom is fine.¬†  The breakfast is very small, don't expect to be in any way full after! It is basically two eggs, some bread and tea/coffee.¬†  The front desk staff are very nice. They were helpful in answering most questions we had and arranged pick up from the airport for us.¬†  The location is a little out from everywhere but Uber is extremely useful and cheap for getting around the city. The hotel is beside slums which can be uncomfortable to walk past as western tourists, but‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Yolanda K
Detailed Review: The hotel looks shabby from the outside but is fantastic inside, the staff are very friendly and helpful. We organised a airport transfer and although my flight got in late the taxi driver was there waiting, it made my first time in Mumbai much easier. The hotel is fantastic and whilst the rooms are a little small in the cheaper rooms, they are comfortable with good wifi, clean bathrooms and super friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast was standard but great and did the trick. I would highly recommend staying here to anyone, it was a welcoming environment for families, solo travellers and friends.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Desy
Detailed Review: clean room, fast check-in and check-out process, average breakfast, hot water available, friendly staff, comfortable bed.  tourist attraction reachable by taxi. some are in walking distance.the staff will give you guidance at the check-in process about how to get to the nearby attraction, very helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lzkp5q
Detailed Review: Stayed here for four nights last week with my son as part of a grown up backpacking tour of India. Thoroughly pleasant stay. Hemond and his staff went out of their way to help, whether that be in airport pick up, restaurant recommendations or in helping sort out tickets for the ODI cricket. Comfortable hotel, reasonable prices. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more. Only downside is the noise from the road, but as any Mumbai visitors will know, constant car horn blowing is the norm so you would get this anywhere. Ask for a room at the back of the hotel if this bothers you.  Would be more than happy to return

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sukanya S
Review: A memorable stay for my CCRT Junior Fellowship Field Work
Detailed Review: I've reached here on 11th of October 2017. My train was almost 2 hrs late. I got a warm welcome from their staff as two of them come down to carry my luggage. I have visited there almost 4 months back. It was a wonderful experience to stay there with my Dad for his treatment. At that time I have a very small studio apartment in Western suburbs of Mumbai. But there was no facility for an aged person who has lot of ailments. That's why I arranged this accommodation for my Papa. Because he was a Professor of History and he has a great admiration and love for heritage building. So at first sight he was attracted by the environment of the place. So he advised me to do the Project work from Elphinstone because that is situated in Old Mumbai and luckily I got lots of data from‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Keshav R
Detailed Review: Spent 2 weeks in this hotel in October and was really amazed by the excellent service from the hotel staff. Rooms were sparkingly clean, hot water was available, complimentary wifi and breakfast as well as free tea/ coffee in the evening. A delightful experience for my family. Highly recommended to travellers in mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jinalsh
Detailed Review: Rooms are not very good. Very conjugated. Service is not proper. Poor housekeeping in room. Take long time for food preparation. Near to marine lines but very noise area. not comfortable even in night 2 am.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ◊®◊ï◊™◊ù ◊§
Detailed Review: Nice and clean rooms but ther's alot of noise all day even in the 7  floor.we pay extra for breakfast and wasnt alot of variety. The staff is unpleasant. we ask from them a taxi to the airport, the reception dask told us its with no extra charge but when we left they dacided to charge us on thet. And this is only one way they were unpleasant. We will not comeback here and we will not recomend to anyone to stay here.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Savio_FF
Detailed Review: Rooms are very clean and spacious. Staff is quick to clean room, server orders etc. Breakfast buffet variety was just okay but can improve on adding more fruits and healthy options.The complimentary airport pick up drop is an excellent perk. the hotel might look a bit old from outside, though it seems they are renovating it, yet inside is good. Best choice for the value for money folks.Would probably stay again.The rooms on the right side face a green area and can be opted for

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sagar S
Detailed Review: Great to have pleasant experience with the hotel le grande, we really appreciate and express our heartfelt gratitude towards the management for the great hospitality along with delicious breakfast. It's an honour for us to have pleasant experience with the hotel grande. Thank you .

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Samir Nath
Review: BAWA REGENCY - DADAR , little short of Excellent.
Detailed Review: This hotel has been continuously upgrading it's facilities and services over past 3-4 years. That improves its total acceptance level to its repeat customers. However the area still needs to be improved are described below.  Lift to be upgraded to newer automatically operation technology.  Insecticides needs to be applied at regular intervals, as I found bugs in the bed.  Lesser priority are given to customers , booked room in advance, particularly through different app based service  providers.  Few popular regional channels on TV needs to be provided based on the data they hold of the regionally character their customers.  Foods served are good and reasonably priced, except the cost of water, which should also be reasonably priced.  Otherwise it holds all the goodness.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nizam S
Detailed Review: Hello,  Stayed here a few  times and looking to book again for April 2018. My only choice when in Mumbai. Excellent courteous service from Hemond / Ejaz and staff. Satisfying  simple breakfast to start the day. Close to many sights of interest / rail station RECOMMEND

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tsering-Dorjee
Review: A 5 star service and a Value for money
Detailed Review: The rooms were very clean and the Manager Mr. Hemond and his staff were very helpful. I left my prayer book and they called me and I got it from them later. So kind service.A best place to be in South Mumbai and value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajeev7070
Review: A VERY CLEAN VALUE FOR MONEY PROPERTY
Detailed Review: Stayed here a couple of times, and every time the experience was simply great. Very clean rooms and very courteous and hospitable staff. Mr Hemant was specially very forthcoming and so were all the staff. Would recommend to all !!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MattRob5
Detailed Review: Loved staying here! Location is great, walking distance to Crawford Market, Colaba and Chowpatty Beach (a long ish walk but doable). Staff were really helpful. Hotel was always spotless and peaceful. Room was cleaned to a high standard. The complimentary breakfast was really tasty we thought! A nice omelette, toast and chai. They serve free coffee and tea in an afternoon too which is a nice touch. Wifi was good too. We could hear the bar below ever so slightly when the room was silent, but it was very distant and we slept really well each night. The small room is on the tight size for 2 people but we managed fine for a few days. Definitely recommend!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HappycamperCebuCity
Detailed Review: We stayed 3 nights and had a good experience. It's on the first floor of the building. Outside is messy and going up is ok, but when you entered the lounge, you are in different setting. Airconditioned and clean. There is a complimentary foot and back massage (though the foot massage machine was not working during our stay). The room we got has a window with a view which is not really nice. Generally, we got a decent room in a good price. Staff in the lounge is friendly, not in the kitchen. Complimentary breakfast is served and it was ok. Overall, we are happy to stay in this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: amberjking
Review: Couldn't stay here due to damp
Detailed Review: We arrived here as part of a g adventures tour group - the lobby looked inviting. Unfortunately all of our rooms smelt overwhelmingly of damp and also all of our beds had damp bed sheets on them. When we confronted the hotel staff about it they were less than helpful and said that someone must have left the window open which was a blatant lie. Other rooms our tour group members were staying in did not have a flushing toilet, and had clear damp marks all over the walls. The bathrooms were in serious need of refurbishment. I would not go to this hotel during the monsoon or even the end of he monsoon season as clearly due to the hotel building it gets hits hard by the floods and staff are not understanding about basic levels of damp being a health hazard.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Naveen K
Detailed Review: ////Hotel staff wary halp fully than indian food warry nice   good service and rooms warry   nice ///// Very well maintained, staff is good, food is cooked properly, snack served is good compare  to earlier party, but ladies hair serve to us this is   very shocked how it is possible in such type 3 star hotel, over hall goodÔøΩÔøΩ

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vineet B
Detailed Review: The property is good with clean rooms. They seems to be renovating it as the false ceiling is open in few common areas. Breakfast spread is okay and not very elaborate. Food is expensive here, there are many good restaurants under 10 mins walking distance for all kind of budgets. Free airport pickup/drop is an appreciated service the property provides.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vinayakdhawan65
Detailed Review: Stayed here and had a good stay.Had come to mumbai for business .The food here is good no problems with services.The rooms are clean and neat.I just called them and my booking was done.They picked me up from the airport and droped me also.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SabaAzhar
Detailed Review: It's been almost one and a half year that I am using the services of this hotel. I travel every month to Mumbai and stay here only. In the range of budgeted hotels, I find this one very competitive. Neat and clean rooms, service is excellent, overall a comfortable stay. It's kind of a second home to me now.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: krishna kanhaiy... s
Detailed Review: i stayed here for 4 day.. nice stay..the hotel staff was very co operative and even they provide complementary pick up and drop from airport....breakfast  was awesome with both north and south Indian taste...room was nicely decorated with designer's antiques and special thanks to staff for their  services...

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bharath1410
Detailed Review: Enjoyed my stay in the hotel. Was very thankful for the airport pick and drop. Clean rooms and good housekeeping. In close Proximity to airport and Railway Station. Good food. Mr Sameer Deep, Manager especially took good care and I thank him for his hospitality.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vinika
Detailed Review: As soon as I reached the building, it was under repair. And a notice saying WiFi  not working.  Then when I went to the room found the washroom light very dim.  My dad couldn't sleep the whole night coz of mosquitoes , the good night was of no use.  Then came the breakfast part.  Variety was too less and the uttapam was smelling so bad. Tea was also served cold.  When I told the manager he said he would look into this. We waited for him for about 5- 10 mins he didn't come. He was busy.  Will not recommend this hotel to anyone. And neither will come back here again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suren K
Detailed Review: We had Aagood to stay here because there was A personal touch from the manager who helped us with the city tour and guided us with everything.They take care of anything and Every questions and information are very clearly mentioned.The breakfast was good.The rooms are clean and neat.i Will reccomend this hotels to otters.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aghera D
Review: Excellent food and very friendly behavior
Detailed Review: Room was clean and service staff would help you in every way to make your stay comfortable. Service was prompt. The restaurant in the hotel has nice ambience and very tasty food that too at a very nominal rates.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nkaushik
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 2 days the rooms were neat and clean .The staff here were very cooperative and helpful .The pick up and drop were timely.I would recommend to stay in this hotel atleast once to experience it.I would definitely come back to this hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LUKERON
Detailed Review: The hotel is just getting better. We can summarize everything in one word! EXCELLENT! The staff just goes above and beyond to deliver the vow! Whether it is politeness, courtesy, helping hand, cuisine, cleanliness.... etc... you name it and they are the best!  Thank you Manager for your concern everytime.  Its the only place we love!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sanjoy901
Detailed Review: The hotel is good located near Dadar Railway station. The ambience is good and staff are courteous. All other things are good. The food delivered to the room is excellent and room service staff is good

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TasteofGoa
Detailed Review: My family has been a regular at this beautiful hotel, where our stay is made excellent by the staff who are very polite and go out of the way to deliver the vow!!!  The first one to approach any strangers are the friendly security at the door who rush to help with the luggage and open the door. The guys at the reception are every so willing to accommodate you with any requests. Not to mention the room boys and room service guys!  The hotel has a round the clock restaurant. Believe me its the best restaurant any hotel has and the curries, starters and rice are yummy !! Yummy!  In short its the ideal place for all. Ideally located its good for business guys, leisure travelers and also who make a dash for a jolly trip. I recommend he hotel to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DjNaps
Detailed Review: Lovely hotel. Obviously small rooms as they specify, lovely entrance and staff are beyond accommodating. Very clean and great free breakfast. I also left my flip flops behind and they went out of their way to get them back to me in Delhi before I left India. Honestly an unexpected and wonderful experience.  Note the cabin rooms are small but they tell you this! So five stars from us :) Thank you hemond for your help!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ankinaik
Detailed Review: A great budget hotel.  Close to CST. Clean and hygienic. Complementary breakfast. Polite Service. There was no water problem despite the water  shortage issue in Mumbai. It was a really warm experience staying at this place  and would surely recommend it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shweta M
Detailed Review: Good location, Staff is very helpful and rooms are good and clean. I may prefer to say here again. Its very close to Back side of CSTM, Colaba area and also close Crawford market. The place is good for Solo traveler.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: alpha 4
Detailed Review: Hotel is located away from Fort and Colaba, would take 15 minutes in cab to reach Colaba or Fort from this hotel.  I wont advice this hotel to couples and thts only because of the reason that the hotel has a shabby entrance where daily wager kinds always throng the pavement so it is awkward for girls to get inn and out of the hotel.  Right below this hotel there is a ladies dance bar where live singing goes on till 1:30 am so you may hear some noise in ur room as well.  Hotel has around 20 rooms, all on 1st floor. Superior rooms are very small, don't stay in those rooms unless no other option left.  Deluxe rooms were good and definitely a winner. Hotel lobby/reception is nice.  Sunil and Hemond at reception are very nice, very soft spoken.  Breakfast not good, even the seating‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AftabSheikh
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for 4 nights recently, when we first saw the hotel from outside was bit worried but once enter into the room was surprised to see clean, beautiful and tidy rooms.Superior rooms are very small so I advise you should book deluxe where you get some walking space.Great Location, walkable distance to station & main market for shopping. Bathrooms were excellent,  Great Staff, willing to help always and available anytime. Mr. Hemond and Mr. Sunil at the reception were great.  You will enjoy your stay here, I recommend this hotel for sure to my friends.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Commited_Traveller
Detailed Review: This hotel is situated in a. Dry run down area. The entrance to the hotel looks a bit sketchy - but once you make you way up the first flight of stairs you find a little oasis in the middle of the chaos! The rooms are small, but very clean and air conditioned. The staff could not be more helpful.   As much as I liked the place there were a few issues. For example on the first day I only discovered that you have to switch on the geyser for the shower / hot water inside your own room - after I had already finished showering in a cold shower! On the second morning I was leaving early for the airport and the water in the shower didn't flow!   In spite of this I would definitely go back here again. The area, though somewhat rundown, is safe and is close to a lot of places of‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: subirchaki
Detailed Review: rooms are good. service is nice. all staff of this hotel very polite.house keeping staff are very talented. breakfast is excellent.checkin and check out was very smooth.very quit hotel this is . i suggest to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manoj g
Detailed Review: this is my 3rd visit in this hotel.very cooperative and very family friendly  hotel. every thing was uptodate. checkin was very easy. reception staff is very polite.also house keeping staff and restraurent staff also very polite and talented.rooms are very clean and hygenic(including linen). breakfast was nice specially aloo paratha. all staff is ready to serve for 24hrs.really very awesome hotel.free wifi is very fast. this hotel really like as my home. permanently i wili book this hotel again and suggest to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vijay J
Detailed Review: This is a budget hotel which needs lot of improvement.  The staff at the reception don't have a smile on their faces. They are so serious all the time.  The room. The bedroom was like a pigeon hole. The linen was stinking like anything. The passage on the ground floor was either covered with a lot of luggage or guests using it as a changing room. Guest relations officers don't even bother to check whether the keys of the room are still with them. There was a situation where I had left the keys at the reception Desk. When I came back he reception staff did not bother to check whether the keys are lying with them and instead told me that the key is with housekeeping staff. When I approached the housekeeping staff for my room keys he said he did not have it. When he went to check‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nandita S
Detailed Review: The hotel is internally located, but they give complimentary airport transfers. The rooms are clean and tidy.  The front office staff was very welcoming.
