With regards to food, the breakfast was beautifully laid, for ala carte orders make sure you order it well in advance, as their orders take a bit longer to deliver till your table.  However, the food is tasty.  All over I give 99 out of 100 to this hotel.  You get more than what you pay for.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dakshita S
Detailed Review: We visit mumbai quite a number of times and whenever we visit mumbai we make sure that we stay in Le Grande only..We have been staying in Le Grande since since last 5-6 years..Everything about this hotel is amazing..The staff out here is superb..Whether it's Mr.Rakesh from bell desk or Mr.Ranjit from the F&B department,all of them are phenomenal,There are quite a few names that I am unable to memorise but the guy who serviced us during our breakfast and the ones who serviced us during our dinner all were superb..even the housekeeping people were really very nice even the front desk team was really nice..it's just the rooms are bit small in size but the view is superb undoubtedly..Thank you Team Le Grande for your wonderful hospitality..We are your guests forever!! Thank you Mr.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Elgine E
Review: Visiting Mumbai for a conference or a business trip? Apt Hotel!
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant stay. Touched down late due to an inordinate delay in my flight. The front desk manager was very kind and courteous in interactions. The complimentary buffet breakfast could have been better quality wise. Rooms are relatively small but one has to understand that this is Mumbai. One can easily get a Uber and Ola anytime of the day as the hotel is quite near to the Western Express Highway.  Overall enjoyed my 3 nights stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: satellite_sandeep
Detailed Review: It's like we are at Home not at some other place. And staff are like family and polite to there customers. We enjoyed lot. We would like to come again and also suggest our family and friends about bawa regency hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rhea R
Detailed Review: The hotel was great. Staff was very helpful. The new rooms on the third floor are in excellent condition. However, the older ones leave a lot wanting esp after seeing the new rooms. The furniture and bathrooms are rather old and run down.  The service and staff are fantastic, friendly and helpful. And my stay was pleasant. Would go back

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: adorafernandes
Detailed Review: The rooms were well maintained and clean. Staff and the service was very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was provided which was good. The location of the hotel is also very convenient. Overall the stay was very pleasant.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manoj F
Detailed Review: it was great stay for solo traveler awesome place in Mumbai was within the reach to the downtown.the place was cool and the decor looks like i am in British colonial ,it was great  stay.i will definitely visit again .........."awesome"

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Colin M
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Elphinstone for 5 nights last week, and intend staying there again when we return to Mumbai at the end of our holiday in India. The location was very good, we could walk to markets and shops and the general area was very interesting for a couple visiting from Australia.  We felt quite safe in this area, and there are several low-cost local restaurants very close by which are well worth trying. Our bed was very comfortable, the room, although not large, had everything we needed and was very clean.  We had a large window with a great view of an interesting street scene. The hotel offers free tea in the lobby from 5-7pm, and there are two FREE massage chairs which we really appreciated after a hard days sightseeing.   We had really great service from all the staff,‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: dav_pand17
Detailed Review: very helpfull staff and very good service (e.g. organising dinner from nearby restaurants, catching a cab and negotiate a fair price, try to keep you safe by making you a aware of scams and dangerous spots for tourists)

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rittwik mondal
Review: SURELY A GREAT STAY IN MUMBAI
Detailed Review: I was in Mumbai for 2 days and had official works at the suburbs. Hence stayed in this hotel, this hotel is perfectly located for people in transit and for people who have work in the suburban Mumbai. The staff is warm and generous. rooms are spacious. Food was awesome.and also the perfect silent location to sleep without disturb. and obviously its great that food is available in the room service for round the clock. i also got a complimentary airport transfers. Thank you Le Grande for making my stay a 'hassle free stay'.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jawa04
Detailed Review: The only advantage of this place is that it's close to the airport. The rooms are fine, but if you look close, everything is on the verge of falling apart. If you book this place online, I suggest you call them again and reconfirm the rate. They charged me 1K extra. I didn't have time to argue, so just paid up. Nothing much to say about the staff or service. Food's not bad. To conclude.... for this price... I suggest find some other place if you can.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankit S
Detailed Review: This is a budget hotel but I wont recommend it for business trips or personal vacation. The rooms are really small with below average attached toilets.  The buckets/toilets inside the toilets are of a typical lodge quality.  When it comes to complimentary breakfast ,it would be same menu everyday and the menu in itself is below average specially for someone who doesnt even like to eat eggs.  Nobody knows where this hotel is and you have to turn on GPS every time you take a taxi or auto.  There are no good places to eat nearby and you have to just depend on hotel dining.  The good thing about this hotel is 24 hours in-room dining which is a bit overpriced but of reasonable quality. Also,this hotel is very near to International airport hence saves a lot of money on taxis and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mohammed A
Detailed Review: We stayed in this hotel more than two months after trying two other local hotels.   They staff are VERY helpful and supportive.The smile the staff always meet you with is very comforting and makes asking for help or assistance easy. This hotel is family-safe, foreigner-friendly,  and very hygienic. CCTV cameras available in main places and in entrance gives you a sense of security and safety especially if you have little kids.  They have variety of rooms ranging in price where you can choose what suits your budget.  There is a restaurant inside the hotel that provides excellent room service. The food  is fresh, clean and varied. You better educate yourself with the names of some Indian meals or you will end up ordering something you do not know.  The hotel is very close‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: TinaHH123
Review: You won't get a better hotel for the price in Mumbai
Detailed Review: It's hard to discribe this hotel, basically it's a reception area with doors on one side & windows on the other, the doors are the hotel rooms so I assume many of those don't have windows. They were small the rooms near reception so if you have a lot of luggage then go for the slightly more expensive room they were much bigger. Had kettle, great aircon, English movie TV & hot water in shower. The room was spotlessly clean as was the common areas of the hotel. Wifi worked well.  Breakfast is inc the price, there is a choice of eggs & toast or an Indian option that is changed every other day. Getting anything free in Mumbai is unusual so this is a nice touch. In the afternoon there is free chai & biscuits. The chai was some of the best I've had in 3months in India. Again this is a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rhiannon B
Review: Small room with no window, but modern and clean
Detailed Review: The superior room was really small, two very small single beds (no doubles available) and no space for anything else with no window. So you do feel claustrophobic and miss the natural light!   However it is very clean and modern, comfortable mattresses with a good bathroom (you get about 30 seconds of hot water per shower which is more than most!). The a/c is excellent also and the internet is mostly fine.  Breakfast was cold and unexciting eggs and toast, had been made quite a while ago by the looks of it. Free chai tea between 5-7pm was nice.  Would recommend the restaurant downstairs called Mumbai Fancy for really nice, reasonably priced food. Or it's 100 rupees for a taxi into Colaba where the main tourist restaurants and bars are.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shiv Menon
Detailed Review: The Hotel is located on the first floor .  I was welcomed by the receptionist who offered me a welcome drink and in a few minutes I was escorted to my room , which was rather small but had what was needed for my stay .  I asked for a smoking room ,but was not available hence they gave me a room with a table and chair outside to which I could smoke.  The staff in the day time was lovely and helpful!  However I wish they had paid more attention to their linen which had stains on them , the TV remotes weren't in a good condition and my mirror was cracked , the night receptionist was rather rude to which I  was quite disappointed .

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sukanya S
Detailed Review: I've come to Hotel Elphinstone on 25th May with my Dad. Both of us are really spellbound to see the beauty and the homelike warmth of the place. The service provided by all the employees are commendably exclusive. They have taken a lot of care. Because at that time my Dad was not well. Wonderful breakfast. We got loads of love, support, care from each of the employees. Cleanliness of Hotel rooms of Elphinstone can be a beautiful example of "Swachh Bharat". Apart from all these qualities the place has a heritage  value

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manon G
Detailed Review: Don't be fooled by the entrance, the lobby already feels inviting. On arrival we received drinks and snacks, which made us feel very welcome. Staff is really friendly and helpful and our request for extra housekeeping was honored without any problem. The rooms are small but comfortable and well equipped with AC, fan and the best showers in Mumbai. The lobby is a comfortable hangout with massage machines. Idly and chai were tasty. Underneath the hotel you can eat local, cheap and good. Only minor was the night club situated beneath the hotel, but the beds were comfortable enough to put us to sleep.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Viralbshah
Detailed Review: We thought that hotel is located in good location so it will provide good service as well but we were wrong.  we almost waited half an hour to get room even though we reached hotel at 12 pm which is a check in time. There was a renovation work going on in lobby so there was no proper place to seat as well.  We were given a room which was so small and without any window as well.  The worst part was the bed and we saw that there were bedbugs and mosquito's as well in night.  The breakfast which they provided was average.  All in all a bad experience for this stay. will never ever consider to stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Edgar R
Review: One of the best budget hotel in Mumbai
Detailed Review: The hotel is just 15-minutes drive from the airport. Hotel pick-up and drop was very timely. Hotel personnel and staff are very accommodating and friendly.. Food are healthy and tasty. The price is very much worthy to the service they provided,

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suresh N
Detailed Review: Good Services and behaviour from staff. Only comment  I have is about the bed. Medicated or hard-type bed must be provided on request. Next time I visit Bombay, i would certainly look for Bawa Regency's availability.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash313313
Detailed Review: Clean,hygenic place.But expensive dining.Maintainance of washroom was not proper.area of bathroom is less.It may feel dirty that commode is just a step ahead of shower.Awesome experience except this.All other facilities are superb.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mjuror
Detailed Review: I needed to book one more room on the day I checked in and they gave me a night stay room saying that it was a deluxe room at the deluxe room rate and the room was terrible with dirty mattress and they told me that I will have to rebook my room every day till the day I m there because the rates fluctuate and that is there policy. I checked out the next day. I dnt think I need to say more. Not going toh choose bawa for any stay ever.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: siddarthkukreja
Detailed Review: Located just off the expressway, close to the Dadar TT circle and the railway station. Room was neat and clean. Food was good.The check out took a little longer than expected. Overall it was a good stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: prosenjit c
Review: Nice hotel in the heart of the city
Detailed Review: It's  small hotel having some 10-15 rooms with all modem amenities like mini bar, tea maker etc, management is super polite and one of the most helpful people I have ever seen, its very near to CST and all the attraction like Taj, gate of India, marine Drive all are with in 3-4 km so you don't have to spent time in travel. Its a very clean,pocket friendly & rooms are small but the price and service they offer also the location is a plus point for your stay. They do have a small kitchen for making breakfast and tea but if you would like to eat in hotel then they will get your order from near by restaurant ( just 2 min) and taste is fine with ok ok price but I would recommend  to have food outside as you will plenty of option specially "Gulshan e -iran" a must eating place with in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajeev D
Detailed Review: They don't even allow your friends or family to enter your room and they will ask them to sit out... Pathetic service and rules.   Area is sticky. You can't sleep at night,coz whole night someone plays loud music.  At reception, they don't even ready to listen to your request. Very adamant and it sounds like we in some hostel with strict rules. I was ready to pay him for two people but this this something you can allow for exception case. As my friend was coming from Pune to see me. Really disappointed with the service and behavior.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raheema
Detailed Review: Very nice welcoming by the friendly staff, especially Ejaz at reception. Hotel was clean. Breakfast was lovely. Hotel is at a very convenient location, restaurants downstairs open till 1am, and not at all far from Crawford market. Around a 10 min drive from the likes of Wankhede stadium, Taj hotel and Gateway of India. Pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Santosh_SH7
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel as our regular hotel was overbooked.  First : to find this hotel u will need a real smart GPS or a smart driver as it's extremely inside.  But the location is close by to airport, Western Express highway and all.  Average hotel, average rooms. I bet you can get better deals than this at the price they charge you.  Property seems to be old and no matter how much you maintain it has it's shelf life so the same can't be blamed.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Abhinav K
Detailed Review: I found this hotel very comfortable, the way employees maintain it by keeping it very clean and beautiful. Complimentary breakfast is a plus point.  People stay there not only different states of the country but across the globe.... Love this hotel.....

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: suryakarthik1970
Detailed Review: Had stayed there for 4 days in April 2017 with family. Very Courteous staff, Good Food, Good Location, Well maintained, Rooms would have been a bit bigger, Very helpful front office and security. Nothing to comment....

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tushar G
Review: Perfect example of how a good hotel should be!!
Detailed Review: Completely friendly and knowledgeable receptionist I have ever met, it's a great first impression of hotel. Couldn't have been more nice in , giving me directions to my business meeting and helping me obtain the best possible route so I could also pick up what my family wanted. Fortunately everything about the hotel was exceptional, and the room itself was well equipped and comfortable. I could go on but suffice it to say I was very pleased with my stay, and although short and sweet this time, I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MarkHenry1212
Detailed Review: A thoroughly enjoyable Experience. We were guided by the Chef.Akhtar as regards to food order n food is delicious and punjabi dishes are highly recommended. I also love the services.the tikkas and tandoori items are incredible.very well done and keep it up.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mahrukh F
Detailed Review: I went for a 2 night stay. the hotel is great. the staff is very good. i liked everything about the hotel. they also arranged a car to take us for a tour of the city which didnt even cost us much. great stay !

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: srinivasan v
Detailed Review: It was a nice stay,which is  during  our Business Trip  and the  staff are friendly , my wishes to Mr. Hemant , and Sunil as well for their support. Expecting to stay again in near future .   Regards,  Yuvaraj and Srinivasan.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Piotr M
Detailed Review: the hotel is reasonably priced for Mumbai and located close to markets, the India gate is around 30 minutes on foot, the only problem is that rooms with window view get quite a lot of noise from outside, breakfast is simple but fresh

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michael B
Detailed Review: We have stayed in this hotel in both 2015 and 2017 and would think of booking nowhere else in Mumbai. It is a good location (walking distance to the train station) and the restaurant downstairs called Kaiser e Hind serves excellent food at very cheap prices. We are staying here again on our final night in Mumbai it is that good. I would highly recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: regis1b
Detailed Review: Very good and non costly place in Bombay. Convenient situation  to reach all interesting places. Helpfull service. Irreproachable cleanliness in term of indian standards. Breakfast just a little bit too light...

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Souvik S
Review: Great hotel-- this much I could say
Detailed Review: A very good hotel close to marine drive and CSTM.   Had a pleasant stay with great amenities and well dressed staffs. Decent ambiance! Great selection of TV channels.  I didn't know from beforehand that this hotel offers free wifi. While checking out, I heard from reception that the place offers free wifi.  They offer a free chips packet, a wet tissue, and a water bottle for welcome. Appreciate the complimentary breakfast with hot coffee/masala chai.   The hotel is on first floor; one needs to take stairs to get to the hotel.  Perfect for family/ business/ couples stay.  It was an awesome stay for me! Will definitely stay in this hotel if I come to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hrishiraj t
Detailed Review: I stayed in a solo room. The room was very small.very small.its like if you keep 2 suitcases, it.will be a bit difficult to move. But the location, staff is very helpful. The lady helped me in getting a cab to the airport as well as guided me to the nearby attractions as well. I prefer tHis hotel becausr of the location. Fashion street is just 2mins walk from the hotel. Colaba market also just 4-5kms.cabs are easily available. The breakfast is pathetic, they charged a lot for the room, but breakfast was very bad.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manu S
Detailed Review: Very near to airport. Rooms are modern and  clean. Good value for money, good service. Great food. Clean specious rooms.. free Wi-Fi complementary breakfast  friendly staff. 3 Star Hotel with Modern facilities like a 4* Hotel. Best hotel best place...

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gagandeep singh C
Detailed Review: The hotel is good. Rooms are clean but are bit small but fine with Mumbai's Standard. The best part is it is just 5 min away from airport. The food is good and is not heavy on pocket. One could easily book it at lower price on net. The hotel is not located on main road, thus it is far from the traffic of Mumbai

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shareaburger
Review: Budget friendly hotel for single person orfamily and short trips
Detailed Review: I got booked in to this hotel because of a travel desk mistake and not by design. But once i was in the room, it wasnt an unpleasant experience.   The reception was great. The Buffet Dinner and Breakfast was limited but still great food. The staff is helpful with any food preference.   I will recommend the hotel for short trips near the airport if you only wish to rest or sleep in the hotel whether you are single or with family. Its nearby to most office places and eating joints in Andheri - Chakala area which makes it very attractive for future visits.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Natasha Dias
Detailed Review: Visited this hotel and stayed for 3 nights during a business visit. As a hotelier myself wanted to stay at a place that offers good service and was close to the airport. Had around 3 options of hotels but finally chose this one. Came in early at 6:00 am and got a room to relax. By 11 am was shifted in an executive room which was clean, comfortable with basic amenities needed for a traveller. The best part is the staff attentiveness and concern, sometimes such service is not even given in 5 Star hotels. The airport pick-up and drop was also well organised. Breakfast is basic but good. Room service service is timely and efficient with tasty food. Special thanks to Mr. Sameer. Now I have a fixed place to go to whenever I travel to Mumbai!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anitra n
Detailed Review: Very good service and friendly atmosphere, food is excellent except for repeated  breakfast menus need changes on juice and fruits.  Otherwise we found the staff very cautious and friendly. Front desk service was very good

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bankim_ms
Detailed Review: This is a good average hotel to stay near the international airport. we had stayed for one night.  Do not expect too much for the price. They have working split air conditioning ( though location of the same is away from the bed and in some obscure corner of the room) Bed linen and bathroom accesories are ok. Not that great nor poor.  Overall a good place to be in when you are in transit.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mahindraprakash G
Detailed Review: I have visited many hotels at Mumbai I found all of them very professional and hospitable , some find it relaxing but I find it not personal and cold and not homily at all. I have stayed at Le Grande for 3 times in last month for a duration of 3days every time,comfortable,clean,homely,even bell hops are warm and helpful. Well recommended home away from home.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jen
Detailed Review: Our taxi driver had A LOT of difficulty finding the hotel but it was actually only a 5mim drive away from the airport! Perfect for a stop over before a flight. Reception and restaurant well decorated and cool. The lifts are very old fashioned and the decor in stairway is a bit creepy with exposed wires and mattresses on the stairs.  Non- alcohol so be warned if you fancy a beer!  Room seemed clean enough but had a funny smell.. think it was a smoking room and I'm a non-smoker. AC worked well. Good free Indian breakfast and we paid for dinner too which was good. Overall not a bad stay.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajan s
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 2Days while I was for business trip. I have to say that the service was exceptional. From the hotel receptionist to the waiter at breakfast, I was treated like a king! It is a beautiful hotel with a great location. The food is exceptional and the attention to each guest is excellent. I loved my room and the little treats I received each day like chocolate in the evening service/ Bed tea. Such a wonderful stay and the station(Dadar) is just Five minutes away!   There are so many people that I would like to mention for their outstanding service but it would take up the whole review so I will just say thank you to everyone, with particular thanks to reception for his constant patience and help with my questions, waiters for being so attentive at breakfast, Despite‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajeshk894
Detailed Review: We had a great stay in the hotel for 3days.staffs were very friendly and polite.room was clean and food was also nice.we will recommend bawa  regency to everyone. All the very best to the team for keep going.Thanks.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: zuvs
Detailed Review: Excellent services. Clean and spacious rooms. Good food quality. Helpful Staff. Good city location.  No dinein restaurant but 24 hrs room services. Recommended for business/ official traveller. Reasonably priced.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: NitinKabra
Review: Pleasant stay. Cleanliness, Good Food and Good behavior
Detailed Review: Had a pleasant time. Staff is co operative and the food taste and quality is also good. Located near to prime destinations like siddhivinayak temple. I visited with my family.  Overall it was a satisfactory experience.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mandremuw1267895
Detailed Review: Amazing staff and service very courteous and regarding .loved the food ,cleanliness , quality close to dadar station .well appointed and excellent service .would recomend getting an taxis from just outside the hotel gates for quick n cheap rides.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mukesh2001111
Detailed Review: Very pleased to stay at Hotel Bawa Regency.excellent ambience, very good location surrounded by market area easily available transportation ..excellent front office staff very cooperative rooms service was excellent...we will recommend this hotel to friends n relative ...thums up Mr.Maninder n team

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ashishsharma35
Review: Great place to stay in central Mumbai !
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel with my family for 4 nights, and my stay was very good and comfortable. Hotel is located very near to Crawford Market and CST station. Neat and clean location and transport is easily accessible to go around. Hotel reception and lobby are very good. Room was neat and clean with proper amenities. Washrooms are clean and tidy with full water supply. I was told by my friend about shortage of water supply in Mumbai but i have not found any problem. Room service is good and staff is very courteous. Very kind assistance by Mr. Hemond who makes you feel at home. Breakfast is also good with hot tea. leg massage and back massage machines were very useful and relaxing with no charge. I had no problem with any music or bar at ground floor as it is not too loud to be‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Butterflyrunner13
Detailed Review: A friend and I stayed here while visiting Mumbai and had such an amazing time.   The customer service was amazing. When we arrived we were treated to a drink and snack which was really appreciated after travelling. The staff helped us move our luggage when we checked in and out, called a Tuk Tuk for us to get to the airport and helped negotiate a price, called and ordered dinner for us and let us eat in the restaurant (only breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant), they also advised us on the sites we should visit and helped us get a taxi for the day to see the sites and they also bought water on our behalf from the nearby shop.   There is the best tea I have ever tasted daily in the late afternoon and breakfast was good. Breakfast was la carte. There was a western option as‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pradipta B
Detailed Review: A good hotel near to Chatrapati Shivaji terminus. From outside it may not look a swanky hotel,but to my surprise the interior is beautifully maintained. Rooms are spacious and well maintained. Hotel staffs are very polite and helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ash k
Review: Good location and staff. Shady neighborhood and breakfast was a joke
Detailed Review: Rooms are very small but we'll maintained. It's in good reach for downtown attractions. The area is bit shady in the night. There is beer bar below which plays loud music till 1am.  Staff is good, specially receptionists. The hallway is very well maintained, interior feels like luxury compared to neighborhood it is in.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anonymus688
Review: A nice small hotel in a unique location
Detailed Review: Relatively - but not too far from the terribly expensive tourist locus (Collaba) and similarly remote from the no less expensove Mumbai Business centers, this small hotel is a perfect match for low-budget travelers looking for a local experience. Close to Crawford Market, Jama Masjid and Mumba Devi Mandir, it provides safety, serenity  and a great value for the fee. The staff is helpful and extremely generous, the rooms are equipped with good air conditioning system which s a must in the all-humid megacity. The only disadvantages are poor breakfast (just skip it and go to have one in the nearby market or have a perfect chai underneath the tree facing the north) and the gazer, which is simply too small to enjoy a good shower. These are small things though. very much recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ravisongirkar
Detailed Review: Good staff ..lovely ambiance...very comfortable stay...near to CST station...and yet ofrdable .... Service with a smile is our philosophy and I am delighted to know that you experienced this consistently throughout your stay. your team of committed and highly inspired   Cool place to stay. It is located much in approachable distance to rooms as standard star hotels but it has good interior. It has good Breakfast options & food quality was also good. Worth to stay  Ravhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: FrolleinSs
Review: Inadequate service despite clean and neat appearance
Detailed Review: Really poor service for superficial neat Hotel. Outside appearance poor, difficult to find.  The few we saw of the hotel was clean, but really really small rooms. As we couldn`t make it to check at the booked date we tried several times to reach Hotel via phone which was almost impossible due to really bad language skills (english). As we finally made to talk to someone (in Hindi) our check in time at the next day wasn¬¥t forwarded properly so our room was cancelled and assigned by the time we arrived. We weren¬¥t informed properly - 2 hours before they sent an email (as you don¬¥t have wifi at every place during travelling not the best way to communicate), but didn¬¥t try to reach us by phone "as they couldn¬¥t do international calls". In the end they offered another hotel with‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Atena S
Detailed Review: Amazingly helpful staff. As my luggage was lost somewhere during my flights the Elphinstone's people took the matter in their hands and in no time the luggage was delivered, they monitored its route and kept me informed. The hotel is very clean, with delightful masala chai tea-time and 24/7 room service ( delicious naan bread and lassi). I stay there every time I'm in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aarti D
Detailed Review: While the hotel looks shady from the outside, it is well appointed on the inside. That's where the good part ends. Now let me describe the bad parts in detail:  1. There is a disco under the hotel which plays blaring music till 2 am. Every room in the hotel is affected by the sound from this disco, and the is no way one can sleep till 2 am. I find it very very very dishonorable on the part of the hotel to not mention this to their guests. People might have had a long day and are looking forward to a peaceful night's sleep. Little do they know what's in store for them. This is simply unacceptable. 2. The rooms are super small, with no windows. I've stayed in a lot of hotels in my life - both budget as well as luxury ones - and I can confidently say that this room was the smallest‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Curley12
Detailed Review: We had a lovely stay in the deluxe room, which was worth the extra little bit that we paid. The hotel is very Close to all the sites. We got a taxi to the India gateway and walked back threw the fort. Receptionist was very helpful and recommended a place for food but unfortunately it was closed. Complimentary b'fast was much appreciated.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: eanh93
Detailed Review: Modern clean with great facilities (great selection of TV channels which is nice after a long day of walking the Mumbai streets). Upmarket feel with budget price.  Friendly accommodative staff.  Free breakfast of limited choice tea/coffee with toast & 2 eggs (any style) but was great way to start the day. Small room with no windows,  however it was comfortable and no light made for a great nights sleep. Also bigger rooms were available. Was noisey one night with music from a nearby club and the room had a ticking clock if that bothers you.  Location was also a shame for us, as we were keen to walk the busy streets of Mumbai,  however if you are happy to taxi everywhere it's about 15 minutes (forty minute walk). Really close to Mumbai central station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DutchAdventurer
Detailed Review: Hotel Elphinstone with it's central location is a great hub to discover Mumbai. The rooms are efficient, clean and comfortable. The staff is pro-active and courteous before, during and after your stay. Definitely recommend the Elphinstone Hotel!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manoj g
Detailed Review: Superb and excellent I want to fully satisfied. Good location to stay at when visiting Mumbai, not too far from the international airport and attraction around Mumbai. Friendly and helpful staff, Its so beautiful that I wish to come back and makes me feel as my 2nd home. Amazing fasility food price & the comfort level is beyond everything. 2 thumbs & May many Branches open round the world. Good luck

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sanjay d
Review: good place for stay for the price Also good for family and friends
Detailed Review: The staff was very pleasant and helpful with everything. The location is good; very close to cst., mumbai Central Mumbai etc. The apartments are kept clean and requests are filled pretty quickly. Room service is good. Taxis and Rickshaws are easy to find. Over all a decent place to stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Zoe D
Detailed Review: Well, what a disgusting hotel. I luckily only stayed for one night and that was bad enough. Firstly, I found numerous ants in my bed, secondly the room was damp, thirdly there was a horrific smell and lastly there was shocking wifi. The room has clearly been used before me by smokers which had made the room stink. An awful hotel with horrible small hot rooms. I would not stay here again. Mumbai has a lot to offer but this hotel really lets it down.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anant P
Detailed Review: Was disappointed with the location and the dusty,noisy surrounding of the hotel. Not value for money either, as a few hundred more rupees would(and I did) have got a better,classier hotel. Staff were ok and the rooms were clean but very small.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: WTravels
Review: Avoid if possible, awful value for money
Detailed Review: When we arrived the staff were incredibly unfriendly - it almost seemed as though they didn't actually want us there. We requested two singles and got a double. The towels were dirty. We were given 8 hours of wifi each (bearing in mind we paid around ¬£40 for the room) which seemed a little silly. The room was nice but the unfriendly staff really ruined the stay here.   Overall would not recommend staying here. Avoid if possible.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: subhash s
Detailed Review: Best price the best budget hotel.The staff here was very helpful the manager was very helpful he also helped me find hotels in other cities.Near to airport with two way transfers..They have a decent breakfast in the mornings with good wifi.The room was big enough.Can recommend this hotel to others

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sunandan_B
Detailed Review: I was in Mumbai for a conference and stayed for a day at the Bawa Regency. The staff was very cordial and the booking guy very generously agreed to my late check in and check out. I had driven down from Pune, and since it is next to the main road in Dadar, finding the place wasn't a problem. Moreover, we had arrived early morning. Its a marketplace, and things do get congested as the day progresses. The hotel has limited parking. But the guards outside do arrange a good place on the roadside and keep a watch. The room was average sized but plush with nice beds, linen and interiors. Bathroom was fantastic. Cleanliness was top notch. Overall, it gave the feeling of a new well maintained property. Room service was quick and prompt.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Donna L
Review: Clean friendly hotel in a convenient area
Detailed Review: Very happy we stayed here, we had a nice clean room with windows, quiet for where it was. It does seem that there are rooms without windows, so definitely ask for one. The outside of the building looks a bit shabby, but inside the hotel it is lovely and cool, and clean. It is a good location for walking around, and within walking distance of Victoria train station. Breakfast is limited but OK, and afternoon chai in the lobby is very pleasant. The staff are all very friendly and helpful, they respond to every request quickly and with a smile. We were 2 women travelling, and had no problems in the street, or in the markets around, and never heard a disco! If you arrange a taxi to the airport, ask if it is AC or not, we had a vey old car, it takes just over an hour to the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michael U
Detailed Review: First impression of Hotel was one of horror,but do not be put off by the entrance. The hotel is situated up two flights of stairs, and once through the doors you are into a world of calm and friendliness. The entire hotel is very clean,and the staff could not be more helpful and friendly. Breakfast is basic but adequate,offering a fairly limited choice. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Overall good value for money. Many thanks for a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KNemo27
Detailed Review: We get room basic room in front of the reception desk. Despite all the good points that they have in booking sites, this hotel is hard to stay if you want a quite place to sleep. The worst thing about this hotel is the neighboring music club: Start at 10 PM until 01 AM. Impossible to sleep because all the bass sounds of the music boom in your head. Your body litterally tremble. I thought that they put us in a burial chamber with limited air and started to torture with this bass sounds. The hotel crew is helpfull & polite: We made an early check in and they arrenged a good room to rest in the day.  The hotel and room decoration is OK but the basic rooms without window are so tiny to breath in. Also, avoid to have airport transfer offer which is very expensive for Mumbai scale:‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Patrick B
Review: Simple but good hotel in mumbai
Detailed Review: The service is good. Always helpful staff and clean rooms. It's a good hotel for being so close to gate of India. Easy to be found with a taxi. Using uber is very helpful for your stay in Bombay. Also all people outside the hotel are most helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: irfans94
Detailed Review: It's was very pleasant stay.i am very happy to choose this hotel all staff were very cooperative.Rooms were very clean. I am very thankful specially to the manager.He is very cooperative and a nice human being too.they have produce great hospitality. I will definitely choose this hotel in next visit.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vivek K
Detailed Review: nice hotel with nice location. good service.with good amenities.clean room. very quite hotel.all important areas are very nearby.breakfast also good.all the staff of this hotel are very helpful.thanks fortune for a nice hospitality.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajeev.shimla
Detailed Review: Nice budget hotel near airport. The service is very prompt and appreciable. A recommended hotel for the business traveler. Breakfast Buffet was limited but Good. Taste also good and service attitude is positive. The Manager Mr Pillai is a great person and always willing to help.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nancy E
Detailed Review: The room was nice , fairly spacious , clean and with a modern bathroom. We liked the resturant and the staff was pretty nice too. The neighborhood does not boast much and it is sort of smelly but thats the case for Mumbai the minute you get off the airplane.  We made the mistake of leaving a window open ,on the 7 th floor mind you and we ended up with tons of mosquitos in the room and a stinky fish like smell. With the window closed it wa better but my niece ended up with a good 40 mosquito bits from our30 hours there.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: readdread2017
Review: Good stay with just a few quirks
Detailed Review: The room, cost, and amenities are all great, especially considering the location, which is near the airport. The rooms are clean, the food is decent, and the staff are helpful. The only quirks were the weird internet scenario; you get a voucher that is good for eight hours, but then you have to keep getting more from the front desk. They're free, but it's just kind of a weird system. The only other weird quirk is that, while they have a free airport shuttle, they wouldn't arrange a car to the train station and just told me to Uber it.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sultan y
Detailed Review: here people is friendly and room is clean I like the breakfast is good here is close main road is not too far I think next time I will come and stay to here again can reccomend this hotel to others.the front office staff were helpful.they had airport pickup and drop

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aria B
Review: Nice building, very bad management and front desk
Detailed Review: The staff are very good. Whenever they see you they will open the door for you and get the elevator on your behalf. There are two old style elevators which you need to close the door and gate in order for it to move. The doors must be closed properly for it to work, and unfortunately, it is often not properly closed.  We usually have to wait 5 to 10 minutes for the elevator, or use the stairs to get it from the floor it's stuck on.  If you ask something from them you'll get it right away. The building is very clean and nicely renovated. The shower and toilet was very clean and pleasant.   The front desk and management are useless. We asked them for a few things we never got it, so we asked the staff and got it right away. It was very noisy one night past midnight and when we‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ingrid K
Detailed Review: We only stayed one night as our plane landed at one in the morning. Could not get a response from the hotel re airport pickup or late check in, which were the main reason we booked. Ended up taking a taxi. Room was nice, breakfast was very good.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shams_09
Detailed Review: I booked the hotel for 1 night as I had to crash for a night. I arrived late in the night and check in was quick, However the room I got was a old one (non refurbished ) and the old AC was made a lot of noise, Since I was too tired I didn't want to change the room again. The hotel has food available late in the night thats a plus, The breakfast is served in the room ( though quite basic when you are paying INR 4000+ for a room). Overall an average stay, maybe if I have received a refurbished room my opinion might be a litter different.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mananbhanu
Detailed Review: It's a good place to stay right in the center of the city, where Dadar station is a 5 min walk.  It's value for money, clean rooms and friendly staff. Only issue faced that AC of our room wasn't working and after complaining for 2 hours finally had to change our room.  PS. Avoid room no 18(ground floor) it looks good and huge but I think they still haven't fixed that AC from a long time!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nadeem_s31
Detailed Review: Excellent service and Good Management with good staff and warm atmosphere staff is so friendly and good natured .................... Hope I'll come someday and enjoyed again that wonderful services and staff ... Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rebecca P
Detailed Review: We had missed our train and booked here in a bit of a panic with nowhere to stay for the night, The hotel entrance was in the middle of some shops and I was worried at first sight, once we went up the stairs and into the hotel I was glad we chose to book there, the hospitality was great and the rooms were clean and beds were super comfy, Also well priced for what you get, definitely would recommend this hotel!  The lovely gentleman on reception also called the hotel were we were supposed to stay(but didn't because of the train) and explained we were still coming just not on the expected dates which was really helpful!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Albie H
Detailed Review: Had another good stay at Elphinstone. Yes your basic rooms are very small but always perfectly clean. However the real value here is the great location and helpful staff. Nothing is too much for them. In a very expensive part of Mumbai this place offers incredible value. Will always return,

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Zuzka V
Detailed Review: Rooms are really small, but that is standard in Mumbai and hotels stuff approach balance the impression to the good side. Location is walking distance to the lot of sites (also Gate of India is reachable) and they have massage chairs in the lobby.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: benjnew121
Detailed Review: Really nice hotel, 10 minutes walk from Crawford market. Room was clean and good size, massive shower. Owner was really helpful suggesting a vegetarian restaurant nearby. Would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 2210danni
Detailed Review: Visited here for one night on a stopover to Goa. Booked a double room and ended up with a twin: had it been for longer than one night, I would have been complaining a lot more than I did at the time.   Rooms very small and tatty. Noise from outside disturbed most of the night. The only positive was the included breakfast which was tasty and quick. We wouldn't return.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MTS13
Review: Economical hotel walking distance to central Mumbai
Detailed Review: Was amazed to find a hotel so reasonably priced considering it was only a 10 min walk to Crawford market, a bit further to CST rail terminal, and approx 30 min due west to Marine Drive.  I was promptly met at the airport even though my flight was delayed five hours. The staff are exceptionally professional, and nice. They constantly offered to get me things (meals, beer, yoghurt) which I turned down as I like to explore local areas.  The room 105 was quite small but it was a budget single and had no window. Bed was very comfortable. Shower worked and hot water was on demand. A/C was great. Breakfast was eggs to order, toast and coffee or tea.  The noise from the club beneath room 105 lasted until 130am every night and I requested to move to the back side of the building. I moved‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Wolfgang W
Detailed Review: The Elphinstone-Hotel is the perfect stay in bustling Mumbai if you don't want to spend a fortune. It is a neat place, not too far away from the sights of Colaba, and also close to Victora Station and Crawford Market. The rooms are small but clean and comfortable, 24h hot water and there is a complimentary continantal breakfast. The hotel-staff is extremely nice and helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Matti H
Detailed Review: We stayed one night after arriving from the airport. Location was good for us as we continued to explore the city next day. We had some difficulties finding the hotel with our driver. Breakfast was toast and some coffee and tea. Rooms were clean, warm showers. Staff was extraordinarily friendly. Great value.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: √ìskar H
Review: The staff is amazing, the local is not.
Detailed Review: The staff is amazingly helpful, the location is in the middle of one of the crappyest locals in Mumbai. But if you are into that, its nice to have a clean and friendly home for u to enjoy. The Rooms are fine, but there is a crazy karaoke club on the floor beneath u that pumps noice until 1:30 am. But after that it is quiet.. And I must stress, the staff is amazing and helpful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shakirayork
Detailed Review: Quick visit.   Between flights.   Prompt efficient pick up.   Lovely room.  Good Buffet at breakfast with lots of Indian choices.   Cardboard toast dosent float my boat.  Helpful staff.   All in all did what it said on the box.  Nice vet professional hotel.  Worth choosing as very near the airport particularly the very opulent Air India internal hub

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rohit M
Review: Very good option close to airport
Detailed Review: I had the booking for 3 days at the hotel. The rooms were good for the price paid. But the best part of the hotel was hospitality and a very cordial staff.  It is the best option for the price you pay. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: jaydeep k
Detailed Review: Was in mumbai for transit. Chose le grande as it was near to airport.  Its nice and clean place. Little bit off the road but well nearby airport.  The best thing is they offer free pick up and drop facility to and fro airport round the clock.  This is a must for whoever is travelling via mumbai airports.  Restaurant food is average but the staff is courteous.   My special request for early checkin and late checkout was well accepted.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jan C
Detailed Review: We were very happy with our three night stay in Hotel La Grande. The street is quiet even though it is very near the airport. It is in a family neighborhood and we enjoyed hearing the sounds of the school next door and families enjoying the park across the street. The hotel seems well-run, well-managed even though there is obvious renovation happening on several of the floors. Good hearty Indian breakfast - with cornflakes and toast for the less adventurous. We recommend and plan to return.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AbhishekAgr
Detailed Review: This is one of the good hotel in the areas of andheri east.  However location is bit offside from the main roads and you may need to walk a bit to get into the running market.  Hotel is good with all essential amenities.  Service is bit slow but food quality is fine.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ravishankar79
Detailed Review: Hello, hotel location is very good, staff is also very good and cooperative facilities in hotel are also very good only drawback there rooms are very small. But you can stay for 1 or 2 nights. All tourist spots are near.....So you can go for it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HOlidayvibes11
Review: Great staff, good location and very clean hotel.
Detailed Review: The hotel is located within easy access by taxi to main sites, or a long walk, which is nice.  The Hotel staff are extremely help-full and went above and beyond for us.  The standard rooms are quite small with-out windows but it's quite fun for a couple of nights.  They are clean and do the job.  We stayed here twice and on our second visit stayed in a larger room with a window which was really nice and probably worth the extra if your not on a budget.  There's a nice restaurant down stairs too.  The entrance/stairs doesn't do the hotel justice so don't be put off and make your way up to it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Clemsidouille
Detailed Review: Very mixed feeling; on one hand, the staff is nice, airport pick up was convenient, the location within the city is correct and the price is reasonable; on the other hand, the rooms are very tiny, our room was directly close to the lobby desk so we had tchat noise all the time, hot water is not very good - if any; during two nights out of three there was a big party nearby all night with crazy beat box that disturb our sleep; and to walk to the nearest good restaurant (gulshan e iran) you must cross a kind of shady bridge especially at night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ella D
Detailed Review: Great service, everyone who works here is very friendly and helpful! It's just a bit loud at night I think there might be a nightclub nearby but we were so tired from exploring we managed to sleep! Breakfast included, airports transfers easily arranged!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lucy T
Detailed Review: We really enjoyed our 7 night stay at Elphinstone.   Please do not be put off by the front of the hotel when you get dropped off and the staircase leading up to the entrance.   This small, modern hotel is spotlessly clean. The reception staff are friendly, efficient and speak very good English.  The wifi is spot on and we think the idea of having complimentary unlimited tea from 5pm till 7pm is great after a long day exploring the city.   The rooms are small but cosy with a kettle, toiletries and AC. The only downfall was that we never had any hot water after asking them if they could fix it.  As for the location it was half an hour walk away from Fort area and 40 minutes to the Gateway of India but I recommend getting a taxi as the taxis are so cheap in Mumbai.  All in all good‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dannyxb
Review: Best budget hotel I have ever come across in Mumbai.
Detailed Review: Located near Crawford Market, this place is nicely tucked away from the chaos that is 5 minutes walk away. Excellent clean rooms with good Wi-Fi and incredibly helpful staff. Air-con and showers easy to operate to the temperatures you prefer. Breakfast is basic, but complimentary. If you want soft boiled eggs ask for poached and you will need a spoon to eat them. Decent restaurants close by and a bar too. Taxi's easy to hail outside at the bottom of the stairs. Rooms cleaned every day if you leave your swipe card with the man on reception. Check the different hotel sites on the internet as prices vary a lot.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tjomas
Detailed Review: Hey,  Just spent some days here and what you pay for what you get is an A+. Very friendly service that is always happy to help,very clean and comfortable rooms that do look as shown in the pictures, good location. I  am very satisfied

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: s0livagant
Review: Best Value hotel in South Mumbai!
Detailed Review: Close proximity to Gateway of India, Elephanta caves, marine drive, taraporewala aquarium, chowpatty beach, hanging gardens. From outside it doesn't look appealing. But inside it looks good. The superior twin bed is very compact. Deluxe room is good. Prefer deluxe room over superior twin, if you are travelling with family.. I found this hotel as a best option to cover south Mumbai at a reasonable stay price, with clean compact rooms and good service. Food is OK. There are lots of eating place outside this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Santiago D
Detailed Review: This is a small hotel, the rooms are fine for spending the night. The stuff, especially the people from the front desk, were very kind. We needed to extend our staying, and even though they were sold out, they help us to find a room in an other hotel from their same group of hotels. They arrange the moving, took us to the other hotel, even pay the taxi. That kind of service is very much appreciated especially when you don't know much about the culture and language of the place where you are staying. We highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KeRa N
Detailed Review: From the outside this little gem doesn't look like much, but once inside you will be surprised üòÑThe reception gentlemen are friendly and helpful. The rooms are very basic, clean and small with NO windows. The breakfast is toast, eggs and coffee/tea.... nothing else!  The restaurant is down stairs and not affiliated to the hotel at all. Only one person speaks english, other than that you need to be Indian to communicate!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Marko
Detailed Review: The service was simply amazing. Due to the currency change in India, we didn't have any cash on us, the hotel helped us with everything. They even borrowed us money. The staff was super nice and supportive with any requests. Nothing seemed to be impossible!!! Big big like for that!  The hotel itself was also very nice, clean and comfortable. Although, the area isn't the best one in Mumbai, the hotel was great. There wasn't a moment we regretted our stay there. Highly recommended!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mary566
Review: Excellent hotel with amazing friendly very helpful staff.
Detailed Review: One of the best hotels to stay in Mumbai. This is our second time staying in this hotel.  Very clean and most helpful staff. Would definitely come here next time we are in Mumbai.  No hesitation in booking this vey clean hotel with wonderful staff.  We booked a suite.  Highly recommend this hotel. Amin and Maherunnisha from Canada.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Soenke t
Detailed Review: Small but clean room with all amenities. Good location to explore Mumbai also on foot. Very close to Crawford market. Good wifi and free breakfast with delicious omlette or Indian idli, etc to choose from. The staff is also very helpful and competent. Only a bit noisy during the nights because of a beer bar near and the normal sound of megacity like Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sumitprat
Detailed Review: Stayed at hotel fortune for a day. really nice hotel with very good location. All places like marine drive, colaba for 5 minute taxi drive. The rooms were small but good and clean enough for the price. We ordered food for dinner and it was average. There are some near by restaurants where you can go. Staff was really courteous and helpful with everything. Will stay at the same place if I have to in that area.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John B
Detailed Review: Booked 2 rooms only one available... Room was damp with death trap electrics.  'Bathroom' stank like there were rotting animals in the plumbing, in fact I threw up.  Moved out after a few hours and felt totally relieved.  Don't even consider this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Matt T
Review: Good little hotel near the cricket
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 2 days while watching India vs England in Mumbai. Small but clean hotel with good facilities and 5 minutes walk from the stadium. Friendly and helpful staff and a nice restaurant. Breakfast was included.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kajol34
Detailed Review: nice poperty near cst station. good room with good service.every thing aws clean in our room. service was nice. bell boy also well behaved.overall nice experience. breakfast also good. definitely come back again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anitakanjee
Detailed Review: We had a lovely experience at this hotel. The staff are very friendly and efficient. Nothing is too much of an effort for them and this includes the front desk and in the restaurant. The food was amazing, simply delicious! It is very close to the airport even though it not situated along with the other hotels. I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Doreen M
Detailed Review: Check in was very quick and efficient. The room was big, clean and modern as shown in the pitures and catered for family of four. Food was well cooked and tasty and well presented. The reception was more than willing to help choose activities suited for my family. They were also gracious and understanding by allowing us to use a room to freshen before our trip to Goa. Its worth noting that there are some shipping and logistic companies in the hotel however it did not hamper my two day stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajan A
Review: Best place to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel and found it perfectly good hotel to stay in a reasonable price. Food is great, staff are really helpful and environment is really comfort. It's located in central Mumbai so going any place of the city is quite easy.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DrArpitha
Detailed Review: My father and I stayed in the hotel for two days and it was the most comfortable stay I have had. They even take care of transportation needs. Clean rooms, courteous staff and tasty food. Made my visit to Mumbai memorable.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kalachevan b
Detailed Review: We stayed in this hotel for 3 days , It is only about 15 mins to Airport ,The enviroment very cozy and calm.The  reception may be small but rooms are big ,tidy and clean.All basic hotel facility is available esp WIFI.The food is good as home cooked. The staffs were very helpful and multilingual. We checked out at 6.00am to Airport,thanks for the early offering of the breakfast despite the opening hrs  of restaurant at 7.30am.Forex and Tour Operators facilty available at the lobby.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sirshendu P
Detailed Review: A very good and well maintained hotel at a cheaper rate.Food supplied and behaviour of the  staff are very satisfactory. Rooms are  cozy and displays the high class. A very good hotel to spent holidays.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Maayaa
Detailed Review: üò°- Reception Staff Needs Improvement.      - Nothing Much To Explore Near By.      - Rooms Are cozy. üòä- Very Close To Airport.      - Nice Food At Restaurant.      - Very Help full Bell üîî Staff.      - Over All Good Stay.      Must Try

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ravikumar T
Detailed Review: Hello to all readers and to all staff @ Trip. Happy New Year Wishes to you all.  I stayed at this hotel on 26 Nov Saturday for one and half days. It is in Dadar suburb and a nice hotel. It is not cheap......but you pay for what you want. My room was 401.....Very comfy and a good size. Road traffic noise was minimal. Bathroom was clean and just adequate. The lift to 4th floor is from 1955. Small , rusty not quick but at least works. I did not have any food here.....as this hotel does not have a restaurant. What you order to eat is picked from an outsource. Never mind. There are plenty of places to eat and 2 bars.......a short 10 min walk away. So no problemo. The room rent was a bit steep . I think. I was there. Taxi travel at your beckon .......Ola or Uber......you step out of‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SasiNams
Detailed Review: The hotel is managed very poorly. I am a tour operator and booked the hotel for my customers. To confirm the time of check-in of guests i called the hotel the day of check-in and informed them. They said the hotel will be ready by usual check-in time with is 12noon. Later around 2pm I got a call from our customers telling me that they were not allotted the room yet. I talked to the hotel manager and they told me that they are still cleaning the rooms and will arrange in 10 mins. I thought the issue was resolved. My customer calls me again at 3pm and told me they are still waiting for the rooms. I called and shouted at the management and finally the rooms were allotted at 3:30pm. It was a terrible experience. I would never book this hotel for myself or for our customers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Corygrao
Detailed Review: This hotel has a good position with a fare price. The staff is quite helpfull and kind. We stayed 3 days and we have no complain at all. They can organize tours and drivers if you need to. They offer a so so breakfast, but good enought to start the day.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Emanuele P
Review: Good position, essential services are good, poor breakfast
Detailed Review: My girlfriend and I stayed in this hotel three days at the end of november 2016. The position is good, close to the south of the city where the tourist area is. Our room was very small, with two separated beds and a small space to enter the bathroom. AC, ceiling fan, hot water and WiFi are available and working well. The staff at the hall was very kind and helped us giving information. Ask for the orginized tour with a guide: the can't advertise it but they have a guided tour, cheaper than the one we did with realitytours (no idea about the quality, though). Breakfast is poor: no buffet, you have instead only two toasts with jam, one egg and a cup of coffee/tea. If you want more, you pay. The sourrundings aren't the best, but it's Mumbay, so... Essential and to be used only for‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shug45
Detailed Review: The entry to this hotel is almost lost in the hustle and bustle of the street and the stairs up to reception are less than welcoming but please persevere! The staff here are wonderful. There are 2 men on the front desk who can only properly be described as gemtlemen and they very much suit the hotel which has a bit of an olde worlde charm to it. The rooms are quite small and nothing special but this is reflected in the price. When unsure of the correct way to go to Marine Drive, one of the 'boys' was sent out with me to ensure I was set on the right track. The next day after visiting the seething mass of people that is India Gate, I returned to the hotel, clearly very tired and was given the tastiest, refreshing chai masala and a very comfy seat with a view towards Crawford‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nirmal T V
Review: An excellent budget option with amazing service and comfortable stay
Detailed Review: We booked the Elphinstone Hotel for 4 nights and right from the time of arrival to the check out time, the service quality was very good. Even though the looks of the hotel is not great from outside, it is a completely different experience the moment you enter inside. We opted for Deluxe room and the rooms are spacious and come with all the features including safe, refrigerator and TV along with free Wi-Fi.  Sleep quality is also good and we have a comfortable stay at the hotel. The hotel serves only light breakfast but even that was a good experience. Overall, highly recommend for people looking for an affordable and yet comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bianca L
Detailed Review: Great for a quick 2 nights stop for our group.  Deceiving from outside but once in hotel it's fine.  Nice clean rooms. Big noisy due to it being on main road and shower is rubbish. But wasn't expecting too much as Mumbai in general is much more expensive in comparison to rest of India

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sam J
Detailed Review: We came in at 1am and they sorted out rooms for the night with no issues, price wasnt too bad and breakfast was nice. Location is near the busiest mumbai cities, staff were also kind to us.  Showers were cold and that was really the only downside

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: jimmywalter
Review: Great Staff, good rooms, great location.
Detailed Review: This is a budget hotel with clean, good rooms, great location, great prices, great staff. It is 500 meters from Crawford market (renamed Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Mndai - Google maps is wrong as I write this, but I have sent them the right location for Crawford market), less than a km from the CST train station (also wrong on google maps). Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus is on google maps which is CST. The breakfast is free, good enough (2 eggs plus toast and coffee or an Indian disk which alternates). It is a little hard to see since it is upstairs and the entrance is narrow at the street level. It is at the intersection of PD Mello Road and Carnac Road at a stop light which works only part of the time. There are two restaurants at street level in the same building which are both‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bharti P
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed my stay. Very helpful and hospitable staff. Breakfast, which was complimentary, was really good. Very good service was provided by the staff.Very hygeinic. Will definitely stay there again. I have recommended the hotel to all my friends and family.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Simon H
Review: felt at home in the heart of mumbai
Detailed Review: I stayed here twice this autumn. The staff are lovely, i felt very at home an welcomed whatever time I was there. The breakfast was good and the afternoon tea very welcome after a day walking around the incredible city of Mumbai. I really enjoyed the location as its not in Colaba or fort where the high density of tourists means that there's much more hassle on the street. This hotel is not far from there, I would walk, but it is close to crawford market, kapeldevi, mahalaxmi and chor bazaar etc. Here I found the people really warm and open and there are some great eateries around, including Badshahs just up the road where you can enjoy their famous falooda royal! I enjoyed its location. The rooms are good and its worth paying a little etc for the deluxe rooms if you want a bit‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Helen B
Detailed Review: We arrived at hotel Elphinstone jet lagged and tired. The staff were superb and checked us in immediately and earlier than they needed to. Room was clean and tidy. Free chai offered. Reception staff were tentative and courteous throughout with advice and taxi bookings. Hemond was fantastic and made our stay stress free. Fantastic member of staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sapan_travelcrazy
Review: Could this hotel be anymore superbly situated ?
Detailed Review: That title has Chandler's sarcasm . So the hotel is situated in such a location that you don't need to deal with auto rickshaws & cabs  , every nearby attractions are about 10 mins walk . When i came to Mumbai through rail at BCT station , i just took local train to marine lines station & walked about 1.2 kms to the hotel  , the convenience factor is so high.  No cab & auto rickshaw dealing were done , i find is hassle free . Nearby places are Nariman point , Fashion street , Metro cinema , Churchgate station , CST , Marine drive  etc.  Now about hotel stay : Room was little small (Mumbai style) & quality is about average , it has its own restaurant , food was delicious . As everything is on walking distance , i don't think you will stay in the room longer .

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mimi460
Detailed Review: Hotel was very good. I didnt find any problem. The staff was so polite. the checkin procedure took some time but thats not a problem. Overall nice stay. The stay was pleasant, value for money. Very clean and tidy and it's just next to the bombay hospital which makes the commute easier. You can choose to eat lunch and breakfast also at the restaurant attached to the hotel. Quality food is served with good taste. Definitely, a place to stay if you are looking for accommodation in and around the metro city..Its value for money hotel staff is good food is good location very good

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tapan S
Detailed Review: nice and very comfortable stay in one words totally hassle free. service is good. clean room. staff well trained. good for family hotel.definitely come back again.all important spot are very near by. thanks to all staff of fortune.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 2016JuliaM
Detailed Review: We found Hotel Fortune online & felt it had everything we needed. We arrived at reception to be ignored for quite a while whilst the staff chatted. We checked in but we were allocated a room that was completely different to the online booking we made. The room didn't have half the items the website & confirmation email advised it would have and was so small you couldn't stand up to put your trousers on! In addition the room was filthy, mound on the walls and ceilings, tables dirty and the bathroom was disgraceful.  We complained to reception and the guy couldn't even be bothered to look at us whilst we were talking. He just played on his phone & tried to tell us that we had what we booked. We really didn't! He kept advising that they had had other bookings. I couldn't really see‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manoj g
Review: Good hotel for Short stay, cheap & near to Sahar International Airport
Detailed Review: Pros: a. Extremely helpful staff b. Near to Mumbai International Airport (less than 10 mins drive) c. Decent Buffet Menu (in Breakfast, & Dinner) d. Provides free drop / pickup from Airport e.   Cons: a. Difficult to get a booking, as  most of the time it is full from corporate bookings b. Lifts are a bit old/ risky

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anuq T
Detailed Review: I find it hard to rate this hotel because when we reached we got a room in the 7th floor, which was absolutely stunning for indian standard especially. The furnitures were modern, it was clean and the color concept was very beautiful. Actually the whole hotel including the restaurant is nicer than on the photos. So we were super happy until we woke up at 4 am because obviously people are camping on the roof. I dont if it is their staff which as to house there or other workers. But it is obvious that they usually live there and make much much noise. So it was terrible after a long flight getting no sleep for the day. And you need energy for Mumbai! So actually our short stay was pretty much ruined by that. But what was actually worse is how the people in the reception treated me.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: saugata
Detailed Review: I have been to Le Grande , Mumbai recently and stayed for 3 nights and 4 days. I really want to thank their GM Samir and the entire staff for making me feel at home. The hotel is located in JB nagar which is close to Mumbai airport and being in Andheri East, it is perfectly set in the business location. They have 58 rooms of two categories and all the rooms are well maintained and are full of positive vibes as their big windows let the natural light come in and also if you want fresh air, you can open the glass windows. The size of the rooms are good and you can freely move around. The toilet is junc free though they can improve on by providing better toiletries and enhancing the lights inside. The beds are comfortable and the storage space or sitting arrangement is upto the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Narasimha S
Detailed Review: The food is exquisite..the breakfast spread was of wide variety...the service is fast and efficient...the room ,ac and electrical appliances worked well and no deficiencies..the staff are well dressed and helpful...in particular Mr.sameer Deb,Manager is knowledgeable and helpful....safety aspect is good...above all,it is very close to the CST terminal...

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ganesha08
Detailed Review: We had a good stay in this hotel. The staff was really nice: very helpful and welcoming. The food was good but can be improved: for European who are not accustomed to spicy food, it is hard to find something without spices. For those who are accustomed to Indian food, it is alright. It is more an hotel for people who came on India for business because it is close to the airport.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: jatinderlal
Detailed Review: All the pic I saw and read review about le grande was more than we  expected staff couldn't do enough for you food great differnt menu each day clean rooms overall we had a fantastic 6 night stay  thank you le grande

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: scooter3517
Detailed Review: Our group stayed here for three days and found the staff very helpful and ready to help with any of our questions. The rooms were very clean and had all the amenities that we needed. The breakfast was good and had great hours.  Dinner was also good.  We especially enjoyed the buffet dinner.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kumar327
Detailed Review: This Hotel is comparatively small, but they are refurbishing it. Top 3rd floor renovation is completed and the stay in this floor rooms is enjoyable. It is a good business and family hotel. Hotel staff is very co-operative. The hotel serves complimentary breakfast, which has to be ordered from their fixed menu and will be served in the rooms. Room size is comfortable for three persons, good d√©cor and well maintained. The hotel is very well connected by Road and train facilities.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rajesh G
Detailed Review: We booked oyo room in bawa regency. Check in was smooth. Location is good near Dadar Station. Room is on the fisrt floor which was very small and old. No spac for easy moving in room . But was clean n tidy. Bed was comfortable. Linen was clean .
