Might make women travelling alone a bit uncomforatble, considering the hotel staffis least bothered about the comfort and conviniece of their guests. Good points: decent breakfast, comfortable pick-up and drop service.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Osamanasher
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel two days I get very good impression , helpfull team work and adminstration , they get resturant prepare very good and tast different type of food ..the hotel is very good for family life style ..its location is amazing it was 10 minute far from main train and airport station ... I advise tourism friend to put this hotel as first choice if they want to make vacation in mumbai ..

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankur G
Detailed Review: I stayed at bawa regency for 2 days , worst hotel .  At the room nor their ac remote was working neither tv and shower was functioning properly . Even the experience with the staff was not good when we asked for a towel they denied told towel are given only in the morning and fought with us.  When we told them about our problems then didnt do nething to rectify the problems so we upgraded the room .  The upgraded room was similar . So My advice never stay in this hotel ... Stay away

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anil R
Review: Great Services, nice location, nice staff,
Detailed Review: the hotel is very near to railway station great services in economical price place like Mumbai. lavish breakfast and brilliant services. the staff is very polite. every thing is fine the hotel accommodation cost

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: gml631
Detailed Review: Stayed a few nights with a friend in Mumbai.  Staff were amazingly friendly, rooms were spotless,walking distance to the CST.  Breakfast was only meh, but that's okay.  Good price as well!  Bathrooms were clean, too!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JOSEPHTAURO
Detailed Review: Excellent service with very clean and neat rooms. Every employee be it the cook or the reception or the bellboy serves with a smile. The manager deserves kudos for running a tight ship and at the same time being very co-operative. I would love to stay here again soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: tilak655
Detailed Review: We stayed with family in suit room , very clean , spacious room , friendly staff . Mr. Helmand was very nice and helpful , he takes care of all worry with his smile . We will definitely coming back to this hotel also strongly recommend friends to stay in this hotel . It is very conveniently located .

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: dashingdipu
Detailed Review: It a nice and clean place. Best for family. Local transport easily available for any direction. Many restaurants available nearby. Pleasant place with supportive staff. Near to CST station. Value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Terrence L
Detailed Review: I stayed for 4 night in Bombay. The best staff i ever met in India. When the hot water was malfunctioned, they quickly repair for us. The staff was so nice and helpful. The superior room is packed for 3 persons to stay, so I would recommend 3 persons to stay in deluxe room.  It would be perfect if the hot water is more stable, because it's quite cold to have cold shower in rainy days.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Adam B
Detailed Review: Absolutely amazing for Mumbai usually prices are very high but this hotel is very reasonable and offered us above and beyond the service we payed for! They allowed us to keep our bags here even after checking out. Rooms can seem a bit like like cupboards but are still very clean and comfy! Can't fault this hotel at all really. Fantastic

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: McMussa
Detailed Review: Although my room was prison cell sized (don't ask!!) This was actually a nice place to stay. From the madness of the streets to a totally different atmosphere, cool, clean and pleasent.   The only downside is they strictly do not low visitors... Which meant I had to sit in the lobby with my cousins rather then my prison cell sized room (lol)..  I'd definitely stay here again... Reception staff were lovely and the location was racy to reach.. and only one stop away from central Mumbai costing just 5rs.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aghismail
Detailed Review: The Hotel is located near to the Crawford Market,Which is the central point for Shopping.If  you wanna get to the hotel mention Carnac Bunder from anywhere.     The Hotel is Clean and go for the deluxe rooms because they  are bit spacious than the standard rooms.     There is free massage chair for back and neck at the lobby and free tea is served between 5 to 7pm at the hotel lobby.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: biltusinha
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the FORTUNE HOTEL for almost 3 to 4 times in the last year. Being in the heart of the Mumbai city, you expect this place to be loud and noisy all the time. But that was not the case. We booked superior rooms for all our visits. The rooms are just fantastic. It has all the modern day amenities, . Being in the heart of the city, you cant expect much of a view, but thats fine as the interior negates this. The food of the hotel is also quite tasty with a large choice. The staff is very good and friendly. Rooms are comfortable and well maintained Another highlight is the Breakfast. A wide choice of food varieties (both veg and non veg). The staff members are very helpful. The Check-in/Check-out was also easy, though they follow proper check-in procedures, which is‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: pavel9905
Detailed Review: I stay in this hotel from 30 May till 01 June 2015. Overall stay was good. In very expensive Mumbai, they are giving a decent service in very decent price. Rooms are not that much big but still manageable.  Washroom is very small not that that much clean. they should work on this.  This hotel is 5mins walking from Marine Drive, 1 KM away from CST station, 2 KM away from gateway of India. every kind of food shop, medical store shopping store are walk-able distance. Metro cineplex is just 2 mins walk.  If you really want to spent good time for Mumbai Darshan then this hotel is ideal to select.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tejinder Singh B
Detailed Review: Hotel is very well located near airport with free airport shuttle. Rooms are very clean and of high standards. Bathrooms are also very clean and comes with all amenities like hot water. I booked my room on phone and Hotel arrange extra bedding for me as requested. Staff is friendly and respect privacy. There is a complimentary breakfast survered on buffet basis which is of good quality and taste. Hotel has an elevator so it very convenient.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shibu Z T
Detailed Review: This is a budget Hotel near airport. The only advantage is free airport pick up not and drop. Morning complimentary  breakfast not much varieties. Just for a night sleep this is ok. They arrange taxis from the hotel reception which is good. Bit difficult to find the address yourself so if the taxi is arranged by hotel then no issue to search back the address. The reception persons are very helpful and courteous, which you may not see in other Mumbai hotels.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anshita G
Detailed Review: I travelled in june 2015. We had a booking in this hotel. But  the manager was not giving us the room for some insane reasons. Esp. The sales manager is completely illetrate. They even dont have manners to talk to clients.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kim j
Review: Worst hotel if u travel with family
Detailed Review: Very bad hotel i travelled last year but don't no whome to complain now i find TripAdvisor.com to write my Complain that and help other travelers is well. This hotel charges me some amount of 2500 for one night and with worst services. I don't have other option because its close to airport and i want to catch a flight in morning but this hotel is worst option and i don't get any thing from my room i have to go to reception for asking for everything wifi is not working in my room. Seriously its very bad hotel. Please be aware travellers dont book this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vinaypawarr
Detailed Review: A city like Mumbai where accommodation is so expensive and especially you would like to stay towards South Mumbai, this hotel is at your rescue. Me & a friend from Pune had to attend a wedding and struggling to find a good budget hotel my friend came across Hotel Elphinstone on Trip Advisor. My friend did all the booking by calling the hotel.   On arrival a bottle of water, wet wipes & chips usually this service you don't get at budget hotels or even at the best of hotels. The staff was on very helpful and prompt. Our room had a issue with the AC, they tried to fix it but it didn't solve the purpose. The rooms are decent  and the washroom is kept clean.  Do not miss on the massage chair in the lobby :P after a long day in Mumbai.  If you are taking a train from Mumbai CST or got‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanil
Review: Great hotel for a short stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: I am originally from Mumbai but have been living in Pune for the last several years. I've never had to stay in a hotel in Mumbai but this time I had no choice as none of my friends or relatives were available to crash with. My friend and I were attending a wedding and were specifically looking for a hotel in South Mumbai for ease of travel when I came across Hotel Elphinstone on Trip Advisor.  Booked a Deluxe room by calling the hotel directly as the same room was going for Rs.400-500 more on 'best deal' websites. That's a good tip for all looking to stay here - book my calling directly and sharing a confirmation via email. Much cheaper and hassle free.  Hemond from the hotel kept following up with me on my arrival to keep the room ready. On arrival, I was promptly handed over‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: CraiginSA
Review: Great value for money and good location
Detailed Review: Everyone is right - the place looks terrible from outside. But once you're up the stairs it's a different story. Friendly staff, clean rooms and a great location. The chai tea in the afternoon was the best we had during our entire stay in India. Okay, the rooms are very small but who cares? It's just a place to sleep and recover from the intense Mumbai heat. Colaba (Gateway to India and Elephanta Island Ferry) is a short taxi ride away, and Crawford Market is walking distance. If you're on a tight budget, this is the place to stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John H
Detailed Review: I found the Elphinstone very clean, comfortable and the staff friendly and helpfull. The location was good for the Crawford market and all transport. In short I found the elphinstone to be extremely good value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RUTHERKUMAR
Detailed Review: I can confidently say that any one who stayed in this hotel would like to come here again and again. There are Small & Big A/C Rooms in the hotel which anyone can book as per their requirements, the rooms are very clean, the Staff is also cooperative and polite and helping nature always seen guiding most of the foreigners guest, the complimentary available in the morning and the free Wifi speed is very good. I have taken the maximum benefit of free Massager chair available at the Hotel which was very helpful to.  Enjoyed my stay when came for business and family trips, I would suggest to opt for this Hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sbk83
Detailed Review: We paid 2231 rs per night. The bed sheets had permanent stains and the room could have used a bit more cleaning. The bathroom was clean, but there really was not hot water. Maybe that's because we were traveling over the summer season. There is a mosque on the back side and if your room is rear facing starting from 730am amplified preaching comes blaring into the room. That said the room has next to no sound insulation, so any somewhat loud activity is heard clearly in the room.  Keep in mind that most taxi drivers don't have any idea of the location of the hotel and the only known landmark nearby is Crawford market, which is a long and dingy walk from the hotel. The wifi worked three of the four days we were there.  The staff is helpful. They called a taxi for us and provided‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Luplux
Review: Best Choice in Mumbai if you want to spend a fortune
Detailed Review: we spend 4 weeks all over india But this was our best Choice. The Personal is extremely helpful and friendly. They Helped us to find our Way in Mumbai without trying to sell us anything, they kept our luggage for One extra Day and where just very friendly in every possible Way. The rooms are very small but clean and modern and very cheap compared to other Hotels. You Can easily reach all important sightseeings from here. Definitly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mikael S
Detailed Review: Service was great, anything we asked about Mumbai they told the answers. Wifi works, clean rooms and breakfast was basic omelette and toast. Just under the hotel is somekinda bar or restaurant and they played music even after midnight pretty loud, it wasnt funny after long flight but you can live with that - its India.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: akashghosh786
Review: Great weekend Break at mumbai fortune hotel.
Detailed Review: It was my first time with my family at fortune and I must say that it was a pleasant experience. The staff at the front office and in the restaurant were helpful. Me being a foodie, must say that this is one of the places with a magnificent view and good food. I had lunch and dinner and the food menu in the restraurent was different and very tasty, The rooms are good, view is idyllic, service is adequate. The bath and toilet are functional reasonably spaced and reliable hot/cold good water pressure and no power outages.  An excellent place to unwind yourself. Fortune is a great experience for a weekend break. The hospitality and service is overwhelming. Been there very recently for my wedding anniversary and got filled with some unforgettable memories. They arranged for a cake‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: koushikdey
Review: very decent place for family getaway
Detailed Review: WeStayed 2nights with grown up kids,all of us had a lovely experience.Services are very good and prompt.Food spread was excellent and taste wise food was very good.  our room was initially messed up with twin beds instead of double beds that we had specifically asked for. Housekeeping did get this rectified immeditealy though. We got our room earlier than their check in time. Excellent Location, brilliant food, extreamly well trained staff and very clean Hotel. Would gladly visit again.and would recoomend to anyone without any hesitation

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Detailed Review: One of my Friend recommended this hotel. It's really nice place to spend weekend with family and friends.... Very clean Rooms and Great Food, I Enjoyed the Stay.. I recommended highly for my all Friends and Family...Thanks fortune

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: thirdclassservice
Review: Ver bad service and staff attitude is also very bad
Detailed Review: Though i belong to hotel industry the room cleaning is very bad the room cleaning was not done properly we found ants and hair on the floor and the bathroom was dirty. Wghen i called housekeeping they told me this is like that only and i cannot help on this, The staff is rude and they dont know how to talk with the customer which i relly felt very bad.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: payalmandol
Review: Really awesome and best in the munbai
Detailed Review: location- ideal service- excellent food- delicious  comfort- superb ambiance- super cool  I only stayed for one very short night so I didn't get to enjoy any of their facilities- however the service was amazing and the breakfast great. checkout was easy and Internet connection was stable. I recommend it. the room was quite impressive and nice.  The hotel is outstanding. This was my 2nd visit and we celebrated my wife's birthday. The staff was very courteous and treated us well.  The restaurants in this hotel are must try and would never disappoint in terms of the quality of the food served. Great place to stay on family trip to Mumbai, quick check in and check out, helpful and courteous staff, good breakfast, free wifi.  Normally I am a serious complainer and not easy to please.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: biplab281
Detailed Review: Just finishing up my stay at the fortune hotel and we've had a wonderful experience. Room was a good size and nicely maintained. Bathroom and shower were also very good. They provided excellent service and were very very polite. Thank you guys!!. All in all, we will be back for more on our next trip. The hotel is really beautiful, the interior is wonderful. The rooms are beautiful, clean and spacious. Wi Fi connectivity is good.The amenities are of higher standard,. Every need of a guest is taken care off. The breakfast they serve is excellent. Thanks for a plesant experience. Love you guys. You all made my stay memorable  Will visit again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SaltLakeCityStuart
Review: 2 1/2 stars, not horrible, but could be better
Detailed Review: This could be an O.K. 3 star with a simple upgrade to the a/c.  My room was hot, and apparently so was everyone else's, as many people left the doors to their rooms opened.  The bathroom was a bit rundown as well, but functional.  Street noise is ongoing, so earplugs are needed. The location in the Old Fort area of Mumbai was good for walking and seeing the sites.  Its not a hotel I would choose to stay in again.  Again, not horrible, but more negatives than positives for me.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vijaya I
Detailed Review: For the money spent it is not realy worth. The rooms are so small and also the bathrooms. Brkfast was also avg. The location is also not so gud. Jus okay okay.  overall we did not like the stay there. not suggestable.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mehnaz A
Review: Best place to stay ,especially if you are on a short visit to Mumbai for travel
Detailed Review: Nice hotel, with good food and very good services , a good choice for those who may have limited budget and also would like to explore the city of dreams--Mumbai !   Its very close to the airport and the hotel include free pick and drop service to the airport .The hotel also have facility to provide guides and Cabs for Mumbai tour for 1600 Rupees for 8 hrs ,covering 80 Kms

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vivek N
Detailed Review: We stayed one night before going to proceed our trip... Very near to airport n best they provide for pick up n  drop to airport n must say excellent start of our trip with this great hotel... Very good food.. Nice rooms... Must recommend of u want rot spend one night n wanna catch flight next day.... Must must must in amachi Mumbai....

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Patrick N
Review: Decent hotel in very industrial area
Detailed Review: This hotel is very close to the airport and they offer an excellent pick up and drop off service, so for a layover it is fine. As a destination however it is so remote that even the taxis can't find it, I had to guide them with GPS. There is nothing to see or do close by. The rooms themselves are adequate, with decent beds, good AC and an excellent choice of television channels in English. They also offer free WiFi which when working is not too bad, but a little irritating as it is on a voucher system so you have keep getting new vouchers all the time and signing in.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Subir Saha
Review: Pleasant stay at Hotel Le Grande
Detailed Review: Facilities in the rooms, quality of the food were excellent. Food found to be bit pricey. Wi-fi Internet speed was just about ok. Airport pick-up and drop-off services found to be very useful.  Free Wi-Fi password is valid for only 4 hours, which means in every 4 hr new user ID and password need to be activated- which is bit irritating.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Trancy C
Detailed Review: Mostly every time i am in MumbI, I stay with this hotel.It has been for 5 times. Firstly, all staff is polite and friendly.Secondly, they always try to meet you  more than your expectation. Thirdly, it is valuable stay than other hotel in Mumbai. Fouthly, I woulid to say one special, important features. That is the manager Sameer is very nice and always try to offer you special experience during stay.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Avnish J
Review: Avoid it !! The staff is good but owner doesn't care
Detailed Review: 3000 bucks is what I feel I did wasted when I stayed in BAWA for 1 night!!   The hotel is below average, TV was not working, and they have dabba TV not even lcd, I stayed in room no 207 where I was hearing a phone which was ringing continuously outside my room and was not able to sleep because of it.   The room service is ok, food is expensive as if you have landed in 2 star hotel, no free wifi.. The hotel staff is really good but they can't make the hotel renovate, it's the owner who should look after all this.   Avoid it in simple and sweet words.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Michaelunison
Detailed Review: We struggled to find the hotel which is on the first floor of a large commercial building, but on arrival were very pleased with the modern hotel hiding in less than modern surroundings.  The rooms are a bit on the small side, but were clean and comfortable.  A good location for the railway station and for visiting downtown Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bikramchhetri007
Review: Awesome stay for family 100% safe n budgets rooms.
Detailed Review: Me n my spouse had a well stay piece and  secure hotel , staffs are good Mr. Rahim was excellent helpful guy and thanks to Mr. Hemond asking me about our stay, my suggestion is some crew need more smile and greet because it's hospitality function. I saw some crew face every morning look like very sad, hearty thanks to Elphistone crew and i will be back again n again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: John M
Review: Clean place, helpful staff, tiny rooms
Detailed Review: The Elphinstone hotel was a decent place to stay, although the surroundings look a bit dodgy, once you get into the hotel it is a different feeling as the lobby and counter area is quite clean and well maintained, with newspapers, magazines, free coffee and tea during certain times of the day, and even a free massage seat (which I really much appreciated). The room I had was clean, with a safe and quite decent. In the downside I have to say it was quite a tiny room (I was a solo traveller but this room had two beds), no windows (although with the noise outside this might be ok), and a tiny single bed; I don't think I'm very tall (1.78 cm) and y feet were outside the bed. Regarding the location, I would say it is ok, I wanted to stay close to Colaba, and although it is not a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Craig T
Detailed Review: Arrived in Mumbai early morning after a horrid overnight bus from Hampi. We made our way to Elphinstone and yes, first impression the outside of the building isn't the nicest, but we soon forgot about that after a warm welcome from the hotel staff.  We were given Tea and Chips and allowed to check into our room early. The room was slightly on the small side, but very pleasantly decorated and extremely clean. The bathroom was a good size and again extremely clean.  The hotel is in a very good location for the very reasonable price. It's about a 20min walk along one road down to Colaba where most of Mumbai's tourist attractions are. Even closer is Crawford Market and Victoria Station.   We only had 3 days in Mumbai and therefor had a packed itinerary, The Elphinstone Annexe was‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vikzstar
Detailed Review: Mumbai is an expensive city but this place I felt was far too expensive for what you got! From the outside and from the stairwell it looks pretty sketchy but once inside, the reception area is really nice. Our room was around the back, by a storage cupboard with loads of junk piled up outside. The room was small but clean and did the job but at about ¬£19 per night, I felt robbed!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Swe99t
Review: Perfect stay at a reasonable rate
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is very cooperative.  Decent place, clean rooms& good service. The hotel also provided free wifi& complementary breakfast. We wer'nt familiar with the places and the hotel staff helped us in getting a taxi& reach the right place.  It was overall a nice& pleasant stay which I would recommend to everyone.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shahirah H
Detailed Review: When we saw the hotel from outside and walking upstairs to the hotel, we kinda feel frustrated but when we saw the hotel entrance and their small but neat enough reception table, we are suprised! The hotel is actually living up to a quality that is above average for a budget hotel. The registration took quite sometimes with all the passport photocopies and signatures, but then during the process they did served us with snacks and water.  We booked two standard rooms and getting into it, we find that the room is definitely a good one for a budget hotel.Though the space is very small but it is quite well equipped. Proper storage for a couple of luggage and clothes. They even provide hair dryer and kettle in the room.The en-suite toilet is spacey enough and hot shower.  I believed‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jan M
Detailed Review: I booked this mid-range hotel in Mumbai to be sure we will get cosy and good place to sleep since we were travelling home for India and needed some rest before a long journey. Music coming from bar/restaurant was so loud we could not not sleep (Room 103) till 2 am. Walls and the floor were literally shaking. It was like trying to fell asleep in the middle of disco. When I went to complain because of the music, a receptionist told me that there is a wedding going on so I was tolerant and waited till the party is over. The very next day we were leaving at 3 am - due to early morning flight. But the music was loud as the day before. When complaining again, the same receptionist told me that there is some celebration. Well, if he would have told me the first day that that loud music‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: arundey805
Detailed Review: I had an amazing time here with my wife. I stayed for 2 nights 3 days. Awesome experience with 5 star amenities and luxurious services.Must visit by all couples and specially in monsoon.  It Is Excellent Hotel nearby  The Beach At Marine drive. The Facilities of the Hotel Was Excellent The Chef of the Hotel Cooked Excellent Food Like Home Overall a good Hotel To Stay With Family Its Quite From The Hustle Bustle Of The City And A Lot Of Natural Beauty Surrounds The Hotel.  Very nice hotel with very welcoming staff, decent size room.  Enjoyed the stay...highly recommended for family and friends

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: tempety
Detailed Review: I was in Mumbai just to catch flight for next morning, Le grand is a decent hotel in it's price rage Location is average but the most convenience is their airport drop and pickup service, which is reliable and included in tariff, Rooms are decent and in this segment they serve good breakfast which i was not expecting from them on my past experience in Mumbai generally only serves sandwiches when traiff is included with breakfast, if you are in Mumbai looking near by Andhari, it could be good option.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raid M
Detailed Review: I as there from 22-25 of April, 2015, the stay is acceptable, nice staff, apart from one of the boys who laughes when given 8 rupees for leading me to my room, nice rapid check in and optimistic 30 seconds for check out procedure, perfect shuttle to the airport at any time, overall experience is satisfying, recommended for a short stay bending for an international flight.  RAED Y.MAHDI.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JohnyTotlani
Detailed Review: Hotel staff is very good & helpful. Food is excellent. Room is very good & services is quick. Next time when we come we will stay in same hotel. Public transport is available in economy prices. Realy nice.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: krupa86
Detailed Review: I had to stay next to airport for one night so booked this hotel via booking.com . I checked in around 12noon and checked out next day at 7am. We did not go.out of hotel as outside hotel it's horrible. so much dusty . dirty . you can't even have a evening walk outside the hotel. We stayed in hotel. There were mosquitos in restaurant  n rooms and i caught dengue from here..I think management has to think on how to keep their hotel guests safe from mosquitos. proper pesticides has to be done o hotel is free from mosquitos. rooms n food was ok .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Soumendra M
Detailed Review: I stay with my family for two nights and I am very much satisfied with the service food was better than other restaurant free Internet service provides by the hotel make easy to do our official works the location of the hotel was good for shopping hospitality of the hotel was tremendous at last we are enjoy

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dhavalsolani
Detailed Review: Just entered and found mosquitos. Poor room service and wired staff/waiters. Orderedciggs and he refused to give back change and started asking for tip from front. However rooms are good and bathroom is clean as well. But not impressive.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sid199
Detailed Review: The room by itself is pretty good, and then you have the usual compliments like breakfast, wi-fi and newspaper. The staff is well mannered but nothing to brag about.  Location-wise, it is very close to the Dadar bus stand and railway station. On the whole, the experience does not justify the price. I've stayed in better hotels with much more friendly staff at a lower price.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aman G
Detailed Review: Total waste of money. Smelly washrooms. Third class bedrooms. Dont trust pictures mentioned. Buffet is a mockery. Only positive thing is its location. Staff is ok. But the quality of rooms is really very very bad. Seems to have never renovated them. Avoid plz

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Colum C
Detailed Review: We stayed here after searching for a few days for cheap(er) accommodation in Mumbai. Accommodation is at least three times more expensive in Mumbai, than everywhere else in India, so when you're booking you just have to accept that.   The hotel is located about ten minutes walk away from the Gate of India, it's not the most appealing area, but it's functional. It's easy and cheap to get to the tourist hot spots by tuk tuk.  Although the entrance is not appealing, the hotel itself is really clean and the staff were excellent. Our room was clean and comfortable, but really small, to us it was luxurious compared to most of the places we stayed in India.   We stayed here for three nights and we were very happy with the service and the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: yanu23
Detailed Review: This hotel offers clean and big rooms. I had a room on the street, so in the early morning already I heard all the traffic - but you don't have to travel to India, when this would be a problem. There is a free breakfast, which is served on a balcony in the backyard. They do fresh made omlettes.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: katf557
Detailed Review: Staff are friendly and very helpful, they went above and beyond to make sure everything was right.  Rooms were great value for money .close to train station and 24 hour check in. So great we booked for the end of the trip as well .

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: pickytravelbags
Detailed Review: Hotel elphinstone This hotel is fantastic! excellent, professional staff!  The hotel is in a very busy area of fort - its a little hard to find so do take the city map from the hotel reception showing the hotel for taxis!  from the outside it doesnt look great - inside however, a different story! lovely secure rooms, air con, great shower, safe & tv - good wifi!  staff excellent! hotel is on a very busy road - but its mumbai! The noise is everywhere! Its near to Marine drive & chowpatty drive. around 1 hr drive from the airport! suits all tourist needs if you want to see the real.heart of mumbai

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rachasri
Review: Stay at Elphinstone Hotel Annex, Mumbai from 16 March to 18 March 2015
Detailed Review: Srinivasan R. India, 18 March 2015	 Good Experience for comfortable stay 1)The location and connectivity, 2)well maintained rooms with facilities, 3) most importantly pleasant , courteous and helpful managers at front desk backed by polite and effeffiicient room service.  The stay was a happy experience. The frontend managers were not only pleasant to deal with but were courteous and helpful.They had provided me with a copy of the map and location for ease of travel.The room attendants were quick and prompt.The hotel is very near to the Fort area, an advantage for business travellers. The vicinity of Crawford market provides scope for shopping around for variety of things. Notwithstanding busy traffic outside, inside the hotel it is peaceful and comfortable.The room is well‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: dareczek69
Detailed Review: The staff at Elphinstone is extremily friendly and helpful. Some rooms are small with no window, but superior rooms are very big with many large windows. Hotel is very clean and located close to the train station. Great value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Adam S
Detailed Review: I stayed in three similarly priced hotels in Mumbai, and this one was by far the best. The staff is exceptionally nice and the hotel itself is clean and modern despite it being in an old building. For Mumbai this place is a steal.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dave D
Review: Great for backpackers - maybe not for families
Detailed Review: This hotel was a perfect place to just lay your head and sleep. The rooms have no windows, so it was very easy to oversleep in the morning! It does seem to be over a nightclub of sorts, but if you don't mind a bit of bass coming up through the floor it's no problem. It certainly didn't really disturb us, but maybe it would if you had a family.  Staff were great - very helpful when my fellow traveller got his luggage lost on the plane & they let us use their phone as much as we needed to sort this out.  Although the rooms are smaller, it was clean with aircon and ensuite.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mostly_Amelie
Detailed Review: The staff at Elphinstone is friendly and helpful. The room is small with no window, but is comfortable enough. The bed is extremely soft, which I found comfortable at first, but woke up with an achy back every morning. The bathroom is nice and modern but the hot water is more lukewarm than anything. Overall, this hotel was a fair few notches above what I have grown accustomed to in India, but it is also a lot more expensive. The bar downstairs from the hotel blares out music with heavy bass until late in the night, which was an issue for me even with earplugs.   What I found the most annoying however is that not one single taxi driver knew where the hotel was, even when presented with a map on my smart phone. I was stranded at Churchgate station a couple kilometers away for over‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: montanasinger
Detailed Review: Hotel is closed to Mumbai hospital, that is what makes this hotel strategic if you are visiting the hospital for treatment. I spent 11 night there. If you ask for a big room you are okay. because the small room is too small plus the heat hits you more specially if the AC is not working. My room was spacious and clean. The bathrooms are not good at all; the toilet has it's own little pump to flush, which is not very confortable. The shower is go very little water. Sink is too little. As the hotel faces one main street it is very noisy. has not balconies and I had hell of the time with ants and mosquitos. They get to the room by the bathroom as the bathroom has fans or open vents to outside. These mosquitos at  night for sure  get on your  face and the ants into your beth. Service‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: arundey783
Review: Stunning, Magical, Delicious, Beautiful... that is the fortune hotel
Detailed Review: My wife and I had a wonderful stay at the fortune hotel. The delicious foods, the care from all the people that work there is very special and unique.  It is a small Boutique hotel. The hotel setting is a place of beauty and tranquility. The flavour and freshness of the food was incredible - some of the best food we've had has been here. For a small boutique hotel the menu is extensive and impressive! Every dish we had was delicious and if you're a foodie this place is for you!! We treated ourselves to the lobster on our final night and wished we'd had it earlier - amazing! This place is very neat and run in a very professionnal manner. This place is ideal for those who are looking for the extra edge in their stay without the headache and trouble of dealing with the outside‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajumumbai9999
Review: Wonderful Hotel with the best service in the mumbai city
Detailed Review: This was the second visit to the hotel. We felt we were coming home. We were so excited and couldn't wait to arrive.  It was like coming home. The hotel is exceedingly well run. The conciege service is first class. The rooms are just perfect. The hotel is like a palace and the area around is wonderful. We had good service, and good help in every thing we asked for. The staff was very nice and polite. Also the food was good and fit to us as non spicy taste. Also the area around the hotel was nice and easy to go there. This is the best hotel I have ever stayed at. The service is outstanding. The room was nice too and comfortable. The restaurants in the hotel are great. We hired a driver to take us around the city for the day, it was so cheap, the car was comfortable and he was‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: paltubose8
Detailed Review: The location of the hotel is superb. It is near of crawford market and church gate and very near to CSTM railway station. So many restaurants are there near to the hotel. Service was also good. The staff is quite friendly and really helpful. And the location like already mentioned in other reviews is excellent. The food was good. We had dinner just once. I have done the booking online for 2 nights. First i was scared as we both were unknown. But the day i arrive i found my self safe. The reception staff and also housekeeping staff was very helpful. Rooms were very nice.  Now again I'll be going to Mumbai in May and I told my freinds that we will stay in the same hotel.....Seee you soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: subirchaki
Review: Good Value Clean Relaxed Hotel IN HEART OF THE CITY
Detailed Review: Very nice and helpful staff, good location. Don't be disappointed by any negative review. hotel is nice and clean. Hotel day begins at noon, but when we arrived at 7 AM and they let us stay. After noon we asked about larger room and there was no problem (we haven't been charged). Very close to Churchgate train station, gateway of india and marine drive. This hotel is definitely worth to stay. Rooms are spacious, clean and airy if a bit old fashioned in styling. There is a safe and plenty of hot water and TV . Each floor has its own waiter whom you can summon by pressing a bell in your room. Service in the restaurant as with reception staff is generally a smiling face. Much more friendly, and not to be missed. If you want good value for money in a clean safe hotel in Mumbai then‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: uttamsaha2015
Review: Nice and affordable hotel for long stays
Detailed Review: We stayed at FORTUNE Hotel while visiting Mumbai. We had a one year old baby and thought this would be a difficult, but the staff went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.The room was clean and spacious. Which is really important for us.The staff was very accommodating, friendly and hospitable. The service and stay was excellent. We had a few meals at the restaurant which were delicious.Mumbai base, I write to commend the Hotel for its outstanding personal service and excellent .competitive commercial terms without compromising service, I have no hesitation in.Breakfast served in the morning was ok . The staff was very polite and helpful . I will definitely stay again when I have to travel abroad in mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rinkisarkar
Detailed Review: The location of the hotel is superb. It is beside of crawford market and very near to CSTM railway station. So many restaurants are there near to the hotel. Rooms were very nice and clean. Service was also good.The location is awesome.. Just at the centre of Mumbai near Crawford Market and bhindi bazaar.. The staff is friendly.. Breakfast is very nice.The rooms are nice cozy with aircon and bathrooms are also in the executive wing...hoping to stay here the next time am in Mumbai..It was a wonderful experience at your hotel.The behavior of each and every staff is appreciable. Rest of the hotel staffs were also very attentive. When we visit a new place, the main thing we look for is a hotel with good service, so that we do not face any difficulty during the stay. In Hotel fortune‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: g_b_Stewart
Detailed Review: We stayed here with a tour group as one of our last stops in India and were all glad that it was for only one night. The rooms are tiny (I mean tiny, no place to put even one bag!) and don't have any windows. They weren't the cleanest of rooms either. The shower in the tiny bathroom leaked through the wall into the main bedroom. They did have the best wifi we'd come across in India. I would recommend for stays less than 24 hours - any longer and you'd feel like you were in a jail cell!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lauretta938
Detailed Review: Basic breakfast  which was fine for us  Staff  lovely location was 45 min from centre but it cost 40R for tuktuk and 20R rtn on the train which is a good experience we were 2. 50 plus ladies that had back packed around India for 3 weeks and this place was clean value for money and we felt safe , the staff and. Manager went out of their way to b helpful .the. Manager even rang the next hotel we were going to and arrange free pick up and drop off at the airport would definitely stay here again   Free wifi

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Damien T
Detailed Review: Le Grande was a great find.  It had the Best price and is near the airport.  It was clean, room had amodern design, pleanty of hot water and Wi-fi worked well.  Le Grande is located in a quiet neighborhood where the traveler still has a connection to India.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Fabfan369
Review: Great and clean hotel for a solo woman
Detailed Review: I cannot say enough good things about this hotel! The price is a little more than I am used to spending in India, but all hotels in Mumbai are expensive and breakfast, wifi, and airport transfers were included.  I am a solo female traveler and the airport transfer made me feel at ease and stress free. The hotel staff was waiting with my name on a card when I arrived, they took me to the hotel without any hassle, and I was delighted to see a clean and comfortable room with hot water and a flat screen tv! The staff was very helpful and friendly and I never felt uncomfortable or unsafe being alone. The front desk helped me plan what to do and how to go and see the city. I was able store my bag after I checked out as I had a 9 pm flight the next day and they even let me use an empty‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shawn_Storm
Review: A hotel to stay at near the airport with free pickup and drop off.
Detailed Review: The main reason to stay at Hotel Le Grande is to be nearby the airport.  I was in Mumbai for a overnight layover, so I just needed a decent place to sleep.  This hotel did the job nicely.  The best part was that they picked me up and dropped me back off for free.  The drivers were very prompt and the pickup/dropoff car was nice.  The room was clean and modern.  The bed was very comfortable (perhaps the most comfortable one I encountered while in India).  The shower had good flow with very hot water and the A/C worked great.  The wifi was good.  There was also a flat screen TV with cable.  The decor was nice and there was even a desk to get some computer work done.  The service was good and all the staff that I encountered were friendly.  The restaurant was ok.  Prices seemed‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HONESTER
Detailed Review: Came from china for business purpose and stayed in the hotel and had a pleasant experience .The front office staff and the manager were very helpful in assisting me with my address to visit.The food was good.Safe for foreigners.I came to this hotel in a tourist cab and was satisfied with my stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jayakrishnan J S
Detailed Review: Location is near to Airport and centrally located. Rooms are tidy neat n clean,  but are comparatively smaller. However the complimentary breakfast provided is very much ordinary. For continuous two days they provided  watermelon juice . Don't forget to negotiate tariff with the hotel management.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ravi B
Detailed Review: Had a comfortable stay with complementary breakfast, clean room & beddings,, in close proximity to dadar railway station..food is quite expensive. but its mumbai..everything from food to rooms are expensive.. but depends a lot on location.. got the best price online for a stay  of 2 days..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Simon A
Detailed Review: SCAM WARNING  I booked and paid two consecutive nights separately and got two separate confirmation emails, saying that everything my room was booked and clear. However, 11:55am after the first night, the lobby called me and told me they were fully booked and that I had two leave as soon as possible. The hotel booked me a cab and drove me 10 minutes north (away from the main tourist area) to a more expensive hotel. They didn't give me my money back, insisting that they haven't received any booking.   Avoid!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lois B
Review: Superb Service and a Comfortable Stay!
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Hotel Elphinstone a couple of weeks ago ... our first visit to Mumbai.  The hotel is on the second floor of an old building - the entrance itself is a bit of a challenge, but once up the stairs, we were welcomed and given an upgraded room; we really appreciated the extra space, window and quiet, clean, modern environment.  The hotel is at least a 30 minute walk from the central part of Mumbai .. not a problem if you take care on the streets which can be busy. Rickshaws are easily available.  One of the best features of the hotel?  The complimentary masala tea at 5:00 in the lobby.  Delicious!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: matysmaster1
Detailed Review: hotel external appearance does not encourage, but inside is quite pleasant, You can be cool as air conditioning works very well. very nice service we waited we were offered a very nice cup of coffee, ROOMS small but nice , clean , bathroom ok, free WI-FI :) pretty good location near craford market.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Roisin1969
Review: Five Star facilities and service at One Star prices
Detailed Review: We stayed here for the last two nights of our month long trip to India as we were flying home from Mumbai. We struggled to find something decent for a reasonable price in Mumbai but decided to book this one ahead on booking.com as we were arriving on an overnight train at 4.30 am! We had a bit of a problem with the booking as we weren't able to get onto our original waitlisted train and had to arrive a day late: due to the booking policy were unable to change the original booking so ended up having to pay the rate for 3 nights instead of the 2 we stayed. However, we were able to get into our room at 5 in the morning as soon as we arrived and after I spoke to the manager he upgraded us to the suite room for our second night, apologising profusely that they were fully booked on‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Henny0805
Review: A very nice Hotel which ist not too expensive
Detailed Review: The hotel is very nice. From the outside it is terrible for western standards, but the inside is totally different! The rooms are quite clean and the staff is unbelievable friendly. Every question we had (and we had a lot!) was answered with a huge smile on the face. At the time we were there, there was some construction work going on directly in front of our room. Since it was a bit loud, we asked if we could change room. We got the new room on the morning after (it was the first available room).

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manda r
Review: Very good hotel for little money
Detailed Review: One of the bests we stayed in in India, especially in a big city. Very friendly, helpfull staff. Cleanest room we had. Very cheap for Mumbai and good location. Provided little breakfast despite booked not included in the price! Unfortunately no window. Good choice for 2-3 nights, for longer stay probably too small rooms.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Florent M
Review: friendly staff but incredibly loud music
Detailed Review: The staff is very friendly (slow though) and helpful regarding the things you can do in Mumbai. I have to say though that the room we had was very average : barely warm water, would need fresh painting, no window. It is incredibly loud until 2am in the first superior rooms due to a bar right under them.  The floor is shaking with the bass. I know it's Mumbai, it's a loud city but regarding the price of the room... The staff kindly refunded us 1000Rps for a two nights stay. In the end to sum up I would say that it's expensive for what it is.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: BOOtsie5
Detailed Review: We searched for 2 days on the internet for a budget hotel that was clean and in a good location and finally stumbled upon this one - thank goodness!!   As soon as we arrived the staff were welcoming and helpful; they made us a cup of tea while we booked in and made sure we were comfortable. The rooms, although small and without windows, are modern and very clean - the bathroom again modern with a hot shower. The location was pretty good and easy to explore the city from. There is some noise at night but is manageable. But the biggest asset are the staff - they can't do enough for you and help in way way they can.  As other reviews have said, don't be fooled by the outside - it's a little oasis inside. Fantastic value for money, wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if I returned‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Raginie87
Review: Nice Budgethotel with very nice helpful people
Detailed Review: Hotel from outside scares you of because it's a old building.  Well don't be! Hotel is clean, rooms are small buth good for sleep, shower and off to go.   The staff is very helpful and friendly!   We recommend this hotel and will keep this hotel in our mind for our next visit to mumbai :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Paulo660
Detailed Review: I stayed here for two nights after reading the good reviews and I have to say it deserved them. The manager was very nice and his staff were pleasant and helpful also. I had a deluxe room on the side and apart from the beeping horns (by day), the room was very good. Nice bed, clean bathroom and very acceptable wifi.  The omelette I was served for breakfast was tiny (especially after a late night!) but in fairness, a second helping was duely served without an issue.  Taxis to Colaba cost from 40 rupee upwards so the location is no problem. I had a nice meal in the corner restaurant downstairs which appears to be the dockers choice. Crawford market is a shory walk and be sure to visit, (not just the covered fruit area, there's lots more). I think it will be hard to beat this hotel‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ajaymedidi
Review: A year later, just as excellent experience
Detailed Review: A good Hotel for a travelers on official trips. The best part of the hotel is its location near Churchgate. After finishing the official business in day time one can enjoy the evening at Fort Area and can also have a stroll at Gateway of India or Marine Drive.I recommend it completely, without any reservation. This is a wonderful hotel, perfectly placed, with kind, attentive staff, large, immaculately clean and airy rooms and brilliant food.  It has real character and my partner found it enchanting.  Just before we left, we had one of the newly renovated rooms, which was gorgeous. The breakfasts are as amazing as ever, witnessed by a substantial weight gain in me!  The wifi is the best we experienced in India, and the positive change is that it's all free, whether you use it in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sudipdas9173
Review: Excellent value, great breakfast, great staff, would stay again.‚Äù
Detailed Review: I stayed at the FORTUNE hotel during the third week of FEBRUARY 2015. The rooms are very spacious, clean and bathrooms have an excellent shower. The attendant staff on my floor were delightfully attentive, extremely helpful and those on the reception went out of their way to make my stay as pleasurable as possible. As an example, when I was unsure as to the location of a particular place, the person on reception went online and personally called the place to find a local landmark that I could give the taxi driver to make sure I got there ok!! There is bellboys and restaurant staff in their pristine uniforms. I know there are glitzier places in Mumbai that probably have more modern fixtures and fittings, but i'd much rather stay in this charming hotel with a soul than somewhere‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: itzzsonali
Review: Reliable and comfortable hotel in the best Mumbai location
Detailed Review: Stayed at the FORTUNE HOTEL  mid February 2015 after many years away .Hotel is great, always full. Located in the heart of MUMBAI. Room is great with good bed and good shower and bathroom. Everything you need is located nearby including synagogue Service great, food ok. Stuff  was helpful.good hotel .it was a good experience with such a good staff during business trip.thanks to all staff n manager.All staff members are good n that serve healthy n tasty food.service is good too. N more ever location is excellent.It is a very good hotel, where we can stay stay and entertain all the time. There is no restriction on any activities. The atmosphere in the hotel is also fantastic. The area also very suitable for stay.i strongly recomenned to all for this hotel. THANKS FORTUNE FOR A‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: joymondol749
Detailed Review: Very good hotel at good location. Beach is hardly 5 mins away from hotel, hotel staff are very cooperative. Special mention to hotel Checf's who takes good care of guest by paying personal attention.Had comfortable stay at this hotel.One thing which i like to appreciate delicious food and on brekfast table Chef's special attention. Very cooperative staff awesomeThe staff where great the rooms where spotless.Free wi-fi. Quiet and comfortable environment.Best hotel for family and groups.Best located near the road neat and clean rooms and shop avb easily outside.Enjoy wth friends nd family must visit the hotel.The room was neat & well maintained, though the bathroom could have been a little bigger. Staff is courteous

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: megadrive
Detailed Review: Stayed here for one night in a group of 4 girls. The location is great for seeing the city. However, the rooms are so tiny they are almost claustrophobic and the fans do little to keep them cool. Consequently, I had a poor nights sleep due to the heat and the noise of the fan. Also, our room was on the ground floor so every time somebody uses the elevator we could here the sound (like a door bell). The rooms seem to be clean, but under the bed is built up dirt and we had an infestation of ants!! The shower is weak and leaks water into the bedroom. However, the staff are friendly and helpful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jerzy G
Detailed Review: At first sight the hotel does not look great but the first impression is the result of the location that does not look impressive. However, when you stay in Mumbai and want to be near the airport this is the place. Reasonable price. Airport from/to transfer. Clean and conveniently furnished although small rooms. Clean bathroom with shower. Free WI-FI available in rooms. Friendly and professional staff. Safe and secure location. Numerous eating places within a few minutes walk. That is all you need. A very pleasant stay. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Narendra M
Detailed Review: We stayed during first week of Feb 2015 for 2 days . Rooms were neat, though small but space utilization was good gives the spacious feeling. Rooms were renovated very recently. Room service, restaurant and other amenities were good. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Food is OK.  Though hotel is located near Airport but a bit difficult to locate, the only drawback to this hotel. But, the round the clock complimentary airport pickup/drop facility never let you know about it.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: gazalagarwal
Detailed Review: I have been here at le grande twice with my pals. It Was gr8 been here. From cleanliness to food it was excellent.  Rooms alloted were also very comfortable.   At safe and secured locality so better for the new ones. And now I personally feel the best and a friendly place to stay at andheri, Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ian B. S
Detailed Review: Very clean and comfortable rooms, nice friendly and helpful management and supporting staffs, facilities for airport shuffle, Wi Fi  etc as promised, arrangement for hiring taxis available. Over all, I had a very pleasant stay with my family.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Himani A
Detailed Review: Wow, Awesome experience..  Best services must say.. Specially the manager, he is really helpful and supporting person.. If u want some roof to spend under with some good Food, cleanliness, some really good surrounding.. Would suggest u come in here.. Le Grand is really nice place..

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vilas_1212
Detailed Review: I stayed here one night before my flight. Booked because of location near to station. Absense of cleanliness, hospitality, customer respect etc... Will not recommend this for leisure or family enjoyable trip.. One can book it for overnight stay max only.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KirstyMP
Detailed Review: The hotel is very well located, which is probably the main drawcard for the hotel. The staircase and the lift up to the rooms are very average and very rundown, the rooms themselves are okay, there's air conditioning and a tv with English channels but they're all very difficult to work. There is no hot water in the bathroom and the toilets are rather dirty. Room service breakfast is pretty good quality and they give you more than you can eat, although there are fairly long waiting times.  The internet doesn't work up in the rooms, even though they'll tell you that it does, you must be in the reception for it to work which is disappointing seeing how expensive it is.  The service at the hotel was pretty good, although sometimes you will have to wait at reception for someone to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aditya Moitra
Detailed Review: The hotel is located  in Dadar and within very close vicinity to main market area. Rooms are spacious but amenities provided are extremely poor. Television sets are of `80s.                 Window AC` makes so much sound that cant sleep properly  !!. Toilets are not very clean and  dirty patches can be seen.  Staffs are very cooperative and helpful. Very polite and courteous too.  The hotel badly needs a renovation immediately.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tralalatraveltralala
Detailed Review: The staff is very friendly and the rooms are clean. The location is behind CST and could be more central - but then the price-performance ratio is excellent! This goes also for the cheap rooms that do not have windows but working AC. We can highly recommend this hotel to everyone!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: arexthunder
Detailed Review: Decent, clean room. Great value for money. Would definitely stay there again. Very near CST station and a short cab from all attractions in the Fort area. The staff were all very nice and helpful. A positive experience all around.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Steven M
Review: Hotel cancelled my bookings  twice in 2 weeks
Detailed Review: Booked to stay on 24.1.15, arrived to be told that this had been cancelled as they could not get hold of me. They booked me in a sister property called the capital hotel. I didn't mind too much as thr manager and porters were apologetic and helpful, even the manager accompanied me in a taxi. Also the capital was in a better location.   Despite this happening, I decided to book Elphinstone again before my flight to dubai. To my dismay, they had done the same thing again but this time to another hotel over half an hour away. I made it clear that I was not happy with this situation and would like to discuss a discount on the rate. They told me to discuss it with the other hotel. They tried to charge me the Elphinstone rate even though this other hotel was cheaper. When I pointed‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nicole546829
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights and had a lovely stay. We came from Udaipur by night bus and were able to check in at 8 am. That was just awesome, especially when you are really tired. Once in the room I was surprised how new the room was, I think we had room 126. Best toilet and shower in a while. As another reviewer said before you do get more than what you pay for. And thank you so much to the reception, they are lovely men and really helpful with advice. I have not eaten at the hotel, so I cant say anything about the food :( but the complimentary chai tea from 5pm-7pm was lovely. (The place below the hotel has awesome thali and food in general. You will notice it anyway from the many locals who eat there) I could not give it 5 star rating as it was noisy one night (but‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: KerryGri
Detailed Review: The Elphinstone is a little gem located opposite the Cander Bundar Bridge leading to Crawford and specialty markets.  D√©cor is elegant and has a calming effect as soon as you walk in. Our room had two double beds very clean and all the amenities below.   ‚Ä¢	Tea/coffee making facility in the room- crockery cutlery  ‚Ä¢	Small fridge  ‚Ä¢	Toiletries supplied  ‚Ä¢	Hot water Showers ‚Ä¢	Breakfast was served hot every day ‚Äì small selection  ‚Ä¢	Wi-Fi was good  ‚Ä¢	Complementary tea & coffee between 5 and 7pm every day in the foyer.   ‚Ä¢	Staff is amazing, helpful, polite and very prompt to do any thing ‚Ä¢	Masseur chair for guests in foyer  ‚Ä¢	Supply of cold water and soft drinks to purchase   Underneath are very good Indian restaurants to eat at or staff will obtain food for you.  They also arrange‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sachindei65
Review: Terrible noise from roof of room
Detailed Review: I have taken a suite room though size for the suite room is also small. No footmat provided. Also There was a irritating noise from the top of room as anybody uses restroom in the hotel. Not able to sleep prior to my marathon. Although Rate is low..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tarun R
Review: U get more than wat u pay for!!!
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel fr one night.i had booked this hotel after reading reviews on tripadvisors. i checked in d hotel around 2.00pm. front desk ppl asked me to wait nd after 10-15 minutes they told me that they dont have vacant room nd asked me to shift in another hotel nearby. as i had prior reservation nd i was coming after a long journey i refused to shift. then after sm tym they alloted me a room. Room was gud.big enough to accomodate two persons. Washroom was also gud. best part of the hotel is its location.plenty of options r available to eat nearby. cst churcgate fort kolaba all r also nearby. Their staff is very polite.in room service was very cheap.though they bring food from outside restaurant. except check in hassles it was a nice experience. u get more than wat u‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Arun R
Detailed Review: don't go by wat u see from outside.. this hotel is super clean and well maintained inside..  the best part is that the rooms don't smell which is not the case with the other hotels near by... Total value for money..

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Becky Best
Detailed Review: After a stressful 19hour journey we were really looking forward to arriving at Elphinstone and we had high hopes given the 2 friendly confirmation emails we had received and the high price (although admittedly Mumbai is expensive in general). When we arrived tired and ready for a rest we were told they didn't have a room for us and we would have to relocate to a different hotel. We weren't happy and asked why they didn't contact us to let us know given we had provided an indian mobile number and an email address. We were relocated to a less nice hotel in a less than ideal location. When we got to our new hotel we checked online and it was showing 4 available rooms in Elphinstone for that evening on more than one booking website! Something doesn't add up there...

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Andre F
Review: vey good hotel with friendly staff
Detailed Review: We as a young couple stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. There are a lot of places to eat, banks, around the hotel. Main market and main terminals station could be reached easily by foot.  The staff is very welcoming and friendly. For instance, our flight delayed so the transfer driver waited for us additional 4 hours and no fee for this are taken. Overall, the hotel makes nice impression for this price. Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ponloeu p
Detailed Review: Really professional staff, they gave us excellent advice on what to see around the city. The rooms were nice and clean, the hotel is in a great location.  There are lots of shops and restaurants nearby.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: prashantgupta_85
Review: Very nice service in affordable price
Detailed Review: I stayed in Elphinstone Hotel last week with my wife. I really enjoyed the stay.  Staff behavior (especially reception) was really good. Considering the location, tariffs of hotel were quit affordable. It was at just walking distance from VT (CST station). Yes, rooms are too small but good for tourist mainly couples and friends. I booked hotel by blindly believing the reviews and I found hotel exactly the same mentioned in reviews. For family I strictly recommend to book Deluxe rooms. Thanks to Elphinstone Hotel staff

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AnnaIowa
Detailed Review: Had booked based on location, which was great. The hotel itself is nothing special with small rooms which are clean but sparse and not very cheery. The staff was helpful enough, though i stayed 3 days and I don't think my room was ever cleaned in that time. I got bug bites while i was there; unsure if it was from the bed. Overall I thought for the price it was a little lack luster, but that could just be paying for a good location.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rks1969
Detailed Review: Low space in the room & insufficient for smooth movement. Delayed response on room dining orders. Though the, front office staffers behaves nicely. Break fast quality is quite good. Consume little extra time at check out.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Alexuty
Detailed Review: The stay was reasonably priced considering the location. Only few amenities. Adequate for a few day visit to Mumbai though. There are awesome street food stalls just around the corner. Marine Drive is only a few minutes walk away. Would stay again I think.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: surajitghosh914
Review: this property is highlight of mumbai along side other landmark destinations like gateway of india
Detailed Review: Beautiful property, lovely swanky rooms, neat & clean, impeccable staff , delicious food lovely view from the hotel . I could go on and on about my not to forget lovely experiences and i would want people who visit mumbai to visit the hotel & stay. The staff of this hotel will treat you like their most important guest and they tell their customers what truly hospitality means , Mumbai is incomplete if one doesn't stay at HOTELFORTUNE. All the best to the property & its staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dr Garima Sumit Sinha
Detailed Review: Extreamly congested rooms...no space even to open luggage!Poorly maintained rooms and stinky toilets.Non courteos staff and very very poor room service.No food service inspite of advertising 24hrs of kitchen.Better to stay in waiting rooms of railway station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hugues L
Detailed Review: In spite of me booking 6 weeks in advance for a 3 nights stay and confirming on the morning of my arrival, i was told that my room was already taken when I made it to the hotel. After pleading with the staff they found me another hotel (a real dive of a place where i decided not to stay after visiting...). They also told me my room would be available for day 2 and 3 of my booking but later send me an email to inform me that my booking had been fully cancelled.  This place is a complete waste of time, avoid at all cost.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Maryammmi
Detailed Review: Sorry for writing this negative review because I'm more like a happy writer but the truth is the truth.. I booked this true another company and I think that because of this I payed to much for this basic hotel. Rooms are really small and please first check your bed or it's clean.. Coz other people (so lucky that it wasnt me) found really dirty stuff in their bed!!!Location is actually not that bad actually, but Mumbai is such a nice city so please take a nice hotel also! üëã

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Andrea A
Detailed Review: This hotel is totally disgusting! The rooms smell moldy and they are falling apart! My bedroom had spider webs by the bed.  The bathroom was beyond disgusting! Black stuff from the roof were falling down and when we asked staff to come clean they only took the soap that was covered in black yuckiness and they didn't actually wipe the sink or any of the black stuff that fell on top of the other parts of the bathroom. My friend staying in the room next door had flies come out of the toilet when she took the "sanitary" strip off it!  Our bathroom floor had at least a dozen little worms crawling all over... Yuk! When I called to complain the staff kept saying "yes yes yes" and they had no idea what I was saying. This room is 100% unsanitary and  If I could have switch hotel I would!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: playlislay
Review: Clean, modern, amazing manager, a real gem!
Detailed Review: I have been travelling for the past month around India and I MUST do this review before I get absorbed in my travels around other countries.  We arrived in the early evening after a complex flight from Varanasi in January, using this hotel as a one night stop before we headed to Goa.  The hotel wasn't easy for our driver to find as it's located behind a main road, but it is very close to the airport and worth it! Just ensure that you have the phone number for the hotel  so that the driver can call for directions.  Signing in was quick and we were sent straight to our room. We were more than pleasantly surprised at how fresh, clean and modern our room was; gleaming floor, big comfy (and clean) bed and a stunning bathroom that had a shower and a bath!  For the money, you get a lot‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rakeshgupta2015
Review: For Nice and comfortable stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: Very nice and courteous staff. very good location.  All staff members are always ready for there good service. Good food quality and reasonable rates. Breakfast service is very good. Taxi and auto are available at a near distance. I recommend this hotel for stay in Mumbai. This is my personal experience with this hotel. I stayed around 100 times in this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jonathan R
Detailed Review: The hotel was a little tricky to find in the early hours of the morning, it is tucked away in a back road. But it is close to the airport, and the rooms are fantastic. Very comfortable and spacious, international feel. We stayed here during a very long layover, and would highly recommend it as a great night's rest. Good breakfast, particularly enjoyed the omelettes and tea. The free airport shuttle is great for travellers, and there is good wifi at the hotel. Very helpful staff. We didn't venture out as it was just a stopover, so not too sure what the surrounding area is like, but it is close to the airport - about 10mins.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mahua1
Detailed Review: Excellent stay in this hotel....food is s good... Room service superb....room are very species... Excellent location....i was very happy with my stay here...Would come definitely back .They picked us from the airport.The buffet breakfast is limited but ok.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: arupdutta
Detailed Review: We three families stayed here after coming back from goa for four days we were guided well by the manager for touring mumbai.The rooms are of decent size.the food was good .the rooms were clean.it is near airports but little far from railway stn.I would disagree from the last review that it isnt a family hotel as we enjoyed

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sumanthkrishna
Detailed Review: I'm very much immensed with service and the hygienic surroundings with affordable cost.i will again choose if I came to Mumbai  "A home away from home" It feels like a home with comfortability and the sophisticated furniture.good housekeeping and the maintenance is very impressed

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: fetishink
Detailed Review: Very good price. Very convenient location. The staff was excellent. Very helpful. They gave us the room hours before our check in when they saw that we were very tired. The hotel is very clean and the rooms too.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Pradeep B
Review: Comfortable and Nice Place, Definitely Value for Money
Detailed Review: I was very impressed by this hotel's location and service. I spent a night at this hotel on a trip to mumbai. Very close to CST, BCT and the Gateway of India. Very Affordable and bang in the middle of the city.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: windia29
Detailed Review: Stayed at hotel E for a couple nights in Mumbai. Were very accommodating of my late check in (midnight flight in). We were welcomed with a bottle of water (rare for budget hotels) and the rooms were clean. The genuinely friendly staff is what made this place exceptional. Safe and welcoming

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sajisahadevan
Review: nice hotel and very helpful staffs
Detailed Review: its an excellent hotel for a reasonable price.should mention about the bathrooms,though small they are clean and well furnished.markets and railway stations are very close by.very helpful staffs,special thanks to Mr.hemond,who is very courteous and nice.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kkssss
Review: One of the best mid range hotel near CST
Detailed Review: I with a couple of friends had booked 2 Suites in December 2014, to my surprise the rooms were amazing, clean and at a perfect location. We initially had booked one suite booked but Mr Hemand(the manager) helped us in getting 2 suites to suit our requirements. He was courteous and helpful. The only thing that can be improved in the hotel is the complimentary breakfast which is nothing but a cup of tea/coffee with few bread slices, I hope atleast a proper breakfast is provided. Otherwise an excellent hotel to stay with family or friends, will surely book again for another trip

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Arlene_n_Murray
Detailed Review: Upon arrival at this hotel we were dumbfounded. The entrance is much less than impressive. However we were soon to be very pleasantly surprised. The hotels actual is entrance is on the second floor. Once you go in the whole picture changes. The place is neat and clean and very update. The rooms while being a bit small, have all that you need and the bathrooms are first rate. The best part about this property is the staff. They were so accommodating. Just wonderful. The location is so handy and there are cabs and buses near the door.   They have a wonderful (and sooo cheap) room service and breakfast is included. If you give the place a try I think you ill be pleased that you did. Very good value.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mya2012
Detailed Review: A very comfortable hotel, 10 min away from the Indian Gate by taxi. The staff is very nice and they helped me a lot with useful information.
