The only problem for me (woman travelling alone) was the location, which was not so great. Normally I like walking but over there I travelled by taxi to/from the centre. The distance is not long and the price not expensive (around 50 rupees per way) so it was ok for a few days.  I recommend this hotel !

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: keikoy67
Review: It is a very good hotel‚ÄºÔ∏é
Detailed Review: I've two nights in Superior Room, clean Amenities also, shampoo and soap, was thrilled to have been prepared to toilet paper.  People of staff was also your very kind!  Free Wi-Fi it is was very happy to also was lodged in the room!  This is the hotel you want to use when it comes to the next Mumbai.  Thank you all;)

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajabosh
Detailed Review: I and my wife has a wonderful stay @ fortune hotel Mumbai.  Staff at the hotel was good and won't say "NO" for anything. Food was amazing especially "chicken Biryani". They surprised us by decorating our room with flowers and even taking care of our gadgets by giving us laptop cleaner. This touched our hearts. Thank you fortune for making our stay wonderful and memorable. We look for coming back again. My stay was very comfortable and i enjoyed every bit of it. The place is very well maintained, the staff is very skilled, courteous, friendly and well trained. The services are very good and the precision of the syncronocity in the working of various departments of the hotel amazed me. The staff makes sure that you enjoy your stay throughly and takes extra efforts to make each‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rudrasarkar
Detailed Review: The hotel is in very god shape with impeccable service.The breakfast are ok nothing to write back home about.Our room was a road facing apartment with good views .The facilities were good with good wifi.All rooms are very good .Nice bathroom and facilities and a very comfortable bed. checking is very quick and simple. we were accompanied to the room and the rather sophisticated systems explained. Really my suggestion is stay there for 2 or 3 days and also hire a driver and a guide for a couple of days to see the rest of the city of mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: simadey
Review: most popular and super luxurious hotel in mumbai
Detailed Review: hotel fortune  really a nice hotel in mumbai.i stayed here in the month of december. all the rooms are very clean well decorated and good furnished.hotel loction are exactly heart of the city.transportation facility are  available for 24hrs.hotel service are so super and very fast. house keeping staff 24 hrs at your door.they always provide u a very clean bed sheet pillow cover blanket and everything, they cleaned your room two or thrice time a day.and they also provide a complimentary breakfast which is very nice. hotel rates are also in your budget.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nw12866
Detailed Review: We booked this hotel as part of a tour. The rooms are tiny (I mean really, really tiny) but you can probably justify this due to it being located in Mumbai where space is at a premium.   However our first room the AC leaked everywhere I asked to get it fixed, they said it was, but when I came back in there was still a small lake on the floor so I nicked a towel from the corridor and cleaned it up myself.   Our tour guide then moved our room, the next room was worse. The sheets stank like a mix between good cheese and bad BO and the toilet absolutely stank. That caustic smell of ammonia that really gets in your nose, mouth, every orifice really. Unfortunately we didn't realise this until we were back late at night attempting to go to sleep.  There's no windows or ventilation so‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Madhu M
Detailed Review: I booked a room online. I got the confirmation from their IT Partner (EZEECLOUD). When I called the confirm to validate, the lady said "No." They are not accepting bookings done online.   Several calls with Hotel and EZEECLOUD drove me crazy.   My advice: don't trust online booking channel of this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ShailendraAwasthi
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for one night during my transit via Mumbai. Good hotel for the price considering the close vicinity to the Airport. Food was good.  Rooms were neat and clean with good lightnings and the TV channels were elaborate with excellent clarity. Staff was very polite and courteous.  Location is very good. It takes only INR 30-40  for an auto to the Andheri RS.  Overall it was a good experience and I would always stay in this hotel during my visits to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 586rajeshb
Detailed Review: Hotel is located bit inside of the main Sahar road and was difficult to locate. This is a very old hotel and the linens and gadgets will confirm this to you. This is a good hotel only for singles and short trip. The good part is decent service, courteous staff and the Restaurant. I will not recommend this for families. You are better off with newer ones with some recreational facilities for longer and family stay

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: spielen20xx-kau
Detailed Review: - Fair price - Hot shower was always available - Breakfast was simple but good - Building is a little bit old, but cleaned properly - Location is a little bit difficult to find - Airport transport complimentary

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanjivpullwan
Detailed Review: This was my first visit to india  mumbai And hotel le grande.It seemed that The room service staff, housekeeping,reception staff were wating for our call to help us.The food was nice.i came here from mauritius to visit to mumbai and goa but seeing the rush for goa i decided to stay back here in mumbai.when i left the hotel i found that i stayed here for 8 nights the days just finished early.My kids enjoyed the most .have taken back good memories of india mumbai and of hotel le grande.Would definately come back again

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Rohitsanjeevani
Detailed Review: I had booked this hotel through booking.com for 4 days after reading the reviews and found it much better.There was a personalize touch of the staff from the time we came till the time we left.Rooms were fine.The food was good.They had picked us up from international and dropped us to domestic.The only prpblem with this place was it is little bit in the interior .They had free WiFi service. They helped us tour mumbai.Overall would recommend this place to others.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kunkelm21
Detailed Review: very clean rooms, excellent and pleasant staff. great breakfast. can't beat the price. will definitely stay here again when I'm back in Bombay! the location is great. hot water at all times. they cleaned my room and delivered a paper each day. thank you le grande!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vickydhanuka25
Detailed Review: We stayed in this hotel for 3 days.the reception, housekeeping staff was helpful.the room was nice.the food was excellent.the buffet breakfast was nice.they have 24hrs room service.Overall has a very nice experience with them.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Malavshah1
Detailed Review: Stayed in this hotel for three days with family had a plea sent stay.the staff especially the manager was helpful.they had a decent breakfast and the food was good with free wifi and transfers.they have expansions in the future which the manager told me.will definitely come next time

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Leesona L
Detailed Review: I stayed there in Aug 2014, I was a solo woman traveler. The hotel gave us good rates and the staff is very courteous. This is also close to all amenities be it shopping , train station or Places to visit. I will recommend to all my friends who are traveling to Mumbai on work/leisure

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: archana v
Detailed Review: We were a group of 4 girls who stayed in this hotel during last week (27 nov 2014). We reached the hotel at around 7 in the morning and our booking was from 12 noon. The staff(aijaz,hemand and one more guy who was in night shift don't know his name, were so helpful and nice that they gave us the room before time.we were new to the place and aijaz helped us in planning our first day outing. Hotel is very clean,food is gud, staff is very helpful,location of the hotel is also very nice as there are so many places like gateway of india,Colaba,that are easily reachable from the hotel.if you are planning to stay here book deluxe rooms as their superior rooms are pretty small.I really appreciate the hotel staff for the services that they have provided to us.our return tickets was at‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nikunj17
Review: Decent clean nice place to stay
Detailed Review: We stayed 3 nights in this hotel  its beautiful place to stay neat clean . we were 7 people . it was 10 mins drive from gate way of India.  The staff was super super helpful, at our service at all times without being pushy or indelicate The rooms are small, but have a good shower and toilet and there is a tv   I think for Mumbai it was great. It was clean, it has a good location, and the WiFi was pretty good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tauseef15
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel at this price. Location is great as you find all the famous tourist attractions near by. Manager of this hotel is very decent.  ............................................................................

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gerbert Jan
Review: Decent, clean and well priced hotel.
Detailed Review: Hotel Elphinstone is very good priced hotel. The location is great, near the Victoria Terminus, and within 10 minutes by taxi you're in Colaba. This is where the Gate of India is. The staff is very friendly, and is always there to help you. The rooms are small, but have a good shower and toilet and there is a tv with some international stations. The only negative thing is, if you sleep at the back, you will have a lot of noise in the evening and from 7 am. Bring your earplugs and this will be no problem. For a couple of nights I definitely would recommend this hotel and I will be back in the future.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Neli K
Detailed Review: The Elphinstone is located near the main train station, and was a fairly straight shot from the airport - took about an hour in heavy traffic. The building is not impressive on the outside - quite the opposite, it's located on a very busy street, but once you make your way up to the second floor, you enter an air-conditioned, clean and welcoming. The staff was super super helpful, at our service at all times without being pushy or indelicate. They deliver super cheap super delicious food and beers from the restaurant downstairs. The only slightly weird thing is - our rooms had no windows :) which was just fine as we spent very little time in it. I highly recommend this as a cheap and pleasant hotel. A word to the wise - bring earplugs as it's on a busy street.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Emily S
Detailed Review: This place was pricier than we'd paid elsewhere in India, but I think for Mumbai it was great. It was clean, it has a good location, and the WiFi was pretty good. We especially liked the service - staff were very helpful and pleasant and went out of their way to help us. We also appreciated that room service prices for food were not inflated as they are at many hotels.   I would certainly recommend this hotel!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jeff W
Review: Excellent service and clean, but small, rooms. Recommended!
Detailed Review: I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights with 3 other friends. The staff were very courteous and attentive, and the facilities were clean. We slept in the normal double rooms, which are on the small side. However, since we didn't spend much time at the hotel it wasn't a problem. Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a affordable hotel near the main train station area.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Dawei13
Detailed Review: I had a meeting in Thane and due to traffic in Bombay the Fortune served the purpose of accommodations for 2 nights. The Fortune is one of 2 in Mumbai ( Bombay ) Thane is on the outskirts of the city center. The other is in Bombay city center. It is a comfortable  4 star. The food in the restaurant there in the hotel is mainly Indian but well prepared. It leans more to vegan which is Hindu style preparation. My room was on the 6th floor and didn't hear any of the street noises from the city. It is under 5,000inr / night including meals. Very clean with an adjacent pastry shop off the hotel lobby.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nandanpobaru
Detailed Review: It's was a superb stay at hotel le grande with family Breakfast was okay but overall services are very nice  It's like a business/family hotel  We r having kids with us but it's not at all problem with staff or management  Our free drop services are also give to the airport for our flight for Dubai!!! It's a superb experience

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: neilbala
Review: A nice and relatively cheap place to stay near to airport...
Detailed Review: I and my family were to catch an international flight from Mumbai.I was looking out for options which were budget friendly,free breakfast and transfers to airport.Le Grande fitted well.I was given the room where there was a lot of noise coming due to next door construction.I made the request and my room was changed.  The rooms were clean but the lobby smelled of cigrattes odour.Made the request to housekeeping and they sprayed the freshner which solved the problem.  The room service was also very prompt.Would recommend it for any traveller for transfer to the airports.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anna V
Detailed Review: I stayed in this place only for one night. However it was super comfy, the room was very clean and perfect size for me with a comfy double bed. Dinner that I order was delicious and the portion was really big for a reasonable price. Furthermore I have left my phone in the bed and the hotel reception called me when I was already at the airport but they still manage to come really fast to the airport and through the airline service deliver the phone to me! That was amazing customer service and this is also why if I am ever staying in this Mumbai again it will be in this hotel!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: S G
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Le Grande for 3 days in the last week of November. I would never recommend this place to any family. They were supposed to pick us up at the Mumbai international airport, but  were 45 minutes late. The hotel is poorly run by Mr. Pillai. The rooms are very small not at all convenient for families. There are also rodents and cockroaches. They even lost one of our garments which we had asked to be laundered and never apologized or compensated for the loss. Tons of street dogs will keep you awake at night. The only good thing about this hotel is the restaurant.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Daniel P
Review: it was very clean and we had a nice view.
Detailed Review: it was very clean and we had a nice view. the people are nice and the food was very good. i would visit this place again. we became good informations about the possible activities around here.it was very clean and we had a nice view. the people are nice and the food was very good. i would visit this place again. we became good informations about the possible activities around here. it was very clean and we had a nice view. the people are nice and the food was very good. i would visit this place again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jack J
Review: One of the best hotel who is looking for a pleasent stay
Detailed Review: I had a stay in this Last week for 4 days. Initially while booking it didn't gave a great impression in the photos. But i enjoyed the stay. It's very close to reach any place in Andheri East. Room Service is always with a warm smile. Prefect cleaning is happening. Food taste is very good in the restaurant even though it's small, the food variety and the taste has made me to love it.  Good Hotel to stay with family and for business trip.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: joanchuen
Review: Clean nice decent and friendly place. Most importantly they all speak pretty good English as well.
Detailed Review: Basic, clean, nice, friendly and helpful people here.  Food is decent and has quite a fair bit of variety and super amazing thirst quenching watermelon juice is served daily during breakfast! But don't forget to bring your adaptor for the power plug coz they don't have it there :)

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vinoth K
Detailed Review: I have stayed in this hotel for a single night. Its really a good stay. All are good expect the rate. Since for executive single persons charges Rs.3500. rooms are not  worth for that. apart from that .... every things fine about the hotel

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vishalbhatnagar2601
Detailed Review: I have started coming to this hotel regularly now.They provide free transport to airports to an from.I always call them up and do my booking.They have a decent breakfast.Hotel is safe and have nice service.The rates are reasonable as compared to other hotels.The staff is helpful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SAB_ED
Detailed Review: We booked this hotel as its nearby the airport and they are offering free airport pickup. When we arrived at the airport,they were already waiting for as with a\c car. The receptionist allowed us to have early check in,for absolutely free of charge. The room is basic but clean'unfortunately without fridge. Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is very good, you can also find many local shops and restaurants just few min walk, one disadvantage is that you can't get beer in hotel or they bring you with unacceptable price. Generally, can't complain for this price,especially in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shiaaaa
Detailed Review: This hotel for me and my family is nice and peaceful. The room is very clean and good services are available. The important things are the people very kind and hospitality are excellent. I like the food especial breakfast and sea food. There is one local market near this hotel and everythings are available.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: MDill D
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Mumbai BaWa Regency in October 2013 (not in 2014) and have meant to post this review ever since. I was a solo female traveler. The fact that 2 years later I still remember the kindness of the staff and the attention they gave during my stay should speak volumes. An example...It was Diwali when I was there which means a lot of firecrackers and celebration in the nighttime. At ten o'clock, the front desk called my room to make sure I was doing okay. My room happened to have been on the ground floor. They served breakfast in the room. I enjoyed the cheese omelet. There are few amenities but this is a budget hotel. It was clean and comfortable and in an excellent location. I needed to go to Matunga, the locality in the heart of Mumbai City toward downtown Mumbai. It‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Traveelate
Detailed Review: Stayed for 2 nights in october. Initially had planned to stay for 3 nights but packed my bags after the second night. Rooms are ok but very basic and i had to deal with mosquitoes for 2 nights. As far as service goes...dont go expecting the world and you will not be bothered. Overall the hotel has a very depressing air.  To be avoided

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sundar
Review: They took great care of my father
Detailed Review: While I have personally never visited Bawa, I recently made arrangements for my father (a senior citizen) to stay at the regency, Dadar for some personal engagement that he was down in Mumbai for. Right through the reservation process to assisting with special requests to ensuring that my father was picked up from the station at an odd hour, the hotel staff was very responsive. The rooms I understand were simple and could have been better given Bawa standards, but the service and approach of the staff made up for it. The only small complaint I have is on the fact that while I wanted to pay for this trip, the communication from the hotel was confusing owing to which my father had to settle the bill while checking out. So that is something, you guys could definitely look at‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DaveTNZ
Review: Decent stay, great price, good location
Detailed Review: A good deal for the budget-conscious/no frills traveller, but would not satisfy foreign travellers with higher expectations. Location was good, short taxi ride to the Victoria Terminus/CST and to Colaba with its many famous attractions (Gateway to India, Taj Hotel, Marine Drive etc). The room itself was pretty small (and no windows) but reasonably clean. One tip: avoid if you can being placed in rooms 1-3, as they are located directly in front of the reception desk, which makes for an rather uncomfortable setup (ie no privacy) and are subject to a lot of noise/music from the bar directly downstairs until around 1am on the nights I stayed. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Also: be prepared that no taxi drivers I met knew of the hotel, so you'll end up having to direct them‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RoDeLucca
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel with my sister for 2 days in october. The hotel is very clean, the shower nd the bathroom are very good, and the staff is quite helpful. Then we went to other cities, and when we returned to Mumbai we stayed there one more night, and the staff remembered us and treated us quite well, as usual. They have a simple breakfast, and we made a sugestion for them, to offer a more complete breajkfast, so they would offer a quite nice stay to the guests. This is a budget hotel, but the rooms are very clean, even if they are a bit small. I recomend this hotel to medium/low budget travallers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sebastian S
Review: Nonindian standard hotel for indian price
Detailed Review: We were not only in Mumbai, but also in Delhi, Varanasi and Goa, and It was the best hotel that we slept in. The only disatvantage is that the all taxis driver couldn't find it so please remind to print the color map of the area! Very helpful stuff! Greetings from Poland :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: niceguyvenki
Detailed Review: This is my 1st visit to Mumbai with my family. I searched and found Elphinstone through one of the site. This hotel is very close to CST railway station and close to places like Gate way of India, Nariman point etc.,. We have stayed for 2 days and it's an awesome experience. We had a royal treatment from the time we stepped into the hotel. From the receptionist to the house keeping boy was always looking to serve you. We felt as if we are in 5 star hotel. The hotel manager Mr. Hemond was very nice, professional and helping. The room has all the facility and very neat. I would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Mumbai. It's a very decent and safe place to stay as a family within your budget.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: amd75
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 2 days and was welcomed warmly even though I arrived way before check in time. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout my stay in Mumbai.  It is very close to a side entrance of Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station so if you are leaving mumbai by train its perfect.  I'd recommend getting tickets the day before so you don't have to walk to the main entrance hall. I walked to some of the sights and got a taxi to others that were a bit further.  The rooms are clean and compact.  I'd recommend staying here if you are coming to mumbai.  And the breakfast omelette was really good!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Openyourflights
Detailed Review: Localisation is okay (5/10min walking from the train station) people are very nice, rooms are cleans, internet computer and wifi available, nice restaurant just ouside, somes guides ans books available in the corridor.  Maybe a little hard to find when you do not know the city.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ShannonSingh
Detailed Review: Firstly for mumbai it's a great value hotel, ¬£60 for 3 nights.  Our room was small but all you need is a comfortable bed, clean room, hot water, AC, fan, soap, towels and good water pressure, which the room had. It even had wifi in the rooms, strong enough to make calls.  It's a 20 to 25 min walk to CST or VT depending what you call the main station. Good restaurants below too.  Lastly the staff are excellent! Everyone was friendly, helpful and they let us leave luggage and freshen up before we left, long after check out time (which is noon)  Very good indeed!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manishjain11
Detailed Review: The hotel is very good. Room Service is too good. Nearest to Airport, and best thing is they have shuttle service to airport, bus stand and railway station also. Food is also good. For a business tour the hotel is the best. Complimentary breakfast and Wi-Fi is also available

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HenryWang52
Detailed Review: I am very thankful to the staff of le grande hotel for there excellent service  and very helpful service.I came from Philippines not aware about Mumbai .This was my first time in Mumbai and was guided by the manger to the places I had to visit .Services were good . This is a budget hotel and wont expect something extraordinary. A decent place to come with family. Will come back when I come back to mumbai,india.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: THAYALAN MUNSAM... M
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff.A very friendly and an extremely efficient operations manager. Place is very clean and food is excellent.Rooms are well serviced and extremely clean. My stay at this hotel was very pleasant due to the above. Thank you to both staff and management.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: haritem
Detailed Review: Here is clean and staff are all kind. Including wifi, balckfast, pick-up service. So nice! Nearby Mumbai international airport! If you need some information of India, they will be help you! Good for your trip!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anil30121994
Detailed Review: Excellent Rooms and Good Staff Behaviour , Near airport Pick up and Good iam deal with hotel booking clear trip Good rates totally Excellent not 3 star hotel , iam  rating this hotel 5 Star  , iam recommend all people's Good rates

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ParamitaDutta
Detailed Review: Very nice experience extremely helpful staff though all the market remain closed on Sunday they arranged a flask for my son many thanks to them just loved it food was also very good enjoyed the stay there

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: murugan14
Detailed Review: Had the excellant friendly aproch by the staf.. and its the budget oriented stay in mumbai.. with free cabs to airport. 24 hours secured wifi.. and neatly cleaned room., and pleasent stay with out knowing hini or marati..

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shaileshraghav
Detailed Review: M through make my trip staff was hepfull nd quick service.hotel has airport pick up  nd drop facility.I came to this hotel reading their reviews and found it much better at last good experience.overall had a good stay with Le grande

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: opotikigirl
Review: friendly, helpful staff made our stay pleasant
Detailed Review: we stayed 4 nights and found the hotel great for our requirements  the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful and solved several problems for us. rooms were comfortable and very clean, and the restaurant foowas great. excellent location close to the airport too.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SherylandMalcolm
Detailed Review: Had a nice stay for 4days while looking at NGO's and Daya Trust activities in Mumbai. Nice food, both Indian and European tastes catered for. Helpful staff and nice rooms with a/c. We recommend this place for nice in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ahan75
Review: The best budget hotel in Mumbai!
Detailed Review: This was my 1st visit, chose this hotel out of many due to proximity, when I got there the taxi driver told me it was a mistake taking this hotel as its rundown which was his view after looking at the building from the outside, believe me from the inside its a different story altogether! This hotel is just one floor in the building with rooms all round, the rooms are excellent with all necessities present, we had a very comfortable stay here. The other positive thing about this hotel is the staff, from the manager who is a gem of a person to the cook and the cleaners who are very polite & extremely helpful. I would recommend this hotel to everybody looking for a peaceful stay in Mumbai and would advise not to get dettered by the appearance outside but to step in & judge for‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Soham S
Review: A hotel with full of terrible rules
Detailed Review: Our group had 2 guys and 1 girl and we booked Elphinstone for 2 nights. As soon as we reached reception, we were asked " what is your relationship with the lady". We informed that she is our friend and since we have 2 rooms, she will stay in one, while we 2 guys will stay in the other. Then came the bomb!!! The receptionist said that we cannot enter her room at any point and neither can she in ours!!! Not even for chatting. On asking why, the guy answered that this is by Law of Maharashtra (which prevents even entering rooms??? No idea!!!) and we are under electronic surveillance!!! They gave us 2 rooms which was DEAD IN FRONT OF RECEPTION!!!! I even told if we can leave the door open and chat (in case they want to see what exactly we will do inside) but the arrogant‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mac j
Review: Great hotel to stay in fort area highly recomended
Detailed Review: I like the cleanliness and excellent service provided by staff specially mr kushal singh and sunil in night shifts. They were very helpful in advising alot about mumbai   Kushal singh was very friendly and one thing is very good in the hotel all the housekeeping staff well dressed n helping they were all welcoming it was our second time in the hotel and planning next trip again in the same hotel ofcourse

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SanjeevNirwani
Detailed Review: Renovation work was on when I checked in. Room was very small but neat with maximum space utilisation.   Downs: Limited room service, they have only 1-2 persons for the room service, fetching most of the things from market on ground floor. They did not have even paper napkins. Too small a bathroom with no ventilation whatsoever.  Ups: Reasonably priced and good location.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Riyasarkar
Detailed Review: hotel fortune really abest budget hotel  in mumbai. all rooms are very nice and well decorated . service are too good. breakfast and food are very good. 24 hrs hot water and room service facility.bombay hospital and cst railway station just 2 mins walking distance.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Faisal0808
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for one night, as I was suppose to catch an International flight.  And this hotel is located very close to the international airport.  They have free wi fi and airport transfers. The service was up to the mark.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suraj R
Detailed Review: This was an average stay , with average facilities inside room and overall. The service was good. Main advantage is near to International Airport. The pickup and drop facility is also good.The location was not that good (not so clean), if you want to walk outside.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: PetroleumEngineer
Detailed Review: I had stayed here on a solo trip which required me to stay near Sahar International Airport (10 minutes distance).  My stay was pretty comfortable and hassle free (to-fro airport transfers complimentary). However domestic airport is at 20-30 minutes distance. They have well equipped taxi and car rental facility.  Overall location is centrally placed but surrounding area is not posh. There is no scenery nearby. Area is peaceful and can be reached round the clock. They have free Wi-Fi facility which I had not used. Staff is cooperative and friendly.  This is a budget hotel with facility of food and breakfast. Rooms are relatively small approximately 10'x12' with in-room Air-conditioners, TV, Tea maker and enough cupboards. The linen was clean and beds were comfortable. Practically‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: premkumar p
Detailed Review: I was in Bawa Regency Dadar, for a night's stay, after visiting Lalbaugcha Raja. This hotel's USP stays it's location. Located just behind the popular Chitra Cinemas, it is not difficult to reach this place. I had booked the executive room, but to my pleasant surprise the manager upgraded it to a deluxe room, and yes, with no extra charges. The room was spacious enough, rather more than spacious, cooling was good, all the electric points working, all other things were also in place. However, one flaw amongst all these perfection was the bathroom. It was decent enough for bathing, but for the toilet; I felt the closet was cramped into a very small area. A person hefty enough might find it a task to fit into the space. This could be different in other rooms. We stayed at a ground‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: prasad_deka
Review: Bawa regency not worth to stay in 2000 or 3000
Detailed Review: I booked bawa regency for 10am to 6pm. I was in executive room  I heared bawa hotels r nice. Nut when I got my room it was shocking for me the toilet was looks like lodge so old wash basin was also. Full bathroom r not feeling use only. I saw tv which was year 2000 tv remote r fixed by cello tape that was so worst to stay n use the service n stuff in 2000 to 3000.  U can see jhumar on ceiling it's installed with 40wat Philips bulb which is cost 10 to 15 rupees. That jhumar is abt 100 to 200 rupees. Was not suiting thr. Aircondition was not cooling bt blowing only air that ac also baba azam ka jamane ka tha. I left room after 10 min. Coz very suffocating me no fresh air total block room. Staff r good. U can go anywhere else to stay without experiencing bawa regency I wil Feel‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: himanshu v
Review: "Good option if you want to stay close to a railway station in central Mumbai"
Detailed Review: I stayed with my wife in a super deluxe room. The room was spacious but lacked sunlight and fresh air. As it was raining in Mumbai, the carpet felt a bit swamp. Although the room did not have a fresh ambiance, it was clean. The toilet was also clean but too small for a super deluxe room. The staff were polite and helpful, full marks there. Also the food we ordered was tasty, if not seemed to be pricey (if you can understand, it was 'dhaba' type tasty rather than a hotel type). Dadar railway station is 7 mins walking. So all in all a nice option to stay if you have to spend a night or two and you are out of the hotel in most of the day time. Also, if you have no such requirement of staying near a railway station, do check other hotels in Andheri/Juhu/Santa Cruze, you can find‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anandita B
Detailed Review: Hotel Elphinstone Annexe is a steal when it comes to a decent and comfortable stay in Bombay. In a city which is known for it's sky high accommodation charges (for even 3-4 star places), it was sheer luck to come across this hotel. It's location is perfect - not too far from any of your star attractions in South Bombay. On reaching the hotel, it's facade might just depress you a little because it is built in a very old building, but once you are inside it gives you in an old world charm whilst giving you modern facilities. The rooms, more importantly the bathrooms, were very clean. The staff was helpful and friendly. I honestly can't comment on the food since we stepped out for all our meals ...and since my friend I were travelling on a budget, we were very happy that the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Volkan D
Review: One of the best in Mumbai
Detailed Review: I'm verry hapy to stay at Elphinstone. Nice location, helpful staff, clean rooms. One of the best hotel of that area. Could be a bit cheaper but i look forward for my next stay there.  Best wishes from Istanbul

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: FrancescoB
Detailed Review: Good ‚Ä¢ the staff was really helpful in all situation ‚Ä¢ the room was clean with all confort ‚Ä¢ in 15 minutes by walk you can arrive in the principal train station and in the center ‚Ä¢ all is new inside, but the building outside is ugly ‚Ä¢ if you are waiting for something, you can go on the table in the back side, it's more comfortable and quiet ‚Ä¢ not all rooms have window

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Harish   K
Review: Aweful place to stay..not recomended at all.
Detailed Review: Well..it was a worst experience staying in this hotel..we had a booking through Agoda which says it was a 40% price off deal..however we booked 2 superior rooms almost a month ago..but the moment we land there found the prices were same in their rate card..they just fool People that it was a great deal..however when we reached Hotel we got a shock from the reception staff that we dont have any booking..after we showed them confirmation email of booking with 100% amount paid..they shifted us to one tiny Room saying that our rooms were given to someone despite having a booking with full payment in advance..we manage in that one room for 3 Days and struggle a lot.. Our bedsheets werent changed during 3 Days stay Bathroom mat Was dirty like hell No sincereity in counter staff‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: subirchaki
Detailed Review: hi i stayed this hotel for three days. i like this hotel because this hotel as like my house. all service of this hotel are very nice. rooms are very cleaned and room service is very good 24 hrs at your doors. complimentary breakfast is well balanced and nice menu system.i recomened to all this hotel for nice stay in mumbai

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: arbs84
Detailed Review: Stayed at le grande for one night, trust me the service is exceptionally good and the services offered along the price tag per night is really reasonable, which includes free wifi, buffet break fast and pick and drop transfer to airport. Rooms cosy clean and perfect. Definitely recommended place to stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kalaimagalkalianan
Detailed Review: Feel at home.everybody freindly expecialy the manager very good man.the food was good.this hotel location nearby to shopping complex and nearby to the airport.facilities was very good.overall we was happy.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Maridiraju
Detailed Review: After my stay in Legrande i can surely say one thing. best value for my Money. Excellent receiving , nice staff, good food, good receiving. For a business trip i stayed in legrande. i found this hotel from trip advisor and book hotel by phone. got corporate discount. even if my flight was landed half an hour before the guy from hotel is waiting for me with my name card, later by hotel own cab went to the hotel, cab is absolutely free for pick up and dropping to Airport. Hotel location is not good, but it is not concernable. After quick check in got waiter took me to the room. room is very neat and clean. provided with fridge, double cot bed, refreshments like tea and cofee(need to make), tv etc.. food quality also very good. Provided with a four hour wifi at free cost. after few‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Nidhi D
Detailed Review: Hi.. Had an overnite stay at this place and found it to be a clean and nice hotel Comfortable stay and also when we requested for a queen size bed instead of a double bed as we were traveling with a kid, staff was very courteous to accomodate the same. Good food at reasonable price..Overall a good place to stay. Only problem we faced was at the time of check in since they demanded for the address proof for both husband and wife. We had our identity proof which is very much acceptable at any other hotel..Even as per the booking confirmation voucher, it was nowhere mentioned to carry an address proof along..By grace of God or shall say by mistake I had my passport with me and that saved the purpose...

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vichu00
Review: It was very pleasant and clean stay over here.
Detailed Review: The service was really awsome. From the day 1 I really enjoyed the stay in this hotel. food and all the other facilities are provided by them . overall I jus gif 5 star for this hotel in mumbai. as far as price ways also I found much cheaper than other 3 star hotel. I suggest evryone to just visit here .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HTprakash
Review: Stay was  very nice. And service was very good
Detailed Review: Stay was nice .came with family.and it wasi very near to internationak air report.food also tasty and we stayed comfortably.  I came with  my son who was flghed to usa for doing ms. He also liked this hotel and enjoyed stay with us.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Seawind12
Review: Difficult to write positives about this hotel
Detailed Review: Well there is nothing much positive that i have to write about this hotel. Though this hotel projects itself as 3 star, I won't give more than 2 stars at most. First of all location is very inside and it is very difficult to locate if you are coming by Taxi/ Auto. Secondly I booked a double room but the size of the room was very small. I wonder what would be the size of a single room if double room is so small. There was dampness in the wall in the room, which was a negative point.They have rooms having individual split air conditioners instead of centralized. The room ac of mine was so noisy that i had to close the ac to sleep at night. Outside the room in the floor passage they have a fixed line phone which is connected to reception. It rang so many times during day/night that‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bsumangal
Detailed Review: Received promptly at midnight at Sahar Airport. Very convenient location Hotel but in a cluttered up locality. Rooms are too small & congested. Food not good. Wi-Fi in room slow & limited. Service Good & Prompt. Okay for overnight air travel

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jenny L
Detailed Review: Good hotel near the airport with clean and comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff. Complimentary Pick up & Drop off service was great. Restaurant was small but good food and 24hour room service which was great.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manish_vw
Detailed Review: NIce & clean ,very near to all ammenities,shopping ,crawford ,manish market ,CST station  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! affordable very neat, walking distance to CST & Majid station just good for bussiness people!!!!!!!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jacob W
Detailed Review: Elphinstone was the best hotel we stayed at during our 5 weeks in India. Clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff, decent price. I think the room we stayed in was called a deluxe. It was rather small, but we didn't really mind. AC worked really well. I think the hot water geyser worked, but we never actually used it. Beds were clean and comfortable. Staff was possibly the best part. From teaching how to use the water filter in the kitchen to helping us order delivery at midnight, they were extremely accomodating. While the location is not perfect, it is also not bad being very close to CST. Wifi was slightly better than at most places we've stayed but still not great. Connection is spotty and makes using the internet frustrating.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lars C
Detailed Review: We stayed here for only 1 day and a half but it was really nice. The location (at 100m from the CST) is ideal. Although the neighbourhood makes you expect otherwise, this hotel is very very clean. It is comparable with a good european hotel. The rooms and bathrooms are very modern. The staff is very helpful, they even went out in the rain to get food for us. For this price an excellent option

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sarah D
Detailed Review: We booked only our first night in Mumbai here and we're absolutely gutted when they were fully booked for the rest of our stay. Although a little hard to find by taxi from the airport (it's not really in Colaba) we were really impressed with the hotel. The staff were friendly on arrival and the room was clean and comfortable with everything required. The staff even helped us order pizza when we were feeling too lazy to go out. The one downside would be the location, it's a good 20/30 min walk from the gateway to india and most of the hussle bussle of the tourist central colaba. The walk was also not too pleasant. But taxis are pretty cheap (as long as you get them on the metre). Otherwise a great hotel in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tarek Shalaby
Detailed Review: After booking I called them up to confirm that we would arrive at 6am (so we actually booked the entire day before just to be safe [and fair]). They said "no problem, when you arrive, your room will be ready and you can choose your favorite from the ones available".  We got there on time (straight from the airport), and they told us there were no rooms available! In fact, they had us wait for over an hour and then said that they couldn't empty a room for us! They were clueless and had the booking on file but said they couldn't provide us with a room, and thay we had to wait till 10:30am to get into one!  They then sent us to a sister hotel in an even worse location where we had to stay. Keep away from this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sherlyndsouza99
Detailed Review: Over all I had a good and positive experience during my stay...  A wonderful and flawless place to stay. Hotel was v clean and the rooms, excellent. Its a place i would recommend my friends and family. The staff were great, the hotel rooms were marvelous. Simply amazing. An amazing stay. Most of all, the staff always ready to help, always there for you. The rooms were impeccably clean and organized. The Ambiance is simply simply amazing. I totally recommend this hotel to everyone...

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: saumyasinha_33
Detailed Review: We went there withone of my friend before she took flight for US, food was really good , service very quick, good ambience and dining hall is very classy and creative, would love to go there again and again

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Manish K
Review: Worst hotel I have ever booked online...
Detailed Review: Firstly the rooms are too tiny than they appear on the online booking sites. It's not a hotel, it's kind of lodge. They don't have much space, and tried to accommodate as many rooms as they can in such a small space. Bedroom will appear you as clean once you will see, but as you will go close you will find the real picture of the hotel. Bathroom is so small with all the dirt. Towels, bedsheets are not clean. And worst experience finding a cokroach on your bed. I have  taken pictures also as a proof. My suggestion don't ever book room in this so called hotel. Not worth of rs 3000.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vishmon
Detailed Review: I stayed for couple of times last month in Hotel Le Grande, Mumbai. Here are my experiences:  The Good:  - Location: Convenient to Domestic airport at just 10~15 minutes drive and if you have business in and around Andheri. - Airport pickup and drop: This is a big plus. Nice Nissan Evalias that pick you up any time of the day from the airport and drops you back. This is part of the package and that means you don't need to worry about standing in a queue for taxi etc - Fantastic rooms: This was really the surprise part. When you enter the hotel you get the feeling of entering a building which has seen better times. But the moment you enter the room you get the pleasant surprise. Rooms are modern, well done-up with all required amenities. The mattress quality is fantastic. You can‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kulbahar
Detailed Review: good hotel, good rooms, cost vise low,they also provide me pick up drop from airport. Overall good experience.. I was on business trip, my taxi driver suggest me about this hotel. It is really good, It has also good view, Good sta

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: aaron-gnanam
Review: This is not a Hotel, it is a Dirty Lodge
Detailed Review: It is a lodge fabricated to look like a Hotel. The rooms are very small (like 6x8). It may look clean, but if you look closely, the rooms are really dirty. You will find dirt in every nook and corner of the room. The rooms are not cleaned thoroughly by the staff, bed linins are dirty (may be already used as well) and there are lot of bugs in the bed (we killed 4 bugs-horrible). The bathrooms are the smallest that I've ever seen in my life, it's about 2.5 feet in breadth and one could hardly stand inside.  There is no ventilation whatsoever inside this place.  It's like staying inside a box.   Complementary breakfast was decent, there is no buffet, it's just one dish that you can order. (Puri Bajji or Toast with eggs) And when you check out they slap an additional Rs.600 for tax‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: torajiv
Detailed Review: Great pickup and drop off service. They managed to pick me up from railway station and drop off at the International Airport. Rooms are clean and comfortable. A no nonsense place to stay between your flights.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aditya Moitra
Detailed Review: I was on a official trip to Mumbai. The driver took me to this hotel. Hotel was really good and service and food was perfect. Rooms were very clean. Rates are reasonably priced. Would strongly recommend for corporate and leisure travelers.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Anni C
Detailed Review: After reading all the reviews we really expected more from this hotel - rooms are small with wet bathrooms. Aircon did not work properly. The rate is good and located near airport but exterior of hotel especially needs some attention. Don't think we would go there again.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: BhupenderK
Review: Its value for money, near airport and on expressway
Detailed Review: good for one night stay, airport is just outside the hotel and location is right on the main express highway. my room was upgraded so really thank the hotel staff and ungraded room was really nicely done. bathroom was neat and clean and sleep quality was really wonderfull given its location near the airport. absolutely no jet engine sound heard inside the hotel. breakfast was ok types. I think its a good hotel for a night stay and strictly for business travellers. The hotel also gives a free wifi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mendapara
Review: Best hotel location and helpful staff
Detailed Review: Centrally Located. Helpful Staff. t was nice. The hotel provided Breakfast even not in the voucher. It is centrally located. The only problem is the lift. This hotel not have lift so big baggage is hard to take to the hotel. The employees are interested in helping the guests but they need more professional training while providing room services.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SherNhix84
Review: The bed bug that really bugging me
Detailed Review: This hotel is okey, rubbish at outside but okey at inside. The staf also very helping n polite n nice. Just onething tht need improvement is the room and furniture inside. Need to change or clean troughly coz many bed bugs, i've got bitten in some area. Afterall is average...

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Akkemay L
Review: Nice hotel, good location, good price/quality
Detailed Review: This hotel has a very nice location, with a cab it's about 5 minutes to horniman circle and from there you can take a very beautiful walk from Fort into Colaba (recommended!). The hotel has the best beds and a nice shower (with warm water if you put the geyser on). It is quite noisy, as many reviews say, but if you just sleep with ear foam it is totally fine. The internet works allright in the hallway, but in the room not always. The staff is very, very friendly and helpful. I would recommend you staying here, especially because the price is very good for what you get.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: laj_graffiti_dream
Detailed Review: Nice clean and comfortable facilities. Very near CST but on a busy noisy junction and need to taxi to attractions-taxis should be metered and therefore affordable though. Not particularly cheap if on a budget but cheap for Bombay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: moumitaghosh
Detailed Review: i booked this hotel by phone. when i reached there they upgrage us in a superiour room.that room was so spacious clean A2Z.me and my family was very happy for this.we returned with a big smile.house keeping staff was very alert on your door for 24 hrs. breakfast in the morning is so amazing.very nice menu system.The front desk staff was so kind polite and very helpful.They were arrange a tour package for us mumbai darshan that was so beautiful.They provide laundry service.24hrs cab facility.The location of this hotel exactly heart of the city.room service house keeping and restraurant staff are so efficient tallented and so polite. we got real hospitality service from hotel fortune.I strongly recommened this hotel to all who want to come in mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: sayansarkar
Review: very nice stay in mumbai in HOTELFORTUNE
Detailed Review: I spend some nights in mumbai in fortune hotel. Really this hotel is very perfect for family. All rooms are very cleaned,well maintained, good furnished,and well decorated.Main railway station mumbai cst and churchgate station is very near from this hotel. Airport also not so far. This hotel service is very nice to top to bottom. Theyprovide complimentary breakfast in morning its very nice.I recomened this hotel to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: abirroy
Detailed Review: hotelfortune really a good family hotel in mumbai. beautiful room and restraurant food.everything is very clean, shopping malls and marine drive are very close from here. mumbai main railway station is just 5 minutes walking distance fromhere.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ryno v
Detailed Review: We are South African, and stayed at this hotel on two occasions during our trip to India. The first night after we arrived in Mumbai before catching a flight to Goa, and the night before we left India from Mumbai. The best feature of this hotel is it's proximity to both the International and Domestic airports, and the free airport transfer service. The outside of the hotel gave us a shock, as it looks very dilapidated and old. inside it's much better. I would suggest that they paint the outside. Rooms are very small and very basic. Don't expect anything luxurious. Our room (210) had a very noisy air con (a/c) - but at least it worked.  Bathrooms are extremely small and relatively clean - more attention could be given to removal of mildew and cleaning of drains. Beds are very‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ganesh V
Detailed Review: Was looking for a hotel that is close to the airports as we were staying there for transit.  good location good service like airport pick up and drop. room was neat and clean. Good value for money. ----

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanjay B
Detailed Review: Hotel is well maintained and good value for money. Service is prompt and staff is courteous.  Wifi Internet speed was good. Restaurant area is congested a but breakfast was generally good. Location is average but its decent.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Yomasz
Detailed Review: Very clean hotel , with very helpfull service desk. Good food , very helpfull manager advicing trips in Mumbai and around area. I recommend this hotel for this price and services provided. i have enjoyed my stay there .. :)

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: nigelsdsilva
Detailed Review: stayed with my wife and 2 year old daughter for six day in April.'14. Staff were very friendly an helpful. Food was good. my main concern were the toilet, which were clean. Yes we would definitely stay there again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venkatesh N
Detailed Review: Hotel Fortune, Mumbai is one of the Finest hotel in Mumbai.Very good location near Domestic Airport & heart of the city. Hotel service is too good.All rooms are very clean. Restaurant caters all type of recipes.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AjitSarkar
Detailed Review: Hotel fortune is really nice hotel in Mumbai.Very good location near CST railway station. Exactly this hotel is heart of the city of Mumbai.Hotel service is too good.All rooms are very clean.Room service are very good.24hers phone and travel service.irecommened this hotel to all.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rahulb88
Detailed Review: Stayed for 1 night only in Le Grande. They had assured pickup from Airport and did so even when it was raining cats and dogs in Mumbai and streets were waterlogged. Stay was comfortable. Food is below average. I remember buffet breakfast was complimentary, but very limited spread.  Bad thing is the hotel is located in a dirty place with narrow lanes and all. Plus it is difficult to get a vehicle from outside the hotel during peak office hours. Though there are windows in the rooms (i had one in mine), there is nothing much to see except for congested byelanes. Pros - Cost factor in Andheri Cons - Location, Food

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: BNM81
Detailed Review: I stayed for 5 nights at this hotel and staff was so helpful and service was good but no options for good food around. Location is bad as it is little inside and bit tough to get easily. Airport Trasfers are free that's good.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Trancy C
Review: Excellent stay for Business and travelling
Detailed Review: It is nice hotel close to airport with confortablity and hostapolity.It is wise choice to stay this hotel when you visit Mumbai, especially for stranger. The people from hotel can give you some good advise. Surely, if said something bad, a little noisy.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ajacobs1994
Detailed Review: For mumbai, the price is good for what you get, clean room, comfortable bed, nice bathroom and great staff - complimentary breakfast was great, lots of good food! Letting us store our bags until this evening, when we will get a free airport transfer

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: namkosh
Detailed Review: My first stay here was for 3 nights in April 2014. Experience was very pleasant. It's a functional hotel with quality service. As a business traveller, found the place very clean, people are polite, good room furnishings. Working air conditioner but can be a little noisy. Complimentary breakfast is available, but it's just right and not too elaborate. Room was small with little space to move around, but not an inconvenience. Very reasonable corporate packages. Recommend this place for hassle-free business travel in Mumbai, especially for a rough-it-out place like andheri east.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: amarguptaskc
Detailed Review: The room was clean and neat.Not a very posh hotel.Was a very budgeted hotel .The staff was helpful.good for transit passengers.The resturant was nice.They guided us well.Would reccommed this hotel to others.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ekta14
Detailed Review: Very good service beyond my expectation I wish to go back to the hotel soon I assure that in this tarrif we will not get such a good room as well as service. Superb service superb cleanliness superb cooperation awsm experience

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Deepak S
Detailed Review: Value for money!! Neat clean......  good for short stay... Near to airport.... Rooms are  well kept and clean.... Advised to all all who wanna stay in budget hotel........................... 15 min to airport

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Balasingham M
Detailed Review: All the facilities are very good and the services have impressed me which are given by the hotel management. Hotel food also very good. If any chance to come again I'll choose this location for my whole day accommodation.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lomasdevsingh
Detailed Review: The Hotel staff is really nice and understanding. The rooms are nice and clean. Some executive rooms are big while some are small. It is difficult to accommodate the extra bed. But overall stay experience is wonderful. The restaurant at ground floor is also good and serve great food. The hotel is very near to airport. One can see the flights landing from the windows. Would visit again in near future.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jatindra K
Detailed Review: Very convenient for airport. There are stores nearby. Extremely friendly staff. Great value for money. We will come back and we strongly recommend this hotel. We have found the pickup and dropoff service very prompt and useful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Doms123
Detailed Review: A perfect stay for anyone new to mumbai. The staffs are wellmannered, rooms are neat and tidy. Food is  availiable downstairs with their multicusine restaurant,also you have choices outside. The airport transfers is another attaraction which is well organised. Even though its location is off the highway,its a very safe place. Complementary breakfast and free wifi are added advantages. Agood place to stay for any purpose.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ashutoshsinha1
Review: nice and excellent place to stay with family
Detailed Review: I stayed here about 9 days, i had very good experience here, all staff are very helpful and cooperative. room service excellent,housekeeping very good,near to airport,pickup & drop complimentary,WiFi facility available, its free I enjoyed a lot , i recommend this hotel for a pleasant stay in mumbai.  i

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jon H
Detailed Review: On a research trip in Mumbai for 4 weeks with my friend, 3 of which were spent in the elphinstone. From the outside it would be easy to judge this hotel alongside other budget Mumbai hotels however once you step foot inside, you'll soon see it's a lot more than that! We stayed in the double deluxe room which was fantastic (spacious and comfortable), air conditioning and ceiling fan was an absolute life saver! Although the room was of such a high quality for such a low price, the best thing about this hotel was the staff. They couldn't do enough to help you, particularly the manager (who joined in some of my Skype conversations back home which was a particular highlight!) was friendly and professional throughout our stay, as well as the chef and all of the other hotel workers who‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Zozo
Detailed Review: I could possibly return to this hotel for another stay. Standard rooms don't have any window, are very small and can smell the cold tobacco. Some deluxe have windows on the street... but then the noise from the outside will make the night uncertain unless you are completely deaf. Appart from that, there is no bad surprises. The staff is very friendly and apparently the price is not so high for Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Christie P
Detailed Review: We had to change rooms three times! First very noisy until 1am due to restaurant below playing music every night (we booked for 6 nights), staff very helpful when we asked to move, but put us in a smelly smoking room with noise from outside traffic very constant, moved again third room had a mouldy ceiling by bathroom  and bathroom ceiling was not covered so all pipes and wires could be seen hanging. Maybe this room has been fixed now! Beds very comfortable and apart from the mould was very clean, good location to Colaba and Crawford Markets. Limited breakfast menu but masala omelette great and chef very helpful. Staff all very friendly and obliging. Bit expensive.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Eax T
Detailed Review: If you are looking for cheap hotel in South Mumbai I would recommend this place. Nice and helpful staff especially Mr.Khushal Singh, clean room but just too noisy from the honking sound 8 O'clock is the wake up time. Nice restaurant call Keisar e Hindi just down stair, they served really nice food.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Wanderlustful18
Detailed Review: Elphinstone is a great value for the money (tip: book directly via phone, do not book via internet or you will pay much more).  The rooms were clean (really clean for India), had air con, TONS of TV channels and the staff was friendly.  There is hot water and the power never goes out.  We felt safe here and felt we could trust the staff.  Some things to note:  -  they do 24-hour check in but that means that if you show up at 4am, you have to be out by 4am the next morning and you'll be charged for an extra night.  - We paid for a "deluxe" room, which was much larger than their "superior" rooms but were given a superior room (because the only deluxe room they had was leaking and smelled like mold) and told they are the same price.  - try to get a room around the corner/not along‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LindaTadir
Detailed Review: we wanted to stay at this hotel based on location and trip advisor reviews I wrote several emails to the hotel to reserve places No replies I called a number of times-at coherent times of day but none of the folks that answered the phone spoke English Finally, I had an Indian friend call on my behalf The hotel said that they would check availability and call back in a few minutes After an hour we called again This time they told me Indian friend that they will not take reservations -only easy to reserve is thru online booking company My friend, as a hotel owner himself was very surprised by the attitude and explained that direct booking would save them commission fees Buy they were adamant and would not even say if there was availability Needless to say we chose another location‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 725FraGol
Detailed Review: I have stayed in this hotel for 6 nights. Very good price for an hotel in Central Mumbai. This hotel is near the 2 biggest train station of Mumbai, CST and Churchgate. Clean room and friendly staff. I recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankityadav
Detailed Review: I stayed in the Hotel for 4 days in March end and Beginning of April. The whole process right from the time you get picked up from the airport is smooth. Took me flat 2 minutes from the time I arrived at the reception to be on my way to room. Rooms are well appointed with adequate lighting and great cable service. Washrooms are neat and clean with personal water heater for a hot bath. The room size is enough to accomodate two people comfortably. Complimentary wifi is amazingly quick with down speeds hovering constantly around 800kbps mark. Breakfast served in the restaurant area has great selection of items with a revolving menu. The room service food is actually better than most restaurants in the area. Autos available round the clock from an auto stand about 50m away from the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: neerajua
Detailed Review: Well it was a happy and long stay for a month with all my colleges. As our day started early every one at the hotel was very helpful.when ever we needed any help,staff was was happy to help out.As every one was new to the city.Its a pleasure staying in le grande.Many colleges of mine has already planned their stay for future in le grande

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Joshuas1285
Detailed Review: Nice place to stay,Good housekeeping and Very tasty food ...Good and helpful staff and service at his best..very close to the airport ..easy to locate and easy to travel anywhere in the city from Hotel legrande.,The total stay was very comfortable and really enjoyed .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv

Detailed Review: Great place to stay when you visit Mumbai with a great hospitality services like restaurant, travel assistance, cleanliness, house keeping, guidance and much more,  It's even better convenient place for airport and as well as for other major area of Mumbai, easy to locate, easy to travel,

Detailed Review: Staff is very good ,food is good ,rooms are good,the  manager is a very nice person  We have enjoyed a lot in our stay .service is very good . The manager Mr. Sameer guided us good. We enjoyed a lot in imagica park in kapokli which was suggested by the travel desk .

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: benedict1
Detailed Review: I reached at hotel through a taxi driver from domestic airport due to missed of my flight , reached at hotel in a frustration but the way hotel people welcomed me and immediately provided a room and mentioned about facilities provided by them i.e net facility / pick and drop at airport / complementary break fast etc. and the same is provided by them in a good quality and on time. The staff here as very helpful.thanks to them

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bhoot_ramesh
Detailed Review: not up-to mark as shown on your website only location is good otherwise its a ordinary with very poor complimentary breakfast staff is comparatively helpful overall it is not worth as per the tariff .

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ssa1928
Review: located in a area not tourist friendly...
Detailed Review: Staff was friendly, adhered to most requests.   Had no dinning facility, breakfast offered in lobby/reception area.   Have to walk up 2 ++floors to reception area which is not well lit in early morning which was when I arrived.  I requested early check in but had to wait 2 hrs. before room became available.  If visiting Mumbai 1st time, search for other tourist friendly areas like Fort, and Colabra.  WiFi reception average to low quality.   Left a personal item in room when I called hotel to ask if it was returned to reception and they replied no.   Would not stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: zanea
Detailed Review: As you arrive on the front door step, you may worry, but once you're inside you'll be relieved to find this super clean, friendly and comfortable little gem. WiFi was good, there's a laptop you can use, towels and sheets were clean. Try and avoid the first couple of rooms on the right as the restaurant downstairs plays loud music till 1:30. As I said there is a restaurant downstairs (which I didn't try, I went to Zaffron which is across the road at 15 mins walk), which is good because The menu is really just tea, coffee, eggs and toast which is available from early till late. I didn't try the place downstairs, I mostly ate in town, and once went to Zaffron which was 15 mins down the road (over the bridge opposite the hotel, follow the main road etc). Location-wise:‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Honeybee2529
Detailed Review: Did not enjoy the experience of our 1 night stay here. The rooms were unbelievably tiny and made me feel claustrophobic, and i don't suffer from claustrophobia. The food wasn't great either, in the stuffy restaurant upstairs.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Huss786
Detailed Review: I stayed at the hotel for a week in February 2014 and have to say that the hotel is very reasonably priced and in a great location. The service is excellent with good attentive and hospitable staff. The rooms are very clean and very good in size for Mumbai. Definately recommend the hotel to all !

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: milindguitarist
Review: Hotel Fortune literally ruined my Fortune.
Detailed Review: Seeing the good reviews on almost all websites i was overwhelmed, but the reality was completely opposite. Before registering, i mentioned a condition, as my sole motive to visit Mumbai was a quick meeting with my business associates. I asked them if i‚Äôm allowed to call few people for a business meet to the room as i was leaving the very next day. I mentioned that i‚Äôm booking your hotel just because of this reason, and they agreed.  I was told clearly that there won‚Äôt be any problem and i can call my associates over for whatsoever reason. The original story starts when i visit the hotel, the staff was irritating and in-cooperative. They said straight no on the face without even thinking where my friends and associates would stay who traveled more than 40km just to meet me. It‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jure K
Review: Nice stay close to the apt
Detailed Review: Rooms are nice and spacious. The place is clean and staff is friendly. If you need assistance they are glad to provide it. Wi fi works good, 24-room service is fast. Restaurant has nice food. Nice for a short stay

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv

Detailed Review: Stayed in this hotel for one week found the hotel good.the staff and the manager at this hotel was nice they were very hepful.i came to this hotel in a auto the appereance of this hotel from out was ok but after staying in this hotel it seemed like a home away from home.they they have 24 hour room service and free wifi.the hotel is in bylane in little interior but my stay with them made me fine with it.i cannot expect everything from my budget.will b coming again in end of march

Detailed Review: room service pretty good breakfast. Delicious food quality n service in restaurant good  Hotel staff very co operative Good arrangement for pick up n drop from airport  Hotel surrounding is quite away from traffic noise n. looks quite safe

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mats √ñdman
Detailed Review: If you are looking for luxury Elphinstone Annex is not the Place for you. Elphinstone is a nice very Clean situated in a old house in the harbour district in South east Mumbai. I lived here for 18 nights. The staff was very nihe and helpfull. The room was Clean and nice an there was all i needed. There is no restaurant, but just down the stairs there is four restaurants in the same building who servesb nice indian food. The hotel served breakfast on the room.  She street outside can be a Little bit noicy with all the traffic, but it was quite in the night time. It is Walking distance to the big CST station, and just over the Carnac bridge there is all the shopping you want at the markets.  If i come back to Mumbai Elphinstone Annes will be my choice again.

Thanking you all...  Ana......
