Name: amitpatel5b
Detailed Review: hi friends. we stat for one day. they provide excellent servies to us we book 3 rooms. what ever we discuss with them they do same. it was very enjoyable and good stay. i recommended  to stay at there.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: souravdas1986
Detailed Review: It was a very nice experience and more importantly it was our first trip after marriage so a memorable one and the ambience n overall experience was a splendid one and nxt time wud definitely come back here for another trip

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: travelpimp
Detailed Review: I was there Jan 24-25 and knew about this hotel from another passengers at the airport. I called at around 1:30am and the hotel sent a shuttle to pick me up at the airport. The hotel is small intimate and unassuming, the staff was really nice and welcoming. When I checked in at night, the front desk staff took me to the room, which was small but has coffee machine, a fan, AC, everything you need for a short stay.  The bathroom is small - you need to turn on a switch to turn on the hot water. Breakfast was limited but tasty and they can make the eggs for you. The staff in the small restaurant was attentive. I came back for dinner and the soup was great. I had late flight so I dropped by bag at the front desk, went around the area, and went back to freshen up and catch the shuttle‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Niladri D
Detailed Review: We were out for an official tour to mumbai and found the hotel a good choice..Good spacious clean room with airport pick up and drop. Would definitely like to stay again in next trip. The complimentary wifi and breakfast was also a good add on. The location is very near to airport. So good choice for people travelling by airport.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Claudy D
Detailed Review: The hotel was neat and clean. Good Room Service. Average food. the rooms are small but for short trips its convenient for couples. WiFi as promised was not given and when requested they said its not available at night!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: AusGuy36
Detailed Review: Free pickup at the airport, free internet and a full complementary breakfast with Indian and western cuisine and clean rooms. What else would you need? Friendly, helpful staff. Hotel is in a quiet neighborhood Near the swank new international airport. A great value for your rupee.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: gauravseth12
Review: very good ambience n excellent orinted hotel
Detailed Review: they have good experience to attend the customers with the warn greetings excellent staff very helpfull ... food is also gud cleaneness is awsum .. you will get the pick n drop service as complementary ... perfect never wants to get any suggestions ..

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: LNPanda2014
Detailed Review: This is my second visit to this hotel. This hotel is very conveniently located for domestic and international transit. Very good arrangement for airport transfer. The staff of the hotel are very friendly and co-opeartive. The food is good. The rooms are well maintained and decent. Would love to come here again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ferdieranee
Detailed Review: landed at mumbai airport at around 8.30 pm, a hotel person alongwith the driver was there waiting for us and in minutes we reached the hotel where the manager and other staff welcome us. Hussel free check in procedure, the next minutes we are led to the room.The hotel room was ok for us with all the basic  amenities and above all clean. The rooms was small (we found out later though that this is not the room that our friend had booked for us) and later the hotel staff shifted us to a slightly bigger room. Room service was fast. Food was great - less spicy and cheap. Complimentary breakfast was superb with change menu everyday. The reason i am so obliged with the hotel is on the 13 jan we had check out of the hotel at 11.30 am as we are proceeding to goa the same evening at 6.30‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Prashant S
Detailed Review: The hotel address is not easy to find. If you know how to reach here, you dont need to worry about anything else. The staff and the manager are supportive but the service might be slow depending on the time.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ronaldreddy
Detailed Review: The service provided in this hotel was excellent. The manager and staff were really helpful and always ready to help out. Rooms are of decent size. Excellent facilities available. Its worth every rupees spend. Although its little interior but its nearer to the airport and transports is available free of charge. You cannot expect from a budget hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kushmorch
Detailed Review: Very good and neat hotel,calm and peaceful environment,excellent customer service,helpful staff and fantastic management. I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and relatives. I really enjoyed my stay here. Keep it up! Cheers!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: CKanashiro
Review: The staff makes the difference. I recommend!
Detailed Review: I stayed for 9 nights due to a championship that would play in the city. The hotel is not very big, there is no space for recreation, fitness and even wi-fi. But it has great value for money, the staff are always at disposal and the receptionists were great, helping us with anything we needed. I recommend the hotel for those who are not looking for luxury, just looking for a place to spend the night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hattie L
Detailed Review: After being told bad things about this place by a tricky tuk-tuk driver we arrived a bit apprehensive. The outside did not look particularly clean or welcoming.   But, to our surprise, the inside was really clean and looked almost brand new!  We were welcomed by the friendliest, loveliest man who went out of his way to help us. We even got free tea and coffee.  Our room was spotless and had the comfiest beds and pillows! The bathroom was very modern with a huge, hot shower. The location wasn't central but it really isn't far from Colaba (a fairly short walk once you know where you are) and this saves you the cost of the expensive tourist hotels too.  For Mumbai prices this is really great value. A clean, safe place to have as a base away from the intensity of the city. Not five‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Charlotte I
Detailed Review: This hotel was a welcomed bit of comfort in India! Big comfy beds and great, hot showers. The staff are really nice and helpful too. Unfortunately our room was near to some kind of party venue? So we could hear music quite loudly for the a while each night - but we were so tired, it didn't affect sleep quality too much :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HarrieM
Detailed Review: I booked for this hotel online after reading a few good reviews. I had stayed in hotel city palace on a previous trip, and whilst it was fine and cheap, thought i would spend a bit more for a nicer place to stay. I saw a few good reviews and thought I'd book it.   Turned out it wasn't as close to the Chhatrapati Shivaji terminus I had expected, but that was my fault really. It was about a 10 min taxi ride away. The outside doesn't look amazing, but you can forgive them for that. The problem I had was that on arrival we were given a very small room, crawling in bugs and it was, as a whole, not as the pictures had suggested. It was dark (no natural day light, which is a problem if you're trying to sync to a new time zone) and just a bit grubby. The bathroom was the worst bit‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HarshMah
Detailed Review: Hi, I had stayed in this hotel for two days(27-Dec-2013 to 29-Dec-2013) in room no. 402. I didn't like this hotel. i have following reason: 1. Room quality was worst. There were mosquitoes & cockroach in our room. Room was smelling very badly. 2. Room size were very small. 3. Food quality was also not good( don't forget you are in Mumbai).  Only good thing about this hotel was about its location. As this in center from BCT, CharcheGAte, MarineLIne local station. And around 1km from these point. Also 2-3 km from Gate Way Of India. When i asked to manager for room change then he provide us another room in next day. Another room was good compare to first one but not up to mark. They charged to me Rs. 2000 + room base price. So i do not think it is worth deal for me. Note- For‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ramprakash Ravichandran
Detailed Review: Decent staff & service, although its bad location (situated close to the airport but within several inner roads, some dodgy) & small unventilated rooms might need you to look elsewhere. They serve breakfast and offer pickup/drop transportation.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Mrinmoydas
Detailed Review: Very good stay at Mumbai. Service and staffs are excecellent and co-operative. I came through an agent but got better  service. Pick up and drop are complimentary and traveldesk are very helpful. Overall the hotel le Grande is best and cost effective in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ibharath
Detailed Review: Awesome experience here at le grande. In andheri don't search any other hotel le grande should be the choice .spent new year here will never forget in my life.excellent place to stay.free wi fi ,reasonable rates ,friendly staff,and wonderful service .had a time of my life.

The downside is the rooms are quite small and cramped, the free buffet breakfast is nothing to write home about just a basic spread. If you have a few hours between flights and need a affordable hotel room then this is it.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mukeshgoyal
Review: hotel is very good location is good n
Detailed Review: room is good staf is good brakefast isgood day by day change menu total kwality   is very good travling  facalites and rates are   most reasonble.the service was good.the staff was cooperative.the food was good.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: HimanshuSubarna
Detailed Review: Centrally located and close to life line of mumbai I.e local trains. Cleanliness is taken very good care of. Food quality is really good. Stayed for 5 day's. Staffs are good and co-operative. Absolute value of money.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv

Detailed Review: came here for medical purpose from my country saudi arabia.the hotel staff was very cooperative to help me with hospitals and treatment.the food was nice .the room service was good but sometimes it used to b late as they were flooded with orders i understand there situation.the manager was very helpful .would reccomend this to others.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv

Rooms  are spacious and fitted  with all facilities. This is my 5th stay at le grande and would recommend le grande  to all business travellers.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Arun Patel P
Review: My recent stay at Le Grande
Detailed Review: The rooms interior just attracted me, it is done so nicely & the room feels so cosy & comfortable.  I was at Room No. 605.  Every corner of the room spoke out, the location of the lights were apt.  The flooring for the bathroom is unique. The room has all the basic amenities like TV, fridge, hot pot, geyser facility and all in good condition.  The reception desk, the restaurant and above all the room has improved a lot, I would love to come back to this hotel again and again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv

Detailed Review: We had an amazing overall experience. The staff and management is really professional and very helpful. I am from California and I wanted a place which is clean and has quality service. Hotel Le Grande exceeded my expectation in all the areas of services.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kanairo
Detailed Review: I had come here for my business stayed in this hotel for 4days i had a pleasant stay the service is good. The location is good for corporates. ldeal for businessman and corporate world.the food was nice.overall experience was nice

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Daljitsing
Detailed Review: My overall experience with hotel is very good. Clean rooms awesome food and very good hospitality. All facilities are provided are very good by hotel management. View is very good. Location of the hotel is very nice and peaceful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: VivekFbd
Review: Nice & clean hotel: a great value for money!!

Close to airport but still away from the main road and hustle bustle.  6. Easy access to auto ricksha, taxi etc.  7. Overall, a nice, decent, clean and basic stay at this price might just not be possible in this area.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Abhiharur
Detailed Review: A very hospitable staff and the stay was a very pleasant one ... Would recommend this hotel to any one who is looking for an accommodation in this part of town or close to the airport ... The food is good and value for money as well .. All in all a pleasant place to stay

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: xavierprabhu
Detailed Review: this is the usual hotel stay in Mumbai since it has clean decent rooms and decent breakfast (not great). last visit had to stay at another hotel as this one was sold out for a marriage party. that one had better rooms, more spacious, had toiletries in the room but wifi was extra and expensive, there was no airport transfers. realized for the price, LeGrande is true value for money. Their airport pick-up this time was better and never utilize their airport drop because they ask me to come back to the hotel for it which is simply not possible with a tight schedule, if they can renovate their rooms and improve their breakfast a bit, they will just be perfect. I usually ask for rooms in their 6t floor which are fully renovated. but heard they are doing it for all the rooms.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: traveladiction
Detailed Review: I have stayed here on Dec 1st and the feedback was it one of the best transit hotel near Mumbai airport with good amenities and breakfast. The rooms are clean and well maintained.Staff is very co-operative and it's really value for money. Highly recommend as a Transit hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Elphinstone_Annexe-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Henrythehen
Review: Much better than it looks from the outside!
Detailed Review: By far the best value place I have stayed at in Mumbai. Location is decent enough that you can walk to CST train station, gateway of India, markets etc etc. Very cheap for rooms that are of an excellent standard. Felt like I was in a posh hotel and yet only paying about 1600 Rs a night including breakfast! Staff very polite and reasonably helpful. Certainly more helpful than other places I stayed in. The restaurant almost beneath the hotel is worth checking out if you don't want to stray too far for your meal. Just don't be put off by the exterior.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Azamasma
Detailed Review: The location is good, near to metro cinema, rooms are good, well furnished, well maintained. FO staff are really helpful. Surojit, he is a smart & good staff.  Service standard is ok, rooms are good but small but in city like mumbai, this is best.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vishnugops
Review: Very nice hotel at a very good location
Detailed Review: I stayed with my friends at Hotel Fortune for 4 days last week. We went for watching the 200th test. The Hotel was very near to stadium. Walkable distance to Marine lines, churchgate, CST terminal, India Gate, Fashion Street, Crawford market, Colaba coastway... everything at your reach or min taxi fare. I was really impressed by the friendly hotel staff and the location. The MEtro cinemas is just a few steps away. Also there are a wide choice of restaurants around the place. Will definitely choose this place for my next trip.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Emmanuel J
Detailed Review: Great time in Mumbai. A mid sized quiet environment with clean and enjoyable beds. This is a good hide away from the hustle and bustle of the busy Indian city. Moderate weather and enjoyable temperature. Will come again.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SNAUTIYAL
Detailed Review: my stay was comfortable and pleasent. came to mumbai for my office work.what was good was that it  was near the airport.the staff is very helpful as i did not know places in mumbai they helped me reach places.the food was good.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lutfullahsyed
Detailed Review: We found here a very good atmosphere and service and staff is totally cooprative. Food is totally good and charges are not so highly. You also enjoy his pick and drop faculty. We are love to staying here.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ihazetenzin
Detailed Review: We stated here for 3 nights. Our room was nice and clean. Service was good. They helped us find out about train/bus services out of town. Friendly staff. It was a distance from the downtown mumbai but they provide taxi for a reasonable rate.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SridharCanada
Review: Very good choice for budget transit halt at Mumbai.
Detailed Review: Though I wouldn't recommend this hotel if your stay in Mumbai goes over 2 days , this hotel is probably the best choice in Mumbai for a 1 night stay either as a transit stopover or short business trip.   Negatives: Rooms are small , the road leading to the hotel passes through some areas to be avoided at night , the street dogs outside the hotel make a racket that could wake up even Kumbhakarnan  Positives: Short distance to airport with free shuttle provided. VERY dedicated staff who waited for us at the airport even when our incoming flight was delayed by over an hour , decent food , comfortable beds , very reasonable price for the facilities provided.   Conclusion: Choose this hotel if transiting through Mumbai , if staying longer better deals are available at other hotels or‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanyam C
Detailed Review: A comfortable stay for two nights.Cooperative staff and hospitality was excellent.Room service was fast.Value for money.Complimentary meals were fine.Taxi for sight seeing was available on extra payment.Staff was courteous and helpful.Overall an excellent stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: yugander
Detailed Review: the hotel is pretty near to us embassy.the environment and service provided at the hotel is quiet good.rooms are well maintained.staff is very supportive.hotel is near to airport and Andrei station is about 2 kilometers

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hasit S
Detailed Review: Here are the Pro's: 1. Good location if you want something mid-town in Mumbai around Dadar startion.  2. Staff was good to us and responsive.   3. Bed and towels were okay.   Here are the Cons: 1. The air-conditioning was terrible. The window air-conditioner made so much noise that we had to shut it off to get some sleep.  2. The furniture in the room is very old (the pictures are for deluxe rooms (only 5 count available), which are not offered via Cleartrip. So what you get are old rooms. Paint was dirty or peeling at places.  3. Toiletries: Only a little soap and a little shampoo (cheap) bottle. At ~4,000 INR a night, I expected better things like other hotels.  4. Breakfast (we left early) we were told was only 1 Indian item (poha/omellete) and tea/coffee. Again for a 4,000‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chefsiju
Review: Excellent for Transits, short stays and Backpackers!!
Detailed Review: I stayed with this hotel on October the 31, 2013 and it was great. It is located away from the noises and disturbances of the city. The location around this hotel doesn't have any special significance. The building from outside is also not that vow. It is a budget one, but you get more than what you expect from a budget hotel. It is really good. Rooms are cosy and elegant.  If you are looking for :  Transit Hotel / Short Stay / Backpackers Away from noises Close to International / Domestic Airports Airport Pick up and Drop Clean Rooms Good Sleep Quality Very Good Food ( INDIAN CUISINE) Good Service Budget  You can trust this review and go for Le Grande with out confusions, you will not regret.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anilkodiganti
Review: very good service, served all our needs
Detailed Review: We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. It served all our needs . hotel has preorganized taxi with if you are planning on sight seeing with some extra payment. Pick up and drop off is only available to close destinations to hotel. It's a good hotel and service was good. The hotel is not in a posh locality if that's what you are looking for. It's quite a bit distance from all the important places though. Overall we had a good experience.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SamratDev
Review: Memorable trip to Mumbai and very nice hotel to stay
Detailed Review: We stayed in the hotel for 2 days, service, food , behavior of the staff was excellent. The solve the problems immediately. I will always stay in this hotel in future. Congrats to the whole team, keep up your service.Travel desk was also very good and helpful.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ganeshchandramondal
Detailed Review: I came to mumbai with my family for the 1st time and stayed in this hotel .the services were veey good .the staff at this hotel was very helpful.they guided and help us to see mumbai.i Would like to come to this hotel again and would reccomend this hotel.the food here was good the morning breakfast was ok but not a lot of varierty

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Craig A
Detailed Review: Myself and my friend Cameron stayed here last year for a month, we had intended to travel all over india but he broke his leg and we had to stay put!    It has to be said that the staff at the BAWA regency were incredibly helpful and made the very best of the situation for us.  We were incredibly grateful to them.  Our room was very clean, well air-conditioned, and the hotel is very close to Dadar station and the main road.  If we ever make it back from Scotland, we'll visit again.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Satish1511
Detailed Review: I stayed here during the Ganesha festival during September 2013. I thought the biggest advantage with the hotel is that, despite being less than 700 metres from the Dadar local station, it was calm, neat and not so noisy.. The rooms were decent and were manageable

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JayeshAsharPune
Detailed Review: Stayed there 2 weeks back. It is a disgusting hotel. Rooms had damp, bed sheets were not changed. Found hair under the duvet. Bedside table had wet stains that had not been cleaned by house keeping. NEVER EVER STAY THERE!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sayali K
Detailed Review: It's a good place to stay for a short visit. Centrally located and close to the market. Rooms are old but clean and spaced out. Three of us could fit comfortably in one room. Good food and quick service. The staff is efficient and friendly. The bedding and blankets were very comfortable and important for a good night's sleep. Overall feedback: Recommended place.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Archana S
Review: Equally bad proportionate to the pricing of the rooms
Detailed Review: Equally bad proportionate to the pricing of the rooms. Room has unwashed/stinky carpets from ages no bathroom accessory is in place. Rooms was not even cleaned/hygienic before handed over to the customer. Housekeeping Staff was non responsive, too much delay in responding to the queries. Food is highly priced seeing the quality of the rooms no one can dare to call for the food at that price.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Suraj001
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 2 days. I didn't find the hotel service that much great.Some of the staffs are very arrogant. Hotel location is close to Mumbai Domestic airport which is the only advantage for the visitor.The taste of the food is just ok type, nothing special.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: satyajitsamerroy
Detailed Review: i stayed in this hotel for 40 days. Had a good experiece here.the rooms r clean and neat.the staff here is helpful.the food in the resturant is good. I would reccomend this hotel to others.they have complimentry breakfast pick ups drops.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aman S
Review: Nice Service and a very good Hotel
Detailed Review: I stayed for 2 days, it was a good experience as i stayed mumbai for the first time so long. Excellent services provided like Free wi-fi, Breakfast was really good. they can arrange for your whole plan out to various places you can visit in mumbai. Prices are also suitable as compared to other hotels here, providing the same services. You can go for it if you need a more comfortable journey.:)

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Drew Bradley
Review: Good hotel with excellent customer service!
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 2 nights, had a very good stay. Room was big, air conditioned and very clean. Staff were extremely helpful & friendly. Very convenient location for airport, only 5 minute drive away. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: -eva1995-
Detailed Review: I liked this Hotel, because it was clean and The stuff was friendly. The only thing i did not like was that the waiter was take off The dishes while I was eating. In western culture this is a bit rude. The rest was perfect ! (Maybe they should make the outside of the Hotel more friendly)

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sanjay_D_2013
Review: TA Rating for this property is not right
Detailed Review: Review is based on what I paid (Rs. 3K for double occupancy All Inclusive per night) There are multiple problems with this hotel. It's a very old property and suffers from bad planning and no maintenance. Location: Very bad, the hotel is tucked deep inside JB Nagar. The address should read FAR OFF Sahar road instead of off sahar road. Pick-up: Was late by 25 minute, the driver started from hotel after I called up hotel that I am searching for the pick-up.  Room: Room (No 207) was the worst part of the hotel, the aircon (ages old) installed couldn't even cool the room during the night in Sep weather. God help those visiting in Summer. I have to fight to get my room changed. The washroom was pathetic, it ends before it started. Don't harbor thoughts of having a nice hot shower coz‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sathiyamoorthi N
Detailed Review: One of the best stays i ever had. The staffs was extremely helpful and polite. The food was great as well. Good rooms and comfortable bed. Location is very good near both the Airports that is International and Domestic. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this hotel and will definitely return next time i am in Mumbai. I will surly recomend my friends

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: amitsharma1
Detailed Review: Room services and cleaning it's good time to time better services Food facilities Very good staff and using good n soft voice Hotel is located in the interior but in a peaceful place  The overall stay good and nice

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: 18shilpa
Detailed Review: The Hotel has excellent location and is close to the riy stns and the shopping areas.The DLX and the SUP rooms are spacious than the STD rooms.The decor is simple but the rooms are clean.The service is prompt.The b/fast should have more choices.Good service,great experience.Would like to come again.....

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: I-Vonne L
Detailed Review: Mouldy wall, no hair dryer service, bed and surfaces had a layer of dust when we first arrived. Rubbish wasnt cleared during room cleaning. Telephone smells. Needs refurbishing. But location is great. Ideal distance to all hot spots, down south is Colaba, walking distance to Crawford Market and CS Station.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Parth581989
Detailed Review: I was staying this this hotel for 2 days.. the only word i have for this property is awesome/excellent. Such a great welcome by staff.. very neat and clean with average breakfast. the best thing of this hotel is they have 24 hour room service being a budget hotel. its in the best location where there is no noise of vehicles. you can perfectly enjoy your stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anishkappil
Detailed Review: I use to travel frequently to mumbai, and i always prefer staying at hotel le grande. Hotel is situated at nice, quite & peaceful location and easy access to all place. Manager and staff are friendly and cooperative, good room service, nice room and also good breakfast that is complimentary. Overall a good experience and nice stay. I recommend holet le grande as a great stay and budgeted hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ASHISHMECHERY
Detailed Review: I would like to tell my  experience with this hotel le grande which is close to Mumbai international airport.They have an option to have an airport pick up and drop..  I would like to recommend all type of trip will suits here.. why because firstly i was happy with all service boys here ....they are nice polite and friendly too...they were excellent in cleaning the room and making the room clean as it would be... Then to food here i was worried before i come here i am south Indian and now in north but the food here was also suits me too... For tour trips they have their own travels also .. this all make me to live here in all my trips.... Thank u Le grande ..

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: RahulDVerma
Detailed Review: Here I found everything exceptional. Great room, excellent service, amazing hospitality and nice food. Restroom was small but was equipped, i would definitely recommend this hotel for transit and tour stay. My experience was "awesome".  Rahul D Verma

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Calvein N
Detailed Review: Hotel is good especially the people, the service. I am Chinese and feel good here. Room is clean and shining. Recommend live here....:))  The food here is also not bad, even I am Chinese, but the food favor is suitable for me. Thanks for that!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: jayanta007
Detailed Review: Le grandeis a excellent hotel in mumbai east, its near to airport, a pick and drop facilities are available, food is delicious, staff of the hotels are very nice, polite, room service are very good, over all its a great experience.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: celozy
Detailed Review: hotel is very nice, i love the place bacoz its so quite n the staff of the hotel r also very nice n friendly n thy great with a nice simle on their faces,,, n mumbai is also a nice city to enjoy,,, love to enjoy like hostrical places n the local fast food.....

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: bigelowispink
Detailed Review: the room and the service here were excellent. the food was delish. its a bit far from south mumbai but gives u the opportunity to take the city trains and have a REAL mumbai experience.  and the hotel is off the main Street so it is blissfully quiet. highly recommended!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: kiranchowdhury
Detailed Review: stayed for 4 days got to get a great hospitality nice room nice food & Check-in was quick and staffs were really humble and nice :) really appreciate the service what we got there. finally the prices was also reasonable as compared to other hotels .. best thing was i have seen was the rooms were very clean and people around was really good.  Regards kiran

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Chameera A
Detailed Review: " Stayed for 2 days..great hospitality, nice room, nice food, free Wi-Fi...will recommend to anyone who needs a good place to stay for the value they spend..." "Nevertheless not in a good location as i had difficulty to find way to the hotel because most of the taxi drivers didn't know the place..but overall it was a pleasant stay at this hotel.."

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ALOK_78
Review: Excellent Location,maintenance & Hospitality - Full value of money
Detailed Review: Visited Mumbai in 2nd week of June and landed up in Bawa Regency on a friend's recommendation. Stayed in the hotel for 5 days and I must thank my friend & hotel both for such a hassle free , pleasant stay , most important - within budget (in mumbai , you can not ask for more)   PROS Location : 10/10 : walking distance from Dadar station , don't have to worry about transportation : cabs outside hotel / bus stand & local train walking  Property : not very big , but well maintained . Welcoming/smiling faces on reception. Small cozy lobby with a little bakery counter  Rooms : I didn't expect such spacious room in a Mumbai hotel at the price i paid.Small sofa unit , clean bathroom , clean linen & towels , basic toiletries , geyser ,window a/c , wardrobe with electronic safe & tv  ‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vasantrai B
Detailed Review: Hotel is very good staff hospitalities excellent food is very good locationexcellent for mass transportation and shoppaing market is nearby room size is sufficiant big.i would like to rebbok this hotel during next trip to Mumbai.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ChawreVakil
Review: Rooms are very small and cramped. Service and food quality too is okay.
Detailed Review: The hotel is located next to metro cinema, and as such at a great location. You cross the railway line and you are on the marine drive. However, for the huge cost you pay, you get a very small and cramped room which simpli fits a bed and one chair with a small table, and then no space is left for any movement. I was also not happy about the cleanliness. Food quality and service too were not in any way noteworthy. Overall, stay in this hotel if you have no other choice.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Reeta P
Detailed Review: We stayed at this hotel for two nights booked by our agency. Location is ok..small lobby and reception area. Check-in was quick and staffs are good. But when we entered at the room was little disappointed. Tiny room with tiny bathroom. They suppose to give one extra bed but they did not provide any. Room was damp hence we did not asked for it also. Wi Fi is available but we did not received the login & password even after several reminder. However the  next day we ask them to change our room and (thank god) they did. For my surprise this room was spacious, even the bathroom has quite a space to jingle around. Breakfast was good and hefty. Room service is prompt. Cost effective and a decent hotel to stay in.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Joseph D
Detailed Review: I had been to Mumbai this May..it was a sudden programme. I contacted hotel le grande just two days before my arrival and that's it I had to do nothing. from the airport pick-up, my room, the breakfast all ready in time. I could rate the service 5 on 5. as this was my second trip to Mumbai looking at my first experience with hotel le grande i choose to reside here. i can say that this experience was even better than the first time. the warm welcome by the staff, the food, the room, the cleanliness and the WiFi made me feel home. cheers to the staff and management running the hotel. planning my next trip in July 2014 to Mumbai and will surely reside here. thanks for the pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Detailed Review: my name abdikarim jama i was this hotel 3 days its really very nice hotel and services every thin was nice i like this hotel  and im going visit my next tripe if god wishes my fisrt time  i was in hindia

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: samshah3
Detailed Review: Good place to stay in with budget tariff. Nicely renovated entrance with elegant look from outside. Comfortably designed like "IN HOUSE BEDROOM" giving a bit of heritage look inside. Bedding is fantastic giving a cool sleep feeling completely relaxed in the morning. Need to walk a bit from Dadar railway station but manageable offsetting the hospitality. Value for Money. Would like to come again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: shettyyogesh
Detailed Review: Located near to the Bombay Hospital, we found the facilities comfortable and the staff pleasant. The most impressive feature of the hotel is the size of the rooms. They are not so spacious but much comfortable. The bathrooms are good too, and clean.  we felt safe here , amenities and facilities are quite antiquated for the price we paid. Location was okay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: cindyabay
Detailed Review: I would definitely stay here over and over again! The service is really great. In fact this hotel has the best service I have ever experienced. The staff are very nice, professional, friendly, very helpful, and very fast. Anytime I ask for something, they are at my door in less than a minute! The food is really good, room service is fast. My only problem was that its a bit expensive but I stayed well over a week here and the manager gave me a discount because of that. The rooms are very clean. Bathroom clean. Although my room was small and difnt have a window, but the AC is in great working condition. The bed and pillows are very comfortable, the duvet is soft and cozy. I would definitly recommend anybdy coming to mumbai to lodge here!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: dimpleNewDelhi
Detailed Review: Location was poor, first night wi fi was not working , some problems with cable tv also,  breakfast had limited menu ,  I feel they need to work upon on  OVERALL ambience OF THE PLACE,  One good thing was there travel desk which was prompt .  You can get much better hotel at this price in mumbai,

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Joseph D
Review: Beautiful accommodation - Makes a Pleasant Stay..!!
Detailed Review: My stay in Mumbai got much better thanks to the good hospitality and service provided by the staff of Hotel Le Grande. The ambiance, the rooms the food were awesome. The staff and the management were very approachable and helpful. Thanks for making my trip so memorable. Will surely stay here the next time i fly to Mumbai and also would recommend my friends the same. The best part of the hotel is its good hospitality, pleasant restaurant and its location.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Avijit S
Detailed Review: I was in Mumbai for 2 days and had business meetings at the suburbs.  Hence stayed in this hotel, this hotel  is perfectly located for people in transit and for people who have work in the suburban Mumbai.  The staff is warm and generous.  Food was awesome. i also got a complimentary airport transfers.  I am planning to come to Mumbai in few months for a leisure trip and have already informed the front office manager to keep a room for me and my family.  Thank you Le Grande for making my stay a 'hassle free stay'.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Tarun J
Detailed Review: Just perfect. Not expensive. In a by lane & hence peaceful. The staff is very helpful. The room size is decent. No conference rooms available currently but the manager did inform me its work in progress & should have one ready within three months.  Most important for me. Its close to the Mumbai domestic & international airport.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ashishberlia
Review: Go only if you won't spend much time in Hotel
Detailed Review: So while this hotel has a severe problem of thousand of flies on the corridor during evening, it really creates lot of frustration. You switch on the light and you see lots of flies.  The location is good which is near Dadar Station but the food is quite unimpressive. I believe it is the location which helps them command a premium. Otherwise, its not worth it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Aggie K
Detailed Review: This is probably one of the worst places i have seen so far. The rooms are squalid, with moldy walls and no proper hot water or air. I cut my leg on a nail sticking out of the bed, the internet is not free and I wonder who would not get claustrophobic in there. Avoid this place if you can help it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Bic-tastic
Review: TINY rooms, but good location - ok for 1 night
Detailed Review: We stayed only 1 night in this hotel.   The rooms are super tiny - only just fit a double bed, and the bathroom was even more compact with the shower almost over the toilet. I'm also a little suspicious when my toilet has the 'cleaned for your protection' sash over it, but it is quite clear to me that the sink and taps 30cm away haven't been wiped down since 1942.  The sheets on the bed were old and had a small rip in them, however the bed and pillows were pretty comfy compared to most other places we'd stayed. There was no window in our room, which was good and bad as no fresh air, but also reduced outside noise for a peaceful sleep.  The fan in the room only had 1 setting - "Category 5 Hurricane" and was very loud. The aircond didn't work when we went to bed, but turned itself‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: DitaJi
Detailed Review: Avoid this hotel at all costs. They will try to offer it to you at the airport hotel service, but do not fall for it. For $60 they gave me a smoker's room where only a bed and chair can fit in, with no windows, and terrible smell. I asked for another room, and the next one was just as small, no windows, dirty sheets, and no wifi access. For that they took me to another room - a smoker's room.. After my patience was over they convinced me to stay in a 'nicer room for the same price' which turned out to be just as small, smelly, dirty, windowless and claustrophobic as all previous ones. While there, I booked another hotel and left immediately. As a female traveler in a single room I also didn't feel safe there.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Sarbajit G
Detailed Review: This hotel, located in Andheri is good for families looking for a comfortable stay at an affordable price. Sitauated a little away from the main road, one can access almost each and every part of Mumbai from here. The Fashion Street Bazar, famous for its low-cost articles, is nearby.  The hotel has a small and cosy restaurant, serving good food. The rooms, little small in size, have all the modern amenities with good housekeeping.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Carolina B
Detailed Review: Mumbai tends to have pricey accommodations.  I found this hotel, like many others in mumbai overpriced.  Hotel Le grande had clean rooms, free wifi, and a really nice complimentary breakfast buffet with cuisine from all parts of India.  It's a short tuk-tuk ride away from the airport and the train station also.  The staff was generally helpful, although many of them express than Indian style of customer service that does not necessarily put the customer first nor deliver service with a smile.  All in all, I would consider staying here again for a night or two.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: JSINGH2401
Detailed Review: i had made a reservation for a guest for 5 days. The hotel is in a sleazy location and the staff is untidily dressed. The guest checked inn and was not comfortable with the atmosphere and wanted to check out. The staff was not helpful, we requested for a half refund because the guest came down in an hour but they were not ready and were stubborn to charge a full day charge. Basically do not stay in this hotel ever pleaseee.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: abdul k
Detailed Review: It was really good experience in staying Grand de Hotel... I was chosen this is going to be best staying hotel in Mumbai.. Their hospitality was like a parental care with all the guest...  I wish you all the best for your growth.. Keep it up...

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: joselemercier
Detailed Review: We are in this hotel for three nights. We appreciate the hospitality, comfort and also quiet rest. The rooms and bathrooms are well kept, the staff all levels is competant and friendly. Its location near the airports is very appreciable, it may nevertheless be a bit cheaper, which would make him an even greater attractiveness.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: md1omer
Review: Its good experience that I have here
Detailed Review: I stayed for 1 day I found it very nice and the service was very good I enjoyed with the break fast and the hotel people were very nice to me I wish I could come again because my choice will be this hotel it near of everything ....thank you le grande

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: BalaVCMPTL
Detailed Review: Affordable, Good Hotel Near Airport.. Providing Good Service, Clean rooms, airport pickup and drop, with Breakfast and Wifi. I have stayed here for two times. Friendly reception and service. Staff is always ready to help in freindly manner. Good place to move around

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Horacio D
Detailed Review: The people in the hotel are very helpful,the reception,lobby manager,every staff nice kind the service which i got here was very good .The room is clean and good.My impression when i entered changed when i came to the hotel.The breakfast is good.The area is good and quite and very near to the airport.The location is good.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: vilaskalkar
Detailed Review: It is not only conveniently located but very nice inside when you enter. I have been staying here since more than 10 years, the staff is courteous and reliable. The rooms have sufficient enough facilities that you need at the end of the day.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Shubhojit G
Detailed Review: this hotel is very close by to Dadar Central station and so ideally located for business as well as leisure or medical travel. rooms and toilets are clean and the staff well mannered. I enjoyed their frugal but tasty complimentary breakfast. no nonsense noted during my stay. Recommended.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: minesh82
Detailed Review: I have stayed in this hotel twice now in the past two years and it's brilliant, and would recommend it to anyone. It's close to the international airport, the staff are brilliant and always willing to help and go the extra mile for the customer and the room rates are very reasonable. Don't be fooled by the surroundings, even when I saw the area I was put off but I'm so glad I took a minute to have a look inside.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ashwin V
Detailed Review: Ambience: Very good. Although the hotel is very close to the Airport, one can't hear the noise from the Aircraft engines as the hotel is located parallel to the runways. Apart from the occasional sound of the ringing-bell from the school next door, it is fairly quiet.  Location: Very close to the Airport and 3 kms away from Andheri Railway station. Not located on the main road, so be prepared to walk for 3-4 mins if you want to catch an auto.  Food: Food at the hotel is good but there aren't many restaurants/eating options nearby.  Staff/Room: Very helpful but they expect tip for each and everything. Room was neat with a very large window facing East.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: devesh_shirodkar
Review: MY STAY AT HOTEL" LE GRANDE " !!
Detailed Review: My first stay at the hotel for 10 days was great;the hotel is close to domestic ; international airport & railway station as well and is at a noise free ;serene location.The rooms are at a very affordable price.The management especially the front office manager is very cooperative n helpful.Looking forward for my stay everytime i visit Mumbai .

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ganesh V. Kamath
Detailed Review: Property is in prime location in Mumbai. You can find service oriented staff all around but rooms are quite old and bathrooms are dirty. People at the reception are professional. The tariff - comforts equation is not found. Hard mattresses and old cots were found in the room occupied by me. There was a junk sofa in the room which was not at all comfortable.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gopal N
Detailed Review: The property is located at a very peaceful area.  The staff is very cooperative and the rooms are good. It is also located near the dadar Station where lot of restaurants are there.  This makes it very convenient for us to choose good restaurants as per our taste.  Bathroom was bit small still it was sufficient. For shopping also it is a very convenient place as Hindmata market and Dadar west is easily approachable from here.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Hemant
Detailed Review: Friendly Staff, Nice Rooms, Clean Environment!!! The Service and people are good...  Walking distance to to Railway Station and MSRCTC Volvo Bus Stand... Ask for anything and they will make it available to you.  Overall a nice experience :)

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SydneyMaisie
Review: Small room but an okay hotel
Detailed Review: As I said a very very small room but the shower gave hot water and the staff were helpful.  Could hardly find a place for the backpack so make sure you get a bigger room if you can.  Wifi expensive.  Rooftop restaurant very basic but he food okay. Good location.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ninjaprints
Detailed Review: By far an away the most unpleasant place I stayed in my 4 months of India, their touts picked me up at the airport when I made the mistake of stepping outside to have a look around and could not then get back in to book a real hotel.  They informed me that the hotel was based in the tourist area Colaba which it is not, the staff continued to disturb me in my room the entire night and even tried to demand 1000 rupees for a bottle of water having already assured me that I would receive free water and wi-fi, which they also tried to charge me a large sum for in the morning.  The room appeared clean at first glance but the bed sheets were all stained with a large amount of blood, the bathroom was in a vile state of repair and riddled with insects and excrement stains all over the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Patrick b
Detailed Review: I would recommend this hotel to anybody. rooms good. quality furniture etc. sensitive people- well run services.The hospitality is good .The staff here is helpful The decor of the executive room is good.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Yosefi K
Review: fantastic hotel, and nice, people good, room service
Detailed Review: I am from Israel My Name is Mr.Yosefi Kobi, I came for a tour And I find good hotel, helpful staff, breakfast is fine, location is very good very near to International & domestic airport, room is very clean, like to come again to this hotel.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Amit Tandon
Detailed Review: The hotel is not on the main road, so needs some effort to locate. But once you check in, its a great value for money hotel. Nicely done, with decent service. I got the room for 2500 / night and seems to be a good deal! Quality of rooms is definitely impressive for the kind of money you are paying!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Balajee_Vasireddi
Detailed Review: Good Ambience, not to hifi. you will get internet complimentary They have airport pickup and drop facility and good front office staff. They are providing complimentary breakfast with limited choice and average taste.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: mariacruzuarte
Detailed Review: We enjoyed and were very impressed with the excellent service and cleanliness.  The room was very comfortable and clean and airy.    We would definitely recommend any traveller for their stay at Le Grande in Andheri East. We will look forward to staying again here on our next visit from Sydney Australia.  The hotel is located in a quiet area and its environment is like a village type and not as crowded and noisy area compared to other hotels we stayed before in the airport area.  We thank you the manager, Mr Dib who parted with some more details about the hotel and the future upcoming hotel in KERALA.   We do look forward to be staying with Le Grande in our next visit and each time we come to Bombay.  Sincerely Roy & Maria Zuzarte Sydney, Australia

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Vadivelan S
Detailed Review: We 4 stayed here in executive room for 5 days. it was pleasant experience, Food, Room, Cleanliness all ok. like to stay again. staying in executive room is recommended. you have easy access to all facilities nearby.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ernesto q
Review: the quality of the hotel according to price is very good
Detailed Review: I have come from Italy and stayed in this hotel for a few days.I found the hotel located in a quite place away from the crowded noisy places in mumbai.The breakfast here is good but of the indian style would prefer more of fruits.The room was decent enough.The hospitality here is very good as they are always available a call away.It is nice to stay here.I disagree with the people who say it is not a nice hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: quantum1980
Detailed Review: I visited Mumbai for a few nights in December. I booked another hotel - however i was told that this was only available.  I checked in and checked out within an hour. The hotel is suitable for very low budgets. The front lady was so very helpful and nice. However the rooms are not up to standard.  I was expecting a far better hotel as i had planned to stay at the Taj Mahal hotel in Colabar. The room had a terrible odour, bathroom and toilets were substandard and the room was way too small.   It needs a serious revamp to make it more modern. I checked out and went to a hotel which i knew well.  Disappointing - this is not a hotel which will score very well with international guests.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: manish a
Detailed Review: Hotel fortune dhobi taloa is a not only good but also the best hotel for every visitor in mumbai let it be bussiness purpose or tourist and it has value for money as per heavy and busy area, staff, services and all are better

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: xavierprabhu
Review: decent option for business travellers in mumbai
Detailed Review: it is not a fancy hotel but one that gets you a clean room, decent breakfast, to and fro airport transfers, wi-fi for a decent price as per mumbai standards. have been a regular here and the only change I see is that they have painted the corridors. their breakfast items have dropped by one or two in the past few trips and have never utilized their airport drop back since it is always inconvenient as one tends to chekc out by noon and my return flights are always in the evenings. unless I get a better place this one gets my vote.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: randeep s
Detailed Review: Stay at this hotel for 3 days on an official tour. Hotel staff is nice. Service is good but the hotel building is old. Rooms are well carpeted. furniture is old and looks delicate, if you try to apply some power if will come in your hand. Room A/C was terrible, even on 16 deg. it was running like cooler. we had to wait for 2 hour to get our room cold. Washroom has old fitting. As i tried to open the tap for hot water it came in my hand. After lots of tries it got fitted at its position. No hot water from tap after all tries. Location wise it is at good location. One can easily hire a taxi and go anywhere. There are lots of food joints near this hotel. If you want to eat at McDonalds, Subway etc. (big food joints), they are too far from this place. No value for money. we stayed‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rajeshkammila
Review: Issues with cleanliness, flies, Hot water etc
Detailed Review: Hotel looks good from outside, but when we pay and get into the room "the adventure starts". The hotel's main advantage is, it is located near the Railway station.  (+ives) Room service, Hotel staff. (-ive's) Cleanliness, Flies, No hot water, Annoying sound & Price.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: rsinh
Detailed Review: This was our family visit from jammu to the hotel and the location is really great with shopping around with the sight seeing places at all walking distance. The staff is good n helpful. The restaurant is slow but the food is good. Overall we had great time. Wuld like to visit again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Megan P
Detailed Review: We arrived at the hotel fortune and we were taken to a standard room - even though we were sure we had booked a deluxe. Our room was tiny, the beds were dirty and the windows wouldn't close - needless to say, Mosquitos were rampant. We then tried to access the free wifi, however the woman at the desk tried to tell us we had to pay. On questioning her, she finally admitted that yes, we did have free wifi but not before trying to rip us off.  The worst part of all was that they were renovating the room below ours and construction was going on until 10pm!! Not to mention the safety concerns that come with that kind of construction. As we were so exhausted this first evening, we put up with this crap. Then to top it all of, on check out we attempted to discuss things with the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Jemima L
Review: The worst hotel in the world
Detailed Review: We arrived at this hotel at approximately 5pm at night. There were men carrying bags of cement up the stairs. Hammering and drilling was occurring, as well as dust everywhere making the air hard to breathe. We checked in and were shown one of the most disgusting rooms I have ever seen. After paying $200 for 2 nights for a Deluxe suite, seeing two disgusting single beds in a tiny room (for 3 girls) was disappointing, especially since the neighbouring rooms were much bigger. We were almost tricked into paying for the wifi that was meant to be "free", we were not given our free breakfast and the renovations (directly below our rooms) began at 8am and ceased well after 9pm - on a Saturday and Sunday night. When we complained to management upon checking out, an argument went on for‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Ankit_divine
Review: Not value for money over charged rooms but better than other options in the area.
Detailed Review: I stayed in the hotel for a day. As i wanted to go to bombay hospital for my mother's check up.i  booked the room over phone and requested for early check in. I reached mumbai 6.30 am,from mumbai central station i directly came to the hotel it took me 10mins . After a few disscusion the staff agreed to let me do early check in . I took the supirior room which cost 4500rs. The amount was too much for this type of room but i guess they r charging for the loaction of the hotel. The standerd room is very small like a cage. U cant even breath freely in that room. Even though the hotel is renovated but its still was average to me. Talking about the staff they never smile. All blanks faces. And to my suprise next day when i was checking out they asked for two days rent as i early‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: David N
Detailed Review: Arrived after midnight because the airport pick up was not there to meet me. Maybe not their fault! Mumbai international may be the most congested airport in the world! There was no drinking water in the room but as soon as I managed to doze off a knock on the door revealed a man trying to sell me a bottle of mineral water. I was thirsty but had no rupees yet so told him to let me sleep. Breakfast was very good for a westerner like me. Was disappointed they wanted me to pay for wifi so did without. Woke up to hundreds of kids playing just outside my window. The room was kind of gloomy but at least was clean. This is a very average hotel for India. The cost was exorbitant in my opinion! I later stayed in much better places for a fraction of the cost.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ek_chennai
Review: Old room & Noisy AirCon. Not worth the price. Airport pickup/drop only saving grace
Detailed Review: Stayed here for couple of days and overall experience is just average. Reception & breakfast buffet area are too small. If you go on time for breakfast you need to scramble for place. Also the menu is boring as there is not much change everyday.   The room is adequate for a couple and kid but the had a noisy windows A/c which is better to be kept switched off. In summers can't image how one can manage the night. Complaints about the noise had gone on to deaf ears I guess. The fittings need replacement here and there. Rest room size is just about average. Being very close to a school can be a little disturbance in the morning but it is bearable. Location is little away from main road but not that far off and you can catch an auto quite easily. The cost is high for the location‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: harendra
Detailed Review: just imagine, these guys never check mails properly i had personally, sat with reception guy to check the booking mail from make my trip, they were not even entertaining the booking id no. as well. were asking me to pay the advance while i had already paid the whole amt. online finally after going through there mailbox rigoursly i found the mail in there mail box ,  otherwise , this time it was so insulting n stupid  poor room , this time i had paid for superior room  the only good thing is there two way pick up n drop

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Catherine C
Review: Manager tried to charge us extra fees, poor quality hotel.
Detailed Review: We booked and paid in advance through Agoda, on arrival the hotel Night Manager tried to make us pay an additional 25% Service Tax in cash. We refused as all services and taxes were inclusive of the price that we paid. This dispute went on for 2 days and the staff were frankly rude and aggressive. They only stopped hassling us when I showed them an email from Agoda customer Services stating that we should not pay any more cash. Then the free wifi service disappeared and was replaced by a service that you pay 100 rupees per hour for. The accommodation is not cheap- even by Mumbai standards, the room was OK however the sheets and the bathroom were dirty, the toilet was disgusting and when we asked for toilet paper they gave us a stack of paper serviettes that would not flush.  We‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ashoo123
Detailed Review: The hotel is close to the Mumbai airport. The rooms are OK, sufficient  for two to three people. However the bathrooms are a little small. However the staff is friendly and helpful. the room service is also good. The included buffet breakfast is just average. Positives: 1.Close to airport. 2. Pick and drop facility to the airport. 3. Friendly staff. 4. complimentary wifi (albeit only 4 hours). 5. Reasonably clean. 6. Good room service. Negatives: 1. Far from the major tourist attractions. 2. Noise in the mornings from school busses. 3. Noisy AC. 4. Small restaurant.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: handy_id
Detailed Review: Good hotel for those on business trips. The location is very very convenient. Hotel staff is extremely helpful and curtious. Rooms are average. Washroom has a bit of water pressure problem. Otherwise overall its clean and nice to stay. Food is also good- less of spices and oil- i enjoyed it. Overall a good experience!!!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Kushal B
Detailed Review: I would disagree to anyone who says this hotel is not good. It is an excellent hotel. The staff is friendly and always available to assist you for anything. The have all the facilities. The room service is very quick in fact, I stayed for 4 days every time my order for lunch and breakfast used to come in like 10 minutes. The rooms are very comfortable and clean, even the bathrooms are super clean. Ya I agree its a little inside but you need that kind of silence to enjoy the peaceful side of Mumbai as well. Overall value for money and a considerable option. You can trust me on this considering the fact that I am a hard critic and I liked this hotel.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SLOUK25
Review: Good location, but less than what you might expect, better hotels in other parts of India.
Detailed Review: 5 min walk from the train station, easy access to downtown Mumbai by train-15 mins, breakfast isn't the greatest but adequate, and staff are alway keen to help and support. Good for a few nights in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: elchoco
Detailed Review: I stayed here for here 3 nights on business in Andheri.  It was totally fine, clean, ac, WIFI, decent sized room, modern bathroom.  A bit far from some of the sights if that's what you're wanting but perfect location for Andheri business and 10 mins from the airport.  The staff were adequately friendly and helpful, all in all no complaints whatsoever.  I would come again if needing to stay in this part of town.  Just read a review mentioning that it's difficult to find.  That's true, none of the rickshaw drivers around Andheri station knew where it was.  Down points: Breakfast a bit mediocre and WIFI managed by passwords that only last 4 hours, must have used about 10 in total.  Not a major issue, but could have been done better, Plus point, the router was outside my door!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: anba3010
Detailed Review: The room is nice considering Mumbai rate are usually high and it is very convenient. The hotel rates are among the cheapest that I can find but the rooms are clean and cozy. The double bed given is quite large and I think 3 people can sleep easily on the mattrees The bathroom is okay.    Nearby to Dadar Railway Station, Bus station and Taxi Stand. It is also walking Distance to Dadar shopping area. The staff are friendly and good service given. The only problem is surrounding which the hotel is located......it is quite dirty and smelly when you have to pass through waste sorting area. Despite this shortcoming I would certainly go again and I have already booked to stay there next year February. Rooms are hard to get in that area. It is convenient for me to get down from the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: hhhbkdx
Detailed Review: there is smell of smoke everywhere . the staff wants tip for everything they do .the rooms are short. the bed was not in good condition. the food was terrible . i found hair in my mango shake. very far from shops and restaurents .there is a cigarette factory nearby. it is situated in the middle of nowhere.this is not a good hotel to stay if you want to explore mumbai & have fun with your family.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SK1960
Detailed Review: Good pricing. The location was good. Rooms need improvement, The food was decent. Was there for a night only and most of the time was out so really cannot comment on this hotel. The staff were ok, courteous but need some more training properly.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: whoami345
Detailed Review: We stayed here a few times but had a very bad experience the last time we went after which we stopped going here. Having stayed here a few times we thought we could trust the place and left behind some cash in a locked suitcase. After we left the hotel and reached home we realised someone had opened the number lock behind us and stolen part of the cash we left behind! That was pretty smart cos before leaving we just checked for the pile of cash and it was there, never bothered counting. One of the staff stole part of the cash. We wrote to the hotel management who promised action but nothing came back.  Before this incident that we were ok with the hotel. It suited our need as a budget hotel for staying a night or two. Food is simple and good. However the room quality kept‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: abhi10_star
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 1 night only. Room & bathroom are very small, location is not so good. Decorative lights on bed were attractive, we liked it very much. Room service is slow and food quality is fine. Breakfast was not good. We were committed for complimentary airport drop but hotel staff could not arrange it on time and we waited for almost 35 minutes even though they were aware that we are getting late for our flight. Finally we left from there by auto and even argued with hotel staff to pay for it but they refused to pay it, this shows the attitude of poor service. Sorry to say that "Le Grande" is just an average hotel not according to what they charged from us !!

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: A Tripadvisor Member
Detailed Review: Intrepid. That's the tour company that we were with when we started our trip from Mumbai to Delhi. Intepid apparently means 'Daring' or 'Fearless' and you'd have to be to stay in this crap fest. I honestly thought I'd been done over by the company. I mean, if your first night is bad, God, makes you think what else they've got lined up for you. And an extra nights stay in this thing through Intrepid costs ¬£20 for a twin room. I've stayed in nicer places in Delhi's backpacker district for half the price. Twin Room. That's misleading. What you've got is a single room with two of those childrens beds it it, you know, the ones you buy when they're 6 and by the time they hit 7, you wish you'd just gone and bought normal single sizes. Ha! fool you. And fool you again if you book here. ‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: indiatraveller68
Detailed Review: If you do not want to be conned and catch a terrible disease - DO NOT STAY AT THIS DREADFUL HOTEL EVER. I had booked a 'Deluxe'!!! room before my tour started and was plonked into what can only be described as a disgustingly dirty, dangerous prison cell facing the road so the constant noise was unbearable. My bathroom window was broken and I had 2 pigeons for company; the air con wires were wound round a metal curtain pole and live wires showing; most of the sockets were hanging off the wall; dirty linen and mould on the walls. I complained to the useless reception man who waved his hand at me and said it was a 'Deluxe'.  After demanding to then view a standard and another deluxe, the man was very nervous and I saw that my room was disgusting compared to the standard room and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: CarolynPune
Review: Don't know the meaning of the word clean
Detailed Review: stayed there 2 nights Feb 2012, the first night we both got bitten alive by bed bugs, little flat buggars with lots of legs,neither the room nor bathroom was clean, I didn't care about the peeling paint the chipped furniture, cracked tiles , ancient plumbing or any of the other shabby surroundings but there is no excuse for filth in a country where labour is so cheap, soap and water costs nothing. I complained the next day and we shifted rooms but the second room was almost  as filthy as the first,  we did not get bitten on the second night.  The sheets and towels had been laundered and the staff were pleasant and helpfull.  I paid the same price per night as I would in a premier inn in the UK, which is small but spotless and very comfortable, if it can be done in UK where‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: paul t
Detailed Review: Please do not book at this hotel. It is dingy and uncared for but stiil worse they allow the porters to use guests rooms when they are out. We had been out for five hours during the day, on returning we had a quick shower (cold I might add) asked for clean bedding as the duvet looked grubby, enquired at the desk directions to  nearby restaurant. As we werer exhausted we were only out an hour. On our return our room key was not in reception, I ran upstairs to try the room door, it was unlocked and a porter was lounging on our bed under the duvet amongst my clothing. The hotel management just said "sorry" no offer of changing rooms or help to find another hotel. They then started beating the boy, which was totally unacceptable and distressing. Keys were the managers‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: lari15
Review: Average property for a business traveller
Detailed Review: The overall property is average. The rooms are overall average. I had put up for a business trip, looking at the location. Food service is tolerable, bathrooms are just workable. Considering the cost and location, the property can be considered for stayting.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Gawthaman S
Detailed Review: flew in from kuala lumpur on 16th Jan 2012, and was picked up by travel agents and visited mahaluxmi temple and siddivinayak temple, finally checked into bawa regency at 6.30pm. the reception staff Ms Sheetal made very quick and efficient check in. the rooms were old but well maintained. we had 5 rooms to us, all 14 people travelling. many of my group are 1st time mumbai visit. toilets were clean, beds comfy and clean towels. hotel doesn't have a eating hall, so they send complimentary breadfast to the rooms. we had toasted bread, puri, omlett with coffee and tea.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SunshineDec2011
Review: Cockroaches, Mold, under investigation for fraud!
Detailed Review: We booked online in advance from America and when we arrived at the hotel they did not honor our paid booking and charged us another $72 for a room.  We had nowhere to go so reluctantly stayed the night.  There were large cockroaches crawling on the walls at night and the ceilings were filled with mold.  There was no shower stall, just a bucket on the floor.  To make matters worse the front desk staff are rude, arrogant and unhelpful.  Nirmal Daas and Giselle were staffing the desk and they deserved to be fired for the way they treat guests.  They are currently being investigates for fraud as they do not honor reservations that are prepaid and charge your credit card again and they lie about it!

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: xavierprabhu
Detailed Review: this is the third time am staying at the hotel and must say this is just good value for money and dont expect any frills. the rooms are clean. they provide airport transfers and wi-fi and breakfast is OK. infact it was better before and this trip found they have dropped one or two more items from the menu. but still by mumbai standards it is true value for money. only thing is that its access is not that good nor is it on the main road. if you dont know the place you can get losst a bit.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Lui_jime
Detailed Review: Toilette discusting, and although we asked to please clean it, after 4 hours had been no reaction. The location is close to the Dadar Station (WALKING DISTANCE 10 MIN) but very busy and dirty.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ShaktiAgrawal
Detailed Review: Because of the some constrain (distance to office location), my company arranged my trip with this (Le Grande) Hotel. The experience was terrible from the beginning itself.  The rooms are too small and you will not find even space to move around in the room. The AC sounds like hell and finally I had switched off the AC and continued my stay with fan only. :( The staff and management are so restless about the payment, that every day (morning and evening) they were ask for the payment which was very embarrassing, although it was book through there channel only. I have given my cloth for wash and iron and they have lost almost ¬Ω of them :( The morning breakfast and room service also had problem like slow service and food quantity / quality.  In all, I will not recommend this hotel‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: visualiser
Detailed Review: I was in Mubai for 3 days and stayed at this hotel. Check in was smooth and the price was very reasonable considering that the hotel is in Mumbai. However, please note that this hotel is in a small lane and is quite difficult to locate unless ur taxi driver knows it. There is really nothing around it but a school.  The rooms are of decent size and the cleanliness is average. Dont expect to find absolutely white sheets !! The restaurant is pathetic; there is absolutely nothing there except 3 tables and the breakfast spread is a big farce; only toast and eggs. Tea/coffee. That's it.  I partly recommend this hotel as a great budget hotel, only if you're alone travelling and not with family. Overall, good value for money

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Atul A
Review: OK OK Hotel, does not justify Bawa Group Level
Detailed Review: I stayed there for 2 days in Oct, Hotel is OK OK .. Like a lounge or Inn. They do not have any restaurent or dinning area, rooms are not upto mark as seepage is visible very much.   Toilets does not have proper air out.. But if you can bargain then its ok Hotel in that area. Only best part I liked is there food. Food is good. Food was on room service.. Otherwise I would say .. It does not comes to the level of Bawa group of hotels... May be they need to work a little more on this property.

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: SAMAREN
Review: A GOOD HOTEL FOR BUDGET TRAVELLER
Detailed Review: I stayed at this Hotel(Our Bank's Holiday Home) in August'2011 and the stay was very comfortable.The best thing I liked about this property is its convinient location.It is very close to Dadar Railway Station,Mumbai.Rooms are very spacious with all the utilities.Staff are cordial and service is very good.SiddhiVinayak Temple is walkable from the Hotel.The famous Dadar market is very close and one can go for shopping as well as an evening stroll.

Source.Name: Le_Grande-Mumbai2.csv
Name: prodeeptadas
Review: Best to avoid at all cost
Detailed Review: Despite confirming pick up time before leaving for Mumbai, I had to wait over 90 minutes in the sweltering heat for the driver.  The shower did not have hot water.  The towels were torn and dirty.  The bed probably was home to bed bugs as I could not sleep all night and was bitten in many places!!!!!!!

Source.Name: Bawa_Regency-Mumbai2.csv
Name: ALAG
Review: Disgusting hotel, dont go even near this place!!
Detailed Review: Everywhere its dirty, looks like nobody is cleaning the room. Dust everywhere. Stain on the bedsheet and pillow covers. Disgusting bathroom. Not even a single English channel. No hot water in the shower. Did not even provide tissue paper in the bathroom. Food is not good. They have only omelet for bfast. Coffee is awfull. Staff are friendly though but the hotel should be categorize as 1 star and not 3 star. It looks good on the website but in reality its all a lie.  Even If your on a budget don‚Äôt go this hotel. Im sure there are other better 3 star hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Fortune-Mumbai2.csv
Name: Venkatesh S
Review: Very average for the money spent
Detailed Review: Happened to stay in this hotel thinking that going for my business meetings would be easy. The location is fantastic as it is near Metro and approachable from both Churchgate and CST. It was easy as most of the meetings were in Nariman Point and Fort area. But should have taken any other decent hotel.  Inside the hotel ‚Äì the reception is small and the lift is so small that only one person with a luggage can stand in. The lobby area was not looking good and it was stinking a little.  The room also was like that. There are two single cot bed on either side of the room.
