Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jimbo065
Detailed Review: Was ok as a base but disappointed with the food offered. English poorly spoken and as we could not speak Hindi it was a struggle. The lift was out of order for most of the stay which proved a nuisance.  Not the best ‚Äòfirst impression‚Äô of the country.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: JA K
Detailed Review: Despite being described as a nicer area of the city, it didn't present as a great first impression when we arrived  in a smoggy Delhi but our minds were changed over our stay here due to excellent staff and dining.... breakfast and home cooked dinner. It's not especially well placed for walking out anywhere although we did find a bar locally but for those travellers wanting to avoid the soul-less chains and seeking a friendly personal touch then a great place to stay. Lovely owners.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Simon R
Detailed Review: The Colonel‚Äôs Retreat is a fantastic caring family run guest house. Great location, staff attentive, breakfast, tea and dinner delicious. Eat every evening in the hotel on rooftop terrace. Metro in easy walking distance making the city attractions easy accessible  Highly recommend . Thank you for a great holiday in Delhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bert d
Review: Start and finish of our 6-week visit to India
Detailed Review: The hotel's location is ideal, right in the middle of all the colour and action of Old Delhi. The breakfast each morning was the highlight of the day. The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. Mr. Rashid in particular was a fountain of good advice and reassurance.  When we had a difficulty with the delivery of a pricey purchase we had made, he placed the critical phone call that set things right. The rooms are variable in quality and on our second visit we had one of the better ones. There is a great cafe right across the street.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Emmus V
Detailed Review: After years looking for a great hotel in Delhi I found Ajanta. The location it‚Äôs perfect, the rooms are spacious, clean and bed super comfortable.  Ravinder is the best help in the hotel, super efficient, always available and looking for the best options for us.  I would highly reccomend to stay at Ajanta! Don‚Äôt think much this is the place

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ronal Prasad
Detailed Review: This is a very nice boutique hotel in the centre of town, the staff at the hotel are always available to help, there is a coffee shop in the building opposite the hotel and local shops all around. The travel centre within hotel is fantastic, they can arrange all types of tours with excellent English speaking guides and very comfortable cars, we would highly recommend you speak to Mr Rashid at the in house travel agency for all your India tours, the also specialize in Kashmir tours.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Peter and joan R
Detailed Review: We stayed here for the 4th time.....en route to the ganges. Awesome staff  so helpful and cant do enough to help....hotel is central to everything including shops, markets and the railway station. The travel agents on site helped us with our trip to see the taj mahal and our trip to rishikesh and back......i would highly recommend your next stay at the ajanta hotel....you can contact mr rasheed.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Stefjk1970
Detailed Review: Our stay was so nice here, Hari and Amman were so helpful, I love this hotel. Good location , breakfast was ok ,lovely coffee shop opposite ,taxi always on hand when you need it. I would recommend this hotel ,I miss this place already. Hotel Ajanta your staff are amazing :-)

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Amy G
Detailed Review: I stayed here twice on my trip to India - coming in and out of Delhi. It is quite central and located near the main bazaar. Rooms are basic, but clean. (The pictures that are uploaded to TripAdvisor are not accurate as to how the hotel actually looks but they are doing some remodelling at the moment.) Buffet breakfast is included (you can ask them to make you an omellete or fried egg as well!) The staff were very friendly. Special thanks to Ravinder for his help during our stay!  Estuve dos veces en este hotel - llegando y saliendo de Delhi. Es central, cerca del bazaar. Las habitaciones son b√°sicas, pero limpio. (Las fotos colgadas en TripAdvisor no son de este hotel, est√°n en obras ahora.) Desayuno bufet esta incluido (y les pudes pedir una tortilla francesa o huevo frito‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ralf W
Detailed Review: Nice Hotel with very friendly and helpful employees. Very good breakfast und a restaurant with tasty meals for a good price. Additionally Mr. Zahoor was very helpful to organize our trip with tickets for trains, driver and city-sightseeing.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sightsee51715090374
Detailed Review: Room adequate very comfortable bed.  The bathroom a bit shabby but a good shower. Mini bar in room a godsend for cold water. Staff, friendly helpful and you are never left waiting. The restaurant serves great food the mutton rogan josh and butter nan excellent and very good value for money. If you are looking for a hotel in Delhi for a couple of nights this is to be recommended. Angela UK

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: ABC123
Detailed Review: I have booked 2.5 months before for my family, after reaching the they are not providing the rooms as per my booking. Lift is not available, providing 3rd floor accommodation. After repeated request rooms provided without AC and without window and ventilation, rooms are terrible. if you are looking for it please do not book it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Poo Lin S
Review: Centrally located, but with a dark spot
Detailed Review: The hotel is ideally located in an area of Delhi that I love ie in close proximity to the railway station. There are many local restaurants - as well as the main bazar; within easy walking distance. At a stretch, one can even walk to Connaught Place. The rooms are of an adequate size, and clean enough; although the WiFi does not work in the rooms, only in the lobby area on the ground floor. Likewise, English movie channels were impossible to get on TV.  However, a word of warning to gullible and naive travellers:  embedded within the hotel is a tour agency called ‚ÄúFriends Travel Service‚Äù; and the 2 shyster operators pounce on the unwary like me, offering exorbitant tiger safaris and tours-all meals included; and then later rescinding on the deal, after payment. What they fail to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: DIYA RAMJHEETUN-NARAIN
Review: Went there as a guest and living like a family
Detailed Review: Words are not enough to praise Mr Rasheed and his team.  Mr Rasheed, an elder brother who has always been here for us - we arrived on 15 November 2018 - our stay was for only 2 days and it's 28 November 2018 we are still in Ajanta Hotel.  The hotel became our home.  The staff is warm and attentive.   MR Rasheed guided us and provided us the best trip to Rajasthan at affordable rates. ( Agra-Jaipur-Pushkar : we got good hotels with breakfast, clean and safe car with driver, guides)  Mr Rasheed always here to guide us and provide us all the necessary materials/information- he helped us in uncountable ways: provided us the best driver Ashoka bhaiya for Delhi tour, arranged our train tickets for Mumbai, guide us for shopping and many others.  Honestly speaking Mr Rasheed has been a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Emily M
Detailed Review: So I will list the pros and cons we found with hotel Ajanta and you can decide what you think for yourselves:  Pros 1. Central location - close to old delhi and close to New Delhi railway and metro stations 2. Room was big and good for the price (approx ¬£30 per night), the bed was big and comfortable 3. Free airport pick up - the driver was waiting for us at the assigned gate when we got out of the airport, he was friendly and knowledgeable about the area 4. The restaurant was great, we ate there 2 out of 3 nights, the staff were friendly and the food was tasty and well priced.  Cons 1. When we arrived at the hotel off our 8 hour flight, all we wanted was to go to our room, have a shower and a rest. Instead, we were taken to a side room for ‚Äòtourist info‚Äô where we were asked to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Adventure68347180700
Detailed Review: The services provided were great. Zahoor Baktoo was very helpful. Helped us plan your trip. Also took great efforts for confirming tickets for us. Gave us great advice on where to visit. Helped us save a lot of time.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Guide17900768672
Detailed Review: The service was very good. Loved the hospitality. The food was great. A variety of food was offered. The reception staff was very professional. Overall the staff was very helpful. The rooms were spacious and very clean.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: SIRAJ Q
Detailed Review: I stayed at this place for 5 nights..I booked a deluxe room through make my trip..But as I had to check in early I called at the hotel..And Mr.Amit on the phone told me that it would be good for me to upgrade to superior room as we were four.When I checked in my room it was good decision.My superior room was on 4th floor very spacious with beautiful interior.The hotel staff at reception and room service staff are always eager to help..Mr Abhay was at my checkout time at 6am in the morning..He was also very helping as we needed any car service for airport drop..The hotel location is very close to new Delhi railway station.The hotel lane is always busy with tourists ...And it is center to tourist places... Definitely will recommend to others...Thank you for your nice hospitality..

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: feltybag
Detailed Review: Great hospitality at the Ajanta, central and easy to find, this hotel is accessible and welcoming. We arranged a great trip for the week and received good local advice. The food was excellent, staff went over and above their usual duties to help us. They paid attention to detail ....helping us with WiFi late at night, carrying and storing our luggage, letting us choose a different room with a bigger window and providing a car and a lovely driver to find an atm! Aman was charming and very aware of what we needed to make our trip special. He had a great sense of humour and even let us use a room to take a shower before our flight, excellent service, thank you.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: BATHLAPAYAL
Detailed Review: One of the Best Budgeted Hotels in Delhi I must say with connectivity all over. When it comes to service or food everything is just awesome. Personally I am glad that I get good assistance always from Mr Santosh on my bookings and stay. Hotel has its 24hrs running cafe and restaurant so you can water your mouth anytym wdout any concern of the timings. Quality of Bed comfort to bathroom Hygiene it‚Äôs just remarkable. Almost every 2mths I have my visit out of India even and for that even I avoid staying in Aerocity as the droppage to Airport by the Hotel Ajanta always make it convienient for me no matter whatever time the Flight is and it just takes 30mn.  So the Best Hotel in the amidst of Delhi well connected to Railway Station ,Airport, Metro and Market with best food quality‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Firoz A
Detailed Review: Conveniently located minutes away from the New Delhi Railway Station & Airport, Hotel Ajanta is the perfect place for business and/or pleasure. Gorgeous lobby, facility and rooms worthy to tell all your friends about. I felt there like home. Breakfast was great with options of different cuisines, I loved that they have numerous kinds of breads. Nice shopping areas nearby. I have recommended this hotel to my friends and family and would definitely return back to this hotel only when we come back to Delhi. Best of Luck Team.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: LFM
Review: Good value for money (for certain rooms)
Detailed Review: We spent one night at our arrival in India and one night before leaving Delhi. Our first impression was not very good but it became much better very fast. Our first night we were given a room without (proper) window (ok, there was one tiny one in the bathroom). However we asked for another room and they change us immediatly. The staff was very nice and helpful.  The morning later, we organized an 18 days trip around Rajhastan.The trip was very very great! The dirver Umed Singh was more than perfect and the hotels selection was very good. Coming back we asked for the room on the 4th floor, and these rooms are definitely better than the ones on other floors. So do not hesitate to ask for those one. The area of the hotel is not very appealling but once inside, (especially on the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Narinder Singh
Detailed Review: I stayed in this place in November for two nights during my Delhi tour.Room was nice comparison to price.Bathroom was clean.The staff was good.They always helpful to us.They have a open roof with small garden.We spent our dinner there. Overall the stay was excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raman Deep
Detailed Review: Its Nice Hotel Staff also Good Room Also clean staff very Good way of Talking Good So Am Advice you if you come Delhi you Can Visit Amex Hotel Paharganj  Food Also Nice House keeping Staff Also Very Good

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Umesh R
Detailed Review: I was stay at amax inn.it was excellent place to stay in paharganj.the rooms are so clean and the staff was very helpfull.the food was amazing there and food was very hiyznic and good.the hotel is having a roof top restaurant with good atmosphere and helping staff.it was nice and pleasant stay at amax.thanks Umesh rawal

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ethan
Detailed Review: Stayed here with my wife. The hotel staff was phenomenally nice. The rooms were exceptionally clean and the AC and fan worked great at night. The shower could have had better pressure but that's my only complaint.   Would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Idrees Gandhi
Detailed Review: This is my 2nd visit to Amax Inn...like my last visit Amax Inn gave us perfect treatment... good cosy room and smiling staff... best part is they let us choose our room..thank u for your service and keep it up.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jatinder S Dhillon
Detailed Review: I come back after year to Amax inn . It's perfect stay as usual. The Rooms are clean and bath rooms are hygineic. The staff is welcoming with super hospitalty. The roof top food is surprisingly up to raste. Best recommend and coming back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Excursion38993624183
Detailed Review: Staff is polite and cooperative and liked the hospitality the most. Value for money hotel and must stay once while you are in Delhi. Best room service was offered here among my various stays. Food was pleasant and quality wise good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Daydream829409
Detailed Review: I stayed here because I came across it in Lonely Planet. It's a nice enough place to stay, but I wouldn't want to stay there for any longer than two or three nights. The AC worked well, hot water was pretty good too (you have to ask them to turn on the boiler 15 minutes before you want to shower), and tuk-tuks are plentiful in Pahar Ganj, so getting around was easy enough.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: LFM
Review: Good value for money (for certain rooms)
Detailed Review: We spent one night at our arrival in India and one night before leaving Delhi. Our first impression was not very good but it became much better very fast. Our first night we were given a room without (proper) window (ok, there was one tiny one in the bathroom). However we asked for another room and they change us immediatly. The staff was very nice and helpful.  The morning later, we organized an 18 days trip around Rajhastan.The trip was very very great! The dirver Umed Singh was more than perfect and the hotels selection was very good. Coming back we asked for the room on the 4th floor, and these rooms are definitely better than the ones on other floors. So do not hesitate to ask for those one. The area of the hotel is not very appealling but once inside, (especially on the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Narinder Singh
Detailed Review: I stayed in this place in November for two nights during my Delhi tour.Room was nice comparison to price.Bathroom was clean.The staff was good.They always helpful to us.They have a open roof with small garden.We spent our dinner there. Overall the stay was excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raman Deep
Detailed Review: Its Nice Hotel Staff also Good Room Also clean staff very Good way of Talking Good So Am Advice you if you come Delhi you Can Visit Amex Hotel Paharganj  Food Also Nice House keeping Staff Also Very Good

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Umesh R
Detailed Review: I was stay at amax inn.it was excellent place to stay in paharganj.the rooms are so clean and the staff was very helpfull.the food was amazing there and food was very hiyznic and good.the hotel is having a roof top restaurant with good atmosphere and helping staff.it was nice and pleasant stay at amax.thanks Umesh rawal

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ethan
Detailed Review: Stayed here with my wife. The hotel staff was phenomenally nice. The rooms were exceptionally clean and the AC and fan worked great at night. The shower could have had better pressure but that's my only complaint.   Would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Idrees Gandhi
Detailed Review: This is my 2nd visit to Amax Inn...like my last visit Amax Inn gave us perfect treatment... good cosy room and smiling staff... best part is they let us choose our room..thank u for your service and keep it up.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jatinder S Dhillon
Detailed Review: I come back after year to Amax inn . It's perfect stay as usual. The Rooms are clean and bath rooms are hygineic. The staff is welcoming with super hospitalty. The roof top food is surprisingly up to raste. Best recommend and coming back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Excursion38993624183
Detailed Review: Staff is polite and cooperative and liked the hospitality the most. Value for money hotel and must stay once while you are in Delhi. Best room service was offered here among my various stays. Food was pleasant and quality wise good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Daydream829409
Detailed Review: I stayed here because I came across it in Lonely Planet. It's a nice enough place to stay, but I wouldn't want to stay there for any longer than two or three nights. The AC worked well, hot water was pretty good too (you have to ask them to turn on the boiler 15 minutes before you want to shower), and tuk-tuks are plentiful in Pahar Ganj, so getting around was easy enough.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: subham d
Review: A great Experience you can have
Detailed Review: Situated very near to airport this hostel provides you with the best facilities a budget traveller can have. The hostel is situated at Mohammadpur well connected with metro access from all directions and cab services.  I booked an 8-bed dormitory and the room was clean and the linen and blanket provided were so comfortable. The bathrooms were clean with toilet papers provided and it has 24*7 running hot water.  The friendly staff were so great and were available round the clock and the dinner was great with the cook cooking a fresh meal with a cost. The rooftop is something one would love to spend the most relaxing time for his trip.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Namfon B
Review: I stay at 2 ningth in New Dalhi
Detailed Review: I selected my room tpye Dorm 6 Female 2 bathrooms¬†inside very clean and comfortably staffs nice and helpful and I like living room on rooftop be wide and not far from the train station easy come ,easy go.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Peter Anthony
Review: Fine but not worth the price
Detailed Review: This hostel is fine, not bad, but certainly not great. The location is not central and it can be a little difficult to find. They do give a free breakfast - hard boiled egg, toast, banana and chai - and they have a nice rooftop. However, our room was dirty and too expensive for the price. They also offer a walking tour which is just as expensive as a professional tour service (I would recommend Reality Tours which gives 80% of their money to an NGO for education in the slums instead). Compared to other hostels we stayed in during our trip to India, this is one I would skip.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: steve p
Detailed Review: Stopped here for three nights on our first visit to Delhi. The location is bang in the middle of Pahaganj in the main bazaar. This area is an absolute assault on all of your senses...at once as soon as you arrive so beware if you don't want that. As it is though the hostel offers an oasis from the madness in its rooftop area. It will provide drinks, snacks and breakfast which is cheap and of good quality. The room we stayed in was small with only enough room for a double bed and a separate shower and toilet but it was relatively clean, everything worked and it was secure, and it was also good value for money. The hostel has a travel service called Gotravi based there who can arrange pretty much anything you want to do and their rates seemed reasonable and can be trusted unlike‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Angelina A
Detailed Review: Smyle Inn is a great place to stay! The location is very good and safe. Nice and comfortable room. The rooftop terrace is very nice, where you can enjoy and relax. They serve good food and drinks. The hotel has got their own booking office, where you can book all you need through mr.Richie. He's very friendly, professional, honest and provides you the best service!  The manager and all the staff, especially Ravi are wonderful! They help you with everything you need. They're very friendly. We'll definitely come back again! Really nothing to complain about.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: steve p
Review: We were stayed 1 night just amazing
Detailed Review: Stopped here for three nights on our first visit to Delhi. The location is bang in the middle of Pahaganj in the main bazaar. This area is an absolute assault on all of your senses...at once as soon as you arrive so beware if you don't want that. They serve good food and drinks. The hotel has got their own booking office, where you can book all you need through mr.Richie. He's very friendly, professional, honest and provides you the best service!  The manager and all the staff, especially Ravi are wonderful! They help you with everything you need. They're very friendly. We'll definitely come back again! Really nothing to complain about.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: LOUISE B
Detailed Review: We stayed 2 nights at this family run hotel. Our room was very comfortable and clean. The food was excellent and what made dinner special was the owners joined us on the roof to explain the array of delights on our plate. The staff were attentive and friendly. It was a great start to our stay in India.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bobbi S
Review: Perfect Respite From Delhi's Non-Stop Noise
Detailed Review: We found this to be the perfect, and aptly-named retreat, being where it is in the quiet, tree-lined and upscale, Defence Colony. Arun, the incredibly engaging, worldly, and knowledgeable gentleman who says he "masquerades" as the owner (he really IS the co-owner but seems to love the power and play of words), along with his wife, Suman, keep a close eye and involvement in their boutique hotel, and the very attentive staff follows suit. We especially enjoyed our evening and morning chats with Arun, learning from him about the 31 species of birds who swing by (as well as the fruit bats, munching away at night!), his world travels, Indian and American politics and cultures, how the Colonel's Retreat came to be (notice that each floor has the same exact layout, as this used to be a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sarah W
Review: Gem and great place to start your travels
Detailed Review: Gem of a hotel and a good location to explore both old and New Delhi. The rooms are spacious and you feel you are in a family home who care about you having a great experience. The hosts are welcoming, speak fluent English and the rooftop restaurant offers tasty food, especially the banana cake.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Flyer43667465588
Detailed Review: We spent one night at the Colonel's Retreat. Our room was very comfortable and the service from staff was attentive and friendly. Our evening meal on the roof top was excellent and tea and coffee was plentiful during our stay.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: kateS
Detailed Review: Lovely relaxing place to stay in Delhi.  Rooms are fairly basic but comfortable and open onto a nice seating area.  The roof terrace is great and breakfast and dinner served here was very tasty and enjoyable with a range of drinks available to wash it down.  The owners are very friendly and welcoming and I would definitely stay here again.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sheryl C
Review: Lovely place to land after a long flight!
Detailed Review: Quiet, immaculate, gracious home. Delicious food served on rooftop. Owners speak fluent English and recommended local attractions. Modern bathroom with hot shower. A wonderful place to begin our tour of Northern India.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Penny W
Detailed Review: We stayed one night and left most of our luggage and returned after visiting Varanasi. We enjoyed our stay greatly with excellent service and delicious breakfasts and dinner in the rooftop restaurant. Nothing too much trouble and  a relaxed and homely feel. In a great neighbourhood and easy access to many places. Thankyou very much.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: peter g
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat was our first accommodation of a 2 week tour in India. Fresh from the plane, we found the cool comfort and family welcome most relaxing. Staff were attentive and helpful and the accommodation both comfortable and very good value.  Very good North Indian cuisine is served in the rooftop restaurant and the proprietors introduced themselves to us, making us feel extremely welcome and told us of their own travels within India and abroad.  The Defence Colony is a safe and comparatively quiet location away from the hustle and bustle of Delhi but convenient for sightseeing.  A stay here is definitely recommended!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Arielle H
Review: Comfortable room and friendly and attentive service
Detailed Review: Very enjoyable and comfortable stay at the Colonel's retreat in the quiet and green Defence Colony neighborhood. The staff are very hospitable and attentive. The rooms are cozy especially with A/C. The charming rooftop terrasse is ideal for breakfast or dinner.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: TimHF-D
Detailed Review: Comfortable and conveniently located BnB. Very quiet with a nice roof terrace for breakfast. Walking distance to some good places to eat in Defence Colony well frequented by locals. A good alternative to a cheap hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jayesh
Detailed Review: I have visited since 2014 so pleast visit soon and also enjoy family to satay hotel ajanta hotel very soon and also launch and dinner so delightfull so please enjoy  and also your family to stay very soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: John-Tuffin
Review: Dependable for quality of welcome, cleanliness and comfort
Detailed Review: I have stayed at Ajanta many times since 2007. My last visit was in October 2018.  It‚Äôs one of my favourite hotels.  Each time the people there have welcomed me and looked after me well.  The service is helpful and efficient, the rooms are clean and spacious, the beds are comfortable, and the food is good both in the restaurant and via room service.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: TomG
Detailed Review: The location of the hotel is good, a 20 minute walk or 5 minute auto rickshaw ride to Connaught Place. The hotel is nice and had an old colonial feel to it. The staff were all quite good, except when we asked for a price for taxis from Delhi to Agra and through Rajasthan, the price seemed excessively high. We didn‚Äôt take their offer and later found it was much cheaper (1/3 of the price) by booking each trip separately and though other providers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tushar S
Detailed Review: Excellent quality of service and accommodation. Room service is also good. The breakfast buffet has a good variety. Rooms are big and fabulous d√©cor with 24hours hot water. Staff is friendly and available to answer any question from front desk. We have enjoyed our stay a lot and will be back to this wonderful property whenever back to Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: jelly54321
Detailed Review: This was the first hotel we stayed in once arriving in India - it was in a great location close to the train station and Connaught Place, the staff were very welcoming and gave us a lovely chai tea on arrival and the room was comfortable!  Gen and Owen

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Phil a
Detailed Review: My friend and I checked into the Ajanta Hotel whet we meet Mr Baktoo. He arranged our visit to Jaipur, Agra, Jodhpur, Pushkar and Udaipoor. Included in the tour were guided visits to forts, markets and a jeep safari in Ranthambore National Park. This was my favourite and we were lucky to see 3 tigers. The Taj Mahal was pretty cool to too! The hotels were generally good and when there was cause for complaint (dodgy air conditioning unit, no water in the pool! ) Mr B offered to pay for our evening meals in the hotels. On the last day we paid for a visit to a top notch hotel for a swim and a meal. Disappointingly, the pool was not open to visitors...but the food was OK. At all times we were in a taxi driven by Narayan, who deserves a medal for his awesome driving skills. All in all‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lilja H
Review: Great place to start and end out holiday
Detailed Review: Very friendly service, lovey rooms and good food- booked through Rashid at Friends Travel Services and we were very happy with our stay as we arrived in Delhi and before we departed after a golden triangle tour.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anil V
Detailed Review: Excellent Ajanta hotel,excellent staff, excellent food, near New Delhi Station,I enjoyed staying there,A home away from home,I strongly recommend.I stayed in the month of October 2018.I stay there only if in Delhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vivek S
Review: Nice & Safe Hotel In New Delhi
Detailed Review: In my stay here the best thing for me  a smile. Front desk are like the soul of this place, they will go an extra mile to assist you, they will always smile and assist you for any inquiries. I am extremely happy with my stay there because of these people who always give their whole heart to serve! And last but not least, the F&B staff is just excellent! When they serve the food, always greet, talk and recommend politely with his care! Absolutely amazing for you all! The room condition is Very good, super clean and tidy with full amenities set up. Standing applause!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ty Mar
Detailed Review: Every morning I was welcomed with the best cappuccino in Delhi! And that's a bold statement as I travel heavily and have very picky tastes. Fantastic hotel close to New Delhi railway made traveling here via the Metro super simple. Well done Ajanta!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: supratim m
Review: Nice hotel,but not professional with regards to billing
Detailed Review: We stayed in this hotel on 15th October 2018. Overall Good with respect to, *Room cleanliness *Facilities provided *Location(walk able distance to new Delhi railway station, lots of eateries around)  However still I am not happy because of non-transparency in their early check-in policy. Few points: 1. while we were coming to Delhi we called them up and requested them for early check-in. They mentioned they charge Rs.700/- for early check-in 2. we requested them that we are also checking out early and requested them to consider the charge of Rs. 700/-. The lady in the call mentioned they will check if any room is available while we check-in. 3. when we checked-in, the guy at the reception asked us to wait for 30 mins and the room will be ready. He never mentioned about the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: PGtips60
Detailed Review: The Ajanta is a good place to start your exploration of this amazing country. The food was great and the staff were polite and always willing to help. The travel  service is also worth a look if you don't known what to do first. We took a 10 day tour which was arranged quickly and efficiently. Just remember that India is a   big old country so when planning your trips make sure you find out how much of your holiday you will spend traveling. Try the trains,  as well as travelling by road. Loved Jaipur and Agra is as good as it looks on the postcards. All in all a great visit. We also saw tigers in Ranthambore!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Baskar
Detailed Review: Some Suite rooms comes with balcony, it's not a private balcony, it's connected to adjacent rooms balcony, privacy will not be there. Rooms furniture, cleanliness is good. Toilet is well lit, ventilated and hygienic. Most of the times warm water only comes, probably solar system. Breakfast spread and taste is good, but most of the dishes are cold. Corridors are maintained well. Travel service is good and comparable/less than Ola. Due to its location getting in and out will be difficult due to narrow roads and heavy traffic.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gala R
Review: Nice hotel and super friendly staff
Detailed Review: I spent a couple of days in Delhi and enjoyed my stay at the hotel. They arranged for a pick up and drop off service to / from airport, and also a half day excursion around Delhi; all the staff were friendly and super accommodating. The only problem for me was the traffic noise, which only calms down at night by a fraction, but I guess this cannot be helped in that part of Delhi. The room was clean and really nice, I felt safe and looked after as a solo traveller on my return leg of the journey. The restaurant serves nice food and the service is good; also check out the cafe with their cakes just across the road. Would definitely stay at the hotel again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: William H
Review: safe and clean hotel with great restaurant but be wary of scammers
Detailed Review: I had a reservation at Hotel Ajanta but was the victim of a very common scam to convince me that the hotel was closed and I'd have to go to the "Government Tourist Office" (like hell it is), and find something else. If anyone comes up to you at the train station and says "hello, where are you from; where are you going?", they will probably be a scammer, lie to you about your hotel being closed and even offer to call it for you (as long as they dial the phone). I fell for it the first night but fortunately tried calling Hotel Ajanta the next day (dialing myself). They explained that the scam is common and would send a cab to pick me up at the scammer hotel. Fortunately, Hotel Ajanta didn't charge me for a no-show the first night. So, TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE HOTEL FREE PICKUP at‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: winstonc283
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Ajanta Hotel in Delhi and had a great time there. The staff are friendly and accommodating. They booked all my excursions, Agra to Jaipur. They were even able to get me train tickets to Amritsar. Along with the Taj Mahal you have to see the Golden Temple in Amritsar. Had a great holiday. Can not wait to go to India again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: buddytravellor
Review: A perfect place to stay in New Delhi
Detailed Review: Nice stay at Hotel Ajanta my favorite hotel in Delhi, everything was perfect nice rooms, Pick up was on time. Room was very neat and clean. Front desk staff was very helpful. I took a tour from them which was so good with good driver. Would definitely recommend this hotel to my relatives and friends.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Seaside822018
Detailed Review: The Hotel was well located for tourist sites as well as shopping. The breakfast was substantial with a good variety. Ajanta Tour Service's Zahoor was fantastic in formulating an itinerary that was excellent. Considering the number of days we had, Zahoor structured a well organised tour of the Golden Triangle. Professional tour guides were provided in Jaipur and Agra. The Driver, Narayan, was also helpful and efficient.  V.Pillay - South Africa

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Indran V
Detailed Review: A fantastic Heritage hotel in the heart of New Delhi nearby Local Market and Railway Station. Amazing experience for the family especially to have a feel of the local market, transport chaos and local tradition you don't get in a 5 star environment.  Friendly staff who go the mile to make you comfortable. We had a family room, kids loved it. The food at the Restaurant was good. Credit goes to Zahoor, Hotel Travel Adviser who organised our trip to Agra, Jaipur and Varanasi including the Hotel, Transport, Local sightseeing and Guides (Ali in Agra and Vivek in Varanasi). Value for money and will recommend the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Andrew T
Detailed Review: Stayed for a few nights, room was very basic and looked nothing like the photographs but it was clean and very cheap to stay there. Food was above average in the area but cost about 50 percent more than elsewhere, the rooftop terrace and restaurant is a nice place to chill out and the staff were friendly.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: IsabelFoodie
Detailed Review: Arrived having booked a twin room to find we were given a double bed. With no twins available we had to pay extra to get a family room with one double and one single.  The room was clean at first but once we turned on the loud AC machine it blew dust everywhere. The towels were also very damp.   Most staff were very helpful sorting out cash and indian sims.  However, we booked a driver for 3 weeks and were promised we would have full authority over where we went. When asking to go To Bundi  we were told it was not possible for our itinerary. Only after much wasted time arguing were we allowed to change our route.   We also paid Amax Inn for two train tickets . One we cancelled and they tried to refund us only a fraction of the true cost, only after asking to see the receipt did‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Passenger827449
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel ever in New delhi very good behaviour and staff are very friendly very fast service and food is very good rooms are very clean And very good connectivity of wifi overall excellent good work keep it up ........And awesome experience in Delhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Youb Raj Basnet
Detailed Review: I analysed number of services of this hotel and say it as "Descent and Good Value" hotel.  Services:  I expected a fair services and the hotel met the expectation  1. Staff were very friendly and they tried helping us.  2. Room: Hotel provides cleaned bedsheet and blanket. It is well adequate for a short run stay. I had some work on laptop, apparently had to sit on the bed to work. The hotel has freeze but empty. Perhaps they have provided that to keep the drink from outside.   3. Lift  There were some problem in lift but it was fixed immediately.  4. Internet  The hotel had the internet but it was not working in rooms. A technician was there but it was not repaired till my stay.  4. Hotel Location  It is in Galli 6 of Paharganj which is bit congested. Well...finding hotel may‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Alok Mishra
Detailed Review: The hotel at its price is a nice option.  The pros:  Clean room, bathroom and linens Good restaurant Working AC WiFi acceptable Friendly staffs Smooth check in  Cons Location (congested  route) No dental kit No toiletries except soap No slipper   Yet chose it for the price and cleanliness.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: GOUTAM B
Review: Best place in Delhi with family  atmosphere
Detailed Review: One of my colleague told me about this place, he was stayed this place few months  before. I also feel very comfortable with  my family. All were very happy when they  are there.  The staff is very helpful with  good  behaviour.  Room was clean and in the bathroom  we got 24 hours hot water.  They  have a restaurant with delicious and tasty food . The hotel is near about  600 meter from New Delhi  railway  station. We will come again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: EdvNor
Detailed Review: Very helpful and kind staff. New Dehli is a chaotic city, but the staff helped with anything you could ask and more. The rooms are also nice with AC and wifi. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who would like to stay in Dehli affordable but nice.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: md g
Detailed Review: I am in Delhi Pahargonj Hotel Amax inn.  from 4th September. Even before I came to Delhi, many hotels were there, but I did not see any such kind of euphemism like this, honesty, friendly behavior, everything impressed me. Come on like me all like

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Odyssey822031
Detailed Review: Had stayed at Hotel Amax Inn,New Delhi. Really cooperative and polite staffs , the rooms are well cleaned , neat and tidy.. It‚Äôs really easily accessible. Anil sir was really very supportive.  I personally recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jagadeesh P
Detailed Review: It was really a homely feeling while staying at Hotel Amax Inn. Heart touching attention, care & Security. Would like to recommend whoever visits Delhi to have this wonderful experience of staying at  Amax. Truly an amazing experience.  Anil was really supportive and really helped us a lot.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ras l
Detailed Review: Perfect stay and good staff well mannered amd caring. Amax inn organised our trip to jaipur and we could leave our luggage in the hotel without any problem or any fees.100 % will come back to this hotel only. We ordered food from amax inn restaurant food was great just amazing 5 star and a big thank to Mr Anil manager of the hotethanks again the staff. Good mannered and will come back soon.JUST AMAZING

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Aarti C
Detailed Review: I travelled with my family to India. I always use Amax inn services for my stay and for other travel needs. This year hotel arrange a tour for us in Delhi and Jaipur. Arranged a toyota innova car for us the driver very nice person and hotel they gave us in Jaipur was very nice. Was a good travel arregment.  We will back soon  Thanks Anil and team

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: zitnyja
Detailed Review: Amazing Hotel in the center of Old Delhi. We had top floor room with terrace and it was very quite during the night. Our luggagge was kept and guarded  for five days for free when we were traveling around other Indian cities.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Peter K
Review: This hotel offers all you need
Detailed Review: Every year when I'm in Delhi I stay in hotel Amax Inn. This already for 7 years in a row. Why? Good rooms, good service, good food and very friendly staff. Mr. Anil Kumar and his staff are always ready to advice you in whatever matter you need.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Andrew T
Detailed Review: Stayed for a few nights, room was very basic and looked nothing like the photographs but it was clean and very cheap to stay there. Food was above average in the area but cost about 50 percent more than elsewhere, the rooftop terrace and restaurant is a nice place to chill out and the staff were friendly.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: IsabelFoodie
Detailed Review: Arrived having booked a twin room to find we were given a double bed. With no twins available we had to pay extra to get a family room with one double and one single.  The room was clean at first but once we turned on the loud AC machine it blew dust everywhere. The towels were also very damp.   Most staff were very helpful sorting out cash and indian sims.  However, we booked a driver for 3 weeks and were promised we would have full authority over where we went. When asking to go To Bundi  we were told it was not possible for our itinerary. Only after much wasted time arguing were we allowed to change our route.   We also paid Amax Inn for two train tickets . One we cancelled and they tried to refund us only a fraction of the true cost, only after asking to see the receipt did‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Passenger827449
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel ever in New delhi very good behaviour and staff are very friendly very fast service and food is very good rooms are very clean And very good connectivity of wifi overall excellent good work keep it up ........And awesome experience in Delhi

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Youb Raj Basnet
Detailed Review: I analysed number of services of this hotel and say it as "Descent and Good Value" hotel.  Services:  I expected a fair services and the hotel met the expectation  1. Staff were very friendly and they tried helping us.  2. Room: Hotel provides cleaned bedsheet and blanket. It is well adequate for a short run stay. I had some work on laptop, apparently had to sit on the bed to work. The hotel has freeze but empty. Perhaps they have provided that to keep the drink from outside.   3. Lift  There were some problem in lift but it was fixed immediately.  4. Internet  The hotel had the internet but it was not working in rooms. A technician was there but it was not repaired till my stay.  4. Hotel Location  It is in Galli 6 of Paharganj which is bit congested. Well...finding hotel may‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Alok Mishra
Detailed Review: The hotel at its price is a nice option.  The pros:  Clean room, bathroom and linens Good restaurant Working AC WiFi acceptable Friendly staffs Smooth check in  Cons Location (congested  route) No dental kit No toiletries except soap No slipper   Yet chose it for the price and cleanliness.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: GOUTAM B

Detailed Review: One of my colleague told me about this place, he was stayed this place few months  before. I also feel very comfortable with  my family. All were very happy when they  are there. The hotel is near about  600 meter from New Delhi  railway  station. We will come again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Peter K
Review: This hotel offers all you need
Detailed Review: Every year when I'm in Delhi I stay in hotel Amax Inn. This already for 7 years in a row. Why? Good rooms, good service, good food and very friendly staff. Mr. Anil Kumar and his staff are always ready to advice you in whatever matter you need.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Oksana V
Detailed Review: 10 min walk to railway station. Hot water for request. Fan and AC. Comfortable bed and pillow. Helpful staff. Good Indian breakfast. There is a point for money exchange and booking tickets. no soundproof, my room is near to reception therefore I couldn't relax and sleep because all night and morning I heard everything goings-on in corridor and at reception

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Takefman
Detailed Review: One nice thing about arriving late at night, tired and feeling dirty is a nice shower. I have to say that  the shower in my room was not just wonderful but one of the best in India (where i have travel led extensively)  The staff represented a keen understanding of customer service and were very helpful, courteous and easy to get along with.   While the rooms are on the small side they are clean, the bedding was also clean and fresh and the AC and fan worked very well. I will definitely go back again to Smyle.  Thanks

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anna Y
Detailed Review: Staff was great and helpful. Location was central. We were very comfortable in our room. It was pretty quiet in the room at night, which was very nice for sleep. We chose to stay in the deluxe room for a little more money, and we believe it was well worth it. Hot water worked nicely and air conditioning was cold. Would stay again. Thanks!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Pathfinder814693
Detailed Review: This is a budget guest house, a good one.We stayed in a family room, it just cut size wise.The rooms are clean and well maintained. The showers have good pressure and plenty of hot water.Smyle is in a good location, in a lane10 metres from the Main Bazaar, a short walk to New Delhi railway station. The breakfast included is a set menu, is simple, omelette on toast, corn flakes, banana,muffin,tea or coffee. Won't win any awards but is an OK start for the day. The wi-fi is good. Ali at the travel desk booked all of our train trips, he charges a commission, but well worth it. I feel that Smyle Inn genuinely tries to give value for your rupee.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Inspire827793
Detailed Review: Excellent Hotel. The  room  was large enough and the ventilator was very good. The Wi-Fi work well. The  breakfeast ils include and we take il on the roof where it‚Äôs cool. Good price/qualit√© ratio. The Smyle Inn si very well situated near  Mean Bazaar Road.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: garry p
Detailed Review: For a budget hotel I always go to Smyle Inn. It is without doubt the best of all the low price hotels in Delhi. The staff are very friendly. The rooms are well furnished, clean and regularly redecorated. On this visit we saw that the rooftop cafe has been upgraded making the inclusive breakfasts even better. Recommended!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Robin B
Review: Nice and next door is under construction
Detailed Review: This is a really nice hostel. The people and gents that run the place are great! Really good location off the main bazar so it‚Äôs relatively quiet. But there is demolition going on in the building next door. There is a constant pounding on the walls. Twelve hours of it in fact. I had really bad jet lag when I arrived and there was no napping in the middle of the day. It‚Äôs 7:00 pm and they are still at it. So, be aware. If you‚Äôre at all sensitive to a constant pounding on the walls of your accomodation maybe give it a miss for now. This could go on for weeks.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Adventurer823671
Detailed Review: Great hotel with wonderful staff. The gentleman Alum on the front desk was always charming, helpful and eager to please.  Nice breakfasts. Clean hotel. One issue with the ladies toilets in the female dorm blocking a lot, but the staff were on hand with smiles every time to sort the problem out.  Would recommend. Good value for money.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: lakesuk
Review: Wonderful home stay in interesting suburb of Delhi
Detailed Review: Great welcome and very friendly and helpful staff.. made to feel at home and nothing was too much trouble.  Comfortable room with all facilities.  Were able to walk out to local market area for a meal.  Thanks to everyone at Colonel's Retreat.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: debnz
Review: Quiet spot, lovely hosts but  with one unpleasant incident.
Detailed Review: I recently spent four nights here - two as a solo traveller (chose this place as it sounded like a nice safe option ) and a further two nights when my travelling companion arrived in Delhi. staff were friendly and helpful, the room was comfortable and the location was great - i managed the Metro on my own which felt like quite an achievement. The hosts were charming and gracious and they run an excellent business. My stay was marred by a major security glitch - i had caught a taxi with a group, got dropped off first, and there was confusion about paying the taxi driver - our understanding was that the cost went on the retreat bill, but the driver understood that I would pay cash. Anyway he returned to the Retreat for payment at around 9.30pm and I opened my door to find two men‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ms_KIPS
Detailed Review: This was a stopover on our way home but we wish we could have stayed more than one night. We will next time. The room was clean and really nicely decorated, had everything we wanted (including a kettle and fridge) and the hotel had lovely common areas. The breakfast on the rooftop was fantastic. Staff were friendly and helpful.  Great location-near the airport, markets and cafes but not in a touristy area.  What else could you want? Great stay

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: ypajuelo
Detailed Review: Located in the old Defence section of Dehli, this converted house is homely and friendly.  I spent 2 nights and had a lovely room with everything that I would expect from a quality B&B (Wifi, bottled water etc.)  My room was spotlessly clean and I could hear no noise from other guests or busy Dehli streets.  I had really nice breaksfasts and had a homemade curry on one night.  The roof terrace was also a pleasant way to spend breakfast time.  The staff were kind, courteous and friendly.  They also accommodated fro my gluten allergy.  If you want a quality affordable place to stay, then I would definitely recommend.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Alexis D
Detailed Review: Colonel Retreat is located in a quiet neighboorhood so you are far from the honks and noise of Delhi. It is really convenient to rest from hectic city. If you take rickshaw, you won't be that far from GK1 or Lajpat Nagar so you can have dinner there if you like. Room is very clean with comfortable bed, AC, fan and lovely pictures on the wall. Bathroom is also very clean and spacious. In this big house, there is a living room on each floor with big sofa where you can chill which is great. Staff is very friendly and is trying their best to make you feel at home. Rooftop is perfect for breakfast, before the heat is unbearable. There is a lot to choose from for breakfast and products are homemade. Really loved it! The banana bread is just delicious.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Thiago0607
Review: Good but not as fancy as showed in the pictures, specially outside the room.
Detailed Review: Great room and breakfast, internet works fine, and staff are very polite and helpful. Difficult to find by taxi, metro 10 minutes walk, which is good. Terrace and other services nothing like showed in booking.com, that is: there is nothing related to "retreat", it's just a simple but high level bed and breakfast.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Irinka Y
Review: Great breakfast, but lying to clients
Detailed Review: We have visited with a friend end of September2018, room was tiny, but front desk people were very friendly, switched us to a different room, not too clean, but ok.  Front desk personnel was great. Breakfast was excellent, one of the best breakfasts from any hotel. But...  my friend came to a hotel first, it was her first time in India, a guy who has travel agency in this hotel (and i was told he is a co owner) said the road to Rishikesh was flooded so no car could pass, and Mountains close to Roshikesh are unpassable too, lots of slides, and showed her an article from a paper.  Blutant lie, but she believed and met her in panic that all our plans are busted.  While the travel guy wanted to sell her an expensive package to Kashmir... I called Rishikesh hotel we reserved, they‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: GKhorana
Review: My Guest and Me are Delighted
Detailed Review: So I had booked a room for a guest from NYC. He visited last month. We went out for drinks etc to CP and got late and I got a room for myself as well as we had an early morning meeting. The front desk was very accommodating and gave me a spectacular room. Morning we had coffee at their Voyage coffee shop across the road. Never I could imagine at Paharganj such an amazing hotel could exist.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sunshine821229
Detailed Review: I had wonderful tour to Rajasthan in September this year which was arranged at hotel ajanta.  First we visit Taj Mahal the most wonderful place in the world. The symbol of true LOVE .we highly recommend hotel ajanta great service, good food and excellent staff,, Ali and Zahoor

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Paula M
Detailed Review: The hotel was good very central the staff were great we met a guy called Ali who guided us on what we could do he arranged our holiday here 6 hotels. 3 flights and  all the hotels we have had an amazing time with out this man our holiday would not have Been as good as it was we had a taxi driver. That took us everywhere Prarb highly recommended we book trips with Ali at this hotel he sent us messaged on Wassup every couple of days to make sure we were ok this is exceptional service we had and made our first time in India great. We went to Srinagar to see the mountain in the north to goa in we leave goa to go home tomorrow. Happy ali is very trustworthy and made our holiday.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Travelerchris74
Detailed Review: excellent service i would recommend this hotel, they can book train tickets for guests, they are very available and always attentive.the hotel is conveniently located near New Delhi railway station. they are friendly and dynamic. Perfect.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jerrad T
Detailed Review: Arriving in Delhi for the first time, myself and four friends were fortunate enough to meet Zahoor Baktoo and Ali at Hotel Ajanta. We had booked the hotel online but kept all four days open, which was lucky, because they quickly suggested ‚ÄúThe Golden Triangle‚Äù. An incredible adventure around the cities of Delhi, Saipur and Agra.  They organised everything from accomodation, meals, private transport, elephant experiences and entry to places such as the Taj Mahal!  They helped us like they were travelling themselves and supporter our needs and budget. Our trip would not have been as extraordinary without their assistance and we highly recommend their services for any Indian travel needs.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nishant S
Detailed Review: The hotel is really inside with congested roads to take, thanks to the uber cabs who make it through these roads helping in commutation. I was given a choice to select a room and the room chosen was decent. Had a foul smell initially which gradually went off. Bathroom amenities are old and toilet was stained but were kept clean. Hospitality was awesome, could see the reception staff really helping out some foreigners. Had ordered breakfast and the food was tasty. Enjoy the Delhi crowd in the surrounding area with very busy streets around. Decent hotel for the price offered.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lucie M
Review: Brief stay in centre of delhi
Detailed Review: Very brief but positive stay in centre of Delhi. Hotel is ok, staff (Anil for example, so are the others) is very helpful. We could leave our luggage for few days for free and safe...  I can recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tarunesh U
Detailed Review: Whenever I visit Delhi, I always stay at Amax..Staff is very friendly and the owner Mr. Anil is way much cooperative. It also serves delicious food. This hotel is very much recommended to the fellow travelers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: shojondewan1
Detailed Review: This was my first visit to Delhi. My uncle told me to stay only Amax inn. I stayed around 20 days and it seems perfect choice by my uncle.The hotel is little Alley of Arakashan road. Once u get in to it you really feel freshness with smiles of staff.  The Rooms are amazing for this prize. Specially the bathrooms are super clean. The rooftop is with varieties of tasty food. I definetly say it's lovely place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Flyer819658
Detailed Review: I am Muzahidul Islam,stayed in new delhi at hotel amax inn for 6 days and pleased with the management and stuff.and their rooms are very clean.I am happy to choose the hotel. and MacDonald just 200 meters away. wishing all the best towards to the stuffs and management of the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kamla H
Detailed Review: We are staying in this hotel from last 15 years, always welcome by staff and the owner Mr. Anil. The room are superclean and spacious, bathrooms arr hygenic. They have tooftop resturent with yamee and fresh food. Also you have chat with other trevller in the resturent. I will be back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: sadhna m
Detailed Review: I am from Mauritius and traveling to Delhi every time for my business. I stay Amax inn many times. The place is,always fantastic and helpful. The Rooms,are clean and Bathrooms are hygienic. We all friends love this place. The staff is helpful. And Anil is,always ready for help.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Wadi
Detailed Review: The place is full of very nice people, amazing food, great room, very clean, excellent shower, good location, totally recommend!  The staff is very kind and took good care of us! Anil is in my heart!  <3

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anni W
Detailed Review: It was a very pleasant stay! They helped us a lot, especially with booking train tickets and getting Indian SIM-Cards. Paharganj is a place often visited by back packers, but we were glad that we were already used to walking through delhi, otherwise the area maybe would have been a little stressfull. But the staff was nice and helpfull, our room was clean and comfortable and it was practically to have a small restaurant within the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vaibhav B
Review: Avoid this place - awful location - very disappointed
Detailed Review: I booked the family room from agoda and after booking it asked me to pay directly at hotel. When we reached hotel, we are surprised to know that family room is not available in the hotel and  hotel staff has given us normal room with one small double bed.After confronting staff member starting giving very lame excuse and mentioned that he will deduct some 100-200 Rs from the normal booking charge which is very unethical since we requires family room which we booked weeks before. Location is so awful, it is present in very interior location in a very thin lane, we came with car and Hotel charged   Rs500 for parking per night extra which is approximate 25% of Hotel charge. Totally cheaters, I booked this hotel after reading Tripadvisors ratings and reviews, it looks like most of‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Expedition814308
Detailed Review: I was travelled this place with my friend.At end of our we got a nice place. I got this place through trip advisor and I saw they have good ratting in trip advisor.After reaching there me and my friend was really  very happy.The room,food and service was excellent. We enjoy our stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mohammah S
Review: Nice atmosphere away from home  to stay
Detailed Review: I was staying this hotel in September, 2018.I feel like home and the service  was excellent. There  I got one Bengali speaking receptionist who helped  us a lot.Room was nice and clean.Food was good in reasonable price. The people were very helpful  to us.I will be comming again to this  hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Martina L
Detailed Review: Hotel is nice and clean. Personal is olways willing to help.They helped us to get an Indien SIMcard, to find the right ATM.... In the hotel is complete travel service, so you can plan you trip right ther. A driver we got there(Shyam)for our trip was really great driver and amazing person.  There is also a possibility to safe your luggage you do not need for free.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ruhit r
Detailed Review: This is a very good Hotel For Live. I am From Bangladesh & i also stay their When i go to Delhi in india...... But it's price is a little bit of high for me....... I wish it's price will be decreased for all to came Hear.....

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vijay J
Detailed Review: Always  staying  in this  hotel for my business.  The rooms  are very  clean  and tidy.  Good air-conditioning.  Very  polite  staff always  ready  to help.  The owner  Mr.  Anil is very  good  person  always  taking  extra  care of  his guests.  I recommend  this  hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anish A
Detailed Review: I am staying in this hotel from last 10 years for my business and family trips. The staff and owner of the otel always welcoming and helpful. I had send my many friends to them, they all are very happy to stay at Amax. The food in the restaurant is very tasty and for reasonable price. The rooms are super clean and bathrooms are hygienic. I Will be back soon Thanks  Amax

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ramchurn R
Detailed Review: i really enjoy my stay ...room very clean.... personel and staff are very cool and nice..... got prompt services.... nice meal during break fast...... im really thankful to everybody including Mr Anil and Mr Kuldeep and all the staff..... longing to come back again

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Dreamer812715
Detailed Review: U am coming from many years to Amax inn.  It's like my home in Delhi . The Rooms are perfect and clean and they keep going g changes in the Rooms every year. It's fantastic place with loveable staff. Mr.Anil is always n call to help you. I definitely Recommend this place.  Keep it up I am coming back.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Cillian Lynch
Detailed Review: If you're looking for a tranquil, chilled out escape away from the hustle and bustle of Delhi then look no further than Jugaad. The staff are lovely and look after your every need. The food on offer is delicious, the rooftop terrace is perfect to unwind and the rooms are of perfect standard for the price being paid. Additionally, the walking tours are a great way to see Delhi with your guides who are knowledgeable about the street food stalls that are safe to eat at and the history behind the historic buildings that are dotted around the city.  A special mention to Salman, one of gentleman staff members there who not only booked our train tickets to Agra and Jaipur for us but sent on a Package that arrived for me after I had left for Agra and updated me when it arrived in the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ana Pucci
Detailed Review: Nice place, not very clean, but a nice option for the last night before taking a flight. But be aware about the staff, one guy stole money from my purse and saw that, after that he just speak hindi and denied. The manager o guess told me that he check his pockets and didn‚Äôt find anything.....be careful with this place. It was 2000 r√∫pies and 10$. In just 1 minute when I was in the bathroom! The problem is that o took him with my wallet on hand and nobody did anything! But when it comes to India, that's the way it is...

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Banyolesarizona
Review: Good Hostel in the middle of Paharganj
Detailed Review: The rooms are clean and the hostel has a nice rooftop. The staff... some of them are really helpful some a little less. Maybe a bit overpriced for what is it but correct. I'll repeat in my next stay in Delhi.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Morgan S
Detailed Review: Smyle Inn was excellent. Our room was nice, the bed was large and comfortable, the toilet wasn‚Äôt great but it worked, the tv worked well, the shower was good, AC was good, WiFi was fast. The rooftop restaurant had a nice atmosphere and the breakfast was good.  The staff were friendly and helpful, they set me up with a Vodafone SIM for my phone for 1 month of internet/calls/texts at great value, and helped us avoid a scam from a fake travel agency. Beware of very friendly people who hang around the hostels and try to push you into a tuk tuk or taxi who will pretend to break down outside a fake travel agency who will try to scam you. They are very good at what they do, and Smyle helped us spot a scam.  The best thing was the travel service from Ali at the travel desk on floor 3.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lorena B
Detailed Review: We booked in Smyle Inn as it was easy to do online and is very central. Tge room was clean and minimalist, but when it became to deal with the receptionist, he did book our train tickets for us, but became annoyed when we told him we had book a tour with other company, did have to bargain the change, as he was doing a very low rate and the breakfadt was very poor. Good place to get a SIM card tho.

Detailed Review: The rooms are clean and the hostel has a nice rooftop. The staff... some of them are really helpful some a little less. Maybe a bit overpriced for what is it but correct. I'll repeat in my next stay in Delhi.
