Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: AsiaAdventurer
Review: Great Location, Comfortable Rooms, Beautiful Art
Detailed Review: Stayed for 2 nights in August, and this is my 3rd time staying at this property. It's in an excellent location in the Defense Colony, which is a quiet residential neighborhood, but within 5 to 12 minutes walking distance to markets with excellent restaurants as well as a metro station. The owners try to meet their guest to ensure everything is going well. I believe they have 4 floors  with 3 rooms each and a common lounge area on each floor. They have a nice rooftop restaurant that opens from October through March or April I believe. The lounges have many books and the art work in the rooms and lounges is quite unique and personally selected by the owners. The internet is free and works well. Small groups/families of up to 6 will find it quite convenient to book all 3 rooms on a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mohammed Ovais M
Detailed Review: We travelled with our two kids (7 and 2), and all of our needs were met very helpfully by the staff. The location is excellent in Delhi - for getting to anywhere else including the airport, and also for shopping since Lajpat Nagar is nearby.  A great experience, we stayed here last about 4 years ago, it was excellent then and it is excellent now! - and that is quite a difficult feat to achieve! - Well Done!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: belen l
Detailed Review: The hotel facilities are good, it is located in what it seems a residential area, far from downtown, but you will need a taxi to go to many places so this is not an inconvenient. Good breakfast and helpful staff. The best is the decor.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Compass813618
Detailed Review: We stayed at Hotel Ajanta in July, we found the hotel in great central position , very clean and good food. The travel desk were extremely helpful , especially Mr Baktoo, he arranged daily excursions in deli and train trip to Goa for us . He is very helpful and knowledgeable. Thank you . Tracey Devlin

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: tommasolucarelli
Review: The hotel you need to ask for!
Detailed Review: Ajanta hotel  Ajanta is a very nice hotel in the center of delhi. You can easily reach the Old Delhi and the Connaught Square areas, the rooms are nice and the restaurant is open also in the late night (it's pretty good!). The attention to the customer provided by the staff is amazing and it's easy to get in touch with them and know a little bit of Indian culture, ad I due with Hari. The hotel provides also a trip planning service. We used it to travel around Rajasthan with a private driver and the service was really really good, with a very good cost/quality ratio. I travelled around other Southern Asia countries and at first I was afraid of the usual touristic-offering stuff, but I was wrong. Jack, the guy who managed our staying at the hotel and our trip, was really good in‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: lalilu59
Detailed Review: We had the best time here! We were welcomed here very friendly. We received an upgrade, which was very nice. All the employes were making sure we had a good time. We had a great deal via expedia, which included breakfast and an Airport transfer. The breakfast is mainly indian food but we enjoyed it. If we come back to Delhi, we will come back here :) oh, and the Cafe voyage across the street has the best Coffee and brownies!!!!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sudip C
Detailed Review: The hotel is okay. Not very good. Foods are good but expensive. Various options in breakfast. We booked a deluxe room and I feel that the rooms are small. They provide only regular water, no mineral water as complementary.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nikhil T
Detailed Review: Very well hotel in heart of city at New Delhi railway station, Room Services & food quality is also very nice , breakfast system is very good. Pick & drop Services is also available in hotel. Finally our tour is completed without stress  Thanks  u for Team Ajanta .

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Parth M
Review: The worst stay I've had in my life.
Detailed Review: The management and logistics at this hotel is terrible. The rooms were decent, but the room service hardly attend your calls, and when they do, they don't resolve your issues. The logistics management was the worst part. We were promised a 11 pm pick up from the railway station a day in advance, but we were made to wait for an hour, before they said they couldn't arrange. We were too tired but had to take rikshaws. Something similar happened on the day of checkout. The hotel car booked a day in advance was an hour late, because of which I had to miss a really important appointment. I will not recommend anyone to stay here. Very disappointed.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: mariavictoriamg
Detailed Review: I highly recommend this hotel, the rooms are big, very clean and nice , the staff is kind, they are all the time caring about you and your confort, and they can  also plan for you  excellent tours, not only in Delhi, but in all  Rajasthan. Breakfast is delicious

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Paul B
Detailed Review: Our stay at Ajanta was perfect thank to the amazing people working there. Special shout-out to Zahoor and Jack, who helped us to book our train journey! Helpful and trustworthy, thank you for everything!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Galeraf
Detailed Review: Espacious and clean rooms, very professional, attentive and friendly staff (The recepcionist help us to coordinate the pick up when our flight was delayed and the guy from the travel desk planned our stay according to our interests) and located in a central street well connected to all touristic places. If we retourn to Delhi, sure that we repeat :)  Lovely place!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: yanhaon
Detailed Review: This hotel has wonderful hospitality, and owners which will go the extra mile to watch out and take care of you, which will prove invaluable when travelling in India. I was a solo traveler that was scammed on arrival on Delhi a week before, and the owners provided me with invaluable assistance, without which I would not have obtained a refund. Secondly, as I had a late flight on the day of check-out, I was allowed to take an evening shower 5 hours after check-out before heading to the airport. The hotel itself was clean, and the amenities are as stated. I traveled to and from the metro via uber.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Dave R
Detailed Review: Very good family run hotel. Great staff. Room service and good food. Found it thru Lonely Planet. Bit more expensive than usual backpacker hotels we used but worth the extra for the safe and friendly place in the heat and hussle of Delhi. Good location 10 mins walk from the Main Bazar.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Thang c
Detailed Review: good facilities, dedicated service, friendly staff. towels and old beds, but this is arguably the most comfortable place I have ever been in India. Although the entrance is slightly difficult. You should prepare the spirit before coming to this country. I will be back.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: rakesh t
Detailed Review: Stayed in amax inn for my business , like the rooms and service.  The staff   is always  ready  for  you.  Rooftop  restaurant  is good place  to eat and share  thoughts  with other  people. The rooms are super  clean. Hot water, and Aircon working  well.  Thanks   Amax Will back to you soon

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Balasubramaniam S
Detailed Review: My son told me to stay in Amax inn . We come and picked up from Airport. As my son told me about the Hotel it was all nice feelings. The Rooms are clean and bathrooms also super clean. The staff was always welcoming. We feel safe with dany. And definitely Recommend ti others.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: bilakhiya a
Detailed Review: I  am staying this place from last 10 years. They always doing changes in rooms. I stayed in many Rooms of this hotel, all rooms are superclean. Tha staff is amazing, always ready to help. They have rooftop restaurant with very tasty food. I recommend this hotel to friends  Thanks  Amazing team

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Fieldsy101
Detailed Review: We booked Hotel Amax Inn before we left the uk for 3 nights. To get a feel for Delhi and India. A silence fell in the car as we turned into the back streets of Delhi. But all was well. Hotel staff very helpful and we had a pleasant 3 night stay there. Against our better judgement we sat down with syed and he planned a trip for us. It sounded too good to be true. With a list of places to visit  ,hotels,car with driver, train tickets and 17 days in front of us. We booked up for the Adventure of a life time.  After spending 8days with our driver Rajeev, who was just amazing. The best driver in India. Got us to our destinations safely and drama free. Which is no mean feat on the roads to Jaipur, Udaipur,Pushka and Agra. We parted company with Rajeev there and headed onto the rest of‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rakesh M
Review: Nice is not enough for them
Detailed Review: I came with my family and stayed there one night.Nice staff and good room with clean bathroom.They provide local taxi for local tour.My family feels like home stay far from my house.The food was good and tasty.Hotel people are really help us a lot.It was my first visit but it was excellent stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Seema M
Detailed Review: I would recommend all to stay in this hotel bcoz of its nearness neatness and polite staff.The room is well maintain and the owner also helpful to us.This hotel 700 mtr from New Delhi railway station.They have a open roof top.If i come again Delhi i will come deffinitely this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Amdadul H
Detailed Review: I heard about this hotel from my friend.I stay there three nights.It is only 500 mtr from New Delhi railway statio.The room is clean and the birthroom also nice.The hotel people are very polite and helpful.This is situated in center of Delhi.They provide car for local tour.The price is reasonable.My family was enjoyed the stay in Amax.If i come again Delhi definitely i will come here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: rasoul g
Detailed Review: I was travelling with my friend and stayed there Three nigts. The room clean and parfect. They have a roof top Restaurant where we taken our meal. We were taken a cab for Delhi local city tour for two days. The tour was nice. The food is excelent. The staff was very helpful. I recomend this hotel highly.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hassantehranlive
Review: Hotel amax ann is very good
Detailed Review: We all friends stayed inAmax inn and we really enjoyed our stay. The Rooms are clean and tidy with clean bathrooms. The staff is always welcoming and helpful for all-the queries. We Recommend this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Teeja R
Detailed Review: Great hotel. The room was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful.Good value for money. Room service and food was excellent. The environment is also good. I would highly recommend this hotel to others.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lashmi D
Review: The Best Hostel Ever in Delhi
Detailed Review: Provide good service, good rooms with perfect condition facilities and also efficient. Environment was good and also provide good food. Staff was really helpfull and provide whatever we need. Near to CP

Name: Teeja R

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lashmi D
Review: The Best Hostel Ever in Delhi
Detailed Review: Provide good service, good rooms with perfect condition facilities and also efficient. Environment was good and also provide good food. Staff was really helpfull and provide whatever we need. Near to CP

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mirza M
Review: nice hostel to escape the bustling New Delhi
Detailed Review: First we got a difficulty to find the place, because its located in some store complex in the south of Delhi, but once we find it we feel that this hostel provide a wonderful place for us to have a wonderful quiet nap in this bustling city, i feel safe with the surrounding, even if i have to reach this place during the night, this hostel alsi near the hype area of delhi, the hauz khaz village, close to some supermarket, and also traditional market surround, pretty close to the Indira gandhi airport too.they have a nice rooftop and the sfaff is also nice, will definitely recommend this hostels to all of my friends and will be my place to come back whenever i reach Delhi

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Stephanie S
Review: Sociable, well-connected hostel - Ideal for young people
Detailed Review: Airport pickup taxi arranged by Jugaad made it easy for us to get to the hostel.  Sociable atmosphere with air-conditioned shared dorms and a large rooftop terrace where you can chill on comfy chairs and chat, read or eat.   Shizu, a live-in volunteer was very friendly from the start, giving us great advice on how best to explore Delhi even though we did not go on the hostel's paid walking tour. In the evening he organised for a big group of us to go out to a nightclub Da Code - even though our group of friends did not have partying in mind when we came to India we actually ended up having a really fun time.   Nice breakfast of toast, jam, egg, banana and chai also provided for free till 10am!! Lovely way to start the day on the rooftop.   Jugaad is not so centrally located but‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mireia M
Detailed Review: I've been in other hostels during my stay in Delhi, and definitely Jugaad is the best one! I highly recommend it. It is located in South Delhi, close to Hauz Khas, where you can find nice restaurants and cool places to hang out. South Delhi is a quiet area though, which it is perfect to rest from chaotic Delhi. Nearby you can find street food and lots of shops (SIM cards, supermarket, printing, etc). Located on the 4th floor, the hostel provides great views over Delhi. Rooms are really clean and comfy. It has a large terrace to chill out and meet other travellers. Thanks to Shahzada and his team, this place has really good vibes. They were incredibly amazing and there is no doubt that they do things with passion. They do a good job, taking care of each guest and organizing tours‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Subhash R
Detailed Review: It was an unpredictable plan to stay in Delhi as my Flight from Kulalampur to Cochin was cancelled on 15th August because of Flood in Kerala. So I opt to be in Delhi for some of my Job assignments. I really plan to stay in Jugaad Hostel for two days. Because I am reaching Airport late night. But it ended up to stay in 16 Days as of now booking it's because of the teams excellence in service quality.    I never felt that I am staying an unknown place/people. It's a feeling of being with family members. The team of Jugaad is amazing and extraordinary. Shivam, Ohm & Midhun are supportive guys. I enjoyed the time with them.   Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Pat T
Detailed Review: We stayed there for 3 nights. They help us booking the train and they did everything to help and get answers for every question we had. The Tours were rly exciting. Showing Best places in Dehli. Best place to stay when you waNT to meet cool locals.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Juliette A
Detailed Review: I highly recommend this hostel in Delhi which was the most welcoming. The staff is great, very convenient with timetables and takes very good care of each and every one of their guests. The rooms are spacious and clean. Some trips and activities are organised with an awesome team. I would recommend the city walking tour which was a great experience. I had a lovely stay and will not hesitate to come back!

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: mathildalibonati
Detailed Review: Jugaad hostel is a really cool, welcoming and warm hostel !! BEST HOSTEL IN DELHI ! The team is really welcoming and took care of us in our trip ! They booked our train ticket they are really helpful ! We made the city tour with one of their guide and he explained us about the monument and the story of the city it was a really good moment! We can‚Äôt thank them enought for all their good advices ! They made our stay in Delhi a wonderful experience.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: kafein
Detailed Review: I don't know about the dorms but double rooms are nothing like the photos you see online. Staff is not particularly helping either in case you complain about it. There were small bugs in the bathroom and mold in wardrobe, so much for cleanliness.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nicolas V
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel in city centre of Delhi. Staff was absolutely great and always available when we needed them. The room was excellent. Clean, modern, comfortable all that for a very good price. We spent 3 weeks in India and this one was clearely the best in this price category!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Dominique L
Review: Clean & reliable budget guesthouse in Pahaganj
Detailed Review: This is where I stay every time I transit through New Delhi, when I have to stay in Paharganj. I tried different hotels, some a bit cheaper, some other more expensive but with high star ratings, but it is never worth it. Here you can expect a friendly and courteous staff, a welcoming facility, clean walls and sheets, and a very helpful owner.   The hotel has two buildings, both close together and tucked away from the chaotic main bazaar street on a backstreet. It is fairly quiet yet close enough to the action. Breakfast is also included in the price of the room, its simple but good option if you just arrived in India for the first time, you need to meet other travelers or don't dare go out to try the local food.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hutchinsign
Detailed Review: We stayed here for a couple of nights in New Delhi. Rooms are basic but clean enough. There are two buildings less than a minute's walk from one another. One looks better than the other. Staff were friendly and the travel agent is VERY keen to help you plan your holiday. There are other travel agents out there too so shop around. Breakfast was simple but took a long time to come out so if you're in a rush, get there in good time.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ang√®le S
Detailed Review: The staff of the Smyle Inn welcomed us in the night, the room was ok, clean enough, the people were very nice and helpful. WiFi was well functioning. They helped us book our train tickets to Jaipur, and helped us with sight seeing too, very nice, thank you

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: L V
Detailed Review: Good and clean hotel, and above all amazing service. The owner of Smyle Inn helped us instantly during some problems we had in Delhi and Jaipur. During night he arranged train tickets, all to care about our smooth and safe journey. And, he assisted us personally to get our money back due to a scam of another travel agency. Thanks again. We would everyone recommend to arrange an Airport or New Delhi station pick up service by Smyle Inn. The pick up by Smyle Inn of just 7 euros is all worth it.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: kafein
Detailed Review: I don't know about the dorms but double rooms are nothing like the photos you see online. Staff is not particularly helping either in case you complain about it. There were small bugs in the bathroom and mold in wardrobe, so much for cleanliness.

We would everyone recommend to arrange an Airport or New Delhi station pick up service by Smyle Inn. The pick up by Smyle Inn of just 7 euros is all worth it.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: sarinyasombati
Review: Good night sleep with Best Banana bread!
Detailed Review: Very spacious and clean accommodation in a quiet neighbourhood (which is hard to find in Delhi). There are staff to help you to call a taxi or just easily call uber. Highly recommended if you are looking for a good night sleep. The area is very safe, but not much around since it‚Äôs a residential area. The breakfast was great, with indian and Continental options. There are A/C , TV, clean towels, bottle water and everything we needed.   We got the opportunity to meet the Colonel himself! Staff were every nice. And the banana bread was actually live up to the expectation. Overall, we love this place and will return.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: malayka
Review: WORST STAY- not recommended for foreigners
Detailed Review: The management and logistics at this hotel is terrible. The rooms were decent, but the room service hardly attend your calls, and when they do, they don't resolve your issues. The management also seems to be working for comission, they knew that you are foreigners and they make you spend your money and even the service is not good. The girl at the recption even called me when i booked from booking.com to inform me to can the booking as they will not  pay any commission to them. she told me to book directly to them. the worst thing is that  they propsed me somehting and the amount spent came to 1lakh for only 9 days and when calculated and confimed by agent they denied the amount which the hotel said. i felt like every one ois a trained crooked over there. even the managers from‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anna S
Review: Average hotel with a good customer service
Detailed Review: We stayed at the hotel for a week. As it was our first time in India, we had very little idea about the location. Paharganj, although very centrally located, but is VERY congested and it basically is full of similar types of hotels.  The staffs at the hotels were great and the guys at the receptions were brilliant. Santosh, the night receptionist was really helpful and made sure we had a comfortable stay. There was a girl at the reception ( Dont remember her name) who was very nice also.  All in all, it was a good stay at a decent price and centrally located.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nilesh C
Review: Hotel Ajanta is Worth for money
Detailed Review: Excellent staff, good quality of food . Cleaning  was done regularly. Air conditioning system is not up-to the mark,needs improvement. Reception staff took little bit more time to allot room. Complimentary Breakfast needs improvement in terms of variety and quality. Overall excellent experience staying at Hotel Ajanta.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Simon H
Detailed Review: Me and my friend had already planned our trip in India, with Delhi and Agra in mind. The hotel manager advised us to do the golden triangle instead, to get the most of our visit in India. We agreed to this, and got a private driver for the whole trip, good hotels and guides for all the cities. The hotel manager fixed all og this for us, for a reasonable price. We got the most out of our journey in India, and wouldn‚Äôt be without it!  Hotel Ajanta lies perfectly in Delhi, close to some local markets and the main city centre. It‚Äôs also possible to hire a tuk-tuk or driver in Delhi for the whole day. The staff at the hotel is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast could be better tho

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Baiju N
Detailed Review: Having a wonderful stay at Ajanta. Such a lovely place with neat, tidy rooms, friendly staffs and worth for money. Excellent food. 500 metres from Railway station and all shopping centres near by. I would definitely recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anirban D
Review: Good but need to be more transparent and serious regarding maintainence and billing
Detailed Review: I normally don't like to write anything negative against any business establishment because any negative reviews do harm the business of a business establishment..I came across  this property I was attracted by their list or awards  excellence.  Their website looked highly attractive as well..The booking is attended by an attendant through WhatsApp and I paid the advance payment accordingly. It was absolutely no hassle..The attendant is only focussed on answering rates and booking queries and practically nothing regarding any other questions which was asked regarding parking and driver details and so on..This sort of behaviour isnt really pleasant for the curious customer who is traveling with his family..However I got the driver details after I reached the airport and the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Diojii
Review: The Hotel Ajanta and how my trip to India was rescued from possible implosion!!!
Detailed Review: 18 years ago I made a fantastic 6 month journey through India. In that time I traversed the city of New Delhi 9 times always staying in the ‚Äúbackpackers paradise‚Äù, the Pahar Ganj.  As a young man traveling alone it was a perfect place to stop over and meet fellow travelers. To exchange experiences and trade the secrets of travel through India. It was also a place to lay ones head at rock bottom prices. The better to save for, ‚Äúthat Tibetan jewelry I‚Äôve been eyeing in Ladakh‚Äù.   Fast forward to the present. Married with 3 daughters, 21, 11 & 6. We‚Äôve been going to Isola ‚Äòdel Elba, an island off the coast of Italy for the past 3 years. I suggest to my wife, jokingly, that we travel to India this summer. She says yes and I fly into a panic. India with the 11 & 6 year old? And a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ahmed T
Detailed Review: Service there is really nice, staff is really helpful and the most interesting thing is that the hotel provides cheap tours whether it is around Delhi (by day or by night) or even to Agra were we were surprised by being provided a guide to go inside Taj Mahal.  Go for it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Annabel M
Detailed Review: Myself and a friend were visiting Delhi for the first time and were very well looked after by Zahoor and his team could not recommend them enough. Rooms were good, food was good. Even when things went a little wrong for us he was very quick to sort it out for us and made our stay a lot less stressful, he kept in contact even when we left for Agra to make sure we were getting on okay. Would stay here again and recommend to friends!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ando T
Detailed Review: We spent a very good time in Ajanta hotel. Hotel was nice, clean and good location. The plus of the hotel: the service which was outstanding. Girl at the reception very kind, Zahoor Baktoo has been very helpful and organized our whole trip. Between Delhi sight-seeing with private driver, Agra, and Rishikesh... he was always from good advice and very kind! Our driver Pratab has been amazing with us! Very kind, polite, professional, and patient. I highly recommend him to any person who needs a good driver! In general, very good stay!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Monomini S
Detailed Review: Nice and clean hotel , Beautiful decorations, perfect for groups ( my group 17 persons ) Staff was friendly & very helpful. Location is near New Delhi station. Easy to connect everywhere. Highly recommended :))

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: brigitte f
Detailed Review: I was really well inspired to book our first two Indian nights at AMAX INN in Delhi.  This bit of luck was going to determine the whole duration of our trip and turned out to be a real blessing !   This is how it went : from Belgium I had previously booked 2 nights in AGRA and then 2 nights in VARANASI.  I hadn‚Äôt bothered about booking transportation thinking this wouldn‚Äôt be necessary since it was still low season.  I was wrong !   AMAX INN very kindly offered their precious help to find us transportation but there were no more available seats from AGRA to VARANASI and my hotel reservation dates at GANPATI hotel couldn‚Äôt be met. I started feeling a bit panicky because GANPATI was quite expensive and my booking.com account said it was too late to cancel.    Well, AMAX INN ‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: 193jennyy
Review: Wonderful experience in Hotel Amax Inn
Detailed Review: We got a wonderful trip from Hotel Amax Inn! They gave us many good suggestion for one month in India. Their room is very clean and tidy , with polite staff and delicious food on the rooftop restaurant. I believe all guests would enjoy staying in here so much! And the location is very near to the central of Delhi , they also provide different tours. We especially love the thali they provided. Thanks a lot to this lovely hotel. üòäüòäüòä ÈÄôÈñìÊóÖÈ§®ÁöÑËÄÅÈóÜÂíåÂì°Â∑•ÈÉΩÂæàË¶™ÂàáÂíåÂèãÂñÑ„ÄÇËÄå‰∏îÔºå‰ªñÂÄëÊèê‰æõÊ∏ÖÊΩîÁöÑÊàøÈñì„ÄÅÁÜ±Ê∞¥„ÄÅÂ∫äÈã™Ôºå‰ª§ÊàëÂÄëÂú®Âæ∑Èáå‰ΩèÂæóÂæàËàíÈÅ©Âë¢ÔºÅ Jenny and Kaman  Student from Hong Kong

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: alinemichael
Review: Quiet but close to the action
Detailed Review: Amax Inn is a good value.  It is clean, with a helpful and resourceful staff, and the coldest bottled water in all of India!  While it is not on the Main Bazaar Road, it is nearby, and is one of the few hotels in Pajar Ganj (I imagine) where all the rooms are quiet because it's tucked back in an alley, a bit off the main road.  It is near all of the sites in Old Dehli.  And... the pizza is really good.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Manish A
Detailed Review: I am coming to Delhi  from many years and staying  inAmax inn every time. And I would recommend everyone to stay in this hotel as the rooms are very clean and the staffs are very polite and cooperative and what to say about the owners they make us feel home away from home.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: dpjasir
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax inn Which is nearest to Delhi railway station, itz awesome.Good staff and management.Clean area,fast room service and food is also ok.You can reach here also through New Delhi metro station

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ss c
Detailed Review: Hotel is good, room is good in Amax inn. Thus is ny second visit. Theroom service is perfect and promot. The rooms are well decorated with clean bathrooms. The rooftop I really enjoyed the food.   Recommend this place to friends.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: pakalapati p
Review: Better place to stay in delhi
Detailed Review: Feels good if you want to stay for few days. Food is available even at late nights. Food is also very delicious and perfect. It is a perfect place if you want to explore Delhi. The railway is also near

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Teja K
Review: We get more than what i paid
Detailed Review: The hotel was nice.The staff was good.They are very helpful and the owner is a nice person.Room was clean and the wash room is better than room.I feel like a home stay.The food was nice and the price is not high.If you compare with the area it is totally different.So please don't compare this hotel with outside area.I think this hotel is best place to stay in Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gowtham N
Review: Best service and good place to stay
Detailed Review: I stay in many hotel but this is the one of the best service I got in this hotel.i love it and having with a reasonable rate.food is so good too.next time I ever came to Delhi I choose this hotel.i hope it will be develop more branches in india

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: RAJ S
Review: Great place to stay in Delhi
Detailed Review: I spent five nights in this hotel with my family.I gind this hotel in Google and in Trip Advisor.I read good reviews about them.After staying there I feel that they are really done a great job.The staff and the owner all are very kind and adjustable. The room is same as i seen there website. My family was very happy when they were there. This hotel is only 700 mtrs from New Delhi Railway station.After all the service was excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: gyanendra a
Detailed Review: It was great a experience when I spent my time with family in Hotel Amex Inn.Room was clean as I seen in their website.The service was also excellent  as I thought before.We enjoyed  our stay  at Amax.The staff   was very nice.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sandeep J
Detailed Review: I traveled with my family few days before.It was a excellent experience with Hotel Amax Inn.The room and food and service was excellent.They have a open tarrus where I enjoyed dinner with my family.All the people of Amax were always ready to help us.I give them 10 out of 10.The Owner also very helpful.It is not so far from New Delhi station only 7 minutes by foot.If I come again I will come this place definitely.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bodh R
Detailed Review: Amax Inn is on Arakashan road just walkable distance from New Delhi Railway station. The place is hidden in a street on Arakashan road which make its more silent then road traffic. The Rooms are modern with all your need. The service is prompt. The rooftop is nice place to share this other other guests. Recommended place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raghbir S
Detailed Review: I come back to Amax inn after ling time. Its still the charming place with new nenovated look.. The Rooms are perfect with nice clean bathrooms. The staff is wonderful. The food is upto mark. The reception staff is welcoming.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Albie C
Detailed Review: A friend and I stayed for 7 nights.   We loved the overall vibe of the hostel - fun friendly staff, pretty good space/set up and a sweet roof top to chill, hangout and meet other people.  Would happily stay again.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Luc√≠a C
Detailed Review: We actually booked through AirBNB and it seems like we were not booking anything like a house/room with kitchen and bathroom.  The staff in this hotel never smiled to us, making its name pretty ironic. In fact, our first night there before going out we wanted to know some reccomendations for restaurants around the area for dinner and the man in the reception was on his cellphone making it clear to us that he had no interest in helping us out.  Wifi was not good and they turned off the air conditioning every thime they felt like it. We also had to call them each time we wanted hot water, which was very annoying.  The breakfast is in another building like 1 min away, and its on the last floor. This wouldn't be so bad if the waiter had been nice, but no.  This place is way to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: kasutcliffe
Review: An adequate place for a short stay
Detailed Review: *This review is for the WOMEN'S DORM, not a private room*  I stayed in the women's dorm for 4 nights. For what I paid (practically nothing), it was perfectly adequate. I had a place to sleep, it came with breakfast, there was a bathroom. Overall, Smyle Inn got the job done. Don't expect anything beyond the basics, but you'll have a place to stay.   Assorted notes: -I chose Smyle Inn specifically because they offered an airport pickup - I was getting in at 2:30 a.m. in the morning and had never been to Delhi before. The driver was waiting for me when I arrived, exactly where they said he would. Smyle Inn is tricky to find and is in a part of town I wouldn't want to wander alone at this time of night, so I would recommend this option, particularly if you are a solo woman traveler.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: AleksK778
Detailed Review: I visited Smyle Inn with a group of 11 people and everyone was very pleased with their rooms.   Staff was very friendly, helped us move our bags in, store them away when we travelled to Agra for a day and gave us advice on how to move around the city. Special shoutout to Ahmad who took particular care of our group.  Would recommend.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Noel
Review: The mecca of backpackers in New Delhi
Detailed Review: Smyle Inn holds the reputation of providing the best accomodation at an affordable rate.  Nestled within the heart of the Main Bazaar in Paharganj, smyle inn is surrounded by shops, stores, cafes and restaurants. Roof top cafes are quite famous within this area which provides your with a rustic view of the ever busy streets of Paharganj.¬†  Smyle Inn is a stone-throw away from New Delhi Rail Station, metro stations and even Connaught Place.  Though Smyle Inn doesnt have a restuarant, they provide guests a hearty breakfast.¬†  Lastly, Paharganj may seem to be overwhelming to most travellers but Smyle Inn provides you the genuine feeling of security. The staff are very warm and accomodating and responds to your requests or queries immediately.  If I ever I will be going back to New‚Ä¶

Detailed Review: I visited Smyle Inn with a group of 11 people and everyone was very pleased with their rooms.   Staff was very friendly, helped us move our bags in, store them away when we travelled to Agra for a day and gave us advice on how to move around the city. Special shoutout to Ahmad who took particular care of our group.  Would recommend.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Noel
Review: An adequate place for a short stay
Detailed Review: Smyle Inn holds the reputation of providing the best accomodation at an affordable rate.  Nestled within the heart of the Main Bazaar in Paharganj, smyle inn is surrounded by shops, stores, cafes and restaurants. Roof top cafes are quite famous within this area which provides your with a rustic view of the ever busy streets of Paharganj.¬†  Smyle Inn is a stone-throw away from New Delhi Rail Station, metro stations and even Connaught Place.  Though Smyle Inn doesnt have a restuarant, they provide guests a hearty breakfast.¬†  Lastly, Paharganj may seem to be overwhelming to most travellers but Smyle Inn provides you the genuine feeling of security. The staff are very warm and accomodating and responds to your requests or queries immediately.  If I ever I will be going back to New‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Natalia S
Detailed Review: Colonels retreat is located in if the Defence colony district , Delhi. In this district live rich people and it is very safe and calm. The hotel it self is family place: very nice and calm place for stay, we loved it a lot during our stay. Breakfasts are delicious, it is possible to smoke on the balcony, everything needed may be found in the room. Very friendly owners and stuff. Excellent stay for Delhi

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: jtaylor946
Detailed Review: We loved staying at this hotel. When we arrived in New Delhi, we were tired after long flights - the staff brought some tea and homemade banana bread for us to which we really enjoyed. The staff were so helpful to us during our stay - they organized transportation for us and gave advice on places to visit. The rooms were comfortable and the air conditioning worked very well. The best thing about this hotel is the location. Its in a really quiet area, so you away from the hustle and bustle of New Delhi. Defense Colony market is less than 10 minutes walk away and has a lot of good restaurants and shops. The hotel also serves dinner, which is around 1500 rupees per person. The breakfast was really good. Also, the WiFi worked better than at other hotels we have stayed at in India. I‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Laviniablaga
Detailed Review: hotels is very good. and hotel rooms are small but it was okay. because i like services in this hotel. other this gives us services three star facilities and budgeted. bathroom were nice and clean. other excuse in the food. i like chilli chicken but they are cooked very spicy. so so it is fine for me. next time i will thought for come to again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ajay S
Detailed Review: Good service. Food was also good. Friendly attitude of the hotel staffs. That's why I'm a regular visitor to the hotel. Recommend this budget hotel to all my friends for the pleasant stay and expect the hotel management to maintain the reputation.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bikash S
Detailed Review: Very hospitile staff.Room ambience is very good and cozy.I stay at the hotel regularly during my official trip.The location is very attracting.Walking distance from New Delhi Station and 30 mins ride from International Airport.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ozzu
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel with great ambience and room service. The rooms are above satisfactory condition and the charges are also reasonable. The staff is friendly. Overall a very pleasant hotel. Totally recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sanjeev S
Detailed Review: Hotel is walkable from New Delhi Railway Station. Hotel is good place to travel with family and friends. The Rooms are super clean with nice bathrooms. We had need many foreigners hanging on the Roof top. The food was delicious.  The staff was prompt and well behaved. Recommended place and coming back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Laurent P
Detailed Review: Very Nice place, as anounced in the guide. Very good quality price rapport, welcome, food, and Nice roof top. Owners are friendly and very helpfull. Rooms age clean and confortable, possibility To have family room and extra bed.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Pintu A
Detailed Review: I had stay at this property for three days. Room I got that was super clean, and food was very tasty. Front desk is always ready to help . I had spend long time in lobby with hotel owner, perfect man. Always try to do best for his guests. Thanks Amazing team I will be back soon And recommend to my family friends too.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Madhurjya B
Detailed Review: Amax inn on arakashan road jyst walking distance from New Delhi Railway station. Its good place to stay with clean rooms. The bathrooms are super clean. The foid served on Rooftop is great. I highly recommend this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ravi P
Detailed Review: The hotel is so nice and prime location  The atmosphere is also good on top you can have a good breakfast,lunch,dinner with your partner and with nice view  The service of the hotel is soo quick  I love the place

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: RoBoTech
Detailed Review: I really recommend this hotel. Photos of the room are the same as in reality. Big and clean room in the center near to railway station, metro, post office. The place is quiet. The price for the room is really cheap

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sachin s
Detailed Review: I frequently stay at this Hotel for my Business Trips, Very Neat and Clean Rooms with very Co-operative Staff. Very Close to New Delhi Railway Station and Markets, Best Quality Food Available. Its always a Nice and Pleasant Stays every Time.  I would recommend to all visiting Delhi for Business and Personal Trips.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Luke D
Review: Excellent place to stay at great value!
Detailed Review: Amax inn had a great location right next to the train station, markets, and any monument that you would wish to see. The hosts were great and offered amenities above and beyond what was required. The united have an excellent food option in the hotel as well.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: fw683
Review: Clean rooms, friendly staff, good location
Detailed Review: We stayed at Amax for three nights. The rooms are neat and clean. The staff is very friendly and are happy to answer any questions. The hotel is centrally located and is nearby the train station and metro, which is very convenient. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend Amax Inn to anyone coming to Delhi!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: NhungNguyen811
Detailed Review: I've been to New Delhi several times and always stay in Hotel Amax Inn. the hotel is within walking distance to the railway station which is very convenient. Room is clean, staff are very supportive. Mr. Anil - the owner is a great person. He helps me a lot every time I was there. Definately choose this hotel again.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: TBSuz
Detailed Review: This hotel is near the New Deli train station (not to be confused with the Old Deli station‚Äî which we did).  We received great directions from them on how to get to their place from the airport ‚Äî and took train out next morning.  When we arrived reception gave us a bottle of cold water.  We must have looked like we needed it after braving 112 degree temperatures.  We left early the next morning  before they served breakfast , but the hotel prepared us a bag breakfast.  We found the staff to be friendly and responsive to our needs.  I loved the framed phrases/quotes the hung throughout the hotel.  We found the location to be a bit noisy and the room to be uninspiring.  We‚Äôve paid the same for nicer rooms, but this served our purpose being close to the train station.  Under the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: outofcontext
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat is a bed and breakfast that provides an excellent value for the stay. The staff at Colonel's Retreat were so nice and thoughtful. The rooms are very large, with beautiful bathrooms. There is a small safe in the closet and a mini-fridge near the bed. The staff replenish the coffee, tea, and sugars near the bed every day. There are gauzy curtains and pretty views of the street.   The rooftop is especially beautiful and verdant, with a great view. This is where guests eat breakfast. I am already missing the masala dosa, banana, eggs, and coffee. Mrs. Khanna is very nice and gives excellent travel advice for Delhi. All staff are generous with their time and attention. Highly recommended!

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: DeVakantieMan n
Detailed Review: It was going to be our first time visiting New Delhi! Being the biggest city in India after Mumbai, we where told to be in for some kind of cultural shock! Knowing this we where not sure if we would go for the save choice of staying in a big western hotel or go for a smaller ‚Äúhome stay‚Äù like hotel. We picked the last option and booked a room at the Colonels Retreat. We couldn‚Äôt have made a better decision! The response time on our booking was super fast and the same goes for all our questions on the mail regarding our stay and where to go in Delhi. After being picked up by a taxi (arranged by Colonel‚Äôs) at the airport late in the evening we arrived in a house like hotel in a quiet neighborhood in New Dehli. The staff on duty welcomed us in a very friendly way and didn‚Äôt leave‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: dunkin007
Review: dirty room, dirty toilet and OBNOXIOUS staff.
Detailed Review: i have been staying at this hotel for well over 10 years now. my last visit will be my last. unfortunately, service has deteriorated way below normally accepted levels of decency.  my stays are usually 7-10 days minimum whenever i have work in the area. i just used to blindly go here because i liked the clean rooms, friendly staff and good service.  NOT ANYMORE. my last visit was very very disappointing. the lady at the front desk in the morning shift was downright obnoxious, unpleasant and rude. and too much hustling. they first tried to put me in a their other property across the road. i refused because rooms etc. are smaller. then she tried to get me to buy an upgrade. i refused. she then tried to get me to buy a bottle of water! i refused that as well. in the end i got a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Siddhartha S
Detailed Review: Had a great experience last year and so decided to spend another transit night there. Booked a discounted room from MMT and was really disappointed with the room shown to us. Nothing like last time. So we upgraded and they took us to the building on the other side of the road. The room was clean and simple looking, absolute budget type. But nothing compared to the original rooms in the main building.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rajeev1971
Detailed Review: One of the good hotels in Delhi. Scrumptious complimentary breakfast. Reception is always in a welcoming mode with a smile. Can arrange for airport pickup & drop with secure cab service. Just a stone throw from the delhi station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Julie and Derik
Detailed Review: When I look for a budget hotel, the only thing I worry about is, ‚Äúis it clean?‚Äù. I assure you this hotel is clean.  The ower is their almost all the time and the staff is very nice and helpful.  The location is good if you want authentic Delhi reality.  The outside area is what you expect dirty and loud.  Inside it is clean and quite. It is a poor neighborhood, but very safe.  Not one time did my wife and I feel in danger.  Close to the red Fort and the mosque.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rasel Mahmud
Detailed Review: My brother stayed here and he told me to go only Amax inn . I stayed here for eleven days. The rooms are super clean and bath rooms .it's total haygince. The food I ate most of the time in the hotel was good quality. Anil was there for your help as my brother told about the owner. I will recommend this place to all my friends.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raza B
Detailed Review: We are back in Amax inn . As usual everything goes well the service was excellent and Rooms are clean. The food was tasty and in budget.we are coming back again and definitely recommend. The roof top is nice place to share with other Guests.

I recommend those of you looking for hotel in New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: isabelledeparis2014
Review: Great place to stay in Paharganj
Detailed Review: I highly recommend Amax Inn hotel in Delhi. I went to Delhi many times and always stay in this hotel. ANIL and all the staff are always very king, helpful and honest. Many kind of rooms are available and all of them are very confortable, very clean and quiet with AC. Good WiFi too everywhere. They have a very nice terrace on the rooftop and the food is so good. No need to go outside for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Easy to come from the airport by metro, and it is close to New Delhi Railway station, so practical. They can arrange taxi pickup too and any other visit plans.  A really good place. Thanks to them for making my stay always good. Om Isabelle

Detailed Review: 2018Âπ¥5Êúà„ÅÆÔºßÔº∑„Å´„Ç§„É≥„ÉâÊóÖË°å„Åó„ÅüÈöõ„Å´„Åã„Åì„ÅÆ„Éõ„ÉÜ„É´„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ ÁßÅ„ÅØÂ§ú„Å´Âà∞ÁùÄ„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÂ†¥ÊâÄ„ÅØ‰∏≠„ÄÖË¶ã„Å§„Åë„Å´„Åè„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨ÂΩì„Å´„Åì„Çì„Å™Â†¥ÊâÄ„Å´„ÅÇ„Çã„ÅÆ„Åã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÜÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Å´„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Éõ„ÉÜ„É´„ÅÆ‰∏≠„ÅØ„Ç≠„É¨„Ç§„ÅßÂêÑ„Éï„É≠„Ç¢„Éº„Å´Áõ£Ë¶ñ„Ç´„É°„É©„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅ„É≠„Éì„Éº„Åã„Çâ„ÉÅ„Çß„ÉÉ„ÇØÂá∫Êù•„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÊúÄ‰ΩéÈôê„ÅÆ„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ  ÁßÅ„ÅÆÈÉ®Â±ã„Å´„ÅØ„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É§„Éº„Å®ÂÜ∑ËîµÂ∫´ÔºàÊúâ„Å£„Åü„Åë„Å©„Ç≥„É≥„Çª„É≥„Éà„ÅåÂ±ä„Åã„ÅöÔºâ„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ  „Ç™„Éº„Éä„Éº„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Éã„É´„Åï„ÇìÔºàÂÜôÁúüÔºâ„ÅØÊ∞ó„Åï„Åè„ÅßÂ§ñÂõΩ‰∫∫ÊÖ£„Çå„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ‰Ωï„ÅãÂõ∞„Çä‰∫ã„Åå„ÅÇ„Å£„Åü„ÇâÂØæÂøú„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Çå„Çã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ  ÂÄ§ÊÆµ„ÅÆÂâ≤„Å´Áõ∏ÂΩì„Ç≠„É¨„Ç§„Å†„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁßÅ„ÅØ„Ç™„Çπ„Çπ„É°„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ  „Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Éõ„ÉÜ„É´„ÅÆÂë®„Çä„ÅØ„Ç∂„Ç§„É≥„Éâ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÈõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„ÅÆÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Åù„Åì„ÅØÁêÜËß£„Åó„Å¶„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ  I spent two nights in May 2018. The way to Amax inn is little bit hard to  find. But the room is clean and comfortable. The owner(Mr. Anil) of hotel was friendly and nice to travelers.  I recommend those of you looking for hotel in New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: isabelledeparis2014
Review: Great place to stay in Paharganj
Detailed Review: I highly recommend Amax Inn hotel in Delhi. I went to Delhi many times and always stay in this hotel. ANIL and all the staff are always very king, helpful and honest. Many kind of rooms are available and all of them are very confortable, very clean and quiet with AC. Good WiFi too everywhere. They have a very nice terrace on the rooftop and the food is so good. No need to go outside for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Easy to come from the airport by metro, and it is close to New Delhi Railway station, so practical. They can arrange taxi pickup too and any other visit plans.  A really good place. Thanks to them for making my stay always good. Om Isabelle

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: AnuMadhu
Detailed Review: It's a very average place, not worth the visit coz of the following :  1. They not helpful, i.e. would love to help, but of course at cost  2. Food not worth it , though the cook is a nice guy... 4. Far from the metro and not easily accessible  5. They encourage you to get ripped off of you traveling outside with their help/guidance ...i.e. how much to pay from here to metro in auto...pay 60-120 range...whereas actual cost is 30-40 irrespective of what nationality you are ... 6. Be careful of what you buy there... everything is jacked up price ....and they don't keep correct account if you state to add to your tab....as they don't give no bill etc...they is no way to find out if in what they say is right or not... 7. Not worth the #jugaad ...it's all lies and scamming the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: estrella_chg
Detailed Review: A friend recommend it and it was worth it. The rooftop is amazing, they serve home made food, the rooms are cleaned everyday and there is a good vibe surrounding the place. There is Wi-Fi in every room, and the common room have a TV and some books so you can be entertained all the time. They also organize trips and take you out some days.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sachin Redij
Detailed Review: Very budget friendly, near to New Delhi railway station, clean room, super A/c, Hot shower, Breakfast on roof top is good TV, WIFI. staff is good, supportive. I will stay there on my next visit to Delhi.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kaspars M
Detailed Review: Great budget hotel. Very good value for money. I have stayed in more than 100 hotels in India and several in Pahar Ganj area in Delhi. Smyle Inn clearly is one of the best ones. And they aslo have a tour agent in the same building, who can help you to arrange whatever you want.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sachin Redij
Detailed Review: Very budget friendly, near to New Delhi railway station, clean room, super A/c, Hot shower, Breakfast on roof top is good TV, WIFI. staff is good, supportive. I will stay there on my next visit to Delhi.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kaspars M
Detailed Review: Great budget hotel. Very good value for money. I have stayed in more than 100 hotels in India and several in Pahar Ganj area in Delhi. Smyle Inn clearly is one of the best ones. And they aslo have a tour agent in the same building, who can help you to arrange whatever you want.

Name: Sachin Redij
Detailed Review: Very budget friendly, near to New Delhi railway station, clean room, super A/c, Hot shower, Breakfast on roof top is good TV, WIFI. staff is good, supportive. I will stay there on my next visit to Delhi.

Name: Kaspars M
Detailed Review: Great budget hotel. Very good value for money. I have stayed in more than 100 hotels in India and several in Pahar Ganj area in Delhi. Smyle Inn clearly is one of the best ones. And they aslo have a tour agent in the same building, who can help you to arrange whatever you want.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Will O
Detailed Review: This bed and breakfast was exactly what we were looking for in Delhi. Rooms are no thrills but extremely comfortable with excellent bathrooms. Service was first class. Breakfast was top drawer. Roof terrace is an excellent spot to relax with a beer. We felt it was tremendous value for Delhi. The location was also excellent within easy reach of everything you need. Very quiet street and an oasis is this hectic city.   Thanks so much for looking after us so well. I will certainly be staying here again for all future trips to Delhi.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: _angie_birt
Review: A fitting end to our trip to India
Detailed Review: We ended our 19 day tour in India at the Colonel's retreat and we were not disappointed, our room was lovely and the aroma of lemongrass was very welcoming.  We enjoyed coffee and cake on the rooftop before venturing out to do some last minute shopping, we returned at around 20.30 and the staff made us some lovely food which we enjoyed in the communal dining area, we slept well and enjoyed breakfast on the rooftop.  The staff were once again very attentive and the owners were on hand to make sure our needs were catered for.  All too soon it was time to depart - a lovely end to a fantastic trip to India.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rachel K
Review: B&B in quiet neighborhood with friendly staff but outdated rooms
Detailed Review: This small, family run B&B is in an upscale residential neighborhood. While we greatly enjoyed the quiet (a rarity in India!), note that it is pretty far from major tourist attractions. Our room was small but comfortable and had everything we needed. It was refreshed every day with bottled water which was nice. They also have a water cooler (filtered) if you need more and we were able to order some sodas from the kitchen. The room did look a bit outdated and in need of some repairs. e.g. obvious patching on the walls and particularly around the outlets which seemed a bit loose. The shower generally had good temperature and water pressure. (Not a given in India!)  Breakfast every day was served on the rooftop and with the beautiful weather it was a great start to our days. Staff‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ivan W
Review: Home stay in the Defence Colony of Delhi
Detailed Review: I stayed here at the end of a trip around India (it was fully booked at the start of my trip so I stayed somewhere else) and booked it on the basis of Trip Advisor reviews and the fact that companies such as Audleys and Riskshaw Travel use it. However I really don‚Äôt get why. There‚Äôs absolutely nothing wrong with it; it‚Äôs a home stay, so basically a B&B. I get that, but didn‚Äôt feel the warmth and hospitality that everyone seems to rave about. It‚Äôs really just a rather small room (albeit with reasonable bathroom) in a basic building in the Defence Colony of Delhi, which quite frankly is really not particularly conveniently located for visiting very much at all without a lengthy tuk tuk ride, and not that easy for eating out either (although I thoroughly recommend the Masala House‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: BarbG808
Detailed Review: We stayed here for two nights of a week stay in Delhi.  The only reason we left was due to the fact that it was booked out for the rest of the week.  It is a boutique bed and breakfast in the leafy suburbs of Delhi yet within easy walking distance to metro etc.  It is a very safe area.  There were four floors with only a couple of rooms on each floor. There was also a sitting room on each floor with a good selection of books to browse.    There was a rooftop terrace where we had the most delicious breakfast - including homemade bread and banana bread  and freshly made coffee.  It felt like a home rather than a hotel.  All of the staff were friendly and helpful.  Our room was lovely, the bed was big and comfortable, the bathroom was modern and the towels were soft and fluffy. ‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: MARCO M
Detailed Review: the level of the hotel is good, I lead groups in India and for about 15 years I use the Ajanta hotel. The restaurant is the best in the area. The staff takes care of the guests. if there are problems, just talk about it and the staff will look for a solution. the price-quality ratio is good

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: AK Singh
Detailed Review: Hotel Ajanta is well kept. Staff members are polite and well mannerd. House keeping is also found to be very good. Hotel Ajanta is very closed to New Delhi Railway station and Connaught Place. Rates are reasonable. Room service is also prompt and good. AK Singh

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Journosupratim
Detailed Review: I frequently visit Delhi and this is first time I have chosen Ajanta Hotel to stay for long 5 Days (25th -30th April, 2018). First of all, Pick up facility from Delhi Airport by Hotel is really good initiative. The Superior Room is good one, big size with all amenities. However, Window AC is to be replaced in the Room. The cleanliness is good and floor staffs are cooperative. The one thing I need to raise i.e Food Service at Room is really very disturbing as you have to pay on spot while you will order for anything and the bills (Paper) provided are of very low quality, which is really need to be taken care of. The food quality is good. The staffs are quite good, but over confidence of staffs are really concern. However, I have also suggested my office for booking and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Maxine P
Detailed Review: The Night Manager Santosh couldn't have been more helpful.  Our son was a victim of a scam and had his original itinerary cancelled.  One call to describe this to Santosh, late at night, and he arranged for a car to go and collect him and kept his room available (even thought the scammers had cancelled it) for his (eventual) arrival at midnight.  He let us know in the UK when he had arrived; he offered advice for onward travel, and was reassuring and helpful, as was his Manager about what to do in busy New Delhi, and getting money back from the scam.  Hotel is also nearby to the railway; the customer service was as much as we could have hoped for.  Thanks to Santosh who stepped up to quickly sort things out.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Seansie2402
Detailed Review: I didn't like the first room i was given after arriving late. It was a little small with two single beds on ground floor.  I was given a far better room the following day when i explained this. They offered  a car pick up service from the airport which was fantastic and inexpensive. Reception listened to me and acted upon what I requested. The service from the female receptionist and also other members was extremely helpful and professional. Quite unusual for Delhi and greatly appreciated. I dont care much for the area, i am used to being at the top end of Pahar ganj and this is at the bottom end near rail station. I would stay here again however and the breakfast buffet isn't bad and they have a cafe opposite selling Italian coffee.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bouanani T
Detailed Review: I sent a few nights in   Thanks Thanks couple and they organised a package tour in Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh. It was my first package travel. They did a wonderful job. The driver Rajeev was very good, Jack and Zoohor perfect professionals in organising everything and anticipating problems. Wonderful trip. Bravo Ajanta!! It is the second time I stay in the hotel and it is already my reference in Delhi. All the staff is very nice and premises are clean!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: cyswong_hk
Detailed Review: We have stayed in this hotel for three times in New Delhi.  The hotel is close to the New Delhi railway station, Airport Express Line and the Main Bazaar.  It's neighborhood may be a bit cramped,  but the hotel offered a modern,  tidy and comfortable environment.  All staff were courteous, attentive and helpful.  Rooms were spacious,  clean and with style.  It offered welcome drinks when we arrived and a room after check-out for refreshing before our overnight flight.  Their consideration and services were thoughtful and intimate.  We shall return to this hotel when we spend our time in New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: BeingMoreNick
Detailed Review: We had gone to Delhi for 4 days to explore business options. The Ajanta hotel is in the area of the train station. Very busy, noisy and dirty but the same can be said for hat while area. Out of the hotels in the area this, from the outside defiantly seemed to be the classiest option. We ordered a twin suite. We through we had a balcony with it but apparently there aren‚Äôt any twin rooms with balcony‚Äôs. we had a suit which had a double and single bed. On the whole the hotel was very clean. Very warm welcome with a complimentary coffee and bottled water. Plenty of offers to take us sight seeing as well, but after speaking to our local contacts it would seem these were offered about about 30% above the going rate. I expected there would be some friendly negotiation to be had to get‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Samprith S
Detailed Review: i have been staying in Ajanta from 2016, but my last  stay here was very disappointing, first they mad us to wait for 30 min for check in( after entering all details and submitting kyc. second we had ask for tea maker in room, which they said they will send , we stayed there for 3 day we have not seen tea maker.  morning breakfast was not that great like before, poor quality non washable bed spreads and blankets. worst is attitude of restaurant staff, they take orders as if they are serving free of cost, no politeness , no smiling ....

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shraddha L
Detailed Review: Very bed service and staff.. They don't take care for their guest. Rooms are unhygienic. Staff is not cooperative. We had to wait 2 hours for our dinner which was. Included in our cost. They were making silly excuses. Worst experience. Not recommended at all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: DebbiMilner
Review: Great Stay and Perfect 10 Day Driving Tour.
Detailed Review: Great place to stay in the heart of New Delhi with caring staff in clean rooms and a decent rooftop restaurant.  Following my stay at the hotel, I took a ten week tour through Amritsar, Manali, and Rishikesh with a driver provided through the hotel.  The tour was wonderful and I am very grateful for the outstanding service provided by Hotel Amax.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kalyan Panja
Review: The rooms are on the smaller side as compared to the hotel rates.
Detailed Review: It is a popular hotel among foreigners tucked in a small lane inside Paharganj. The rooms are on the smaller side as compared to the hotel rates. The room service is friendly and good. The price of the food is on the higher side.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Peter P
Detailed Review: You will get in this hotel a very good service.  If you need anything help ( for travelling,  or Sim Card or others..), you will get help. The rooms are clean,  comfortable,  compaired with other rooms in same standard are very cheap.  If you want to keep any package there,  you can deposite in an extra safe room. The food from the hotel kitchen is also good and cheap.  Free WiFi also and very near to the Railway Station and Delhi metrostation.  The Managment will do the best to feel comfortable and to have the feeling to live in a community.  Praise the Lord.  Peter Georg from Germany

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: miriamsson
Detailed Review: This has been my second stay at Amax Inn, after last time's great three days this time six says at the heart of Pahar Ganj. Again, the staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, the rooftop restaurant serves good food and is a great place to meet other nice travellers. They really manage to have an overall friendly and relaxed atmosphere at this hotel! The location is great, not fay from CP (Connaught Place) and the New Delhi Metro station, which also is the easiest connection you want to get when you take the Airport Expess Line from the Airport and don't arrive too late in the day. The reason being that you still want to take an auto or shared auto to be dropped off. That should cost you about 10 Rs, when you're obviously a traveller you might have to bargain a bit. So, overall a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Davesontheroad
Review: Right in the chaos of Pahar Ganj
Detailed Review: The hotel is pretty good.  It's good value for money and the management were friendly and helpful.  Can't say it looked like picture... It ain't quiet. If you're new to India this isn't an easy way to start.  There's a lot going on just outside your front door - and it's dirty and noisy. If you're looking to experience the craziness of India with a decent room this will fit you nicely. There's some good chai to be had down the road. The restaurant on the corner is s**thouse.   Welcome to Delhi!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Abdul k
Detailed Review: We are on trip in India for our business. We are using Amax inn from long time . We are really appreciate the staff behaviour and friendly attitude. The Rooms are perfect with higene bathroom. We enjoy roof top food in the evening. We feel safe and secure.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: md m
Detailed Review: I am coming to Delhi many times.  This time my friend Sharma bring me to Amax inn on Arakashan road. The staff is welcoming and always ready with smile.  The Rooms and Bathroom are clean that's what you need in Delhi busy time.  The food was great at good price.  We had great time and coming back next month.  Recommend to all.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: SHA E
Detailed Review: Me and my team  always  using  amax services.  It's  a gem  in a little  street.  Rooms are super clean and staff is always  ready  to  help you, They have a rooftop  restaurant  inside,  food is yamee and fresh. don't  compare  with five star hotel, it's  value for money. They  have travel  arrangements  in lobby,  will help  you in any travel  solutions.  Thanks  Amax team  will be back  soon..

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: jc19742015
Detailed Review: Excellent value for money. Staff is very well behaved and accommodative. Food is good and rightly priced. Wifi is free and has excellent connectivity in rooms. Overall a very nice experience. Every time I visit Delhi I stay at Amax Inn

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: sultan k
Detailed Review: I Visited many times to delhi  but am not satisfied with hotels  when i got a hotel Amax inn  i think its end my unsatisfied hotel journey Now i finally got a satisfied hotels  i really enjoyed a room service  very good staff and helpfull staff Now Am very happy .........Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kathy T
Detailed Review: We stayed here when arriving in Delhi for the first time.  Nice welcome from staff.  It is up an alley but don‚Äôt worry, hotel is nice and clean.  Staff are attentive. I don‚Äôt think we were given the nicest of rooms but it was still clean.  Food was lovely and tasty. It was a busy and vibrant location not far from central metro station.  We did try to walk it but got lost so hindsight we should have just jumped a Tuk tuk from the metro.  Metro from the airport is absolutely brilliant.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lalte K
Detailed Review: We had stayed here with our families . The kids really enjoyed with atmosphere. The Rooms are clean and modern . The bathrooms are hygienic and clean. The rooftop was good spot for delicious food. We are coming back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: sm a
Detailed Review: I stayed that hotel for one night with my friends.I got it online and I read good reviews  about them on trip advisor.That is true they  are excellent. There room was clean and perfect. The stuff was very polite to us. They have a rooftop restaurant where I had our dinner. Food quality  was nice. It not so far from New Delhi Railway Station. In this trip I stayed many hotels but Amax was Amazing.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: DebbiMilner
Review: Great Stay and Perfect 10 Day Driving Tour.
Detailed Review: Great place to stay in the heart of New Delhi with caring staff in clean rooms and a decent rooftop restaurant.  Following my stay at the hotel, I took a ten week tour through Amritsar, Manali, and Rishikesh with a driver provided through the hotel.  The tour was wonderful and I am very grateful for the outstanding service provided by Hotel Amax.
