The rooftop terrace its a very good place to unwind and leave for a while the hectic city.  The location is quite centric.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: FCsusan
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 2 nights and the area is quiet. It was booked for us as part of a tour.  The beds were comfortable althought a little firm for my taste and the shower worked OK.  It was nice to talk with the owners about places to see in Delhi.  When I got sick, the owners sent someone to the chemist to get some meds that seemed to work.  It makes a nice homestay.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Elizabeth B
Detailed Review: Arrived here early morning after night flight. We were made very welcome and served tea and the most delicious banana bread. It is secret recipe and I can‚Äôt quite make it at home. Did a tour of Delhi in the afternoon so  we were ready to enjoy good quality food and sleep well. Staff very hospitable and breakfast included more banana bread plus home made bread using ancient grains so no additives etc. Delicious.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: bigredwombat
Detailed Review: Stayed here two separate nights (one at the beginning of a tour and one at the end). My rating is the average of the two. It is located in a quiet neighborhood off the main roads and is a little hard to find. The first night we were given a room just off the entrance foyer on the ground floor.  I would not recommend this room.  It is very small and the shower stall partly overlaps a window, which results in quite a bit of water winding up on the bathroom floor because the shower wall does not seal against the window. Also you can hear everything going in the foyer, so I was awakened by guests checking in at 2am.  Other than that, did not hear any traffic or neighborhood noise.  Was also able to get dinner at the hotel, which was very welcome after a late arrival.  Good food and‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: baxterview2
Detailed Review: After a long flight we were relieved to be made so welcome at this hotel. A hot shower (with fabulous towels) and a short rest had us ready for sightseeing in Delhi. Sadly we couldn‚Äôt get the fan heater in the room to work (possibly operator error!) and the staff didn‚Äôt seem to understand our request. We found it rather cold.  The owners were delightful and made us most welcome during our short stay. I do think the place is in need of a little TLC - a lick of paint etc. should make a big difference

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: POPL
Detailed Review: This wonderful oasis in Delhi was just what we needed after a long journey. The welcome in the family home was friendly and the staff and owners looked after us really well. Everyone talks about the banana bread and it lives up to its billing!  Our room was spacious and spotless. We ate both in the dining room and the roof terrace and the food was excellent. The morning we left, a packed breakfast was waiting for us. A lovely place to stay, close to thee centre of New Delhi yet in a quiet side street..

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Martin E
Detailed Review: Simple hotel but very good. Friendly owners and helpful staff. Good food both breakfast and dinner if you want it- home cooked and tasty. Complimentary tea and cake on the rooftop in evening. Within striking distance of main areas of Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Navin S
Review: Good hotel near new Delhi railway station.
Detailed Review: Located near to paharganj railway station, surrounded by lots of restaurants, awesome room, best in class hotel, total value for money. Airport is just 15 km away from hotel and hotel provides airport cabs at decent charge. Staff is very polite and helpful. I would suggest everyone to come here once and feel their royal treatment at very cheap cost.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: viqar90
Detailed Review: i just stayed for a night in hotel but its a great experience for me right from reception to room service . and extremely thankful to miss gunjan for her prompt response for  my query regarding the duplicate bill to reproduce it in my company.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kolega g
Detailed Review: Feel very comfort in hotel. Room was clean and spacious with nice and big bathroom. Surprise  me two tv in room. Internet connection wasn't the best but usable and free. Staff was very frendly. Good location.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: harvinder k
Detailed Review: I feel that this is my home away from home. Staff is very friendly and helpful. They will help you in any way they can. free pick up from to and to the airport.  Always looking forward to go back there as it seems like they are your family members.  that is how they treat you.  will never replace them as long as they will treat me the same way. Million thanks to the staff of Ajanta Hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: pardesipradeep
Detailed Review: I recently stayed at Hotel Ajanta and this time I find better rooms with great comfort.Room was nicely done up with all modern amenities.Staff were very courteous with very prompt and great services.I love this hotel.The reason I choose this hotel is the fact that this is centrally located and close to CP the business hub of Delhi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Robyn S
Review: Excellent service from staff - nice hotel.
Detailed Review: We reserved this hotel for 11 nights as we had to have a reservation for the visa. We had  requested quiet rooms with windows on the higher floors. On arrival our first night was on the first floor with no windows. Gunjan, who runs the front desk then made sure that we were then moved to really lovely rooms higher up for the rest of our stay. Her attention to guests is unmatched, and she is a real pleasure to deal with. We unfortunately had made the booking through Booking.com and when changing our plans to travel to Jodhpur, they charged us 3 nights cancellation fee. We also had to pay again (a lower rate) for our last night at the hotel. They weren't able to override this. A suggestion is to book directly with the hotel to avoid this happening. There is a big variation in the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: milind m
Review: Poor Experience rather say Bad experience at all
Detailed Review: I stay here with a group of family members from Jan 25 to Jan 27. I stay almost 2 days here whenever we ask hotel guys to provide hot water or change the rooms cloth-like towel or napkin they don't react fast even wifi is very poor. Hot water is not coming into bathroom properly. And top of most whenever we received any service they immediately ask for money.Last day on 27th Jan 2018 when we check out from rooms they give bill where they mentioned that you have consumed soft drinks and eat biscuits where we don't drink even soft drink at all.I am Thinking that why Trip advisor gave 2017 best hotel awards they need to rethink about this.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Manoj S
Detailed Review: Hotel Ajanta is one of my favourite place in delhi, i always stay here. All the front desk staff is good but Ms. Gunjan is best with her conversation with the guest. I had a very nice deluxe room with good interior, and 24 hours hot water available everything was neat and clean. I would definately come back again also refer to friends also.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: apintolobo
Detailed Review: Stayed once again at this hotel and as usual found it pretty well kept. The staff are very helpful and co-operative. Was up graded to a very spacious room on the top floor with a huge balcony. The breakfast and service is good. Cleanliness maintained. A special mention about Mr Ravinder Singh. This guy is not only very helpful but is an asset to this establishment. "Good show Mr. Ravinder - Grateful thanks"

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: shivavlc
Detailed Review: Excellent service and best rooms at economy price.I always prefer this hotel for holiday or business purposes.  I visit every year to this hotel only at Delhi.  Thank you Soo much for Gunjal Mam.she has booked our rooms at last minute today though we came all of sudden.  Response is very quick.Friendly staff.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: FellowTraveler457012
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is well presented and friendly ! The service and rooms are great ! We had a family room.. and enjoyed our stay . As the food was great we had buffet breakfast at the hotel. I would like to go back again .

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: _kalyani2981
Detailed Review: Not Satisfied with this Hotel. Service was very bad. We ask hot water for drink they never provide within 2 days. Even they can't give us normal water in Room. we told him for clean the room but they just ignore and not clean the room within 2 days.We didn't take Pepsi Can Biscuits from room but the ask pay for the same. Really bad experience with this Hotel.I never suggest to anybody. Even TripAdvisor give them Certificate of Excellence, I didn't thing so this is right certificate.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: AJNT
Detailed Review: We come to Delhi every year and always stay here as they go out of the way to make sure we are taken care of. When we arrive early before check in or have checked out earlier and waiting for a late train, they have given us a temporary room to freshen up/shower. The restaurant offers the best breakfast buffet in a pleasant environment. A great budget hotel worth finding.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: BonnieAustralienne
Review: Best hotel for a short stay in Delhi ‚Äì great service, great value, central location
Detailed Review: We stayed only one night in Hotel Ajanta in transit from Kerala back home, and had a great but regrettably short stay. We were upgraded to a beautiful room on the top floor, with a balcony overlooking the busy streets of Delhi, plus a very comfortable bed and living space. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The location is very central and a quick 5 minute tuk-tuk to Connaught Place. As far as hotels in Delhi go, this is the one! We'll definitely be back.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Helenaethiago
Detailed Review: After 3 months traveling around the country, It was good to be in a hotel with a good shower, nice Room and food. We had a good stay there and the staff helped us with our needs, always kind to us. We definitely recomend It.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: dave w
Detailed Review: friendly staff. great buffet breakfast. great restaurant for dinner. great prices and the staff make you fell welcome and comfortable. would recommend staying here as it is close to a lot of areas tourists will want to visit

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: SriramAjmer
Review: A good hotel very near to New Delhi Railway Station
Detailed Review: This hotel is about 5 minutes walk from New Delhi Railway Station and is a decent place to stay.  Unlike other hotels in the area that functions with touts, this hotel has lots of foreigners staying and maintains its class.  It has a small restaurant attached and serves good food.  The staff is cordial and the rooms are clean.  Overall a good experience.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Kumar p
Detailed Review: Hello... Recently I visited hotel ajanta in Delhi.. It was such nice place,there all staff very humble and polite... It's a perfect place to stay... ND thank you that person who really help me lot.. Thank you Mr Ravinder Singh... Everyone must visit hotel ajanta when you go Delhi.. Nice experience...

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bindiya R
Detailed Review: Best deals got by Hotel Ajanta. Good Service in addition to Good Food. It was a nice stay for us. The Hotel staff and other staff was very nice to us. We recommend others also. Suit and Superior Rooms are awesome. Thankyou Ajanta

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Trevor B
Review: Convenient place to stay in Delhi
Detailed Review: One of the best hotels that I have stayed in Delhi. Very friendly and helpful staff,good food,clean rooms and value for money. Very convenient location. Thank you Ms Gunjan for been a helpful person in the hotel industry that makes stay a very special.  Thank you Trevor Bastiansz

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sanjay
Detailed Review: Please visit, please choose this hotel in New Delhi.Excellent customer service, must see Mr Ravinder singh, he is the best, rooms are excellent, value for money, you get much more than you have expected.hope they stay like that. I was in room number 401, and my brother was in other room, room number 419, it was excellent except shower leakage in 401, staff was confused about tissues as I asked for tissued but they were confused, apart from that everything was good. I must say that I had to wait to get into room but I had very nice experience. Guy who book taxi is bit arrogant but the driver was excellent, was as good as a guide. god bless him. Long story short, everytime I will visit India I will stay at AJANTA hotel, please give them chance to stay  but say no to buffet‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Karan D
Detailed Review: The service was quick. Interior of the hotel is good too. Can improve the breakfast buffet. Internet speed needs improvement too. Apart from the above everything else is excellent. Had a nice stay. Would love to come back

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: shrestha1234
Detailed Review: It was really nice.We booked superior room but the receptionist gave us suite.the food quality was really nice and the room was extremely neat and clean the staffs doesn't ask for extra tips if it's your wish you can give otherwise not

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Pooja B
Detailed Review: Hotel was very good and clean  Service was also upto the mark  Food was absolutely good. Staff was very nice, friendly,courteous and cooperative especially Ravinder Singh sirüòä I would definitely recommend this to others  as well üëçüèª

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Dreamer454937
Detailed Review: We were visit above hotel it was good hotel  every thing  is near by hotel . staff was very helpful n the manager Mr.  Ravin Dar singh give us  nice service food was good rooms are neet n clean .ashokbhatia ahmedabad

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Paii S
Detailed Review: Nice hotel, good services and location Staff help us so much, Eddy is the one of their staff help us to much and then he provided us for complimentary birthday cake for one of our friend. Highly recommend for visit Delhi üòÄ

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: pradeep l
Review: One of the best Hotel surround with wholesale markets
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality right from the waiter till the managers, nice rooms, perfect room service, delicious foods, easy to commute from places. worth for money all to gather.  My family enjoyed the time being here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: knuttapong
Detailed Review: Hotel Ajanta was awesome . i used to travel allover India . I can say surely Ajanta hotel is my first choice to stay whenever i visit to Delhi . I must mention about the hospitality of the hotel people, the staff take care us so good and treated with very friendly manner. The first time i stayed here with my group of 17 people and all of my friends are so happy to stay in Ajanta hotel . Second time i visited again between 13th to 17th jan 2018 again. For me no way to think about looking another hotel. Easy to go every where, situated in downtown of Delhi Grateful ....

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: nina n
Review: Great Staff, friendly place to stay
Detailed Review: I always stay at the Ajanta when I‚Äôm in Delhi they have reasonably priced rooms that are clean and it‚Äôs in a convenient location. I return as the staff are so warm and friendly especially Gunjan one of the management staff who always makes sure I am welcomed, and that my stay is comfortable and I‚Äôm happy with my room... so much thanks for this excellent service!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: damanx
Detailed Review: The staff was super friendly and very efficient. All my queries and issues were resolves immediately. The restaurant was great. The price and quality of food was excellent. I had all my meals there. The hotel surrounding was just ok due to the location. But for the price of the rooms, excellent staff and great restaurant I would definitely stay there again. Great job Hotel Ajanta !

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Honey B
Detailed Review: Hotel was very excellent. The hotel was in central everything available near to Hotel and the staff is very cooperative and friendly room service is good.The room was very clean and well furnished with comfortable blankets,chairs,mini bar

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: OnAir749611
Detailed Review: Hotel Ajanta was wonderful. The staff, particularly Gunjan, were very helpful. They spoke English very well and helped us with every question we had. Facilities were clean and maintained. Breakfast was also good. The hotel is in a good spot. Walkable to Paharganj market street and Connaught place.  The staff were very helpful in organizing tuk-tuks and travel around Delhi and rest of India.  We have already re booked to stay here when we return to Delhi on our way home.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Gale K
Detailed Review: Highly unsatisfied with this hotel services. 1. Upon reaching the hotel at 10 pm the reception was empty for atleast 10 minutes. We ladies and children were made to wait without even being offered a seat to wait for receptionist. After the booking in charge finally arrived he made us wait another 5 to ten minutes to address a foreigner who arrived much later than us. Even when the foreigner requested the hotel staff to tend to us first they did not listen and carried on addressing his issue. This racist treatment was our first impression of the hotel.¬†  2. After finally meeting the booking person in charge and payment made for 3 rooms we were given such filthy rooms with dirty toilets with broken pipes. The fosset pipe had fungus over it and was disgusting.The bedroom was only‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: david j
Detailed Review: I have been in the Ajanta already five times, my first stay was in 1997! It is a wonderful hotel, in every aspect, it is comfortable, super friendly, the staff is fantastic, location perfect, good restaurant, etc. Very reccomendable!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anna S
Detailed Review: The Hotel is central. Close to shops, coffee bar, food stalls, pharmacy, etc.. The staff is very welcoming and ready to help the guests. Everyone is nice and available. The internet connection is also good. The complementary breakfast is a great good morning and I highly recommend the milk coffee. The rooms are spacious and nicely decorated. A few negative points: I stayed in the hotel only 2 days. The first night my family and I were arranged in a nice family room clean and comfortable but in the morning we all had to get a cold shower since there was no hot water at all (that might not be due to the hotel, but, especially in winter, that can be a bad surprise). The second day the staff moved us to a bigger room with two bathrooms and two bedrooms. This last location was less‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Scenic748328
Detailed Review: We traveled December 2017 - January 2018 in North India (2 adults and 4 children). During this trip we stayed at the beginning and the end some nights in hotel Ajanta. The stuff was really friendly and helpful. Santosh organized us the pickup from airport and railway station and everything worked well. Thank you for the great support! The rooms are clean.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: David S
Detailed Review: Stayed here with my family, in a family room. The hotel was lovely - helpful and professional staff, clean, spacious rooms and a really nice restaurant. We were really exhausted on arrival, and it was the perfect place to recuperate.  The area is a bit hit and miss, but very convenient. An easy walk to the station without luggage, or a short car ride with luggage.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tob T
Review: Fancy hotel in a not fancy area
Detailed Review: The room was very clean and well furnished with comfortable blankets, chairs, a mini-bar and even a bath tub with hot water. The privat terrace had a nice view. The service was very good and all staff was very friendly and helpful. The food was good. The airport transfer was well organized and comfortable. We had a late flight but an early check-out so they offered us a free room for refreshment and they kept our luggage safe. If we got a WiFi connection it was very slow (no connection in the room). The nearby area doesn't feel safe as soon as the sun comes down and is very touristic.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: chinkara
Detailed Review: My husband and I stayed here 3 times during our last trip to India, and it became a friendly refuge from the madness outside! All the staff were lovely, and were always helpful, reliably booking taxis when required and offering any advice needed. Good food is always available, in your room or in the upstairs rooftop restaurant. The rooms we had were clean and comfortable, the last room we had that was a little more expensive than the others was quieter. Hot water was available mornings and evenings. We have travelled a great deal in India, mostly back-packing and the Hotel Amax Inn is one of the best budget hotels we have experienced on several levels. Thank you, all at the Amax!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: john
Detailed Review: Stayed in Hotel Amax Inn for 2 nights..chose this hotel as it was close to railway station and reviews were in general good. However, in reality the area is awful, I was travelling with my well travelled daughter and it felt very unsafe area. As soon as you left hotel you were targeted by scammers. The area stunk of urine and smog and even the hotel room was filled with the stench from outside. The hotel itself was in a dingy alley (see photos) and you entered through a metal detector! That tells you something about the area! Even The staff at reception said "don't talk to anyone outside, don't say hello or respond to anyone, just keep walking and get a tuk tuk asap!"  The room was very basic, bathroom very poor and the towels provided were damp and smelt like they'd been washed‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: LorenzoG
Detailed Review: The hotel is in a central and area, noisy but well positioned  to visit Delhi's main attractions. The rooms are clean and the staff is very nice. They will help you with any issue/requests you may have. Kitchen is always open, and food is good and cheap. Defintely good value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lawrence W
Detailed Review: It‚Äôs not 5 star by any means but it‚Äôs clean staff are very attentive and helpful paranji is the slums of Delhi but all the foreigners tend to gravitate to here and it‚Äôs a reasonably safe place certainly handy.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: DJGR
Detailed Review: Two night stay which was ok but we wouldn‚Äôt want to stay any longer. We found it cold and noisy, the hotel solution being a heater which we were offered to rent. Sadly the heater was broken so an extra blanket was provided.   Positives- Staff are friendly and gave good / free travel advice  Food was nice  Fridge in room (although a bit dirty)   Negatives-  The bed was pushed up against the wall directly under the aircon unit which was draughty.  Only one blanket in the room and the pillows are very hard.  The rooms are very noisy, noise very clear from the street and conversations in the hall and reception audible.  Two / three men always sat on a chair immediately outside our room door. Sometimes that close they had to move to allow us in & out ! Again, every word they spoke‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Uzhul
Detailed Review: A great place to stay, near everything. The rooms are clean and comfy, the staff is warm, great about advising, and very, very welcoming. It's our second time here and we will gladly back again ! Also, restaurant and tea are great.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Pauline D
Detailed Review: An excellent place to stay with everything nearby, metro station, train station, bazars, markets, monuments...  The staff is welcoming, warm and great at advising. The rooms are clean. The restaurant has good dishes. And it has good prices for its quality. We highly recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shamim H
Review: Great place for staying with luxury
Detailed Review: It's a great hotel in my experience with all its  luxurious rooms, neat washrooms, delicious foods and frieendly behaviour of its staff. I felt like I was at my home and was served all homemade food throughout my stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shmmy A
Detailed Review: Good Service with neat and clean room.Washroom and room service are good. As a foreigner we get good behaviour from them. Our booking made by online and pay later without any harragement. So it's a good hotel with full of Satisfaction.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Milan P
Detailed Review: I stayed in Amax on December,2017 for five nights for business purpose.The rooms are quite spacious and bathroom was cleaned enough.the service was excellent.there is a rooftop restaurant .hope to visit more times in future. The staff is very friendly. There is transportation facilities for sightseeing and travel inside and outside of Delhi.the place is very as it is noticed lot of foreigners use to stay here.

The staff is very friendly. There is transportation facilities for sightseeing and travel inside and outside of Delhi.the place is very as it is noticed lot of foreigners use to stay here.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: minispringrolls
Review: Clean and fun vibe hostel with friendly staff
Detailed Review: Jugaad gives a fun and nice vibe and staff are friendly and helpful. I stayed in a private room in Jugaad Hostels during my first visit to Delhi. The room was clean and comfortable with a private bathroom and fast internet. Jugaad is located in the residential area. I felt safe being around the area as a single traveller. No one was bothering me or ask me to buy stuff when I walked out of the hostel. Jugaad also organised my trip to Agar. The driver and the tour guide they organised for me were professional and friendly. I thoroughly enjoyed the trip and my stay in Jugaad. I'd highly recommend anyone who'd are looking for budget stays but also want to have a private room to stay with Jugaad! 5 stars!

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: sba27
Detailed Review: I can‚Äôt resist myself from stop telling about the quality of Jugaad Hostel in Delhi, not to mention, a perfect place to stay in Delhi. This hostel would give you an amalgam experience altogether. The interior and room set up are very comfortable for any person to live in relaxation. More importantly, their lavatory is clean which is so important for women. The sitting room has a gathering of distinguished individuals from different parts of the worlds and hence, would give you the opportunity to meet them. Their staffs have got friendly gesture and the convenient part is to have all the menus of different restaurants close by to choose and order food from. This was first my experience in there and would love to pay a visit again and recommend my friends as well. Much‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: imodiumjoe
Detailed Review: Excellent place to stay.........decent fee breakfast (if you stay).......even if you don't stay, you should use there tour guide (advice) on their 4th floor. We stayed there often but they were booked a few times we couldn't stay, but we always used their tour guy.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Subha S
Detailed Review: Paharganj is pretty cramped, the streets are narrow and crowded, can't expect cleanliness around those busy streets. Chandi wali gali is one such place in Paharganj. I was kinda surprised to see many foreigners who chose to stay in Smyle Inn. It is a neat small place, ideal for a solo or couple stay. I liked their breakfast menus, it was simple and balanced. It is perfect for a 3-4 night budget stay. Also, there is Paharganj market on the main road offering more street food options. Easily accessible from RK ashram metro station. Overall I had a good stay at Smyle Inn.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tutimalbran
Detailed Review: I want to share my experience in this hostel. Since i arrive the personal gave me a nice welcome. Everything was excellent. They are very helpfull. If you need something or any recomendation they will help you. I came here 2 times and my last time they gave me a favor to keep my bags until the taxi arrive (for 8 hours) the offer me water, a shower and i could sleep a little nap for 2 hours.  The rooms are very clean and confortable. The best shower ever! Thank you so much smyle inn. Im very happy with this choice. Trust me guys you gonna love it! And is in a nice location.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: KirupaShankar
Review: Good decent hotel to stay with low cost
Detailed Review: We had a airport pickup  Very Happy  When we seen our name board at the airport when  coming out with no plans  He took our bags and taken to the car  Talked lot with him even we don't know the exact Hindi language we survived  Driver is very helpful  Good decent hotel to stay with low cost Nice breakfast

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: –í—è—á–µ—Å–ª–∞–≤ –†
Review: Great place to stay in the center of Delhi
Detailed Review: The hotel is located right in the Main Bazaar, near the New Delhi railroad station. Compared to many hotels in the same price category, this one is much better: clean rooms, funny jokes written on doors (help you not to confuse the number of your room), nice and cozy terrace, free tasty breakfasts, gentle and helpful personnel, fast wi-fi. Sometimes the water wasn't warm enough but still, our stay here (2 nights) was very comfortable and nice.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Catharina K
Detailed Review: I stayed for 2 nights at Smyle Inn and I think it's real good value for money especially because of the friendly staff and the practical help they offer freely. Delhi can be challenging but they really help to make that experience as smooth as possible. The room was simple but clean, the hot water was not always working but this is almost everywhere in India the case.  I will definitely come back here, recommended for solo female travelers as well. Thank you guys! See you next time

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: fufunia
Detailed Review: Stayed 2 days on our group tour with a total of 20 students. A nice place to stay at Paharganj, New Delhi. Location is very close to the Railway Station. Manager and all other staff were helpful with good service. Rooms were clean and a stylish dormitory with free wi-fi. Rooftop was wow for having breakfast.And this place is not like other maximum  fraud hotels of paharganj. Lastly A Highly recommended Place for both backpackers and family...

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mattie G
Detailed Review: Rooms were clean.  Comfy beds. Basic bathrooms.  Tour agent Ali was amazing help booking our day trip in Delhi and also train to and from Harwidwar.  Just off the main bizaar which was wild and vibrant.  Close to the most amazing vegetarian restaurant - Tanda - recommend the Vegetable Korma to ALL!  Even though says accepts credit card, cash is definitely preferred.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Katarzyna B
Detailed Review: My boyfriend and me decided to stay with SmyleInn twice during our 2-week India trip. Each time it was a very nice experience; rooms are tidy, the location is very convenient, breakfasts are also good (although they do not vary a lot). A very nice surprise for me was that we got our money back for the night that we decided not to take (due to some change of plans). I can highly recommend this hotel, it is definitely a good value-for-money service.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Francisco N
Detailed Review: Everything worked fine, very nice people and good conditions for backpackers!! Very large bed, hot water and nice breakfast. The rooftop is nice and quiet. All the help with transfers and city guide. Thank you Smile Inn

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: peter_jonsas
Detailed Review: Located close to the colorful and busy Main Bazaar street with authentic foods and narrow side lanes. The rooms were tidy and nice with a hot shower. Staff was very helpful and the travel agency upstairs gave some tips for further travels.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vasco M
Detailed Review: The good things first: the place is clean, the staff is really friendly and helpful, always smiling, provided me a heater since it was cold, luggage storage after check out no problem. The shower had hot water, which was really nice.   However, I would have expected more for the price (1200rs per night). The room was okay (clean but very basic and not really any space for luggage), the bathroom was tiny (had to sit on the toilet sideways), breakfast was okay (though not enough to be filling, at other places I paid maybe 50-100rs for a breakfast like this) and the tea is only from tea bags.   Overall, this is an okay place, especially if you are new to India and need help organizing your trip etc.

Overall I had a good stay at Smyle Inn.

Name: Katarzyna B
Detailed Review: My boyfriend and me decided to stay with SmyleInn twice during our 2-week India trip. Each time it was a very nice experience; rooms are tidy, the location is very convenient, breakfasts are also good (although they do not vary a lot). A very nice surprise for me was that we got our money back for the night that we decided not to take (due to some change of plans). I can highly recommend this hotel, it is definitely a good value-for-money service.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Francisco N
Detailed Review: Everything worked fine, very nice people and good conditions for backpackers!! Very large bed, hot water and nice breakfast. The rooftop is nice and quiet. All the help with transfers and city guide. Thank you Smile Inn

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: peter_jonsas
Detailed Review: Located close to the colorful and busy Main Bazaar street with authentic foods and narrow side lanes. The rooms were tidy and nice with a hot shower. Staff was very helpful and the travel agency upstairs gave some tips for further travels.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vasco M
Detailed Review: The good things first: the place is clean, the staff is really friendly and helpful, always smiling, provided me a heater since it was cold, luggage storage after check out no problem. The shower had hot water, which was really nice.   However, I would have expected more for the price (1200rs per night). The room was okay (clean but very basic and not really any space for luggage), the bathroom was tiny (had to sit on the toilet sideways), breakfast was okay (though not enough to be filling, at other places I paid maybe 50-100rs for a breakfast like this) and the tea is only from tea bags.   Overall, this is an okay place, especially if you are new to India and need help organizing your trip etc.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: imodiumjoe
Review: Gave us a different room that reserved
Detailed Review: Excellent place to stay.........decent fee breakfast (if you stay).......even if you don't stay, you should use there tour guide (advice) on their 4th floor. We stayed there often but they were booked a few times we couldn't stay, but we always used their tour guy.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Subha S
Detailed Review: Paharganj is pretty cramped, the streets are narrow and crowded, can't expect cleanliness around those busy streets. Chandi wali gali is one such place in Paharganj. I was kinda surprised to see many foreigners who chose to stay in Smyle Inn. It is a neat small place, ideal for a solo or couple stay. I liked their breakfast menus, it was simple and balanced. It is perfect for a 3-4 night budget stay. Also, there is Paharganj market on the main road offering more street food options. Easily accessible from RK ashram metro station. Overall I had a good stay at Smyle Inn.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tutimalbran
Detailed Review: I want to share my experience in this hostel. Since i arrive the personal gave me a nice welcome. Everything was excellent. They are very helpfull. If you need something or any recomendation they will help you. I came here 2 times and my last time they gave me a favor to keep my bags until the taxi arrive (for 8 hours) the offer me water, a shower and i could sleep a little nap for 2 hours.  The rooms are very clean and confortable. The best shower ever! Thank you so much smyle inn. Im very happy with this choice. Trust me guys you gonna love it! And is in a nice location.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: KirupaShankar
Review: Clean, basic rooms at the heart of Delhi
Detailed Review: We had a airport pickup  Very Happy  When we seen our name board at the airport when  coming out with no plans  He took our bags and taken to the car  Talked lot with him even we don't know the exact Hindi language we survived  Driver is very helpful  Good decent hotel to stay with low cost Nice breakfast

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: –í—è—á–µ—Å–ª–∞–≤ –†
Detailed Review: The hotel is located right in the Main Bazaar, near the New Delhi railroad station. Compared to many hotels in the same price category, this one is much better: clean rooms, funny jokes written on doors (help you not to confuse the number of your room), nice and cozy terrace, free tasty breakfasts, gentle and helpful personnel, fast wi-fi. Sometimes the water wasn't warm enough but still, our stay here (2 nights) was very comfortable and nice.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Catharina K
Review: Good place at a good price
Detailed Review: I stayed for 2 nights at Smyle Inn and I think it's real good value for money especially because of the friendly staff and the practical help they offer freely. Delhi can be challenging but they really help to make that experience as smooth as possible. The room was simple but clean, the hot water was not always working but this is almost everywhere in India the case.  I will definitely come back here, recommended for solo female travelers as well. Thank you guys! See you next time

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: fufunia
Review: Good decent hotel to stay with low cost
Detailed Review: Stayed 2 days on our group tour with a total of 20 students. A nice place to stay at Paharganj, New Delhi. Location is very close to the Railway Station. Manager and all other staff were helpful with good service. Rooms were clean and a stylish dormitory with free wi-fi. Rooftop was wow for having breakfast.And this place is not like other maximum  fraud hotels of paharganj. Lastly A Highly recommended Place for both backpackers and family...

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mattie G
Review: Great place to stay in the center of Delhi
Detailed Review: Rooms were clean.  Comfy beds. Basic bathrooms.  Tour agent Ali was amazing help booking our day trip in Delhi and also train to and from Harwidwar.  Just off the main bizaar which was wild and vibrant.  Close to the most amazing vegetarian restaurant - Tanda - recommend the Vegetable Korma to ALL!  Even though says accepts credit card, cash is definitely preferred.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Katarzyna B
Detailed Review: My boyfriend and me decided to stay with SmyleInn twice during our 2-week India trip. Each time it was a very nice experience; rooms are tidy, the location is very convenient, breakfasts are also good (although they do not vary a lot). A very nice surprise for me was that we got our money back for the night that we decided not to take (due to some change of plans). I can highly recommend this hotel, it is definitely a good value-for-money service.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Francisco N
Detailed Review: Everything worked fine, very nice people and good conditions for backpackers!! Very large bed, hot water and nice breakfast. The rooftop is nice and quiet. All the help with transfers and city guide. Thank you Smile Inn

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: peter_jonsas
Detailed Review: Located close to the colorful and busy Main Bazaar street with authentic foods and narrow side lanes. The rooms were tidy and nice with a hot shower. Staff was very helpful and the travel agency upstairs gave some tips for further travels.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vasco M
Detailed Review: The good things first: the place is clean, the staff is really friendly and helpful, always smiling, provided me a heater since it was cold, luggage storage after check out no problem. The shower had hot water, which was really nice.   However, I would have expected more for the price (1200rs per night). The room was okay (clean but very basic and not really any space for luggage), the bathroom was tiny (had to sit on the toilet sideways), breakfast was okay (though not enough to be filling, at other places I paid maybe 50-100rs for a breakfast like this) and the tea is only from tea bags.   Overall, this is an okay place, especially if you are new to India and need help organizing your trip etc.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: trisha109
Detailed Review: I spent a few days at the Colonel's Retreat before travelling on to Varanasi.  This gave me time to re-acclimatize myself before hitting the real stuff.  It was a lovely homely place in a good area, with a park nearby and a garden roof eating place for breakfast and other meals.  The Colonel himself is a charming gentleman of the old school and goes out of his way to greet guests and make them feel at home.  The staff were great.  Nothing was a trouble.  There are sitting rooms on the property where you can flop and read the morning paper and cars and drivers are easily arranged.  I enjoyed my stay and it is close by Parliament and other buildings of note for those who wish to explore.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Wisteria2014
Detailed Review: This hotel was a terrific place to see Delhi, an underrated city. We stayed for five nights and thoroughly appreciated our accommodation being in a quiet part of Delhi, just a quick stop from the metro with easy access to most of the city. The breakfasts on the terrace are super (they made us gluten free bread on request), with gorgeous house made jams, as well as Indian parantha and idli. Just a quick walk away from the Defence Colony Market with a range of restaurants or you can eat in house. Thanks to Arun, Esther and staff for a lovely stay. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: forrestlive
Detailed Review: The room was more than adequate.  I've stayed here a few times on my way in and out of New Delhi.  Near the rail station.  Great restaurants and shopping near by.  Staff very helpful.  The dining area was adequate - did not get "Delhi belly" from their food.  I'd stay there again.   It has been longer since Dec. 2017 since I was there.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: flaminggiraffe
Detailed Review: Found this hotel through Booking.com along with six others we stayed in during our visit. We stayed here twice, either end of our first week and found this hotel very acceptable for Indian standards. Although quite 'tired' in areas and a bit grubby, we enjoyed conversing with staff and liked the location. The restaurant (which is also open to the public) served good food at very cheap prices, two Thalis, ice cream and soft drinks for under ¬£9!. Their Voyage Cafe across the road was a great little place for a coffee and a slice of cake (again very inexpensive) and somewhere to chill (the hotel does not have a lounge) and plan the next day!  We had a good stay and left early on Christmas day 2017 with our driver and headed for Jaipur. Thank you Ajanta.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: thejeshgn
Detailed Review: This is my favourite hotel in the centre of Delhi.  I have stayed here multiple time. Its good for singles, families or friends. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Its walkable to New Delhi Railway Station and the metro station is also very walk-able.  Only downside is it's on a crowded street but it has never been a problem for me. I have started couple of road trips with this hotel as the starting point, no issues parking over night(but on the street).

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: elenasp2017
Review: Very nice staff and enjoyable stay!
Detailed Review: The Hotel is in a very good location, very close to the Train Station. Rooms are really quite despite the noisy street. Staff are really nice, not only people in front desk but also people in the breakfast and those who help you with the luggage, really kind. I'd highly recommend it.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: jw4277
Detailed Review: I stay at the hotel Ajanta for about three nights when ever I am in Delhi;  usually two or three times a year.  It is clean and comfortable and the staff are helpful, good natured and efficient.  There is a restaurant in the hotel and across the road the hotel has a cappuccino coffee shop and almost next door to that is a lovely little temple to Lord Vishnu Bhagwan and Sita Ram.  New Delhi RR station is close by and the hotel can help with your travel arrangements.  My only small complaint is that sometimes it is difficult to get enough really hot water.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Robert G
Detailed Review: For the room rate, this hotel is fine, made all the more enjoyable by the very helpful and pleasant staff.  Facilities and cleanliness; you are going to get what you pay for at this room rate, however.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: nikisames
Detailed Review: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Ajanta in December 2017. Our room was spacious, well maintained, and tidy. Staff were very attentive particularly Zahoor who manages the tours desk. We arrived in India with little idea of what we wanted to do other than explore  Rajasthan. We met with Zahoor on the recommendation of the Hotel Manager. Zahoor listened closely to what we would like to do and within an hour had a 9 day tour booked for us including a driver, hotels, and tickets to the Taj. Our tour was absolutely amazing, more than we could have wished for. Our driver was professional and friendly. The Heritage Hotels Zahoor booked were all lovely. And our trip to the Taj at sunrise an experience we will never forget. Highly recommend speaking to Zahoor and the team at Srinagar‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: karan s
Review: A great comfort Nd Luxury hotel I visited
Detailed Review: It stayed at this property in the month of December last year when I visited this place and was very much satisfied by the luxurious stay I had at this place. The Hotel staff is very friendly, they speak English very fluently and the rooms are very spacious with good amenities and the best part is their Buffet Breakfast which is really amazing. If you want to experience the real Delhi stay at this location. It was an amazing experience. Will come back again this month.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Yvette D
Detailed Review: The Hotel is situated in a part of the city which is crazy busy. Unfortunately our room was not very clean the first few nights that we stayed there, and I ended up quite sick from the dust in the room. However I must meantion that once we complained about the room they did make sure they cleaned the room properly. We were with a group and once we saw their rooms we realized that they had given us the worst room, the other rooms all looked freshly decorated and clean so perhaps it was just bad luck on our side.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anshul P
Detailed Review: Fabulous place to  stay, very near to Delhi Station , staff is very  supportive, food  is super awesome, rooms  are very  clean, can stay with family as well .. Will  keep  visiting this hotel, one of the best hotel in that area

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anit1980
Detailed Review: This is unfortunately the worst hotel I have ever stayed. It was wrong choice at my end only while I choose the Hotel looking at previous tripadvisor reviews. Detailed Pros & Cons as under:  Pros  1. Located within the proximity of the NDLS Station & CP area 2. Wifi Speed is good in the rooms 3. Transport service was time & good  Cons  1. Check In is pathetic as it still follows the old world manual register & it is frequently obstructed while attending walk in queries for check in  2. Rooms are very dull, old & half the lights & plugs doesn't function at all 3. Water flow in the washroom is pathetic & you don't get hot water frequently 4. Service is very slow & it took 15 minutes to get a plug arranged to get the things charged as the connections were not working at all 5.‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Arjunnatthanaryan
Detailed Review: Right in the heart of Delhi, this hotel is really good for value. Stayed with family and for the money we paid, I can‚Äôt fault this place but traffic is really really bad in this area. Not a luxury hotel at all but the staff is really nice. Food at breakfast or their cafe serves really nice yummy food. All in all, my rating is 6/10

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: TonyHonan
Detailed Review: We used the hotel restaurant, but stayed in a hotel across the road. You‚Äôll get a good curry for a reasonable price. The bread is good, and as you would expect the place caters well for vegetarians and even vegans.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Hariharan Ponnusamy
Review: Front office and Housekeeping team Super
Detailed Review: We had 3 days stay over there and we arrived late night and upon arrival we are upgrade to family suite which really great also our package including dinner and late night we are offer dinner by front office team however we refuse.   Room was super clean and housekeeping team was very helpful and support.   Room service was good and food good too.   The only places we are not happy restaurant, Not even single day water has been served and we had few more challenges. And my wife not interested at all to go for Dinner and breakfast.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: brisgard
Detailed Review: We stayed for 2 nights at the very beginning of our holiday. Mr Rashid on the travel desk was very helpful with any requests & questions we had. The hotel is conveniently located for ND railway station, 10 mins walk. There are plenty of shops and restaurants nearby.  The room was clean & comfortable, no complaints.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ramusa2017
Detailed Review: Very nice staff. Clean. Good breakfast. Good location, near to the New Delhi train station that connects directly by subway to the airport (anyway, in New Delhi you almost always need a car or rickshaw to get around so the location of the hotel is not very important either). Noisy street, a little less at night because there is less traffic, so if you do not want any noise, request an interior room. They usually offer free pick up at the airport, or even at a train stop if you negotiate it (you must pay for the parking of the car). They have a travel agency and exchange currency.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mohammad H
Detailed Review: One of the most appealing budget hotel in Paharganj. Hotel ambience is good & suitable for foreigners specially for those who are visiting from European countries.   Worth mentioning that the hotel offers a good breakfast containing Continental & indian choices within the room rent. The inhouse menu also contains variety of indian cuisines at a affordable price. During my stay I have ordered mutton biryani & it was very tasty i must say.  Ajanta's noticeable differences with other hotels in the vicinity are clean bed & toilet & friendly stuff.   Recommend this hotel if anyone interested stayng in Paharganj, but in a better environment at a affordable price.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: @katekellogg
Detailed Review: The family suite was spacious, comfortable and clean. Stayed with my husband and 11 yr. old son and we all slept so well. Even though it is on a busy street the room was quiet. Staff were kind and helpful. Nice restaurant with a variety of offerings and interesting people watching out of the big windows. Great value for the price. Would definitely stay again!

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: serena225
Detailed Review: The position is very good, near the metro so you can easily go everywhere.  Breakfast buffet was very good and plenty. Rooms and the hotel in totality was very clean and the personal at the reception friendly.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jeevanitha M
Detailed Review: For the price paid room was bit congested for two persons...Bathroom was bit stinking...Other facilities was okay...Breakfast was good...Location not so good because we had nothing to do outside the hotel...We were told it was unsafe to walk around...Need lots of improvement

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Judy D
Detailed Review: Just one night here but it was clean, the people were helpful, and made us feel welcome. The area is an impoverished and dirty one so you may not feel confident about places to eat, but they can guide you. It was advertised on Airbnb but it wasn't really an Airbnb, just an ordinary guesthouse. But fine - cheap and a reasonable place to land while you plan your next move.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ISHTIYAQ A
Review: We got more than what we paid
Detailed Review: Staffs are very helpful and advised us to get air and bus tickets as per the cheapest price. They have allowed us to stay after check-out time when had to wait for the train. After the Shimla-Manali trip we came back to hotel to wait again for the train to catch.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bhobesh D
Detailed Review: Hotel is good in service, in room and toilet  facilities. We like  the hotel very much. We will try to stay in Amax inn when we will visit to Delhi in the future. If any member of our relation/ family visited Delhi,  we will contact with 'Amax inn' hotel.        Thank you.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Curly Tawharu
Detailed Review: Stayed for a night. Reception was very friendly and helpful. Gave a map with local tourist activities and offered to sort a taxi. Informed us on local services, train etc and offered to sort this for us too. Highly recommend for the price. Rooftop restraunt and bar was also Great!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: suziegoodier
Detailed Review: My friend and I had booked in for 2nights, on arrival we were shown our room which was not ‚Äòluxury‚Äô as the title suggested nor was there a window, double bed instead of twin and the presence of an ash tray suggested that it was not a non-smoking room. This we could dismiss but the bed, which had only the top sheet on was stained, ripped in places and slightly damp. On closer inspection there was a jumping flea/bed bug or 2. We asked to be moved rooms, and the sheets were both stained, ripped and damp in the next room as well along with the door not bolting and generally not very clean. The staff member who we spoke to was not very helpful nor apologetic. We decided we were not staying here and asked for a refund, we were told we would have to contact the company whom we booked‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Tamanna N
Detailed Review: This hotel is conveniently situated at the busy paharganj, Delhi & offers very good ambient & execllant rooms at affordable price. The room that i stayed is well maintained with a clean toilet having hot water facility.   overall, excellent stay at a very affirdable price compare to other hotels in the locality & would strongly recommend everyone.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mohammad H
Detailed Review: I stayed this hotel for 3 days & received great hospitality from the hotel staff. The reception manager Mr. Milon was very helpful & privided all local sight seeing & travelling information with precision keeping in mind particular needs.   Overall, great stay at a very affordable price.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: drethai
Detailed Review: Located in busy Arakashan Road , Paharganj , New Delhi . I had a beautiful room ( AC and fan ) with a private bathroom ( hot and cold water ) . Breakfast was not included but there is a restaurant at the rooftop . Very friendly and helpful staff . They helped me to buy a simcard , showed me good restaurants and even helped me to find a good local barbershop . I booked a day trip to Agra ( Taj Mahal ) here and it was a experience I will never forget ! Here you can relax after a day in busy Delhi !

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Halim A
Detailed Review: At the end of our trip I was stayed there with my family.Really we enjoy our stay during Amax Inn.From the beginning the receptionist and upto the end of our stay the service of the stuff was excellent.Dont comparison the local area with Amax Hotel.I got better services as I thought.The room which I was staying was clean and the birthroom also very clean.They have open rooftop for sitting with family and you can have breakfast,launch, dinner.At the end they give us a airport drop that was 500 only.We enjoy our stay with my family.thanks.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Suneel D
Detailed Review: Amax inn is having an amazing hospitality. I am travelling from many years and this is my stay home in Delhi. Its always ready with smile.  Tge rioms are super clean and upto standards.  The food on the rooftop is favourite for me with lots if variety to choose.  You will not have choice after sraying here because everyone is welcoming. So guys ready coming back again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Partha P
Review: Nothing to say it was excellent
Detailed Review: I am very happy to say that this hotel environment was so good. Room service, food, stuff are very helpful to provide their service. It‚Äôs decoration was so beautiful. The room was good. One word to say it‚Äôs cool.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Judy D
Detailed Review: Just one night here but it was clean, the people were helpful, and made us feel welcome. The area is an impoverished and dirty one so you may not feel confident about places to eat, but they can guide you. It was advertised on Airbnb but it wasn't really an Airbnb, just an ordinary guesthouse. But fine - cheap and a reasonable place to land while you plan your next move.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Partha P
Review: Nothing to say it was excellent
Detailed Review: I am very happy to say that this hotel environment was so good. Room service, food, stuff are very helpful to provide their service. It‚Äôs decoration was so beautiful. The room was good. One word to say it‚Äôs cool.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: shajay2018
Detailed Review: Had a really nice time here- the bed/room was nice and comfortable, there's a wonderful  place to chill out on the rooftop. The breakfast was absolutely delicious- different every day, and the chai was perfect.  The hostel is a five minute tuk-tuk ride from the nearest metro station.The people running the place are super friendly and helpful- one of the best hostels I've stayed in. Thanks guys =)

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: 246adriend
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hostel for a couple of nights, the rooftop is really nice as well as the dinner home made style. Staff is very helpful, including the travel desk one.  Only negative is the location upon arrival. Without uber or a taxi ordered directly at the hostel, it is very difficult for a taxi to find the place, mine took a good additional 30mn to find it. Anyway, it is overall a nice and friendly stay for a few nights in Delhi.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nicholas B
Review: A quiet oasis from the craziness of Delhi
Detailed Review: We stayed in a private room and it was really clean and spacious. We had some problems with the hot water and the staff bent over backwards to fix it. The common area and rooftop were perfect to escape the craziness of Delhi. We thought being so out of Delhi would be a hindrance but it was anything but. I would highly recommend the hostels walking tour of the old town of Delhi (great opportunity to taste foods, see sights and see the sunset with a great view of the city). I would also recommend having at least one evening having the Indian meal at the hostel. Well worth the price and really tasty. They also helped with organising onward travel. Really good hostel! Definitely recommend!

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: yeahcarebear
Detailed Review: I'll start with the only negative thing so we can end on a good note :)  The only thing I have as a negative, is that I got to my private room, and it had no window. I notice that hotels and hostels seem to leave this information out when booking. Please include this in the information, its just a bit misleading, I would have been happy to pay for another room at the hostel, or even stayed in a dorm, but I need the information on windows to be more clear please.  Okay, now the good stuff! I only needed to stay at Jugaad hostel for a night in Delhi, and it certainly served that purpose. The hostel is nicely decorated and presented, and the private room I stayed in was very large. I particularly liked the layout of the separate shower and toilet en-suite structure. I pay‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shah Naveed
Detailed Review: It Feels Like Home.Provided Free Breakfast every day during my stay.Hotel Staff Is Very polite and the owner Harish is really a man of commitment.He provided me every facility I wanted hot and cold water is also available.Budget Hotel.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ahmad Saeed
Detailed Review: We stayed for two nights and it was great, the staff was very helpful , the room was very clean with comfortable bed and mattress. nice place to start the journey, I can recommend this place to others travelers

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rohit L
Review: Clean and budget rooms in city centre
Detailed Review: stayed here with with friends for 3 days, very nice and clean rooms. They have complementary breakfast. The staff is very friendly. Good location, very close to New Delhi railway station. R.K.Ashram metro station is at 5 mins walking distance.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Una G
Review: best way to start your trip!
Detailed Review: we stay  for two nights and it was great. place is very clean and friendly. They deliver everything they promised and price was fair. There is very friendly guys  Rinku  and Monu they give great  service and helpfull at any time. We especially recommend the travel agent Ali located in this hostel he is very knowledgeable,  trustworthy  and pleasant , and his English is great so there is no misunderstandings Great place to start the journey!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: wearehereexpedition
Detailed Review: This hostel is best place in Delhi. Near to Main Bazaar where you can buy what you wantüòÄ.  Team is very nice and helpful. Rooms are very clean and cosy. Hostel have amazing roof where you can spend the time watching view on Delhi. For sure this is our home away from home. We can recommend this place for stay in Delhi üòÄwe had here wonderful timeüòÅ

Name: Shah Naveed

Detailed Review: It Feels Like Home.Provided Free Breakfast every day during my stay.Hotel Staff Is Very polite and the owner Harish is really a man of commitment.He provided me every facility I wanted hot and cold water is also available.Budget Hotel.
