Highly recommend this place for a comfortable stay! Thank you

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Karan J
Detailed Review: Colonel's Retreat is somewhat like a hidden pearl in the infinitesimally vast ocean of big and small hotels in Delhi. It's located in a peaceful and leafy neighborhood, which is also surprisingly at the center of the city. This makes it an ideal place to rest and relax, after a long day of exploring all the fascinating colors of Delhi. The rooms are well kept with a homely vibe, along with excellent service and delicious onsite catering. However, the most refreshing aspect about this establishment are it's wonderful hosts. The dashing colonel and his beautiful wife are very warm people and they both make it a point to personally greet you at your breakfast table. I had the pleasure of staying with them last year and I'm looking forward to catching up again whenever I get a‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: MumTraveller
Review: Welcoming, great intro to Indian hospitality
Detailed Review: Stayed here as first part of our guided tour. Great choice - we prefer small hotels/homestay rather than the big chain hotels to get a more personal experience. Here you get to see the owners, and talk to them. Rooms are nice, en suite and quite large, quiet as it is off the main road and near a small river. Roof top terrace really nice relaxing place for a beer. Breakfast great, I tried the Indian version which was tasty and pleasant, my husband stuck to the European version and had a fresh omelette. Evening meal was very good and a nice change to going out for one night, although it is not really a restaurant, so there is not a lot of choice, but freshly cooked and very tasty. There's a metro stop nearby, so very convenient. Would highly recommend and would stay here again.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Brenton E
Detailed Review: A must stay in Delhi if you want that boutique feel with excellent service, rooms with ensuites and wonderful meals provided by friendly staff. Hidden away in a quiet lane within the Defence Circle, this small intimate hotel is the perfect stay.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: ABHISHEK J
Detailed Review: Stayed for four nights, it was a wonderful stay everything from the day of check in to check out was very comfortable, staff gives personal attention to the guests and tend to every request of urs with a smile and courtesy. Breakfast is very delicious especially home made  banana cakes. Will love to stay again . Thanks team Colonel's retreat

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rajesh k
Detailed Review: We stayed in colonel's retreat for  2 days. The room, service, food, management support, location everything was good. Lajpat nagar metro is near and tuc tuc is easily available. I highly recommend this property and look forward to stay again in the next year.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: –õ–∞—Ä–∞ –¢
Review: Great place for a short stay
Detailed Review: It‚Äôs a second time we stayed at Ajanta. We really love the helpful reseprionist, who care about our comfortable stay 24 hours. Lux room with big terrace was great, room service fast enough, location is good for a short stay in Delhi. We got a small problem in our room, but staff made everything to turn it for positive way, even provide a complimentary taxi transfer to idomrstic airport. Only the Internet must be better, with no new password every single hour. We will stay here again.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: DINU50
Detailed Review: Ajanta Hotel was exceptional - we weren't sure what to expect on booking, so were extremely happy to be very impressed with our clean and spacious suit room, the hospitable and accomodating staff and especially the receptionist who helped us out multiple times. Ajanta is a great choice with its central location (a seven minute walk from ndls fly  stn) and surrounding shops, as well as the well-priced restaurant downstairs. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: sambhu1
Review: ‚ÄúA Great Hotel in the Heart of Delhi‚Äù
Detailed Review: This hotel is tops I recently stayed here with my wife and son.We found all the staff to be so friendly and helpful, especially the lovely young lady on reception is very informative. The rooms are clean & comfortable . The food is good . I want to compliment the present Chef for doing a great job !

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: neillancaster111
Review: A Gem in the Heart of Delhi
Detailed Review: A wonderful hotel, fabulous staff, a great restaurant.  An absolute gem. Great, clean, well-groomed rooms. Close to all the pulsating vibrancy New Delhi offers. Gunjan, is the wonderful lady receptionist to make your visit complete Fantastic value, and a ‚Äòmust‚Äô hotel to visit stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: loisharrison58
Detailed Review: We arrived in Delhi and had nothing planned except a hotel for 2 days. We met mr. Zahoor baktoo the next morning expecting nothing. In an hour we left with a detailed itinerary, hotel vouchers, airline ticket, sightseeing with tour guides at each destination and an airconditioned van and driver. We went back to our room thinking OMG (oh my goodness) are we crazy. however, we were pleasantly  surprised at each destination to find ourselves checking the itinerary  as everything that was written was accomplished and more. If it was not Zahoor it was Mr. Rashid but they called, and texted every day to check on how things were going and asking if we needed anything. It was wonderful no unpleasant surprises or problems our driver for the duration of the trip was excellent  (Mahaveer‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: paulboop
Detailed Review: Our group of 15 adults stayed three nights in this pleasant , modern hotel. Paharganj is a noisy area but the hotel Ajanta was surprisingly very quiet. The front office staff was very friendly and the Indian breakfasts were varied and tasty . In a very friendly  manner the cook listened to our special request and made our omelets and dosa as requested without ghee or garlic.  We‚Äôll gladly return here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nikki A
Detailed Review: So we stayed at the hotel ajanta, the staff are very accommodating. The rooms you get what you pay for it's nice and comfortable. Local to amenities, we weren't sure where to go next and was having trouble booking train tickets.  The tours desk in the hotel are very helpful and planned a trip covering everything we wanted and more.  We are now in our third destination of the tour and can't really complain. The driver we have is very helpful and asking along the route of we would like to stop at certain places and if we decline he is being really gracious  about it.  No complaints so far, i would recommend if you come to India give this hotel a fair trial. Zahoor couldn't have been more helpful and even when at first we couldn't decide if we wanted everything doing for us as we‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: ankit c
Detailed Review: the hotel location is just perfect for tour or holiday. It's situated very close to centre of Delhi canaught place,  near Metro Station,  rail station etc.  Rooms a well air-conditioned and gives a warm feel. Restaurant is 24 hours plus hotel has a coffee shop. It was pleasure staying here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: azzabarrett
Review: Nice hotel, in a good location.
Detailed Review: As far as hotels go it was nice, rooms were clean, a decent size and the beds were comfortable.  Staff were friendly and the restaurant breakfast was pleasant too.  We didn't have hot water during our stay, which wasn't a massive problem, but it was advertised with hot water.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: saurabh gupts
Detailed Review: Rooms are good but the approach to this hotel is not so great. Staff was very courteous. I did not like food (sabji and roti) ... had mosquito problem a bit..overall okay stay .. can do woth with this hotel..

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vivek K
Detailed Review: Hotel Ajanta is quite comfortable, easy to book, cooperative staffs with tasty brunch and worth for money.....One should try it if not want to spend much. Rooms are very neat and clean. It has all category rooms.Equipped with free pickup and WiFi.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: roberto_junho
Detailed Review: I stay for 8 nights with two different groups of friends at Hotel Ajanta. The staff is really helpful and friendly. The kitchen offers indian and western menu and it's open 'till late. Location is also fine, just walking distance to Main Bazar and for 50 rupies is possible to reach Connaught Place or the metro station by tuk-tuk.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: barry202
Detailed Review: Chose the wrong Ajanta (there are two!) Front desk friendly but restaurant staff did not make us feel welcome. Disappointed there was no bar, but even more disappointed that as it was a 'Muslim' hotel, we could not have a glass of wine with our meal. What about the rest of us? Stopped 1 night, then away, then a 2nd night. First night room poor. 2nd night good. Would not have stayed the 2nd night if not pre-booked.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Saradevos
Review: A haven in a busy city
Detailed Review: The reception was friendly. They collected us from the airport. We were offered a 4 day trip to the Golden Triangle.  We were a bit unhappy with our first room, but got upgraded the next day.  Just make sure you don't get a Mr Singh as your driver for the tour.  The on-site restaurant had lovely food! There is also a coffee shop across the road with good coffee.  The road in front of the hotel is very busy.  But once inside it is calm. All the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Very good value for money.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jeeva R
Detailed Review: Excellent service friendly staff good and clean room.also we can get airport service and all india tour with good price.mainly reception lady was very polite and good english.and aera is little bad  But hotel is very very good

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: applepie42
Review: Good hotel except avoid man selling tickets and tours
Detailed Review: We had a good stay at Ajanta, an easy arrival and check in followed by an upgrade. We were in a good room on the road but not too noisy which was great.   Only thing to be careful about is a man selling tours and tickets, he will try and rip you off. Having been my 5th trip to India and knowing what price should be paid for train tickets he tried everything to add agent fees and then saying all the sleeper class were booked up so the only class we could go in was the highest. Despite us looking at the screen and seeing that seats in lower classes were available. I would recommend going to an Indian government tourist office in Connaught place.   Would definitely recommend hotel though!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: miriamsson
Detailed Review: The Amax Inn is really at the heart of Delhi, and a great starting point to explore the city. The surroundings a bit loud, but the rooms themselves are calm and clean. The staff was very friendly, helpful, and funny. The rooftop is a great place to hang out and chat with other travellers, and the food is really good if you don't feel like going out to the bustling city after a long day. The drop off to the airport was reliable and reasonably priced. I spent three nights there and would definitively pick it again. Thumbs up!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: mattysaints
Review: Good value hotel close to New Delhi Railway Station
Detailed Review: This was our first hotel in India upon arriving in Delhi as recommended in the Lonely Planet guidebook. After catching the metro from the airport to New Delhi Station, we elected to walk as it seemed a short distance away - probably not such a great idea when you are new to India and in the humidity of midday! The walk was approximately 15/20 minutes from the Metro and after some help from local residents we were able to locate the hotel as it was tucked away just off Arakashan Road.  Check in was easy and staff were very pleasant throughout our stay, advising how much it would cost for a tuk-tuk to local sights. The room itself was average, the A/C was quite nosy and the cleanliness of the sheets was potentially questionable - not a massive issue as we used our sleeping bag‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Amitsinha12
Review: Peaceful Hotel with excellent rooms close to New Delhi Railway Station
Detailed Review: When we think about staying in a hotel, we always think Neat, Clean & Nice rooms with good interior along with polite staff. Well, Hotel Amax Inn got all.   I stayed here on 14th Sep to 17th Sep.   Upon arrival, behavior of reception Manager was excellent, They already knew about my booking and formality was fast, Gul Muhammed, a very kind and polite staff of hotel was instrumental in showing me room. My room was 301, He was also helpful in giving me lot of information related to Old Delhi.  Food at hotel was excellent but they do need to balance spices in Biryani. It was too spicy. :)  Restaurant above rooftop is also beautiful, gives opportunity to meet lot of people from across the world.  Not to forget, all these facilities in very cheap and economical rate.  Overall, Amax‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Aditya p
Review: Perfect hotel close to New Delhi Railway Station.
Detailed Review: I was here for couple of day, Exploring Delhi and Agra. Hotel is walkable distance from railway station if you don't have huge language, Quick 7-8min for for me. I was traveling solo so booked Deluxe room. Rooms are clean, comfortable. Clean Toilet, perfect working AC, hot water & good WiFi networks !  Hotel staff is friendly, everyone is always ready to help. Hotel do offer baggage holding if you are traveling somewhere for few days, I found it reliable and trustworthy. Food is good,many options available. If you looking for nice rooms then do try this one!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Fred L
Detailed Review: This hotel was very good. It was a plaesure for me to sleep there. It is near the New Delhi station. Just perfect if you want to take a train earlier in the morning.  Peaple from there are very nice and very lovely. I recommande this hotel and for sur for my next Journey in India i will take again a night here

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Zahoor K
Detailed Review: I flew from Japan and booked Amax inn. The pickup was perfect and guy was ready at the Airport waiting for us with smile. We reached hotel and greeted well at the Reception . They had given us superb room on 4th floor just next to rooftop.  The Room was surprisingly clean with nice upgrade bathroom. We had given good services  clean towels and toilet paper soap which was hard to find in budget hotels. The food served on Rooftop was great value.Asa traveler I definitely Recommend this place and sure for next visit.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mahabuber R
Detailed Review: Its good hotel. Very nice place. People are very friendly.  We found the rooms are clean and comfortable.  The baths are amazing  in this category  of Hotels.  I wad surprised  with food  quality.  The staff is always welcoming.  We are coming back soon.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Vikt√≥ria M
Detailed Review: People in the hotel were always very caring and helpful, they've even helped us to plan our trip in India and provided a driver. Hotel is nice and clean, there's small restaurant on the roof, food is safe and delicious.  We enjoyed our stay. I recommend this hotel for 100%.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rahul2604
Detailed Review: Stayed here for a night,booked through a travel portal and get good deal. Located at Arakashan road,10 min walk or short rikhsaw ride from New Delhi railway station and 15 min from RK Ashram metro.Many budget place to eat around the hotel including Chawla and Kashmir sweet which are famous for Chur Chur Naam. Check in was swift,it took hardly 5 minute to complete formalities,I was shown 2 rooms.Room were small in size but ok for single ( and even 2 for one or 2 night).Clean room with a comfortable bed,good working AC and a LED Tv.A chair but no table.Bathroom was basic but clean,no toiletries were provided other than a soap. I normaly avoid dinning at hotel but as I arrived late and was not in mood to go out ordered dinner from room,just a chicken biryani and fresh lime‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: PINTU D
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel staff behave very good. I m fully satisfied.They have a open restaurant  on the top floor. They guide us how to travel Delhi city.The food was nice and tasty.The stuff was always ready to help us in any problem.Big thanks to all of them.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: meike m
Review: Nice clean hotel, great rooftop, staff is super kind
Detailed Review: We stayed in a double air conditioned room and it was super clean and quiet! The roof top Terrasse is a great place to hang out and we met a lot of nice people there! There is a restaurant and it serves very nice Indian food (it was not too spicy). The staff helped us a lot with train booking and everything else, we had very nice chat with the owner anil! We can definitely recommend this place for New Delhi!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: miriamsson
Detailed Review: The Amax Inn is really at the heart of Delhi, and a great starting point to explore the city. The surroundings a bit loud, but the rooms themselves are calm and clean. The staff was very friendly, helpful, and funny. The rooftop is a great place to hang out and chat with other travellers, and the food is really good if you don't feel like going out to the bustling city after a long day. The drop off to the airport was reliable and reasonably priced. I spent three nights there and would definitively pick it again. Thumbs up!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: mattysaints
Review: Good value hotel close to New Delhi Railway Station
Detailed Review: This was our first hotel in India upon arriving in Delhi as recommended in the Lonely Planet guidebook. After catching the metro from the airport to New Delhi Station, we elected to walk as it seemed a short distance away - probably not such a great idea when you are new to India and in the humidity of midday! The walk was approximately 15/20 minutes from the Metro and after some help from local residents we were able to locate the hotel as it was tucked away just off Arakashan Road.  Check in was easy and staff were very pleasant throughout our stay, advising how much it would cost for a tuk-tuk to local sights. The room itself was average, the A/C was quite nosy and the cleanliness of the sheets was potentially questionable - not a massive issue as we used our sleeping bag‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Amitsinha12
Review: Peaceful Hotel with excellent rooms close to New Delhi Railway Station
Detailed Review: When we think about staying in a hotel, we always think Neat, Clean & Nice rooms with good interior along with polite staff. Well, Hotel Amax Inn got all.   I stayed here on 14th Sep to 17th Sep.   Upon arrival, behavior of reception Manager was excellent, They already knew about my booking and formality was fast, Gul Muhammed, a very kind and polite staff of hotel was instrumental in showing me room. My room was 301, He was also helpful in giving me lot of information related to Old Delhi.  Food at hotel was excellent but they do need to balance spices in Biryani. It was too spicy. :)  Restaurant above rooftop is also beautiful, gives opportunity to meet lot of people from across the world.  Not to forget, all these facilities in very cheap and economical rate.  Overall, Amax‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Aditya p
Review: Perfect hotel close to New Delhi Railway Station.
Detailed Review: I was here for couple of day, Exploring Delhi and Agra. Hotel is walkable distance from railway station if you don't have huge language, Quick 7-8min for for me. I was traveling solo so booked Deluxe room. Rooms are clean, comfortable. Clean Toilet, perfect working AC, hot water & good WiFi networks !  Hotel staff is friendly, everyone is always ready to help. Hotel do offer baggage holding if you are traveling somewhere for few days, I found it reliable and trustworthy. Food is good,many options available. If you looking for nice rooms then do try this one!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Fred L
Detailed Review: This hotel was very good. It was a plaesure for me to sleep there. It is near the New Delhi station. Just perfect if you want to take a train earlier in the morning.  Peaple from there are very nice and very lovely. I recommande this hotel and for sur for my next Journey in India i will take again a night here

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: meike m
Review: Nice clean hotel, great rooftop, staff is super kind
Detailed Review: We stayed in a double air conditioned room and it was super clean and quiet! The roof top Terrasse is a great place to hang out and we met a lot of nice people there! There is a restaurant and it serves very nice Indian food (it was not too spicy). The staff helped us a lot with train booking and everything else, we had very nice chat with the owner anil! We can definitely recommend this place for New Delhi!

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: tetheredgeii
Detailed Review: My stay in Jugaad hostel was absolutely wonderful. The staff were helpful. The guest were cool and eclectic. The food was great. The community was fun. They offered a lot of help with navigating Delhi, and offered many trips throughout India. I would highly recommend anyone to stay.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: AyushGulati
Detailed Review: I've stayed at numerous hostels around the world but i have to say that the vibe and the atmosphere at Jugaad is truly exceptional. The staff- Om, Mithun, Udhav, Tapan, Raju, Shubham and the others are all super awesome and go out of their way to help you out.  They have several activities like walking tours (Look for Amit, super friendly guy and knowledgable) and pub crawls throughout the week to make sure the experience in Delhi is truly a memorable one.   The rooftop is just beautiful where one can hang out, read a book, have beers, do yoga, play ping pong and watch the sunset. It's an extremely social hostel where one can meet some amazing people from all around the world. I've made some great friends during my stay here. Keep on with the great work guys. Looking forward to‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Corinne C
Review: I want to live here. Not kidding.
Detailed Review: I loved the people, the room, and the privacy. A lot of India hotels and rooms bother you constantly to make sure you're alright; that ruins your experience and your sleep. Vasu and his team were a perfectly helpful and laid back host. I'm coming back asap!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Eleanor B
Review: Basic budget hostel, adequate but some improvements could be made
Detailed Review: Our first time in India travelling as a couple. We requested the airport transfer prior to arrival and I have to say that the staff were very easy to contact and have this arranged safely. When we arrived our driver greeted us at the airport, the car was not ideal. No seat belts for rear passengers and the drive if you have not been to India before was quite scary. The hotel is around a 30 minute drive away from the airport. The hotel is located off a small side street off the main bazaar round. For us being particularly cautious this was quite daunting as the road was chaotic and the hostel was difficult to see. Once inside staff were very helpful and accommodating. The superior room I had booked was unavailable and we were given a standard room however promised we could move‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Ester C
Review: Cool location - service could be better
Detailed Review: The location of this hotel is really convenient by the bazaar and walking distance to Delhi Railway station. We stayed there for a couple of nights and got a room with a huge bed!!! There is some waiting time to get the breakfast serve (so plan ahead). The last day we had to leave very early and we asked for take away breakfast, at least a coffee and the fruit that they were providing, and even if we asked twice and were told that we would have the coffee ready in the morning, it wasn't, and we didn't get any fruit to take with us. They seemed lazy and not very motivated to work. We left one of our own blanket and a pillow in the bedroom and one of the caretakers followed us outside the hotel to give it back as he thought we had forgotten it. This was nice of him.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Laura C
Review: Budget Hotel - you get what you pay for
Detailed Review: We stayed at Smyle for 3 nights as our first hotel in Delhi. The first room we had was extremely small and hot and I barely slept during our first night, the room only had room for the bed and a small bathroom. We were lucky enough to get an upgrade to a luxury room for the same price which was lovely with more air conditioning and space. The staff were always lovely and helpful and made our stay in Delhi easier. Would recommend staying here but go for a slightly more expensive room - it makes your stay much nicer. 3 stars is for the first room we stayed in, second room would be 5 stars.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: evie s
Detailed Review: This was our first stop in India, and thank god we booked here! Harish helped us book our ongoing trains for the next 21 days for a super reasonable price, I would highly recommend doing it through them rather than being scammed by another travel agent (this nearly happened to us). Really clean and good filling breakfast.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Eleanor B
Detailed Review: Our first time in India travelling as a couple. We requested the airport transfer prior to arrival and I have to say that the staff were very easy to contact and have this arranged safely. Really clean and good filling breakfast.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Brahmavid
Detailed Review: Excellent location, good food (although it became monotonous after a few days), helpful staff, quiet, good rooms with marble floors. Only downside is that staying in a guest house affords less anonymity than does a hotel (but I suppose for some that is the point.) At the time I booked, it was also an excellent value.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: robert092
Review: More of a B and B ......but an excellent one .....completely recommended
Detailed Review: It pitches itself as a "boutique hotel" .....describing itself as " the best B and B in town" would be a better description.  First location....the Defence Colony is a middle /upper class part of Delhi away from the chaotic noise of Delhi itself .....an ideal place to be. About ten minutes walk away is the Defence Colony Market .....which is not a market but rather a reasonably sized collection of shops and places to eat....and where you will most likely eat after a days sightseeing.  The Colonels Retreat takes up one floor of a 3 storey residential building .... Just 5 rooms ....with an excellent team of workers who keep the place spotlessly clean and ensure you are very well looked after. They will,  find you a driver or buy tickets ....and even pop out to buy some beers for‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: Fiona M
Review: Comfortable friendly safe haven in Delhi
Detailed Review: We loved our stay here as a family of 4. Comfortable rooms with good bathrooms. Huge communal rooms, some of which are air conditioned to combat the current high humidity. Calm quiet residential area .. very close to metro which we found easy to use  We met the lovely hosts on our second morning. Their courteous smiley staff looked after us very well the rest of the time. Delicious breakfasts and dinners  They also allowed us to store some luggage while we toured Rajasthan   Fully recommend you stay here if you are travelling with children

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: To√±o M
Detailed Review: I loved the cozy room when we first got there, it is a nice neighborhood, great weather we had around, quiet from a big city such as New Delhi, the owner recommend us couple taxi drivers to take us to all Delhi and Agra, we had a good time! we definitely enjoyed the breakfast, very homemade, the hotel is so peaceful, i really recomend this place if you are looking to stay away from crazy avenues and being in a very nice neighborhood and enjoy a great Indian breakfast before your day start! Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jam4ika
Review: Great place nearby the railway station
Detailed Review: Ajanta is a famous hotel in that locality. We got a got a good deal for this nice hotel, so decided to stay there without hesitation. The Property is in good condition. Clean. Breakfast is buffet but you can also come & eat there for a reasonable price even if you are from outside (actually that is how we discovered this property). A/c was working, the bathroom was neat & clean. Rooms & corridors are . Mostly occupied nicely decorated. The hotel is full of foreigners in winter time. The best thing about this hotel is that it is really in walking distance from the railway station. The locality outside is of course horrible but there are few more decent options to stay if you really arrive late by train or you have to catch an early train.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: chrisray_4
Detailed Review: We enjoyed our stay at Ajanta in August 2016. The staff were very helpful and pleasant. They organised a really great tour and a driver to take us around Rajistan . Room was clean, shower was excellent. Very authentic area, close to Chadni Chouk ( try the stuffed Parata breads) and the  Ghandi museum which I highly recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Parthajeet M
Detailed Review: My first stay at Hotel Ajanta was thoroughly enjoyable. The room was clean and adequately spacious, had some fine amenities. The breakfast was nutritious and delicious. This hotel gives absolute value for money and stands out from the rest of the similar hotels in the locality purely for its service quality. It is located very near to New Delhi Railway Station and also a bit close to Connaught Place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Helena Torres
Detailed Review: Best hotel in the area. I booked at Hotel Ajanta because it meet what I been looking for... A beatiful British architecture with great location in the middle of the acction... At the Great Old Delhi. Good A/C and Wi-Fi, confortable rooms and delicious food!!! I would like to appreciated to Zahoor for help me to re-organized my itinerary.  To Rashid and all the staff at Hotel Ajanta, specially the guy at the Tour desk, he was very polite & courteous all the time. And to Partap my driver for 6 days... He was very friendly and educated, vehicle very clean. Always on time. Thank you for everything!!! I definitely recommend it..

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: starletondiscs
Detailed Review: We stayed for 3 nights in amax inn and we were taken care of from start to finish. The staff organised a day trip to visit Delhi at a very reasonable price and we had a very knowledgable driver for the entire day. The food is amazing here and very cheap. Aircon in the room was nice and cold. The hotel is very clean and kept very well. 100% recommend Hotel Amax inn.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Meghraj
Detailed Review: Hospitality is what counts, when it comes to the Travel Industry. I consider myself fortunate to have located this gem of a place. Very reasonably priced for the excellent service. Although my flight was delayed a bit, the driver Mr. Vikas waited patiently and had a smooth ride to the Hotel.   I am also very impressed by the service provided by Mr. Anil with his prompt replies and above & beyond customer service.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: asif2145
Detailed Review: I had stayed  in this  property  for my business many times , the rooms are super clean.  The front  desk staff  is always  ready to  help and welcoming. Many of my friend are staying  here,  all of them are  very happy  to stay at Amax inn.  They have a rooftop  resturent with delicious  food.  There you can have your food and share your thoughts  with  other  guest. Recently  they had made indoor place for dining,  there you can have your food in the day time without  any sun heat in air-conditioning  Thanks Amax team.  We will  come back soon. Keep it up

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: dpjasir
Detailed Review: When we are coming in Delhi always we choose Hotel Amax Inn because of Good Service & Good Rooms.Hotel and Rooms are clean & staffs are helpful. And also easy to reach here from New delhi airport, Metro and Railway Station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rajesh C
Detailed Review: The entire ambience is very good. A positivity creeps on when you enter and interact with the staff.  Cleanliness, all day availability of hot water, good service, good effective wi-fi,  neatly done rooms and cleat toilets are some features felt prominantly.  I will give my consent and advice every one to try it out at least once. Wish all the best to the managing team.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raza B
Detailed Review: We had stayed Amax inn first time on our friends recommendation. We find this place good for friends or families as my friends told me about this place. Rooms were clean with all the modern look and easy to access the things.The staff was welcoming always and ready to help for all the things. Roof top is amazing place to share with other guests.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: skagrawal4k
Review: Its just ok. Good option for a pit stop.
Detailed Review: Stayed for a day with my family. I booked it as it was the cheapest option among the hotels listed on tripadvisor near New Delhi railway station. All we needed was a night sleepover as we were leaving for Agra next morning. You'll probably find many such cheap hotels in the area but it always helps if you are listed on tripadvisor. We were 3 adults and opted for standard room with extra bedding. The room was small even for 2 people. Extra bedding made it even more cramped. Can't say for other rooms. May be they have other larger room options available. In fact, the whole locality was cramped and overpopulated and the hotel was a bit difficult to locate. The hotel is decent, clean. The food was okay. The AC was loud although cooling was perfect. The service needs improvement. We‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bob B
Review: Two days of noise and grime
Detailed Review: The good points: 1) airport pickup service was good 2) the staff are fairly friendly  The bad: 1) the air con was a single unit (no external fan), it's like trying to sleep with an old motorbike engine running above your head 2) the 'restaurant' is terrible 3) don't trust the hotel to arrange any trips or tours, they will overcharge and you'll end up being sent shopping earning them commission if you buy anything 4) the location is a bit hellish (the whole area of town). A true delhi tourist trap slum.   If you must stay in Delhi and can afford it at all, please go somewhere nicer.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Noufal V
Detailed Review: Good service exlent hotel we come to Delhi for our business trip we always stay Amax In it's feel like home and rooms are extra space and clean food also good and near to New Delhi rail way station and one thing staff all very good and friendly... Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: EJ1993
Review: Despite the lonely planet recommendation I expected more
Detailed Review: Arrived in Delhi off the train from the airport, having flew from Mumbai! WORLDS APART! Delhi is maddddd!   Walked to the hotel but kept getting lost - would deffo recommend getting a tuk tuk. The area the Amax is in, is pretty dodgey not gonna lie! If you were going to get pick-pocketed it would deffo been around here.  Man at the desk, don't know if he was the owner or not wasn't the most helpful and quite passive in response to our questions. Also didn't let us know that card payments were not permitted until we left and were in a rush to catch a train!   Rooms v clean though and bathroom good with western toilet and good quality shower. AC included.   Good room service we ordered a Thali really enjoyed it!   Beautiful outdoor seating area and amazing views from the roof top!‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Joss0202
Detailed Review: Lovely staff, decent rooms, aircon, room service and affordable rooms.  There is an in house tour manager who were very helpful helping us booking the rest of our holiday.  Management are very accommodating and very friendly. Great for solo travellers also as lots of other backpackers heading in and out to meet.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ompriy m
Detailed Review: We had stayed  while visiting Delhi. Its great place. WE enjoyed our stay. The Rooms are  clean   and  hygienic. The  bathroom are super clean. The roof top is Amazing place for sharing your stories with other guests and food is delicious.  Definitely Recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: starletondiscs
Detailed Review: We stayed for 3 nights in amax inn and we were taken care of from start to finish. The staff organised a day trip to visit Delhi at a very reasonable price and we had a very knowledgable driver for the entire day. The food is amazing here and very cheap. Aircon in the room was nice and cold. The hotel is very clean and kept very well. 100% recommend Hotel Amax inn.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Meghraj
Detailed Review: Hospitality is what counts, when it comes to the Travel Industry. I consider myself fortunate to have located this gem of a place. Very reasonably priced for the excellent service. Although my flight was delayed a bit, the driver Mr. Vikas waited patiently and had a smooth ride to the Hotel.   I am also very impressed by the service provided by Mr. Anil with his prompt replies and above & beyond customer service.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: asif2145
Detailed Review: I had stayed  in this  property  for my business many times , the rooms are super clean.  The front  desk staff  is always  ready to  help and welcoming. Many of my friend are staying  here,  all of them are  very happy  to stay at Amax inn.  They have a rooftop  resturent with delicious  food.  There you can have your food and share your thoughts  with  other  guest. Recently  they had made indoor place for dining,  there you can have your food in the day time without  any sun heat in air-conditioning  Thanks Amax team.  We will  come back soon. Keep it up

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: dpjasir
Detailed Review: When we are coming in Delhi always we choose Hotel Amax Inn because of Good Service & Good Rooms.Hotel and Rooms are clean & staffs are helpful. And also easy to reach here from New delhi airport, Metro and Railway Station.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rajesh C
Detailed Review: The entire ambience is very good. A positivity creeps on when you enter and interact with the staff.  Cleanliness, all day availability of hot water, good service, good effective wi-fi,  neatly done rooms and cleat toilets are some features felt prominantly.  I will give my consent and advice every one to try it out at least once. Wish all the best to the managing team.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Raza B
Detailed Review: We had stayed Amax inn first time on our friends recommendation. We find this place good for friends or families as my friends told me about this place. Rooms were clean with all the modern look and easy to access the things.The staff was welcoming always and ready to help for all the things. Roof top is amazing place to share with other guests.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: skagrawal4k
Review: Its just ok. Good option for a pit stop.
Detailed Review: Stayed for a day with my family. I booked it as it was the cheapest option among the hotels listed on tripadvisor near New Delhi railway station. All we needed was a night sleepover as we were leaving for Agra next morning. You'll probably find many such cheap hotels in the area but it always helps if you are listed on tripadvisor. We were 3 adults and opted for standard room with extra bedding. The room was small even for 2 people. Extra bedding made it even more cramped. Can't say for other rooms. May be they have other larger room options available. In fact, the whole locality was cramped and overpopulated and the hotel was a bit difficult to locate. The hotel is decent, clean. The food was okay. The AC was loud although cooling was perfect. The service needs improvement. We‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bob B
Review: Two days of noise and grime
Detailed Review: The good points: 1) airport pickup service was good 2) the staff are fairly friendly  The bad: 1) the air con was a single unit (no external fan), it's like trying to sleep with an old motorbike engine running above your head 2) the 'restaurant' is terrible 3) don't trust the hotel to arrange any trips or tours, they will overcharge and you'll end up being sent shopping earning them commission if you buy anything 4) the location is a bit hellish (the whole area of town). Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: ompriy m
Detailed Review: We had stayed  while visiting Delhi. Its great place. WE enjoyed our stay. The Rooms are  clean   and  hygienic. The  bathroom are super clean. The roof top is Amazing place for sharing your stories with other guests and food is delicious.  Definitely Recommended.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Joan K
Detailed Review: Would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Delhi - whether for a few days of for a long-term stay. I stayed at Jugaad for almost 4 months, while studying at DU, and the place was like my home away from home, while I was there. You get so much value for your money, with clean rooms, common kitchen, nice common room and a rooftop area to hang with other travellers, and the best of it all; the most helpful and friendly staff you'll ever find: Mithun, Om, Rohan, Tapan, Raju, Shivam, Vasu, Uday and Amit the intern, who unfortunately is not there anymore. If I'm forgetting anyone here, I'm sorry guys - you all do such a great job! They will help you with booking train or bus tickets - which can be quite a task for a foreigner, since you can't use your creditcard on indian‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: David R
Review: Best hostel for a step back from crazy Delhi
Detailed Review: We were a little worried as we climbed the stairs of Jhandu mansion, past the decaying lift shaft propped up with splintered bamboo. But five minutes through the door, we had cold beers and were sitting on the rooftop communal area, watching the sun set over Delhi while kids flew their kites down below. Located in South Delhi, Jugaad is idea both for proximity to the airport, and for a small step back from the madness of the city. Also, make sure to check out the paneer curry restaurant just round the corner. The staff, however, were what made this a place we kept returning to; they were both friendly and excellent hosts, and one of the main reasons Delhi was a highlight for us, whereas so many people found it claustrophobic and stressful. Great meeting spot for travellers at‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: tc s
Review: The View was very good and the staff were very friendly
Detailed Review: The dorm was clean,the staffs were very friendly and the breakfast made by them are really tasty. Also the accommodation is very economical for travellers. The stay was very fulfilling as they also provide free wi-fi.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lau_cav
Review: a different point of view on delhi
Detailed Review: beautiful hostel, cheap, CLEAN, with an amazing rooftop. if you want see a modern, young, active Delhi - maybe  different from your expectations - you cannot miss it. We were a group of 8 and we stayed in a dorm with 2 bathrooms: absolutly recommended! moreover, the hostel is located in a very beatiful and clean district of delhi, full of restaurants bar and so on.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Nick S
Detailed Review: This place was super fun and social and cool and clean and awesome and friendly ( trying to think of other adjectives). Seriously tho, I stayed 5 nights and I had a blast. They offer some great tours and would high recommend the food walk and the golden temple tour. Loved my time here and couldn't ask for a better experience.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Danielle D
Review: Excellent Stay, Perfect for Solo Travelers As Well
Detailed Review: I spent a short time at Jugaad, but it's easy to see why it's ranked number one. It's location is great considering how big Delhi is, 20 minutes from train station and airport. The rooftop terrace is great to hang out. A lot of space in the dorm rooms and two bathrooms is a huge plus. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. I was a solo traveler and found this to be a perfect place to meet other travelers.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rahul Nanavati
Detailed Review: I had booked 2rooms for 3days in the moth of Aug17. I had done prepaid booking from Cleartrip. Each and every Staff (it may be front desk, pantry staff, room service staff) (except Mr.Anil) was behaving very rude to us at the same time we observed they were very kind and polite with the foreigners. On 2nd day they forced to changed one of the room and found AC was not working in the new room, at the night it was not possible to change the room. In the morning while going to bath came to know Water Geezer was not working, while we go to complain for the same Mr. Aman advised to us now its summer so why did you need hot water, I was really SHOCKED with answer, as he was well aware about the issues of Room No.14 still give us the same room inspite we had a family with children. If‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: c-valenc
Review: They were very kind and helpful with us
Detailed Review: Our plane to Delhi had a 16 hours delay and we were very worried about loosing the reservation. The people at Smyle Inn were really helpful and kind in the whole process. Finally they send us a car to pick us up at the airport at 5am! The room was clean and confortable enough, and breakfast was pretty good. All the staff very kind. No doubt I recomend them.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Omar
Detailed Review: Yes ....Yes ....  it's excellent backpackers hotel ..  great location.  Very friendly staff...     nearly New Delhi railway station.  Main market paharganj.  Lots of  handicrafts shop . Many more..  so I recommend this hotel  all backpackers... if travel Delhi.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: J.Ravi
Review: Breakfast Quality Is Excellent, But Quantity Is Not.
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 2 nights.  This place deserved full 5 stars, but I deducted one star for the less quantity of breakfast served, while the quality was excellent. The breakfast was not at all sufficient for us.  Even if we asked for an extra serving, we got one-eighth or one-fourth of a paratha! Their home-made banana bread and jams were mouth-watering.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Passport676563
Review: "Awesome Hotel & Tour" & - True Value for Money.
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel through a reference, who suggested this as a good property in New Delhi, very close to New Delhi Railway Station. As others have noted, the location of the hotel is pretty much perfect -- right on the leafy esplanade. We were able to walk to most of the city's sites,   I have used them twice already (Delhi one day and Golden Triangle for 5 days). My best experience of any Indian travel companies involving tours and logistic. First, Rashid is quick and upfront about pricing. Cars, schedule, and itinerary tailored specific to us. No generic reply that you often get from most other car companies in India. No need to bargain as his quote is reasonable (again, this cannot be said about other car/driver companies). Our driver during the whole journey was Mr. Satbir‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Harshit S
Detailed Review: Value for money, best place to stay in budget at Delhi. Nearby to New Delhi Railway station. The interior of the room is classy and royal. You could feel the class while using room. Wonderful furniture. Hygenic, clean and nice

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Hitesh K
Detailed Review: I had a terrible expereince here. I came in the night around 3 to this hotel and asked for room. He took Rs. 2000 for six hours and after getting the money he gave the room to us opposite to their hotel. When we entered the room it was like nightmare place or a haunted place. Blanket was white with red spots and was smelling awful, A/C was broken and hanging. There was no soap and shampoo in the dirty bathroom. Bed broked in the midnight. TV was not working. And when we came for breakfast there was nothing in breakfast.The hotel is unsecured and police raid can happen anytime. When I woke up in the morning the hotel was very noisy we can not sleep. The reception guy was Sardar and fraud.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jaideep.Jadeja
Review: I mean this is no place to go
Detailed Review: I don't think this place has anything called ownership.... Was to check in by 10.30pm last night my flight got delayed so I reached Delhi by 1AM..... Called them to let them know that I am late but on my way to my horror I am told I don't have a booking only then he says I have released your room but can put you up nearby I mean such shady attitude this place works by and trip advisor is promoting a very unethical place for money

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: marcelyoung48
Detailed Review: We were in this hotel for five days. Hotel staff was really nice. On our request  they upgrade our room to superior room, a nice treatment detail in room and a welcome drink. In our room we find everything that we need. Breakfast was great i already paid for it on cheak in time. Staff member solved our every problem with politely and helped us to book a cab for city visit. It was nice experience in this hotel. In my whole stay all went well. I had a nice stay.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: SALIMSAYANI
Detailed Review: Very close to delhi station, rooms not that clean what it shows in their pics, noisy street area so you wont find peace. and room service is slow as well as poor. AC is old but works fine. food is good at terrace.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jos√©phine S
Review: VERY GOOD stay in Delhi :  thumbs up for the boys!
Detailed Review: What a choc when coming in Delhi at 2 o'clock in the morning, after 24 hour of travelling, and what a relief to arrive at Amax Inn.  We stayed a week at the hotel and it was very nice. At the beginning, we had a room at the first floor: I don't recommend that room, it's loudy and there was smoke in the room because of young guys smoking in the AC. Then, when they changed us for the 3rd floor, it was perfect. Clean, quiet, comfortable, big.  The boys are absolutely amazing. It is like a crew of guys wearing blue shirt who bring you whatever you need whenever you need it. Some are very cute.  HELLO and THANKS to Salim,  who showed us the view on the roof top, on the part where tourist are not usually allowed. The skyline of Delhi is wonderful at this spot, around 7 PM, when the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rosie G
Detailed Review: Emailed in advance to book and they arranged airport transfer. Room was great value and good location. Hotel staff were really helpful (let me call BA from their phone when my bag was delayed and sorted some site seeing)

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Freedom286740
Detailed Review: My friend and I (2 female travellers) stayed at Hotel Amax for 3 nights whilst in Delhi. We felt comfortable and welcome during our stay, nothing was too much trouble for staff. The roof terrace, serving beers and food, is a fantastic addition and a great place to meet other travellers. The hotel helped us to organise a driver (Raj) to visit the Taj Mahal, various sights around Delhi and our onward destination. Raj was polite, funny and very helpful. Hotel Amax is a great place to stay, if we're ever in Delhi again, we will be staying here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Baktash J
Detailed Review: This is the second stay in this hotel. Very good services, good food in the restaurant, nice staff, reasonable and cooperative management, and most importantly, a clean place!   I compared the prices of food is cheaper than the restaurants in the same neighborhood. You get things done, what you ask for! Sometime, staff forgot to clean, when reminded, no matter if it was late, still they did it with open forehead!  This will be the place to stay each time, need to visit Delhi.  Thank you Anil and the team to make the stay a good one!  See you,

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: shaunscottjohnson
Review: Great find - close to train station.
Detailed Review: Great hotel. Very welcoming. Pick up from airport which was straight to the hotel (750 rupee; taxi 500rupee, but driver has to pay for parking) Food a little expensive for what it was so if adventurous try somewhere else. I would recommend as a pit stop when starting travels in India for a first night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hameed m
Detailed Review: Very good service and good atmosphere  Speciality service and respected to customers every one.room arranging very spicess  area Good interior and exteriors  I like Amax inn comparing another hotels Ok every one welcome heartily

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Muhammed Kasim K
Detailed Review: 12 year in stay hotel  very good service room very good exlent place  staff very good service  food very good hotel resapation very good  management very good  room service  very good  I am enjoy stay hear amax

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: jagadishpalika
Detailed Review: Hi my self jagadish from hydetabad i am so comfort as i visited 7 times it was caring, room service, hygiene and quality management n food was asome thanks, i sugest to stay in comfort n good service   Jagadish palika

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lottie95
Detailed Review: This hotel is close to the train station about a 10 minute walk away, the alley way it's located down is pretty dodgy, there were people doing heroine at like 1 in the afternoon by the hotel BUT even so it did feel safe, believe it or not. The rooms are clean, the blanket on the bed seemed like it hadn't been washed for a long time, but being s bit thick blanket this would've been hard to notice. The TV has plenty of channels. The staff are friendly and very attentive. We weren't offered housekeeping at all during the first week we stayed, however when you needed toilet roll/soap/food from their restaurant you could call and the service for these were very fast. The food is good priced and the menu is vast. The breakfast and curry dishes are much better then the pastas/other‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: alexbullard
Detailed Review: I was really struggling with an injury I had sustained before my trip and needed to re-book my flight. I couldn't in the end but the staff were so helpful and let me use both the computer and phone to sort out my flight home. So kind and friendly. A really really great place with fast wi fi and great rooms.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shamimul A
Detailed Review: I am shamim, country bangladesh. I stay in  amax in hotel. This hotel is best hotel in arakasan road , pahargong delhi.  So everybody stay in this hotel. Service is best. The rooftop is good for food and travel desk us helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sanjoy G
Detailed Review: Hotel AMAX INN is a wonderful hotel to stay at in New Delhi. The stuff will take very good care. The hotel is very clean safe and nice free WiFi is also available. It is situated near to new Delhi railway station

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: faljahwry
Detailed Review: Its,second visit in Delhi. We,all group from Yemen  stays,this place. This place is,excellent  value for money. Rooms are super clean and bathrooms  are fully hygienic.  Tge staff is,welcoming  all the time even in the night . We enjoyed  food on the Rooftop with varieties  of  food to choose . My favorites  Bannana choclests pancake in breakfast.  I definitely  Recommend  and stsying again  at Amax Inn.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Darjapisorn
Detailed Review: This hotel is very clean, safe and nice. Wifi and great air conditioning. The staff will take very good care of you and help you with whatever you need. We appreciated everything so much! There is even a restaurant on the 4th floor with good food. Room service too, and all the prices are budget friendly! Would definitely recommend to other travelers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anne W
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax Inn is a wonderful hotel to stay at in New Delhi.  The staff is so welcoming and friendly. One staff member spent 3 hours with us booking train tickets and other touring things. We had a late train ride and they let us hang out in the lobby for a few hours. They spoke great English and went out of their way to help us.  The restaurant has very good food. The room was very clean and wonderful. The hotel is located just a few minute walk from the New Delhi train station. I highly recommend staying here!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: nareshsahu457
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax Inn is very nice hotel in budget in Delhi city. It is very good value of money and time also. It is very close from Main Bazaar only 10 minutes walk by foot. Room were decent and very clean, we were fully satisfied with it's all amenities.Breakfast was nice with high quality. Room services was good. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: prashantsinghna
Detailed Review: We stayed here for two nights. Room was very big and enough for my family. Received a very good welcome on arrival. Food was ok. Located very near to NDLS junction. And location outside is very good. Big market to buy everything. For me its a best hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: SALIMSAYANI
Detailed Review: Very close to delhi station, rooms not that clean what it shows in their pics, noisy street area so you wont find peace. and room service is slow as well as poor. AC is old but works fine. food is good at terrace.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Jos√©phine S
Review: VERY GOOD stay in Delhi :  thumbs up for the boys!
Detailed Review: What a choc when coming in Delhi at 2 o'clock in the morning, after 24 hour of travelling, and what a relief to arrive at Amax Inn.  We stayed a week at the hotel and it was very nice. At the beginning, we had a room at the first floor: I don't recommend that room, it's loudy and there was smoke in the room because of young guys smoking in the AC. Then, when they changed us for the 3rd floor, it was perfect. Clean, quiet, comfortable, big.  The boys are absolutely amazing. It is like a crew of guys wearing blue shirt who bring you whatever you need whenever you need it. Some are very cute.  HELLO and THANKS to Salim,  who showed us the view on the roof top, on the part where tourist are not usually allowed. The skyline of Delhi is wonderful at this spot, around 7 PM, when the‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Rosie G
Detailed Review: Emailed in advance to book and they arranged airport transfer. Room was great value and good location. Hotel staff were really helpful (let me call BA from their phone when my bag was delayed and sorted some site seeing)

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Freedom286740
Detailed Review: My friend and I (2 female travellers) stayed at Hotel Amax for 3 nights whilst in Delhi. We felt comfortable and welcome during our stay, nothing was too much trouble for staff. The roof terrace, serving beers and food, is a fantastic addition and a great place to meet other travellers. The hotel helped us to organise a driver (Raj) to visit the Taj Mahal, various sights around Delhi and our onward destination. Raj was polite, funny and very helpful. Hotel Amax is a great place to stay, if we're ever in Delhi again, we will be staying here.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Baktash J
Detailed Review: This is the second stay in this hotel. Very good services, good food in the restaurant, nice staff, reasonable and cooperative management, and most importantly, a clean place!   I compared the prices of food is cheaper than the restaurants in the same neighborhood. You get things done, what you ask for! Sometime, staff forgot to clean, when reminded, no matter if it was late, still they did it with open forehead!  This will be the place to stay each time, need to visit Delhi.  Thank you Anil and the team to make the stay a good one!  See you,

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: shaunscottjohnson
Review: Great find - close to train station.
Detailed Review: Great hotel. Very welcoming. Pick up from airport which was straight to the hotel (750 rupee; taxi 500rupee, but driver has to pay for parking) Food a little expensive for what it was so if adventurous try somewhere else. I would recommend as a pit stop when starting travels in India for a first night.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: hameed m
Detailed Review: Very good service and good atmosphere  Speciality service and respected to customers every one.room arranging very spicess  area Good interior and exteriors  I like Amax inn comparing another hotels Ok every one welcome heartily

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Muhammed Kasim K
Detailed Review: 12 year in stay hotel  very good service room very good exlent place  staff very good service  food very good hotel resapation very good  management very good  room service  very good  I am enjoy stay hear amax

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: jagadishpalika
Detailed Review: Hi my self jagadish from hydetabad i am so comfort as i visited 7 times it was caring, room service, hygiene and quality management n food was asome thanks, i sugest to stay in comfort n good service   Jagadish palika

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Lottie95
Detailed Review: This hotel is close to the train station about a 10 minute walk away, the alley way it's located down is pretty dodgy, there were people doing heroine at like 1 in the afternoon by the hotel BUT even so it did feel safe, believe it or not. The rooms are clean, the blanket on the bed seemed like it hadn't been washed for a long time, but being s bit thick blanket this would've been hard to notice. The TV has plenty of channels. The staff are friendly and very attentive. We weren't offered housekeeping at all during the first week we stayed, however when you needed toilet roll/soap/food from their restaurant you could call and the service for these were very fast. The food is good priced and the menu is vast. The breakfast and curry dishes are much better then the pastas/other‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: alexbullard
Detailed Review: I was really struggling with an injury I had sustained before my trip and needed to re-book my flight. I couldn't in the end but the staff were so helpful and let me use both the computer and phone to sort out my flight home. So kind and friendly. A really really great place with fast wi fi and great rooms.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Shamimul A
Detailed Review: I am shamim, country bangladesh. I stay in  amax in hotel. This hotel is best hotel in arakasan road , pahargong delhi.  So everybody stay in this hotel. Service is best. The rooftop is good for food and travel desk us helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Sanjoy G
Detailed Review: Hotel AMAX INN is a wonderful hotel to stay at in New Delhi. The stuff will take very good care. The hotel is very clean safe and nice free WiFi is also available. It is situated near to new Delhi railway station

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: faljahwry
Detailed Review: Its,second visit in Delhi. We,all group from Yemen  stays,this place. This place is,excellent  value for money. Rooms are super clean and bathrooms  are fully hygienic.  Tge staff is,welcoming  all the time even in the night . We enjoyed  food on the Rooftop with varieties  of  food to choose . My favorites  Bannana choclests pancake in breakfast.  I definitely  Recommend  and stsying again  at Amax Inn.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Darjapisorn
Detailed Review: This hotel is very clean, safe and nice. Wifi and great air conditioning. The staff will take very good care of you and help you with whatever you need. We appreciated everything so much! There is even a restaurant on the 4th floor with good food. Room service too, and all the prices are budget friendly! Would definitely recommend to other travelers.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Anne W
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax Inn is a wonderful hotel to stay at in New Delhi.  The staff is so welcoming and friendly. One staff member spent 3 hours with us booking train tickets and other touring things. We had a late train ride and they let us hang out in the lobby for a few hours. They spoke great English and went out of their way to help us.  The restaurant has very good food. The room was very clean and wonderful. The hotel is located just a few minute walk from the New Delhi train station. I highly recommend staying here!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: nareshsahu457
Detailed Review: Hotel Amax Inn is very nice hotel in budget in Delhi city. It is very good value of money and time also. It is very close from Main Bazaar only 10 minutes walk by foot. Room were decent and very clean, we were fully satisfied with it's all amenities.Breakfast was nice with high quality. Room services was good. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: prashantsinghna
Detailed Review: We stayed here for two nights. Room was very big and enough for my family. Received a very good welcome on arrival. Food was ok. Located very near to NDLS junction. And location outside is very good. Big market to buy everything. For me its a best hotel.

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: J S
Review: BEST HOSTEL EVER! I found a second family and home here.
Detailed Review: The best Hostel you will find in Delhi! Full points on: location, dorms, rooms, amenities, cleanliness, staff, food, kitchen, terrace, activities, yoga, music, dancing in the rain, cooking sessions, city walks, sunrises and sunsets! There isn't anything that I did not find great about Jugaad, and there isn't a reason to not book my stay here again! Thanks to everyone who made my stay so special and memorable!

Source.Name: Jugaad_hostel_Delhi2.csv
Name: Cameron C
Detailed Review: Jugaad is hands down the best hostel in New Delhi and the best in India. The staff is friendly, helpful and great to be around. Jugaad is a place where you can feel comfortable and have a good time. For me it is a second home in India. I have been staying there for many many years and it just gets better and better. Recently they served up some great khana as well. Good clean dormitories, nice A/C, great facilities, and very trustworthy. Various times I've left things there and they have been kept for me. Never feel as if I need to lock my things. The rates are affordable as well. This place is the best place for travelers to come when passing through or visiting Delhi. They really understand how to be hospital and to give each guest a good and enjoyable experience. Organizing‚Ä¶

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: PJT1009
Detailed Review: Walking distance to New Delhi Railway Station and metro, the Smyle Inn offers an affordable, comfortable room.  Staff are helpful.  Pre-booked pickup at airport worked well, despite arrival time being in early hours.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Mariano P
Detailed Review: Great attention and super friendly everyone of the staff. Everything works great, topical Indian breakfast and an option to change for one more occidental. Ac, good cold and hot water, offer a travel trip five in the building. Thank and see you soon.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Picaro9000
Detailed Review: Hidden in a narrow lane next to the central location (walking distance from the New Delhi train station) of the Main Bazar, Smyle Inn can be found. Location-wise, it is an easy location to explain to Rickshaw drivers: "just go to Citi Bank at Main Bazar." The rooms are very clean and cool, and the staff is nice (especially the owner Harish).  The rooftop restaurant was still under construction, so we went to one of the many restaurants nearby.  Perfect stay for a few days in New Delhi!

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: alexandraj29
Detailed Review: We arrived earlier than the check in time, but they made no effort to get a room available for us. They said come back at nine am, so we did, then they said oh there are still no rooms come back at ten. Finally when we got there we had to pay a lot more than it had said on the website! There was no warning about this so instead of 800 I had to pay 1200 rupees! Also the towels smelled disgusting like BO even when I asked for replacements. And the hot water did not work. All in all a bad experience.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: sids2k
Detailed Review: I think this is a decent budget accommodation. Don't expect anything fancy, but all the basics are in place. The wifi is good, you get breakfast, plus the staff is accommodating. If I reported an issue, they immediately resolved it. I will return here on my way back.

Source.Name: Smyle Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: PJT1009
Review: Budget Hotel - you get what you pay for
Detailed Review: Walking distance to New Delhi Railway Station and metro, the Smyle Inn offers an affordable, comfortable room.  Staff are helpful.  Pre-booked pickup at airport worked well, despite arrival time being in early hours.

Source.Name: Colonels Retreat_Delhi2.csv
Name: kathleenbT9943CW
Detailed Review: Had a great 5 nights at this hotel. Good clean room with large bathroom. Breakfast was lovely, especially the Indian alternative and set us up for the day. Very friendly and helpful staff. Lovely to meet the Colonel too.  Very close to the metro (walk or rickshaw) which made access to the city super easy and very cheap. Quiet area so got a good nights sleep. I was a little apprehensive initially as our room was directly off the common living/dining area and next to the kitchen but it really didn't affect us at all as the hotel is really very quiet. Will be back next time.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: raoul...s
Review: Very nice for a full immersion in Delhi and a very good intro to India for first-timers
Detailed Review: Though a little disappointing at first arrival, the manager, Rashid, went out of his way to fix the "glitches" and satisfy all our requests. He and his staff made for a very enjoyable stay as well as very satisfying recommendations (and arrangements) for trips outside of Delhi. We stayed over three weeks (on and off) and became "family" with many of the employees as well as the management staff.  Centrally located, nice rooms (even if a few are less amenable); the in house restaurant offers excellent Indian meals and is very reasonably priced. A coffee shop across the street (under same management) offers quite decent espresso and such. If you want a feel of India and the warmth of the people this is an excellent start.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: –õ–∞—Ä–∞ –¢
Detailed Review: The service was great. Transportation to/from airport was convinent, and driver was friendly informative about the area. Food was amazing, and breakfast buffet just 180 rupper. Staff was awesome, had some small isssues with air conditioner and they fixed it immediately.

Source.Name: Hotel_Ajantay_Delhi2.csv
Name: Saud P
Detailed Review: It was my Road trip from Bangalore to Srinagar with my family we traveled in 4 cars .I had booked 7 rooms in hotel Ajanta for 3 nights in may 20017 . Hotel is very good and clean! !Breakfast was excellent .Rohit was very well behaved and humble except 1 man who stoped and abused my men  while we wr cleaning our cars outside the hotel ! I suggest the owner of this hotel to remove that man immediately Sardarji on front desk was present at the time of incident rest no regrets nice place to stay ! I hope action will be taken ?????

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Bharat S
Detailed Review: Best hotel. Reasonable rate.Clean room. Cooperative Staff.Food is also.good.Also Owner Attention For Client is  Highly Appreciated.Not Hotel Look like Home. We give 5 Star I Recommend This Hotel.who Come with Family..Bharat  Saraiya

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Cruiser618758
Detailed Review: I travelled alone to India, and Hotel Amax was my first stop. Good rooms, good bathrooms, good rooftop restaurant. The in-hotel travel agent was excellent and helped me with train ticket and other travel around Rajasthan. Good all-round hotel and very helpful staff!

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: vikramsaxcena
Detailed Review: My stay in hotel Amax was awesome. The wonderful service by this hotel. The AC in room was working very well. The breakfast was served on time and was delicious. All in all the room wast fantastic. It was  a good choice for us. Location was good, it was very calm outside the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: _G3430DL
Detailed Review: Amax  inn  is cool place with wonderful rooms. The Rooms  and  bathrooms  are  super clean.  This is hard to find  in India. We stayed here for 4 days and it's  our second visit.  We are quiet happy with  Room service  and  staff. We are coming soon .

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: mohsen A
Detailed Review: We are friends  studying in Aligarh   university . We come to Delhi  offenly.  We always stay  at Amax  inn. The rooms are clean and bathrooms are clean and perfect. We enjoyed   the  food  on rooftop. The staff is always welcoming and smiling.  We Recommend  this place.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: rawatrashmi53
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at Amax inn.. The rooms are nice and clean.  The service is also good.  The staff is helpful and welcoming.. The owner is very friendly and helpful.  In all must visit hotel Amax if you are in delhi..

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: rajkumar_nagarajan
Review: Good economy family hotel with metro rail access
Detailed Review: Visited this hotel with my friend and his family. Booked the room directly with the hotel. Warm reception by the staff. Had lunch at room and the food was good. Rooms were very neat & clean. Especially the toilets were very neat. A very good hotel to stay with family at heart of the city with RK Ashram and N Delhi metro rail access. Highly recommended economy family hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Amit S
Detailed Review: Highly recommended to stay. Good food clean room. Perfect location to visit nearby attraction places. Friendly staff. Good owner. Roof top restaurant. Stayed 2 times at same hotel. .. Spacious rooms.    .

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: Guerby R
Review: Really kind service staff and good rooms.
Detailed Review: It s our second visit here!  The hotel is a really nice and good hotel. Everything is clean and the service is helpful and friendly,   The hotel is very good to reach From delhi airport and it has a nice rooftop !

Source.Name: Hotel_Amax_Inn_Delhi2.csv
Name: bhaskar c
Detailed Review: The hotel is peefect with its location and value for money.  The rooms are spacoius and clean . The staff is welcoming and always smilig even on odd hours. The reception is helpful. The food on the Rooftop is delicious. Definetly coning back soon.
